Summary: We stayed here for a large family vacation and each member was very satisfied with all parts of our stay here.  Having a great place to stay makes the rest of the vacation much more manageable.  We had clean and quiet rooms, friendly staff, great food with a lot of variety for everyone.  No complaints
Manager Response: Hi Bmh08.   On behalf of the entire staff, we are thrilled to hear about how great your stay was. We look forward to your next family vacation with us.

Summary: The hotel is very run-down. Dirty, old carpet. Cracked seams all over the bathroom. Rotten smell coming from the sink disposal. Broken elevator meant everyone had to use the one remaining elevator. The elevator is extremely slow. Staff had to use the same elevator too. It took 5 minutes every time you wanted to go downstairs. And each time you usually had a huge bin full of garbage or dirty clothes in the elevator with you. Huge chunks missing from the pool deck. Rocks and debris from the worn surface all over. Unsafe for kids to be on there. Huge wads of hair in the pool. Tons of gunk in the pool water. Super disappointed with this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear DisneyGuy2000,   Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We're truly sorry to hear the condition of your room and our property left you feeling disappointed in your stay. This is certainly not the impression we had hoped to leave, and we've shared your points of concern with our maintenance team to implement ideas for immediate improvements within our means. While we are not currently scheduled for an update/remodel, this is something we are working towards and in the early stages of planning. It may also comfort you to know the pool is scheduled for closing and updates within the next few weeks once we move into our slower season (so guests will not miss out on this coveted amenity). We sincerely hope once the pool is completed and our other updates are realized, you will allow us a second chance to host you as our guest.

Summary: This hotel is a great place to stay.  We are repeat guests.  The complimentary evening social, breakfast and grocery shopping are a huge plus!  Our only concern was the elevator that is quite slow.  If you are impatient, you might want to ask for a lower floor.  We had rooms on multiple levels, but the second floor was fine because they had a center set of open stairs we preferred to use instead of the elevator.  Very friendly staff and very clean.  We would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear 4LoLoTravel,   Thank you for being a lovely loyal guest. I apologize for the condition of the elevator, I will pass these comments on to our maintenance team. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: They rooms need a lot of attention, 1 elevator in the front that is the slowest you‚Äôll ever experience, which is a real problem when you‚Äôre on the 7th floor, if you walk to the opposite side of the building, that elevator only goes as high as the 6th fooor. For a busy area by Disneyland this property should be nicer.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Amazing stay for a family of 4
Summary: The breakfast was amazing. I showed up at 1230am during a holiday weekend and I still had parking. The cost for their Disney shuttle is cheap(almost the same price as ART bus, I only used it for 1 day but they had a multiday rate) but its direct and it's as large as a city bus so you are getting in.(Homewood is the first pick up and the marriot next door gets picked up too). The room was so convenient. Kids got the queen sofa bed in the living room. Its nice getting that door that separates the adult room from the kids. The elevator in the back is faster than the front...or.just work out your legs. The military discount was the best price. I had searched on the internet for the best price but I called in to make the reservation to verify all prices and the military discount
Manager Response: none

Summary: The only negative feedbacks I have is the slow and small elevator and the parking per day day fee.  Other than that everything else was EXCELLENT.  My family would definitely come back and stay there in the future!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is a good location for the parks.  The front desk staff was friendly and tried their best to take care of some rough situations.  We ended up in three different rooms, the first two not being clean.  The first with left behind hair from the previous guest and the second with the kitchen having not been cleaned.  The second room also with the air condition not even turning on.  The staff at the front desk did their best to make a bad situation better but it made for a very rough long travel which I would hope for better with a Hilton brand.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The bathroom was dirty with pee around the toilet. The wall have makeup smeared on it.The kitchen table, coffee table and toilet were broken. This location had no type of customer service. The emergency exit sign was broken with wires exposed on the lower wall. This was extremely dangerous. None is these things were fixed during my stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Positives- decent complimentary breakfast. Loved their granola with yogurt, fresh bananas, eggs, and coffee. Location was convenient and close enough to the Anaheim convention center. Also a Starbucks inside the Marriott across the street. Lots of space inside my room with great lighting.   Negatives- bedding was not comfortable. Covers were not soft and the pillow was too squishy. I had to get an extra blanket out of the closet, hoping to find myself warmer and more comfortable. No makeup mirror or shower gel (just the bar of soap). Overall, pretty average and decent hotel to stay in for a reasonable price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we‚Äôre very sorry you were unhappy with our suites. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.

Summary: I always love staying at this hotel. It The hotel offers a lot in a small space. Large suites with kitchens. large breakfast area with plenty of seating. Nice size pool with BBQ area. If you are sensitive to road noise do not pick rooms off of Chapmen. But you do get great views of the fireworks from these rooms.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was run down and desperately needs updating. The WiFi never worked, despite calls to the front desk. The breakfast buffet was terrible - I mean I don‚Äôt ever expect much from a complimentary buffet, but this was as bad as it gets. Parking is it free - I‚Äôm accustomed to paying for parking at nicer hotels where one has an option to valet or self park - but this is all self park on a surface lot, not even covered!  I expected a lot more for what we paid. I do not recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you have a family going to Disney this was a great spot.  Clean quiet Starbucks next door   Restaurants across the parking lot and a Target.  Ease to get to Disney?  We did both.  A cheap cab ride to Grand Ca hotel which has an entrance to Disney or a quick ride to the redone parking structure.  It‚Äôs were great!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Homewood Suites provided a comfortable stay after long days at Disney. The room was very clean with two TVs - one in bedroom and one in the living room.  The outdoor pool was also nice and it is right across the street from Target! Which is great!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice hotel with amenities. Spacious rooms. Convenient shuttle service to Disneyland for reasonable rate. Slow elevator. Parking available. Close to very expensive Starbucks. Easy access to Target and Red Robin.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff was friendly and attentive and rates were reasonable. The shuttle to Disneyland was very convenient but cost extra since it is provided by a third party. Rooms were average and slightly dated, but clean. The food offerings for breakfast and social hour were average or less than, but the food staff was excellent. The pool area was also simple, but a welcomed escape from the busyness of Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Stolen items/ manager didn‚Äôt make it right
Summary: We got our laptops stolen 3 days into our trip from our room and we had to fight to get things done. In my opinion he should have been prepared to offer something for our troubles. But I had to request things . Making the moment right is not their motto. Manager needs more training with customer service recovery
Manager Response: none

Summary: The stay was ok, some good & some not so. Room: was spacious,but the pullout bed was awful, with springs popping out. The bedding didn‚Äôt fit the bed, the pillows were horrible. Kitchen was lacking Utensils, no kettle, Dishwasher was Beeping a  lot , had to get Maintenance to fix. The lounge suite had disgusting cushions.  I feel that the room didn‚Äôt need the chest of drawers in the lounge. They should have had the tv on the wall on a bracket that way there is more room. The Dining table had one chair, we were a family of 4. The laundry room was very small and tight had only 3 washing machines & one was out of order .  Breakfast was ok, sometimes Cold not much variety, no waffles and my kids were disappointed. The lifts was slow, used the stairs daily!! Staff was ok.  Location
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great breakfast and evening social drinks/munchies. Staff from front desk to housekeeping is professionally fabulous. I would give this hotel a SIX STARS out of five. Shuttle to Disneyland for a minimal fee. Shops and restaurants across the street. So check it out for your self and enjoy!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We needed an affordable suite hotel near Disneyland and landed on this one. The location is good as you are walking distance to Target, Starbucks (in next door hotel), restaurants, etc. The hotel's shuttle to Disneyland is better than the ART because the hotel's shuttle has set times so you know when to be at the bus stops. The staff at the hotel were all super friendly, helpful and patient with some other not-so-nice hotel guests we saw who were upset that the hotel wasn't at the "main gate" of the park.  The free breakfast was also great and had a lot of options The only problem was with our room(s). We were first given room 410 and right away we noticed the bizarre smell (like Glade gone wrong) and how humid the particular room was. The room hallways also had a very strong
Manager Response: Coffeeaddict7,  We truly appreciate your time and feedback. I apologize for the inconveniences you had to encounter during your stay. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant time interacting with our staff! We strive to make a great experience for our guests and I am sorry we fell short of that. We hope to see you on your next visit to the area and would love to have a chance to give you that excellent experience!

Summary Heading: Pleasant Stay at Homewood Main Gate
Summary: Pleasant stay close to disneyland park. Staff was helpful and friendly. Room is clean and quiet. Breakfast is good with multiple options. Happy hours has good snack that we didn't have to order dinner. Wine and beer is ok but good enough to enjoy.
Manager Response: Hello joelU4825FY,   I am so pleased to hear that our location suited your needs and that our team took great care of you. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed our breakfast and evening social! Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Do not book...tired hotel and no interest in improving it

Our daughter could not sleep on it...we were offered an alternative room but were told all sofa beds were waiting on management prioritising the change of them so all would be as bad. The issues didn‚Äôt stop there...the room furniture was old with missing and loose handles all over 4 coat hangers for 5 people and the pool was full of debris. And  there were only 4 sun loungers; when we questioned why only 4 (which were taken by a family) we were told to ask the GM (who was
Manager Response: Welovethestates,  Thank you for taking the time to share your concerns. It is disappointing to hear that you were unhappy with your stay with us. Summary: The room was nice and clean. It was quiet. The fitness center was clean and all machines were working. Staff was excellent and food was great. I would recommend this hotel for business or leisure travel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had three families together, with the main purpose of going to Disney.  The rooms were great for the size.  The shuttle bus was amazing to get to Disney, always on time and friendly.  The breakfast options were great and plentiful.  The staff was always helpful and even went above and beyond when my daughter lost her stuffed animal.  We would definitely come back and highly reccomend!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This homewood suites is a decent hotel but it isn‚Äôt worth it to stay here when you can choose a better hilton closer to disneyland for the same approximate price. The building is getting old and needs lots of maintenance. The breakfast food offerings are worse than any other homewood suites I‚Äôve stayed at. The staff was great, but I would only stay here again if all of the rooms at all the other hiltons in anaheim were sold out.
Manager Response: Hello James G,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide us with great feedback about you recent stay, we know how valuable your time is. I apologize about the inconveniences you had to encounter. I will pass your comments on to our staff as we always strive to enhance our guest experience. We hope to welcome you home in the future!

Summary: Stayed here during our visit to Anaheim for the Disney theme parks. Hotel is nicely located and there are a number of restaurants downstairs within walking distance. Our room was spacious, clean and comfortable with a separate lounge and kitchen area. Nice pool outside too. There is a laundrette on the first floor for guests so that was very handy. The buffet breakfast was lovely way to start the day before venturing to Disneyland. The only downer for me were the old lifts which were a bit slow and tired looking so I took the stairs most of the time which was okay as my room was on the 3rd floor. Great place though and I‚Äôd stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was a weekend get away to Disneyland for the family. I chose this Homewood Suites for its location, and because I needed a larger room for the four of us. I'm a Hilton Honors member and I've stayed at nearly every (Hilton) brand in the area. I've found that the rooms at Homewood Suites in general are not as large as other suite type hotels. Also the free breakfast lacked a good selection of items and was nothing worth writing home about. If you want a larger room with a full breakfast, stay at the Embassy Suites for nearly the same price, if not a little more. The hotel was clean and the staff was friendly. I did notice a few minor issues with the building's infrastructure having to do with the hot water and ventilation, but I find these same issues at many other hotels.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent location -- excellent staff -- excellent rooms.  Perfect in every way.  We booked this hotel based on our prior experience with Hilton and its proximity to a conference we were attending.  When I called, the staff was amazing.  Looking forward to our next stay.
Manager Response: Itmwright,  Thank you for your 5 star review of our property. We are happy to have served you during your stay and we look forward to your next stay with us soon!

Summary Heading: Great hotel, friendly staff, great perks

Manager Response: Hello Voyager51510817363,  I am so pleased to hear that our location suited your needs! We are so glad to hear you enjoyed our breakfast and evening social! Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Hotel was more than I expected.  Professional Staff, good cleaning service, delicious breakfast and extremely comfortable.  Elevator was a bit slow, but not extreme. Shuttle service is well worth the cost and convenient. Overall a great Disney experience with grandkids.

Summary: The front desk clerk was unpleasant and overcharged my card. I was charged 3 times for a 2 night stay. He was willing to help me correct his own mistake! He expected me to swipe my card again. Restroom smelled like urine! My trip was ruined!

Summary: Service was great, VERY limited food options for those with dietary restrictions, VERY slow elevator. Overall, a decent hotel at which to stay. Would do it again at a good price. The staff really want's to make your stay e good one.

Summary: This is a great place to stay while in the area.  The hotel is clean, comfortable and quiet.  The staff is friendly and helpful.   The rooms have a full kitchen.   They have a shuttle that goes to the Disney Resort for a small fee.

Summary: Great place for family. Customer service is excellent, they go beyond to help you out. Clean and quiet environment considering how close it is to Disneyland is a bonus. We will definitely stay there again!

Summary: The Room was luxurious and beds where comfortable, wish they had better variety of foods. Great customer service and cleaning staff did a great job. So happy with our stat we will definitely be coming back.

Summary: Great overall experience. Hotel was clean, large rooms, laundry was available and helpful with infant. Great service all around. Breakfast provided daily and was a wide range of choices. Thanks to the amazing staff!

Summary: This hotel is always a pleasant experience. The staff is very welcoming. You feel like you‚Äôre coming home! The appearance is always neat and clean. Summary Heading: Good location with restaurants and Target near by.
Summary: This is our third time staying at this hotel.  For the military family price with the room size and free breakfast, it's hard to beat as compared to other similar hotels in the area.  Do not stay on the first floor near the pool if you like to sleep early.

Summary Heading: Really nice hotel - a typical Hilton Group property
Summary: We were passing through on our way from San Diego to San Francisco. We chose this hotel because it's part of the Hilton family and the price was interesting. We checked in and were greeted by a very friendly staff member. We had inquired what restaurants there were in the area and she offered us to stay and have a complimentary dinner in the dining area during the "Manager's Reception". We asked if we could take a look at the buffet, which we did and decided to stay, since the food looked really tastiy. And indeed, the food was just as good as it looked. Dear Homewood Suites thank you for the fine complimentary dinner. The suite was spacy, clean and quiet, so we had a good night's sleep. The breakfast the next morning was just as expected: a good buffet with a good variety to
Manager Response: 911ken911,  Thank you for your thorough review of our property. From our location, to our complimentary breakfast buffet / Managers Welcome in the evening. Summary: hotel significantly declined in cleanliness & service for am 3-4 year old hotel, halls filthy and stained carpets, rooms smelled like urine with sofa bed all beat up, floors in bathroom scrubbed, front desk staff not helpful. apparently quiet time is after 10pm so don't call front desk about extremely loud stomping and running in room above you at 5 pm, they wont deal with it. gym is run down, no sanitary hand wipes and equipment doesn't work properly. food is cold for morning buffet. Likely our last stay at this hotel. Note we travel frequently, have noticed the Hilton brand in general decline in service and more over past 4 years.
Manager Response: clbbb, thank you for taking the time to review our property.  I am so sorry that your stay fell below expectations.  It is our goal to make sure each and every guest has a memorable experience, and it seems we missed the mark.  I have reviewed your comments with my team and assure you we use this feedback to get better.  We hope that in your next stay to the area, you will give us another chance to give you the best possible experience.    Regards,  Richard Auer General Manager

Summary: Good location but old hotel. No safe in the room Breakfast is horrible Not clean You have to wait a lot for the elevator as one elevator beside the reception and one on the other side are serving 165 rooms
Manager Response: Dear Gyazbe,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.  Sincerely,  Nola Alexander Front desk supervisor

Summary: Very convenient location, clean and neat, staff are friendly, the 2 beds suite was perfect for our trip, breakfast with a good variety of choices, taste delicious, will stay in this hotel again, will refer to friends
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a great value!
Summary: The hotel was very accommodating and the staff was very kind! Very breakfast (5 total) was delicious and hot and the staff was always smiling! It was a very quiet place where it was easy to sleep in! Close to Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center!
Manager Response: I am so pleased to hear that your stay was so great! We thank you for your recent stay here at our hotel! I hope you felt at home.  We can‚Äôt  wait to welcome you home again soon!

Summary: For the family traveling to Anaheim California, the Homewood Suites Main Gate is a wonderful option.  The location is a little far to walk to the Disneyland Resort however the hotel offers a (pay) shuttle option.   The rooms are spacious and offer a full size refrigerator, which if you are traveling with a family is always a plus. The staff is always friendly and professional and I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay and for choosing our hotel for your families vacation.   I am glad you found the hotel to be to your satisfaction. I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well.   Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon.   Sincerely

Summary: Avoid staying here. Horrible experience!!! Place is super packed for breakfast, food is below average, parking fee is ridiculously high, location is great, if you have an emergency and need to cancel they will charge you anyways, check-in staff was rude! I stay at hotels for work and travel multiple times a month working in the sports entertainment industry and this hotel makes Hilton owed properties look bad.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Jesus,  I apologize for your stay not being to par. It saddens me to hear that you weren't treated with better regard, seeing as we take all our loyal Honors members to heart. We hope that one day we can make things up to you an offer a better experience if you choose it.  Sincerely,  Nola. A Front desk supervisor.

Summary: I stay at dozens of hotels per year for business.  This one stands out for the attention to making their guests feel welcomed and excellent customer service from every single employee, from front desk, to housekeeping.  Very clean hotel, great breakfast, helpful staff, perfect location.  Suites have everything a family could need for an overnight stay or more extended stay.  Kudos to management for running such a nice operation.
Manager Response: Dear Chad,  Thank you so much for taking the time out of your day to give us feedback about your recent stay and on this business trip. We are so pleased to hear our wonderful staff made your stay more enjoyable! We look forward to welcoming you home again soon!   Thank you,

Summary: We had a great stay to visit Disneyland. Staff is friendly and helpful. Breakfast was great. Parking was good and we were close to good restaurants. The room and very clean and comfortable for our family.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was great for the location of visiting family and enjoying the area. The staff was very helpful and smiled. The room was great and clean. The beds were very comfortable. The breakfast area always had plenty of food.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is convenient to Anaheim locations.  The lobby is newly remodeled and looks great.  The front desk staff were very helpful. BUT this facility is tired and worn out! The general cleanliness of this hotel is lacking.
Manager Response: Our most sincere apologies for any areas where we may have fallen short. It sounds like you have identified some needs for training and you can feel confident that we will take your comments to heart. We hope on your next visit to the area we can improve the experience for you. Thank you again for staying at our Property!   Thank you,  Raquel C.  Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great for Family Visits and Reunions
Summary: As with our last visit, we booked the Larger 1 Bedroom Suite for family to visit while we are staying in the OC. The room (201) was not nearly as well-prepared or supplied with the amenities as last time (room 701), perhaps rennovations are still on the way? Lots of small things to annoy us BUT the hotel staff (especially Raquel Clark, Guest Services) were always helpful and friendly. When you are planning a visit to Disneyland or North Orange County, I would highly recommend this property. The immediate response from staff, great location, Manager's Reception on weekday and Breakfast Buffet made it well worth it and we will be back next year!
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your time and response. I apologize for the inconveniences you encountered through out your stay. We appreciate your honest feedback, which we take into consideration as we work to improve our facility. Again thank you for your time and patience.

Summary Heading: Clean, great staff, average food and uncomfortable beds
Summary: Beds are uncomfortable and the food was mediocre. The staff was always friendly and helpful. Entrance to hotel was a bit confusing at first. Windows are thin and we heard people at the pool when they swam.
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your time and response. I apologize for the inconveniences you encountered through out your stay. We appreciate your honest feedback, which we take into consideration as we work to improve our facility. Again thank you for your time and patience.

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay near Disney
Summary: Stayed here for Disney trip with the family. Nice, big rooms with small kitchen. Was nice to have the kitchen setup if you're staying a longer period and want to be able to cook or reheat your food. With the one bedroom you get two good size, comfortable beds in the bedroom and a pull out sofa bed which was not particularly comfortable even with the added mattress topper you can request. Service was awesome and they immediately attended to every need. Wish the pool was at least slightly warmed as it was a bit cool for the evenings  Hot tub was nice and hot though. Breakfast was great and varied by day. The weeknight social was your choice of a beer or wine and a salad bar. We will consider staying here again for future trips to the Disney or Anaheim area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a nice hotel. I did not particularly care for the surrounding area but you will get what you expect when you stay at a Homewood. Good size suite. Decent free breakfast. The pool and jacuzzi are are just OK, nothing special to write home about. Our interactions with the staff were quite pleasant. Overall a nice place to stay. Seemed a bit high in price relative to the area but I am guessing Disney has a lot to do with that.
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your time and response. I apologize for the inconveniences you encountered through out your stay. We appreciate your honest feedback, which we take into consideration as we work to improve our facility. Again thank you for your time and patience.

Later that night we found an someone else sock left in the room. The toilet wouldn‚Äôt stop running and the vent in the vent in the bathroom didn‚Äôt work. Carpet in the hallway was tore up. I am currently waiting on a refund for that one night stay. Was very sadden how this place look to be a Hilton brand. Wouldn‚Äôt go back there again.
Manager Response: Dear Lem47:  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. I'm saddened to hear things didn't go as planned. As for your night refund, it was processed the day of your departure, so it usually takes the banks 3 to 9 business days to complete their cycles. Thank you again.  Sincerely,  Nola Alexander Front desk supervisor homewood suites anaheim main gate

Summary: The sheets smelled slightly of chlorine bleach, but the laundry detergent was unscented. I actually woke up without a headache 2 of the 3 days I stayed here. No bad reactions. Room was large with a separate bedroom. Comfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Sofa bed was horrible. The bottom of the mattress looked to be burnt or rusty and the springs could be felt through so much it left imprints on my daughters body in the morning. Socials would be nice if they lasted longer or ended later.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for two nights to celebrate our 30th anniversary.  The location in relation to Disneyland's Toy Story lot was perfect.  The parking places at the hotel were wide and there was no shortage of spots.   The front desk staff was top-notch.  As a Gold Member, they made us feel appreciated and welcomed. The beds and linens were very comfortable.  We slept very well.  The suite was spacious and well appointed and up to date. Loved every minute of our stay! We did hear some traffic noise in our room, but it was not bothersome. We enjoyed the breakfast.  There was plenty of variety to satisfy our hunger.  The evening was social was also very nice.  It was a little over-run with gluttonous children who were poorly supervised, but that is not the hotel's fault.  (Don't get
Manager Response: Wbil,  Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay. I am glad you found everything from the location of the hotel, to your room and more to be to your satisfaction. I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well. We hope to welcome you on your next visit to the area!

Summary: We have stayed two other times at this hotel and it was fantastic (wondering if it was because we spent all our time at Disneyland those trips), this last stay left a lot to be desired.  This trip we stayed 5 nights.  Our other 2 stays were a quick night or two.  Prices at the convention center homewood were slightly cheaper (and we stayed there for a quick trip before as well), but we decided the dedicated shuttle was worth the extra price.  After all our other quick visits here we had no complaints.  This time was disappointing.  The other trips the staff made my kids feel so welcomed.  This trip everyone acted as if we were an inconvenience.  We were told they were over booked by one room, so maybe they were stressed (?) As for the hotel itself, it‚Äôs a lot older condition
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your time and response. I apologize for the inconveniences you encountered through out your stay. We appreciate your honest feedback, which we take into consideration as we work to improve our facility. Again thank you for your time and patience.

Summary Heading: Really warm and friendly...Perfect for families, or folks stopping through
Summary: Stayed here for a few days visiting Orange County, and going to an Angels night game. There were lots of families there, but it wasn't noisy or unreasonably chaotic. They obviously know what they're doing as a company, and execute it well. I was able to make my own coffee, which was really great. I didn't get to utilize the kitchen space as much as I would've liked to, but if you need that, it's really quite impressive. They have social times in the evenings, which is a nice option if you're into that. We were tired, so opted out during our stay. The staff is friendly, and helpful. Really suggest this, even if you're a couple, or don't have kids, but want some peace and quiet and prefer to cook your own food, or have those options.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel has a great staff, great snacks  and a front desk manager that is out of this world. Nola made us feel at home, went above and beyond to make the stay enjoyable. you for a great stay and would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello and Thank you for taking the time to give us a little feedback about your stay. We are so glad to hear your time with us was enjoyable. We hope to welcome you back sometime soon.

Summary: My stay was for 5 weeks and overall was happy about the experience. Food at the evening socials was often dry but palatable. Breakfasts were very good Room was clean and kept up during my stay. Good location with a lot of places to dine within walking distance
Manager Response: Hello and Thank you for taking the time to give us a little feedback about your stay. We are so glad to hear your time with us was enjoyable. We hope to welcome you back sometime soon.

Summary: Excellent hotel for family. Bedroom is comfort and nice view. Hotel staff excellent. Breakfast and diner is good. The room is like a mini house. have every things that you need. microwave, cook top, refrigerator, cookware, plate,......

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near Disneyland

Manager Response: Dear Sunshine, Thank you for your kind remarks about your stay here at the Homewood Suites. We hope next time you visit, we can offer you some matters padding in order to improve your sleep!  Sincerely, Nola. A Front desk supervisor.

Summary: When they say "Main Gate Area" I assumed they were actually near Disneyland... they are only a 5-10 minute drive away but certainly not walkable (we are currently in a Disney hotels and heck, their own hotels aren't walkable... )... The first complaint I have with this hotel is the thinness of your own walls - we have a family of 5 and got to listen to ever person using the bathroom in great detail. Couldn't sleep through someone taking a shower... Second complaint is the mattresses... they feel like you are laying on old newspapers or something. Don't get it. Love Hilton but this hotel wasn't the best.   The elevator layout is senseless too - they only have two elevators. One very convenient and by the front counter. The other at the far end of a long building. If you follow
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Scott it saddens me to hear that your stay was not up to par. We are the ‚ÄòMain-Gate‚Äô to the City of Garden grove, its entrance. And since this Homewood was the first built in that location, we were honored with the name. Also unfortunately due to the Hotels older condition we have no control over the wall standards and elevator placements. But we could‚Äôve help you further with the unpleasantness of the mattresses. Summary: I usually love this hotel, but not this time. The mattresses were old, and killed our backs. The curtains did not close, they had a six inch gap, someone did not measure right, and the pull down shades lack taste, we could not sleep past sunrise. The pool literally has 3 chaise lounge chairs so we couldn‚Äôt enjoy the poolside like we have before. The hotel is clean, and the staff is really nice, but it‚Äôs hard not to be disappointed with the lack of quality things like good mattresses, pillows, pool lounge chairs, and feeling like you haven‚Äôt slept well because of those things that should‚Äôve been taken care of for the price you paid. I don‚Äôt stay at motel 6 so the accommodations should reflect Hilton, not Super 8!

Summary Heading: Not the nicest Homewood I've ever stayed in
Summary: The hotel is in a great location and offers a shuttle service (for a fee) to Disneyland.  It's right on the main strip so there are plenty of restaurants around.  Our room was just ok - pretty dated and some of the fixtures were worn / falling apart.  It's definitely not the nicest Homewood Suites I've ever stayed in.  The breakfast buffet was stellar though, definitely enough to load you up for a fun day at the park.
Manager Response: Hello and Thank you for taking the time to give us a little feedback on your stay. We do apologize for the inconveniences. We will take your comments into consideration while we work to improve the service.

Summary: Very friendly service and CLEAN accommodations.  Shuttle service to Disneyland right out the front door. Pool and hot tub well maintained. Great item choice for breakfast and the coffee was hot when we arrived.
Manager Response: Hello and Thank you for taking the time to give us a little feedback about your stay. We are so glad to hear your time with us was enjoyable. We hope to welcome you back sometime soon.

Summary: This hotel is great! Can't beat the free breakfast. The buffet is fully stocked and accommodating for those with allergies. The rooms were a great size for our family of 4. The kitchenette was awesome and the staff did great keeping our coffee stocked. The only downside was the the dressers we're a bit old and run down. But to be fair, I never addressed this with the staff and it certainly wasn't something to keep me from returning to this establishment. This location is a but further from Disneyland, but they offer a shuttle that takes you straight to the gate for a reasonable price. And the hotel.is right across the street from Target. The staff at this hotel is the best I've ever interacted with. You really can't go wrong booking your stay at this hotel.

Summary: We stayed in May 2019. The hotel had friendly staff, and the  shuttle service was great. The breakfast was good and convenient. It was nice to have a full kitchen in the room.  Plenty of space in the room.

When I complained more vocally, I eventually received a Be Our Guest Certificate, which gave me one free night at any HS. Fast forward to April 23rd, 2019, when I used the certificate at HS in Anaheim.   I was supposed to get one free night and properly presented the Be Our Guest Certificate. Summary: Easy check in. Clean room. Full size fridge. Living room area was spacious. Kitchen was had a stove. Amazing view of the Disneyland fireworks from our room. Nice hotel for family or for couple how just want to get away.

Summary: I can‚Äôt really fault this place.  Suits families as has separate lounge.  Plenty of room.  Has a kitchen and they do a free breakfast.  Shuttle to Disney leaves from the front every 30 minutes and same on return.  Has a nice pool and parking.

The hotel's location is near lots of restaurants & stores within walking distance. The pool & hot tub are kept very clean. We observed pool & grounds being maintained on several occasions.The negatives are that you can hear your neighbors because walls are not thick. Also

Summary: We love it there. Remember that this is a three star hotel and this was our third visit. The suite was clean, comfortable and the kitchen well stocked. Everything worked. The customer service is

Had to pay extra for a shuttle and went back and forth awaiting that each day trying to time it right and missing and awaiting another 30 minutes each time missed. Would not go again to this hotel with a family and certainly not for a Disney trip.

My advice, stay at the San Diego Sea World location. It costs less. It's beautifully remodeled. Modern.

Summary: very friendly staff, rooms were excellent, breakfast was awesome, everyone greets you with a smile. everything was at walking distance and I would definitely recommend this to anyone and I sure will be coming back.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear your stay with us was a pleasant one. We truly appreciate you sharing about your visit and thank you for giving us the chance to accommodate you while in the are. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: We reserved a King suite but upon arrival, they told us it was sold out and they gave us a queen suite and adjusted the nightly rate. We were fine with that as it worked out better for us since the sofa bed was too springy and worn for our kids to sleep in. I called to see if they can replace the sofa mattress but they said it is part of the sofa. I think the hotel is a very good value as they gave breakfast and light evening meal along with beverage.  They were also very generous in giving bottled water upon arrival. I didn't like the tap water, so the bottled water came in handy.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. We truly appreciate your feedback and comments and thank you for giving us the pleasure to accommodate you. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: My Family had been planning this trip for months.  We were excited to stay at a hotel so close to Disney. While that stayed true, we were told there was a Free Shuttle, which wasn't true and we were also charged for Hotel Parking even as hotel guests. :( The Housekeeping was not good at all, but the Front Desk staff was very nice.  FREE Breakfast was a great perk for us, however, if you're taking it to your room to eat, prepare to stand in a long line to get on the ONE elevator or climb the stairs.   For the price, I've stayed in better.  For the location and a cheaper option to staying close to Disney, it'll do.
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize about the experience you had during your visit. We truly regret the service and elevator inconvenience. We truly appreciate your comments and feedback and thank you for giving us the chance to accommodate you.

Summary Heading: Comfortable stay at this recently remodeled property!
Summary: Stayed here for a few evenings while staying in Orange County and it was a comfortable stay. Booked direct via Hilton and was able to choose my room 24 hours prior to check-in. Hotel even texted me inquiring on my time of arrival and was open to requests via text.  Check in was excellent by Janelle. She acknowledged being part of Hilton Honors, made me feel welcome, and ensured I was ready and on my way in a quick and efficient manner. ...seems like this property offered a Digital Key, but it was down upon arrival...  One Bedroom suites are spacious. The queen bed seemed on the small side...perhaps it was a full? Mattress was in good condition and the property has been recently remodeled.  Water pressure in the bathroom was great although the towels were starting to show its
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. We are truly happy to hear Janelle was accommodating during your check in. We appreciate your comments and thank you for giving us the pleasure to accommodate you.

Summary: Family trip to Disneyland. We have stayed at Homewood Anaheim before and enjoyed our experience again. The complimentary breakfast is a great way to start the day. Transportation is easy and convenient from the hotel without relying on the Anaheim Resort Transit. Overall great trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. We appreciate your comments and thank you for giving us the chance to accommodate you once again.

Summary: Great hotel, very accommodating.  Staff was tremendous.  Clean rooms.  It's about a 30 minute walk to Disney -- not too bad at all.  Or, the shuttle is convenient (except at night).  Overall, we had a great stay.  I would definitely recommend this one.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I truly appreciate your comments and feedback. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way!

Summary: The room I stayed in was a two queen suite and it was beautiful, comfy and clean. The staff was honestly incredible and helped me with any questions I had and offered local recommendations as I had never been in the area before. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for giving us the pleasure to accommodate you and thank you for your feedback. We hope to see you again in the future if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: We stayed at the Homewood to attend a conference at the Anaheim convention center and also visit Disney.  The hotel is is a great location to get to both easily.   Overall, the hotel is in great shape, and looks like it has recently been renovated.  Breakfast buffet had a lot of choices as well as the night time reception. In addition to being in close proximity to Disney and the convention center, it also has quite a few restaurants within walking distance.  Basically in the same parking lot.  The only negative comment I have is the elevators.  There are only 2, one on each end of the building which aren‚Äôt enough for that size hotel.  I know there is nothing they can do about that, but we spent quite a bit of time waiting for an elevator.   Overall, rooms were great, clean, and
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. We are truly happy to hear your stay with us was an enjoyable one. We appreciate your comments and feedback and we hope to have the chance to accommodate you once again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Thank you Hilton for another great stay and a surprise outing with my kids. Over the last 22 years, I have taken my kids to a surprise location to celebrate Father's Day. This year was L.A./Disney Land. We had great fun, many memories, and for me, an awesome blessing to be a dad!‚ò∫

Summary: Good hotel close to Disney. Great breakfast selection and decent evening food Monday through Thursday. Great pool. Very helpful staff who went out of their way to rectify and problems. Older propert but great renovation.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for giving us the pleasure to accommodate you. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way!

Summary: I recommend this hotel, we had a really good experience.  the staff was amazing, very helpful and friendly. we will stay here again. the breakfast could use some help, we were expecting something along the lines of embassy suites. but overall very nice hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. We appreciate your comments and feedback. We apologize for the inconvenience the breakfast might of caused. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way!

Summary: We had a very bad experience at Anaheim Marriot Suites. Homewood got us right in and took great overall care of us. We would definitely recommend this hotel. We will look for a Homewood on our future travels.

Summary: This Homewood Suite has a great staff.  The breakfast and evening reception is great for families.  It is close by some restaurants.  They have a shuttle to Disneyland every 30 minutes for a nominal fee and in my opinion it is far better than using the Disneyland parking lot/garage.  They have a hotel gym which is good for a hotel gym and a pool.  The only drawback was the hotel elevators are slow and because I am not patience, I used the stairs. I would definitely bring my family back here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. We are delighted to hear your stay with us was pleasant one. I apologize for the elevator and the inconvenience this might of caused. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: We booked the suite with kitchen for our stay. We loved that the bedroom was separate from the kitchen//living area. We planned on using the kitchen to cook some meals. A little disappointed with the amenities in the kitchen. If you plan on cooking, make sure that you pack measuring cups/spoons, bowls for mixing etc... The stove is very small, so only plan on using one burner at a time. Otherwise, we enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am terribly sorry about the inconvenience you experienced during your visit. We appreciate your comments and feedback, and thank you for giving us the chance to accommodate you. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Conveniently located and great spacious suites
Summary: We enjoyed our stay here. Staff was very accommodating and suites were very spacious and love the layout . We have 2 bedrooms and full kitchen , living room and dining room. We feel like we were in a resort.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear your stay with us was a pleasant one. Thank you for your comments and feedback, we hope to be at your service again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Amazing staff and entertainment but very dirty
Summary: Front desk were very friendly and helpful. The activities and dining options that were held every night and day were amazing. The cleanliness and smell of the hotel and room was very terrible. Parking and security were great.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am terribly sorry about the room cleanliness and smell during your visit. I apologize about the inconvenience. Please allow me to be at your service if there is anything that I can do. Thank you again and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: From the start to Finnish I had a really good exp! Everyone one there is on the same page from start to Finnish! Clean! Respectful and great area! I recommend this hotel! I will definitely be returning!

Summary Heading: Have had better in the past
Summary: Have stayed here many times, but this time was a  Fiasco. I don't know why quality suffers with time.  Room was run down this time, no Cold water for shower and room heater not working.  Had to change rooms. I needed help with getting a airport shuttle, first staff member told me to go and look it up on the internet to find a shuttle.  I looked, asked a different staff member on which company is best, she just pulled out a book and called for me, only wished the first girl would have.  Good side  Great breakfast and Mon-Thurs dinner included too!  That helped so much with 5 of us (2 being children). I will stay here again, just hope they clean it up!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I sincerely apologize about the experience you had with us, I deeply regret the lack of service from my staff and the quality of the property. Please allow me to be at your service if there is anything that I can do for you. Thank you for your time and patience and we look forward to see you again.

Summary: The hotel was very clean and the staff were always friendly and welcoming. The complementary breakfast exceeded my expectations and everything went smoothly on this family vacation. Will definitely stay here in the future.

Summary: The hotel staff was helpful and friendly. The rooms and amenities were great. The location is also close enough to Disneyland with restaurants and Target close by. The rooms were nice and clean with plenty of space. We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear your stay with us was an enjoyable one! Thank you for sharing about your visit and thank you for your feedback. We hope to have the chance to accommodate you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: First the good things...the staff was very friendly and accommodating. We requested extra towels and they were brought to our room very quickly. The rooms were clean and there was a nice kitchen in the room. This was within minutes of the Disney theme parks. There also was a nice breakfast included each morning. ( the breakfast ended kind of early, check the times) There were a few things that needs improvement. There didn't seem to be enough elevators for the size hotel. There was usually a wait. There was no ice...the ice machine on our floor was torn out. Our toilet ran unless the handle was lifted... All in all it was a nice hotel it just needs some updating.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear your stay with us was a pleasant one. I apologize for the elevator and ice machine, I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience this might of caused. We hope to have the pleasure to see you again if your travels bring you back our way!

Summary: Overall it is nice hotel that is close (not within walking distance) to Disneyland.  The room was clean but a little worn compare to the better Homewood Suites we have used in the past.  The staff was very nice and helpful.  We were able to get a good rate (about $150/night).  The breakfast was good with a good selection.  The evening meals were also good, saving us money on food.  The location of the hotel is very nice with many places to eat within walking distance and a Target close by as well.  While we liked this hotel, I would not have paid the higher summer rates just to be closer to Disneyland.  There are many other hotels within 2 to 5 miles of the park.  I also don‚Äôt recommend the shuttle service to the park.  It isn‚Äôt free (I believe $6 per person) and we heard it was
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. We appreciate your comments and feedback and thank you for giving us the chance t accommodate you. WE hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way!

Summary: Stayed on points for CA trip for family event. Did not realize upon booking it was so close Disney - this was not our reason for staying. We stayed Memorial Day week. It was very busy. Overall I think the hotel handled the large crowd well. There was sufficient food for breakfast every morning. I liked the variety and something changed each morning. The evening free food was not so great. The one bedroom was a bit on the small size  and was poorly designed. We had a maze of doors between the bathroom and bedroom door that went in opposing directions to block access to the sink. Not sure why a pocket door wasn't used. Pullout bed was pretty bad but son slept anyway. The pool was fine. As others have said forget the elevator - use the stairs. Location was actually good for our
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. We are terribly sorry about the inconvenience of the suite. We appreciate your comments and feedback and thank you for giving us the chance to accommodate you.

Summary: Please note, I had a very hard time writing this hotel. I think if there was a 2.5 that would've been a little bit more accurate. The reason it was so difficult was because the staff was very friendly.  Location.  This hotel is not located anywhere near the main gate of Disneyland. The reason I'm saying this is because it is called Homewood suites by Hilton Anaheim maingate and the title kind of implies that they are near the main gate of Disneyland.  There is a Target Store right across the street from the hotel. This is a huge advantage because Target carries everything from groceries, to clothing, and tons of Disney souvenirs. It was particularly convenient for us because of the dietary restrictions in my family. Gluten-free options were definitely available at Target, and

Summary: This hotel is a good value if you are planning a Disney trip. The complimentary breakfast is a good way to kick off you day. The staff were all very friendly and attentive. The only complaint is the lack of elevators for a hotel this size. Be patient or take the stairs.
Manager Response: We are delighted to see your stay with us was an enjoyable one. Thank you for sharing with us we appreciate your feedback. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Hotel is in great location and the rooms are spacious and nicely laid out. The breakfast is superb and the evening social as well. The pool is nice and clean and kids had a blast playing in it. Disney fireworks can be seen from upper floors.

Summary: The proximity to Disneyland combined with the value and guest experience make this the location I chose whether it is business or pleasure when traveling to Orange County. The staff is the most friendly and helpful I have seen at any hotel in any city.

Summary: The hotel was large and very close to Disney you could fit 6 adults and a child in here if you needed. We has a two room suite. Two queen beds and a pull out sofa. The room has a fridge and nice kitchen.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for sharing about your visit and thank you for giving us the chance to accommodate you. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Always a great place to stay
Summary: We love this location, close to Disneyland and everything else we need. Great breakfast and very nice, clean rooms.  The recent renovations have only added to the desire to continue coming back to this Homewood location!
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit. Thank you for your feedback and comments and we hope to see you again if the future.

Summary Heading: Great, clean hotel with free breakfast, dinner and superb customer service!
Summary: We were visiting the Disneyland resort for 4 days with 5 people in the two queen suite. It was ample room, very clean and comfortable beds. The free breakfast was pretty good, not the best, but saved us $$ at the parks. The evening reception was different each night and was good as well with free beer and wine. Wish they had included free soft drinks, but once again, saved us $$ overall. The front lobby staff and kitchen staff were very friendly. I would definitely recommend this hotel and would stay here again.  Also, the hotel shuttle to the park was always on time and only made one stop which got us to the park fast than previous places we've stayed before.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. We are truly happy to hear your stay with us was an enjoyable one. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: I love the Homewood Suites brand, but this particular Homewood Suites its just dated. There are two in the area, one the Anaheim Main Gate area and the other the Convention area. I've stayed at the Convention center HS, and so i expected the same level of quality. Sadly it is not. No real complaints really, except for the elevator, it is HORRIBLE. We took the stairs our whole stay, which was fine for us, I have teens and tweens, but for some this could be a real problem. The staff is extremely nice and helpful, food quality was the same, room was clean, it just wasn't the level of the other HS. Next time I will pay the extra money and stay at the newer Hotel that is actually closer to Disney anyways.

Summary: The staff here was as nice and as helpful as any hotel I have experienced.  We had a very nice stay here. I found this to be a very good value for the cost.  Rooms were clean and spacious; breakfast and evening meals were great.

Summary: This hotel is friendly and clean. They offer free breakfast in the morning which include eggs, pancakes or waffles, fresh fruit and oatmeal. Something for everyone. Located near Disneyland. For a fee a third party shuttled transports you to Disneyland. The rooms are spacious and the mattress comfortable. I would definitely recommend this hotel especially families.

Special shout outs to staffers Brandon, Eva, Nola and Stewart for taking the extra effort to assist our family with the Hilton Honors Mobile App requests  during our vacation stay. While the staff did a phenomenal job with what they had to work with I do have to doc some points for the other areas of the hotel stay. Make sure you tell guests not to use the back elevator while "checking in at the front desk". It may not be obvious to guests even if signs are posted on the first floor. I tried to use the back

Summary Heading: Brandon at the front desk is AWESOME!
Summary: Our family of 6 stayed at the Homewood Suites for 2 nights for a Spring Break Disney Trip. Brandon checked us in and showed us amazing Hospitality. Thank you for taking great care of us. We enjoyed the shuttle, the free happy hour, (however we don't drink, wish they served soft drinks as well) & the free breakfast. There is a Target across the street so bought some items to cook in the Kitchenette.  We will be back. Thank you!

Summary Heading: Great stay when you're doing Disney
Summary: Enjoyed our three day stay last week at Homewood Suites. Staff was friendly and helpful. They gave us water when we left because I'm a Hilton Honors member. Breakfast was free and more than I expected. Very good! We didn't take advantage of dinner or manager's cocktails but I would have loved to. Our room was big and we were lucky because it was close to the elevator. There was only one elevator near our room and was slow sometimes but it wasn't a big deal. There are washer/dryers on property which is a plus! The only negative things I would say is i felt the carpet and bath towels could be cleaner/newer. I didn't feel comfortable letting my infant crawl around everywhere. Also, right across the street from Target! That being said, I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear your stay was en enjoyable one and the amenities and area were appropriate for your vacation. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: This used to be our favorite place to stay every Spring break...this time we found it different...not the same home feeling...it felt cold...too modern...it was sad they changed the fire place with the cute Disney character statues they used to have that I took pictures of my kids with in the past...food wasn't the same..no waffle irons..it was depressing...we won't be returning..plus they promised to take care of the parking for us...being long time customers and members and they still charged us and never credited the amount back...that topped things off..we'll miss the old Homewood...off to find another Spring break get away!
Manager Response: I am terribly sorry to hear about the experience you had with us. I deeply regret the lack of service and follow through. Summary: This hotel is great value for a family with breakfast included. As a family of three we welcomed the extra space of separate bedroom with two Queen beds, flat screen TV and plenty of cupboard space. The lounge/ kitchen had a pull out sofa bed, another flat screen TV with all the Kitchen facilities you really need on a holiday- large fridge/freezer, microwave, crockery etc. I thought breakfast was going to be like the Holiday Inn Express offering, but no the choice was better and varied each day. An added bonus was to find out they offered a light supper buffet along with beer or wine , absolutely free from 5-7pm Mon - Thurs. The main purpose of staying here was access to the Disney parks where the hotel offered a regular bus service which was good value. The staff were all very
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us about your visit. We are truly delighted to hear your stay with us was an enjoyable one. We are happy to know the amenities and grounds made your visit a pleasant one. We look forward to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Wonderful staff, very accommodating!  Food was great, themed nights, breakfast and tea thrown in - saved us heaps, especially for a family of five!   Rooms were clean and comfortable!  The price for the rooms was very reasonable, I had actually booked at another hotel, but then found this one - saved us $600 plus we ended up with queen beds all around!  Within walking distance of Disneyland and shops.  At the time we stayed they were renovating, they organised for us to do our laundry at the hotel next door.  The renovations did not interfere with our trip.  Would stay here again!

Summary Heading: Amazing rates, Amazing staff, Over all impressive
Summary: This hotel was perfect for our visit. We arrived late with no troubles. The room was amazing for having got such a great deal. Great place to stay for lengthy trips. The staff was amazing. There was one little hiccup and they were on top of it with good attitudes. While I was standing at the front desk, multiple guests stopped by just to thank the girls for their kindness. I would recommend that if you're taking a trip to the area that this be your first choice for your stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us. I am truly happy to hear our team was able to assist and made the stay as smooth as possible. We appreciate your comments and feedback and we look forward to see you again.

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for 11 days,close to fullerton or amtrak rail stations for easy access into la, near shopping and resteraunts, breakfast is standard fare, dinner selection I was impressed with, always included salad, place is packed with kids on weekends ,also the earlier you go to breakfast and dinner the better, rooms are quiet and comfy, staff is suburb, visiting from maryland and will return to this homewood in the future, thanks you all for a great vacation stay.

Summary: Perfect setting for a family staying in town for theme parks. The breakfast options were very good and were different from one day to the next. The free shuttle to the theme park was quick and timely. The staff were very friendly and eager to help clean your table and accommodate your requests.

Summary: I got the reservation using phone reservation, I asked for a fare with parking included However even I requested to remove the charge you guys charged anyways! I stayed 4 days before with the same fare and you didn't charge... why did you charge in the second stay... please be serious
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel.  We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience.

Summary Heading: great location and exceptional customer service
Summary: Conveniently located, great happy hour, and superb customer service. Truly enjoyed our stay and our family will be back soon! The room was clean and appliances worked very well. The dinnerware and household basics were fully stocked and ready for use. The BBQ Grill was a nice touch, we used this complimentary amenity daily. Felt like home.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am truly happy to hear the amenities we offer and the staff were able to make your stay an enjoyable one. We appreciate your feedback and thank you for giving us the pleasure to accommodate you. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: They found my son's cell phone and returned it to us!  -Yeah!!!
Summary: Mr. Martinez, Brandon and the staff went out of their way to help recover my son's cell phone that had been lost on the property. When my son returned from his high school orchestra's music festival trip (a six hour drive away from us) he discovered his phone was missing. We then checked on the GPS locator but the hotel staff couldn't find it. They went out a second time to look for it and this time we were able to activate the remote ringer. It was under some palm branches that had fallen down on it from the high winds of the day before. The staff went out of their way, twice, to help us out. The manager FedEx'd the phone to us. They were amazing on the phone and in their help to recover the phone. Way to go, Homewood Suites!  Yes, we will stay there again!
Manager Response: We are very happy to to hear we were able to be of assistance. Thank you for sharing with us about your visit, we appreciate your feedback. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way!

Summary Heading: Great friendly staff! Super clean! I highly recommend this place!!!
Summary: Maria and staff are extremely helpful, cordial, willingness to help in any way possible!  Hannah, my granddaughter, and my two daughters plus myself were staying here for our Disneyland visit/Hannah's 6 Birthday vacation.  Hannah was telling Maria with great excitement that she had just turned 6 that Thursday morning!  Maria listening to all of Hannah's plans for her Birthday.  And then asked what room we stayed in.  We told her and left for the day.  Upon returning to our home away from home, Hannah had a beautiful surprise gift basket waiting for her!
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear your stay with us was an enjoyable one. Thank you for sharing with us and thank you for giving us the pleasure to accommodate you. I will ensure to share this with the team as they will be thrilled to hear they were able to make you feel at home. We look forward to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Have been coming to this hotel for the last ten years every time we visit Disneyland, great rooms, very spacious, seperate bedrooms and full kitchens, very close to target so can stock up on snacks and drinks etc after long days at the parks. Always put on a great breakfast and snacks in the the afternoons on Mondays thru Thursdays. Great pool area, staff always very friendly, cant wait to go back!

Summary: Everything you need to be comfortable and feel right at home! You will experience feeling like you're going back home when you come back to your room from your daily activities.The food is average quality, and the room is comfortable with an almost full kitchen. No oven, though.

Summary Heading: Stay from Hell - And very costly
Summary: Shower goes cold two minutes in. My two daughters never got a chance to take a shower because of cold water and time to check out. Noticed black mold in the shower. I reported it to the front desk. Maid comes into the room while I am getting dressed to collect dirty towels. I had just got out the shower, therefore, only 3 towels were dirty. Both smoke detectors in the rooms did not have batteries. The wires were hanging from the base. Front desk Brandon, not very warm and non-apologetic. Would only give me 20 minutes to check out - 12:30. Not enough time for my daughters to showers. Let than a 24 hour stay cost well over $200.00 and no showers. I will not stay again.

Summary Heading: Nice staff, clean resort, close to Disneyland
Summary: This was a very nice and clean resort that was close to Disneyland.  The staff was extremely helpful and the room was spacious enough.  They cleaned the room daily and were extremely responsive to any needs we had.    The only thing that could use improvement is the pillow quality and comfort/size of the beds.  For us the pillows were too soft and the beds weren't that comfy, but they weren't awful.   They have one elevator in the lobby that is VERY SLOW because it goes to all 7 floors.  There is another one all the way at the end of the other side of the resort so it's not very convenient.  Outside of that, it was a nice place to stay and would stay here again.

It is a bit of a walk if you plan to go to Disneyland, but doable. Not sure if they have a shuttle, but I know there is a bus that comes into the parking lot. There are a few restaurants in the parking lot and right across the street. Parking is only $10 per night- half the price of hotels closer to the park. I would definitely go back.

It is our goal to exceed the expectations of our guests. I am working with our housekeeping staff to prevent this from happening in the future.

Summary: We stayed in the homewood suites when we attended Disneyland.  The staff was extremely helpful and professional.  The hotel was clean and we enjoyed the hot breakfast everyday.  I'd highly recommend them.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear your stay with us was an enjoyable one. We look forward to be at your service if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: A wonderful place with outstanding people.
Summary: We have stayed there on our yearly California trips for 5 or 6 years not would not consider anywhere else.  The rooms are all suites with a bedroom and a full kitchen.  However the people are the most important in any kind of transaction and every employee we have encountered has been friendly and helpful.  The Assistant General Manager, Luis Vasquez has been as kind and helpful as anyone I have ever met.  He is a huge asset to this property.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear we were able to make you feel at home once again. Thank you for your comments and feedback and thank you for your loyalty. We look forward to see you again.

Summary: We chose this hotel because it was near my daughters dance competition and because I'm a Hilton honors member. I love how most of the Hilton family of hotels offer breakfast, it makes it convenient for me and my family. Their staff was so helpful and generous. The pool area was clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear your stay with us was an enjoyable one. Thank you for giving us the pleasure to accommodate you and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Excellent Service - Beds, not so much
Summary: This hotel has a very friendly staff and the rooms are well maintained. The shuttle service to and from Disneyland is also a great feature.  Our only complaint was the beds. Our grandson slept on the pull-out couch bed which had springs sticking all the way to the top of the mattress. It actually hurt him to lay on it.  We complained and a staff member brought up several blankets to put on top of the mattress which helped a little.  Our king size bed wasn't much better.  It was also a spring mattress that had seen better days. We left a message for the manager on our first night (of 3) that we were there regarding the poor mattress.  He/she never responded.
Manager Response: I am terribly sorry about your experience with us. I deeply regret the lack of follow up during your stay on our behalf. Please allow me to be at your service if the re is anything that I can do. Thank you for your time and patience.         Best regards,         Luis Vazquez  Assistant General Manager  luis.vazquez2@hilton.com  Phone: 714-740-1800 ext.434 12005 Harbor Boulevard Garden Grove, CA 92840

Summary: I wanted my kids to have 1 really great trip to Disneyland and the hotel delivered on their end! We didn't realize they offered dinner so that was a pleasant surprise. My youngest had a million stuffed animals and we would return to find them nicely lined up on the couch. The cable is a little lacking and 3 hours ahead but oh well. We will stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with u about your visit. I am delighted to hear your stay with us was an enjoyable one. Thank you for your comments and feedback and we hope to have the pleasure to accommodate you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Great hotel except for the morning shower dance.
Summary: We were provided with the suite on the 5th floor.  The suite is very spacious. The kitchenette was very helpful for reheating and eating left overs and keeping goodies cold in the refrigerator. The couch was a pull out couch and was decently comfortable. The bedroom was spacious with 2 queen beds. The bathroom was large as well.  The staff upon arrival was very friendly and welcoming, making the check-in process smooth and painless.  There are some quarks about this hotel.  There is only one elevator to serve each wing so this means a lot of waiting for the elevator.  Also the elevator is not too fast.  We waited about 10 minutes for the elevator when we arrived.  The morning elevator wait times were not as bad as the evening.  Also the shower in the morning was a cold, despite
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear your stay was a pleasant one. I am terribly sorry about the inconvenience you experienced with the shower and the temperature of the water. I apologize for the inconvenience and please allow me to be at your service if there is anything that I can do for you. Thank you again for your time and patience.         Best regards,         Luis Vazquez  Assistant General Manager  luis.vazquez2@hilton.com  Phone: 714-740-1800 ext.434 12005 Harbor Boulevard Garden Grove, CA 92840

Summary Heading: Wonderful Accommodations for a Disney Trip
Summary: This hotel was wonderful in every way. The room was clean, comfortable, and spacious. The breakfast buffet and evening socials were delicious -- far above and beyond the typical hotel fare. The Disneyland shuttle was affordable and easy to use. I'd stay here again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the feedback, we really appreciate it. We are glad that you enjoyed our breakfast, evening reception and using our Disney shuttle. We definitely look forward to having you come back and staying with us again.

Summary: All of the staff at this facility were truly amazing! So thoughtful and genuinely kind!!  The room was spacious and modern. It was clear that the hotel has put quite a bit of time into updating everything. The 7th floor had a beautiful view of the sun setting over the city even‚ô•. This is a MUST VISIT kind of property!  Plus, they had a lady in the kitchen for their dinner social, whose only purpose, was to pour wine and beer for guests! Now thats what i call customer service!
