Summary: Had a great stay for our Disneyland trip! The room was extremely quiet, and clean, with plenty of room for our adult children. The breakfast and staff were wonderful! We will  definitely be back. Great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your recent stay. We appreciate your feedback and thank you for giving us the pleasure to accommodate you. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Janelle is pretty awesome. Several requests were made and every time she delivered promptly and happily. The other staff members were very friendly as well and always smiling. Will stay again. Business or personal travel would be equally enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am really happy our team was of assistance and helpful. Thank you for your comments and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: I booked the wrong one, was trying to stay at the new one closer to Disneyland but this one was perfectly fine for my daughter and I. It was her 16th birthday and we got a free bus pass for 2 days and that bus to Disney is CRITICAL. I love that it arrives and departs exactly on time. Don't be late. The lobby was under construction i think a bit or newly done and very bland/white so i thought it was the back, but really WHO CARES? The staff was very friendly, no pool(construction) but we didn't need one, there is a little minimart for essentials which we ended us using quite a bit, the restaurant across street delivered TO OUR DOOR. Yes the living room furniture is a bit hard and generic but when you realize how often these rooms turn over i think it has to be. Yes there are only

Summary Heading: Great stay for Family Disney trip

Summary: The staff bent over backwards for me when my car broke down during my stay. The shuttle to disneyland was always on time. Breakfast wasn't amazing but it was edible. My issue was with a slow draining shower that caused me to stand in ankle deep water while showering.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear we were able to make you feel at home. I am terribly sorry about the inconvenience you experienced wit the bathtub. We hope to have the pleasure to accommodate you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: I arrived late, it was raining and I really appreciated the front desk staff. Plenty of parking and the room was quiet. Breakfast options were great.  I hope to return again.  The pool area was nice, this was a business trip, I'll be back during hot summer.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the chance to accommodate you while in the area. We are happy to hear your stay was a pleasant one and we look forward to see you during the summer time.

Summary: Great experience! Will definitely book again! Shuttle too and from Disney was great! Complimentary breakfast was a little sparse for my liking, but over all good. Staff was very willing to help! Evening social was enough to feed us dinner!

Summary Heading: Best stay of any hotel I've ever stayed at in my life!!!!   Life-changing to experience - even BETTER than Bun & Burger!
Summary: Better than Bun & Burger!!!   Oh, and let me tell you - Bun & Burger was greaaaattt!!!   Sometimes I used to go there with Shane Head, and sometimes with Chris Davila, but mostly I just went with my friend Daniel.    Daniel and I both appreciated Bun.& Burger's lightly salted burgers, as well as their 2-for-99 cents Burger special!!!    Wow!   They even had a cool sign in their Dutch Haven Plaza outpost, which read, cleverly, "Here's the Beef!!"  And they were RIGHT!!!   The beef most certainly resided there!   Well, this hotel was right up there with "Bun & Burger!"  I hope that this fine hotel gets a lobby arcade, and can have the classic game "Jump Bug!" In their arcade.   'Bun & Burger' had 'Jump Bug!'     God, I loved Bun & Burger.

When I walked in they were testing the fire alarm, the agent who checked me in was very kind and apologized multiple times for the strobe lights and alarm going off. I didn't get to meet Brandon but I have to say if it wasn't for him I would've had a horrible day. I love this hotel it's my 1st choice when needing a place to rest after working a double shift!

The comfortable index has been argued quite extensively in the industry in this regard, but I have always relied on my own, that is, three things: the first is the comfort of the facilities which should provide all as needed from breakfast to dinner, then laundry and fitness rooms; the second is the comfort of the room where I have to eat, work and sleep; the third is the comfort of the staff in terms of communication with.   This hotel has actually met all the above criteria. Although it was in renovation in part of the hotel, it didn't affect my staying and enjoying all the things that one intends to

Summary Heading: Have Come to Expect More from Hilton
Summary: This is easily the worst Hilton property I have ever stayed at. The sink in the kitchen didn't drain. There was only one chair for the kitchen table, even though I was in a two-queen suite, so obviously made for more then one occupant. The couch was incredibly uncomfortable and too big for the living room - I had to kneel on it to close the drapes. Speaking of drapes the ones in the bedroom didn't touch, so there was a sliver of light all night from the parking lot, so much for having black out drapes. The lightswitch for the bathroom was not actually in the bathroom. Which means, if you have a late night trip to the bathroom, the whole family gets a flash of light! The vanity was in the bedroom, so again, the whole family is woken up if you need to wash your hands or brush your

Summary: You can't beat these rooms for the price! This is a great place to stay for a week-long business trip.  The extra space really allows you to stretch out and relax.  I did not feel cramped like I do in a standard hotel room.  The best part is that the price is comparable with a standard hotel room.  I highly recommend this hotel.

Summary Heading: Not What It Used To Be
Summary: We've been staying at this property since 1996 but it's gone completely downhill. First, it was under construction, which was not listed on the Hilton site. Had we known that, we would've booked at the other property up the street. No handicap parking, the front doors were blocked off, elevators didn't work one day, room was filthy, (poo and boogers on the walls), missing and torn curtains, torn and stained bedding, blankets were so old they felt like sandpaper. The sofa bed mattress was the worse I've ever seen...filthy and nothing but metal springs). Our first request for blankets was ignored. Our second request was met with 3 wet blankets...yes, they were WET! The front door was blocked off...having a handicap person in our party, this was a REAL issue and complete hassle! On
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback of your recent stay with us. I was very sorry to hear that you were unhappy with the cleanliness of your suite. Summary: We enjoyed our stay at Homewood Suites garden grove. We were concerned leading up to our stay re previous reviews. Yes, the lobby is being renovated,the lift is a little slow(but there is a second lift on each floor) neither worried us. Everything about this hotel was convenient. Close to Target, bank of America and many restaurants. There was a shuttle, that cost $6 per day, that was always on time. There was a laundry on the ground floor. The complimentary breakfast was more than adequate.As the managers reception, four nights of the week. And the staff were the most friendly I've ever come across.. We would stay again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Thank you for haring with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear your stay with us was an enjoyable one. Thank you so much for your feedback and comments we truly appreciate it. We hope to have the pleasure of accommodate you once again if your travels bring you back our way. Thank you again and Happy Holidays!

Summary: Complete kitchen facility, closet space, spacious rooms, very helpful & pleasant staff.  Separate vanity convenient, allows family organization for dressing.  Fast complimentary wireless Internet.  Clean CARPET, no dirty socks.
Manager Response: Than you so much for your feedback and comments we are very happy to hear your stay with us was a pleasant  one. I appreciate your time and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area.

Summary: Hotel is under construction, however very Friendly Staff and clean Hotel! Front Desk Staff Jeremy and Andres were very friendly and helpful! We will be back and will be bringing more of our Family. Can't wait to see the facelift.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us, I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and that Jeremy and Andres were able to make you feel welcome. We look forward to see you again in the future!

Summary: The hotel is something you might expect to find in a poor/rundown section of town.  The front entrance was taped off with yellow tape,  I thought it might be a crime zone.  Hard to find the registration desk.  Room dirty and worn, torn draperies,  no hot water,  no shower, and there is more.

Summary: Staff was extremely pleasant and nice. They get a 10+ Hotel was under construction, but i didn't mind it too much. A few strange things: Housekeeping was vacuuming hallway at 6 am, which I found odd.  It didn't bother me as an early riser, but it was strange. Great value

Summary: The hotel is undergoing renovations in the lobby, breakfast area, and pool. The hotel rooms were spacious and clean as expected from Homewood Suites.  The front desk staff was very nice and helpful, in spite of working in a small area due to the renovations. There's only one elevator near the front desk.  The elevator is slow.  There's another elevator towards the back of the building which is closer to the parking lot.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am terribly sorry about the renovation and I apologize about the inconvenience. I appreciate your feedback and comments and we hope to have the pleasure to accommodate you once again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Wonderful hotel if you are traveling with family.  Close to restaurants, Disney parks, and Target for those last minute items.  Staff friendly and accommodating.  A shuttle to / from Disney parks for additional fee is nice.  The shuttle allowed us to return to the room to take a break enjoy the evening social before heading back to the park.  Location undergoing renovations but that didn't affect our trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing wit us, I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and the amenities we offer. Thank you for your feedback and comments we appreciate it. We hope to see you again once our renovations are done if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Overall good stay.  Beds comfortable.  Convenient location.  Decent selection for breakfast and dinner. Conveniently able to take out with disposable plates and utensils. Only negative was as a hiltons honors member, I wish there was no parking charge.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted o hear your stay with us was pleasant one, Thank you for giving us the chance to accommodate you and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Hotel rooms definitely need updating/refurbishing as many of the finishing touches (carpet, carpet base boards, flooring) were old and very worn however, the staff was very helpful and customer service friendly. The service and cleasiness is really bad.  * Rooms are dirty (Hair in tub, Red stains on comforter's, Dirty Carpets and dishes) * Food is awful  * Bad Service * Elevator not working properly * Parking was tough to find a spot  The hotel does not live up to the Hilton Brand

Summary: We stayed in 623 and our son and his family across the hall in 622. It was so handy having the kitchenette and really liked that the bedroom was separate from the living/cooking area.   That free breakfast was great with a huge variety of hot and cold items.  The staff throughout the hotel were very friendly and helpful.  The shuttle to Disneyland was perfect for our group of six (3 generations).  The main floor was under renovation and the pool was not available but we could have used the pool at the hotel next door but really didn't miss it. Next to the hotel is a Starbucks and a really good Italian restaurant/sports bar where we ate twice - great happy hour prices on alcohol and appies. There was coin laundry available too.  We would definitely stay here again on our  next
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. We are happy to hear your stay with us was an enjoyable one. We appreciate you giving us the chance to accommodate you while in the area and thank you for your feedback. We look forward to see you again, Happy Holidays!

Summary: This is a wonderful place to stay.  The rooms are suites, thus allowing privacy to sleep or rest while your family  or friends enjoy the living room and kitchen.    Hotel Suite was Very clean, the bed was very comfortable.   The breakfast buffet was good with many choices. And I could take the breakfast to my room to enjoy.
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear your stay with us was pleasant one. Thank you for your feedback, we are very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and the amenities we offer. We hope to see you again if you travels bring you back our way.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel a few times and it's a great, reasonably priced option for our family. The suite is nice as it gives everyone a little bit of extra room.  The breakfast and easy reception definitely helps the budget and there is a nice family restaurant/sports bar in the parking lot, and an outback just a few steps away.   The shuttle to Disney is reasonably priced - about $5 per day for adults, and you can come and go as much as you want every 30 minutes. In my opinion it's way better than trying to park and then shuttling to your car.   The staff is do friendly and the rooms are cleaned.  The hotel was going through temps, but they did their best to give guests a great experience anyway.  The pool wasn't open but we had access to the Marriott next door - just
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty and thank you for giving us the pleasure to accommodate you once again during you r travels. Thank you for your comments and feedback I appreciate your time and patience. We look forward to see you again. Happy Holidays!

Summary: Our experience, other than construction, was great.  The staff were amazing, tremendous, outstanding and all those terms and should be give credit for making our stay great.  The room was wonderful.  The bed extremely comfortable and the pillows heavenly.  We did not lack anything and highly recommend the Homewood Suite that we stayed in.

Summary: This is a very convenient location within walking distance of Disney Land, the convention center, multiple restaurants and shopping. I had a corner room and despite many families staying there, once I was in my room, I never heard anyone. My room was clean, spacious and comfortable. The staff I encountered were nice and helpful. The pool area looked nice, but I did not go out there. Parking is relatively secure. They serve breakfast, which was fair at best, but let's be honest - is any hotel breakfast good? The breakfast buffet had a large variety of items to chose from. If my kids were with me, they would have been happy and it's an inexpensive way to fill them up before starting the day. Since the weren't, I opted to go elsewhere after the first day.

Front desk was awesome though only good thing about this hotel.

Summary: I thought we would be close to the main gate at Disney and we weren't. You'll need to take a shuttle and the shuttle schedule wasn't very obvious. I'm going back to the Residence Inn so I can walk to the parks. This hotel is still undergoing construction.  The elevator was the slowest I've ever experienced at a hotel. The room was clean and spacious.
Manager Response: I am terribly sorry about the distance of our property to the theme parks. I apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay. Thank you for your time and patience and please feel free to let us know if there is anything that we can do for you.

Summary: I was hesitant about this hotel based on reviews however it was above my expectations. Staff was awesome!  Rooms were large, clean and everything was remodeled. Shower always had hot water. Which was nice after a long day at the park. The free breakfast and dinner was awesome!!  Breakfast had everything you could want. Kids loved nacho night and especially the freshly baked warm chocolate chip cookies!!  Location was perfect as well!!  Close to Red Robbins, Joes Crab Shack and Outback. Target is right across the street.  We used the hotel shuttle service which was very convenient. I would definitely stay here again!!!  Thank you Homewood Suites for an unforgettable Disney vacation!!

Summary: We stayed here Nov. 6th - 10th for a family trip to Disneyland. Staff was very friendly and helpful! The shuttle picks you up at the front door! Breakfast and evening social dinner was good...they even served beer and wine which was a plus after a long day at the park. The room was smaller than other Homewood Suites that we have stayed at but no big deal as we were only there to sleep and shower. I would recommend this hotel!

Our stay was suppose to be 7 nights we only stayed 2 before checking out. I would not stay at this hotel again!

Summary: Homewood Suites s a gift that keeps on giving. I have stayed at this hotel multiple times and I can honestly say that I have never been disappointed. The staff is the absolute best in the world. When you walk through the door, anyone of them: Nola, Stewart, Alan, Jeremy or Luis will greet you with a smile and make you feel as if you are the most important guest there is. You will very much feel at home in this hotel.  They serve breakfast 7 days a week and you can even get something good to eat in the evenings M-Thursday. The rooms have recently been remodeled. I thought the old rooms were great but the new rooms are fantastic. Don't want to eat fast food or not feeling particularly social. There is a nice size refrigerator and two burner stove in your room. You can go to the

Summary Heading: Great Hotel without the outrageous prices
Summary: Great hotel and location. Complimentary breakfast was great way to start a full day of Disneyland. If you plan on being in your room alot, then this may not be the best place for you. Room wasn't the most up to date I have stayed in but it was perfect for my family to rest and sleep in after a long, full day of disneyland. I would definitely stay here again.

Summary Heading: Great place for a family Disneyland stay
Summary: Overall this Homewood has nice accommodations, a very friendly staff and a good location.   We had planned to get ART passes but noticed at the last minute some posts saying the hotel offered their own shuttle option. It's basically the same price as ART, but you don't have to walk to an ART stop. We had no problems with the shuttle and would definitely recommend it. However, it was not a busy time at the park while we were there, so I could see it being a little crazier at times.  I would categorize the breakfast as good. The buffet would have some type of an egg dish, breads & toaster waffles, oatmeal, fruit and dry cereal. Often the eggs would be made in a way to be able to make something like a egg/muffin sandwich, breakfast burrito, etc. They also have a decent manager's
Manager Response: We are happy to hear your stay with us was a pleasant one. Thank you for your feedback and comments, we are happy to know the amenities we offer were helpful during your visit. We hope to have the pleasure to accommodate you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: We stayed at the hotel while visiting Disneyland.  The welcome from the front desk staff was warm, friendly and overall first class.  All their staff were wonderful - they could teach other hotels in other cities I've visited a thing or two about customer service.  The hotel had a fairly reasonable breakfast buffet that would include oatmeal, some egg dish, breads, fruit and dry cereal.  The location was a little far to walk to Disneyland in warm weather, but probably doable when it gets cooler.  The hotel offered a shuttle to Disney for $15 each.  Across the street from the hotel was a Target which was very useful since we wanted to cook a bit.  The kitchen area was very user friendly - the room had a nearly full size fridge and plenty of cutlery and dishes.  Highly recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. We are happy to hear your stay with us was an enjoyable one. Thank you for your comments and feedback we truly appreciate them. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Excellent place for a family to live between trips to Disneyland
Summary: The accommodations are fantastic and the staff is friendly and responsive.  cooked and prepared our own food (healthier and much less expensive than the park). The shuttle service to Disney a big plus!

Summary: I was greeted as soon as I walked toward the front desk. I already checked in via my hhonors app and it was painless to get my keys and my hhonors loyalty gifts. The staff here was very friendly and I had several people ask me if I needed anything.  Breakfast is always nice and they had scrambled eggs, bacon, potatoes, breads, cereal, oatmeal, yogurt bar and fruit. There may have been more items, but I just really wanted eggs and coffee so I didn't pay much attention. You can eat it right there or take to your room on paper plates.   I didn't participate in the Monday night Happy hour as I was off to Disneyland for an event. I'd love to stay longer and enjoy some of the evening receptions sometime. I'll be staying here again soon.

Summary: They were doing some minor renovations by the lobby but the rooms are really nice! Clean, comfortable & quiet property down the street from Disneyland. Hotel staff was very nice and always helpful.  Shuttle to the convention center was also convenient.  Downside, there is a $10 nightly parking fee.

Summary: I'd booked for a conference.  My mother was diagnosed with breast cancer, and I needed to reduce my trip.  I was within the 72 hour cancellation period, so they insisted on charging my card for the first night.  Was going to stay for 2, but given that I just came out for one since I was paying for 2 anyway and needed to get back.  Then they charged my card for the full time (4 days) instead of 2.  Then they charged it for another one in trying to correct it.  I had to go the the desk 4 times to get it straight.  Food was cold.  Service and attitude were marginal to bad.

Summary: We have a family of 6 and we reserved a one bedroom 2 Queen suite with a separate living area that has a pull out sofa. The room was clean and kept clean throughout our 7 day stay. Housekeeping missed a few minor things--didn't stock dishwasher soap but quickly responded when we called the front desk, missed resupplying bathroom towels one day but, again, quickly responded after a phone call to the front desk, and missed re-lining the trash containers a couple of days but wasn't a bid deal because we had Target bags that we used instead (we didn't make a call because it really wasn't that big of deal to us).  We used the breakfast buffet every morning. Every morning, there was a different meat choice, a rotation of scrambled eggs (plain or southwest style) or eggs cooked

Summary Heading: Our new favorite place to stay!
Summary: Great hotel near Disneyland. Near stores to get groceries or restaurants if you don't want to cook! The staff was so nice & helpful. They always welcomed us back or wished us a fun adventure on our way out! Plus the beds were comfy too! We will defiantly be back!

Summary: We stayed for a week.  The room was comfortable with a bedroom & separate living room, full sized refrigerator, 2 burner cooktop, dishwasher & microwave. A hot breakfast every morning included some sort of eggs, potatoes, cereal, breads & bagels, fruit, waffles, juice &coffee. They are remodeling the lobby area, but the inconvenience is kept to a minimum. The pool & hot tub was clean & enjoyable.  There is a happy hour Monday-Thursday that could probably be used for a meal! The staff was very nice & helpful.  They have a shuttle (not the ART shuttle, so less crowded) to Disneyland also.  I'd definitely recommend this hotel. Great stay!

I requested a crib, an upper floor so we could see the Disneyland fireworks (I read on a blog you could see them from the hotel), possibly later arrival, and adjoining rooms. We received multiple e-mail replies confirming the reservation.   I, again, called the hotel to confirm that the reservation was not duplicated in their system, as it appeared in the multiple e-mail confirmations.  The agent confirmed the reservations and

Summary Heading: Rooms have been refurbished!  Meals were delicious!
Summary: We have been going to this hotel for many years.  We went last week and the rooms are so nice.  The breakfast & evening receptions were great.  They're doing construction in the lobby, so there is quite a bit less room to dine there for the meals.  We always were able to get a seat if we wanted one though, because we are early eaters.  There were a couple of days when we decided to take the food back to the suite so we could get ready quicker which worked out fine as well.  The breakfast consisted of coffee, juices, milk, cold cereals, oatmeal, toast, bagels, yogurt, fruit, eggs, some type of meat, and generally another dish or two as well as another pastry/waffle of some sort.  Evening reception consisted of salad, soup, and an entree along with sodas/alcohol.  I used the

Summary Heading: As a returning guest, our recent trip was disappointing.
Summary: After traveling for 20 hours drive all the way from Seattle the rude night shift person didn't accommodate us very well. Tub what's plug with black moldy stuff that came out when I tried pulling it up and down to unclog it, water you showered with is above 8" of your feet. Night shift F.desk didn't bring us an extra blanket when we checked in after midnight. We extended our stay 2nd night and address those issue but nothing was done. After our long day at the park, no running hot water till the next morning so we slept sticky and sweaty after our long day bec. Water was freezing cold. Our 2nd night was free due to the hot water.

Summary: First time staying at Homewood Suites!  Large, clean rooms and every convenience of home.  Quick, hearty breakfast available every morning.  Family-friendly for sure, but just as warm to us singles.  Welcoming staff from the front desk to housekeeping. Comfortable bed and no problem with Wifi access. Food & Shopping within walking distance.  Short shuttle ride to Disneyland.   Pool; clear & clean.

Summary: We booked at the very last minute avoiding hurricane Mathew in Florida and instead opted for sunny CA. The reviews were spotty so I was a it worried.  Here's the deal the hotel is under renovation with all guest rooms and hallways done. Public spaces on the first floor still being worked on but it wasn't a problem. Food service area is done and most of the lobby.  The hotel was $179 a night a full $100 cheaper than the other Homewood suites a mile away. All said, I believe it to be good value for the area, however if they raise their rates after the remodel is done I might consider another hotel. There are some good attributes and lingering bad even after the remodel.  The good: Breakfast buffet was plentiful even with a high load of people with lots of choices. The suite room

Summary Heading: Best Customer Service, Great Location and Good Accomodations
Summary: From the moment you enter the hotel you are greeted with Welcome!  We had the best customer service.  The rooms were nice and clean but it was the staff that made this the best trip.  The hot water went out over night and they were immediately on getting it resolved, they were apologetic and offered us free 3-day shuttle service.  In addition, they don't have a military discount but were kind enough to pay for our parking for the 5 days we stayed there.  These are items that make a company special when they go above and beyond what they "have" to do.  We have stayed there many times and will continue to have this as our hotel of choice whenever we visit Anaheim.  Thank you so much!

Summary: My family stayed for a weekend at Disney and loved it. The rooms were clean and ready by 2 PM on the day of our arrival. Although the lobby was under construction, the staff made every effort to not let that interfere with our vacation. The breakfast was good, the coffee was hot, and most importantly, the area was clean. I would stay here again on my next visit.  We stayed in room 309/311 and did not notice any hallway or elevator noise.

Summary: We've been traveling almost nonstop for the last 3.5 years across the USA and this hotel, by far, is tops. The staff is the most friendly and professional we've been around. We'll be here for at least six weeks and they've become like family. They are in the midst of a renovation downstairs and yet it is still one of our best stays.   We are hoping they will add an outside restroom by the pool, which is needed, and a basketball court during the renovation so we'll have that to look forward when we come back this way. When we are booking a reservation at a Homewood Suites, one of the first things we look for is the basketball court that most of them have. It helps to have a bit of fun, but mainly to work the tightness out of the muscles, especially after long trips.   It is close

Summary: Hired a quality photographer for the website pictures. Our room did not look like what was pictured at all. We had a suit and it was dirty. Crumbs on the floor, dirty master bathroom floor. Very outdated. Thin windows (hear everything outside), SUPER thin walls, cracks under the door were 1/2 gaps. Could hear clearly every guest that walked by or talked. Carpet and room smelled musty and old. Not typical Homewood Suites quality. It was like staying at a Motel 8. We left early and booked elsewhere even though we had prepaid for 2 nights and would not receive a refund. Staff was wonderful. Breakfast was ok. They were doing construction so hopefully this property will be updated.

Summary: This hotel is really gross, for a Hilton it was not up to the name. First impression the room smelled nasty. We called the front desk and they offered to put carpet deodorizer and we accepted. The carpet was never fully cleaned. The curtains were ripped also the bed skirts. When we would take a shower and if a neighbor had the shower on we could feel the cold water. I am an honors point member I paid one of my nights asked to b switched for another room and said they were sold out. So I had to stay in same room w the nasty carpet. I think they should get new vacuums. I will not stay here again. So I had to pay for one of the nights even if I was not satisfied w the sevice. I have bn to numerous Hiltons and Hiltons brands and this one is not to b named Hilton it should be named

The second room was cleaner but had large damp patch on the carpet, right in front of the cupboard, very inconvenient to store suitcases. Summary: I'm picky. Really picky. I looked at reviews and evaluated costs so naturally I was really worried about Homewood Suites. From the minute arrived (we were early) to the time we left, we had an amazing experience. First off, the front desk was really warm every time we spoke to them. Our room was the perfect size and the kitchen was set up. Room service cleaned our room and although yes, the rooms are dated, they are well taken care of. The mattress could be better but it wasn't horrible. We used the BBQ one night and the pool one afternoon. Both were great.  As for proximity to Disney - we have a 4 y/o so we took the shuttle but it was easy enough. If you really want to walk you can but save your energy for the parks!   The breakfast was crowded but only if you get up when

This is a Hilton and for the normal standards I would expect from this brand, this property falls well short.  The room was large for a big family, beds were good and the room(s) were clean. We had 5 Adults and two children and we all slept comfortable.

Summary: First thing you need to know was the hotel was undergoing a remodel while we were there. That being said our rooms were well-maintained. We arrived hours before check-in, but the front desk allowed us to leave our bags and recommended several places to spend sometime before we could check-in. They even called us an hour before check in to tell us they had a room available. This was heaven to hear since we had been traveling since 4:00 am central time. All of the rooms are all suite, including a kitchette. The hotel is across the street from a pharmacy, and Target and share the parking lot with Joes Crab Shack, a pizza restaurant and a Marriot. We were there to visit Disneyland. The hotel shuttle was very convenient; running at half hour intervals all day. They were even able to
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear your stay with us was a pleasant one. Thank you for your comments and feedback and I appreciate your time. Summary Heading: Good hotel, for a good price.

It was also walking distance to a few restaurants and a Target so you could use the hotel shuttle to the park and not have a car.

Summary Heading: lengthy stay of 9 days-comfortable and safe

Be prepared to take breakfast back to room because seating VERY limited(even with overflow room). Disney Jr. tv in breakfast room AND elevator-nice touch for the multitude of children present. Low cost shuttle available to Disney-with a park rep next door at Marriott. Will visit this property when returning to the area and would recommend to friends and family.

The outstanding services that's provided by this property should earn "Great Services of the Year".  Front desk Manger Luis and the whole staff on this property are willing to assist with great hospitality and with a smile.  The hotel rooms are all remodeled and clean.  Great breakfast and after 5 food with beer or wine included.  Thank you for your amazing services.  They also have barbecue by the pool that you can use.   Thank you again for the amazing services.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear we were able to make you feel like home, I appreciate our feedback and comments and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you. I look forward to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Great location, free breakfast and wonderful shuttle service
Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights/5 days vacation to visit Disneyland and as a family of five, it was great to have a spacious room with a full kitchen. And the breakfast menu was every day different and it was better than what I expected. Having the shuttle service to Disneyland made our Disney experience less hectic as we didn't have to worry about finding our parked car, etc. The rooms were newly renovated so the room was generally clean. However, the bathroom wasn't cleaned very well and the towels were every time not replaced with new ones and we had to call to request new towels. And as you walk through the hallway, it was amazing how so many people were packed into one room (just seeing on and off, how many people walked out of one room) so looks like the hotel had a very
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I appreciate your feedback and thank you for your comments, I am happy to hear the shuttle service was at your convenience. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: I used the app to chose my room and to check in.  When I arrived I was not checked in and I was given a different room. I was also told they needed a hard swipe of my credit card.  I thought the check in by the app was to bypass time spent at the counter.  This was not the case.  I was not greeted as a Gold Member nor offered and snacks.  Next there were no luggage carts and I was told someone would go and get one.  That did not happen.  We had to carry all our luggage upstairs.  As we traveled to our room there was a strong cat urine smell in the hall.  *Note: I invited another family to travel with us and they were assigned the room next to mine*  When we got in the room there was a bearable urine smell that we attributed to the hallway. Unfortunately for the family that I
Manager Response: We are sorry we were not able to provide you with a better quality of service. It is our goal at Homewood Suites to make you feel at home and provide excellent service. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we are terribly sorry we did not ensure your stay to be a pleasant one. Thank you for the Hilton loyalty we truly appreciate your comments and feedback. Thank you for your time and patience and we hope to be at your service if there is anything that we can do for you .   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Assistant General Manager  Homewood Suites by Hilton  luis.vazquez2@hilton.com   714-740-1800

Summary Heading: I would not stay at this location any more
Summary: The place smelled, very dark low ceiling. Small rooms. We asked for a 2 bedroom suite with two queen bed in each room. They messed up our reservation there was only one queen in each room. Also they had painted the walls they should let you know I case you are allergic
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback of your recent stay with us. I was very sorry to hear that your reservation was not accurate. I sincerely apologize about the service and maintenance of the suite.  I sincerely apologize about the inconvenience you experience and thank you for your patience. We hope to be at your service if there is anything that we can do for you.   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Assistant General Manager  Homewood Suites by Hilton  luis.vazquez2@hilton.com   714-740-1800

Summary: Excuses for everything wrong...room not ready at check in, air conditioning broken, no cable one evening, no cleaning of room for 3 of 6 days, no clean Towels... Seems like they should close down. Do the Reno, maintain equipment and then reopen! Trying to work in between leads to excuses for everything!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I sincerely apologize about the terrible experience you had during your stay. I deeply regret the lack of service and upkeep. I am sorry about the quality of our property and service from my staff, I hope to be at your service if there is anything that I can do for you. Thank you for your time and patience and I look forward to be of assistance.   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Assistant General Manager  Homewood Suites by Hilton  luis.vazquez2@hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary Heading: Pretty good with some significant caveats
Summary: We've liked this hotel in the past and it is still okay. Good breakfast.   But... There was mold in the shower. The water would turn cold then hot then cold every 30 seconds or so.  The elevator was painfully slow.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your stay, I am terribly sorry about the experience you had with us during your stay. I sincerely apologize about the elevator and the lack of cleanliness on the bathroom. I appreciate your feedback and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you, I hope to be at your service if there is anything that I can do. Thank you for your time and patience.

Summary: Property was having some renovation. This property had not been maintained very well. Main problem was that staff kept giving us wrong information regarding shower problems. Once we got to GM he resolved shower problem.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am terribly sorry about the inconvenience you experienced during your stay, I deeply regret the lack of service from out staff and I am sorry about the information provided. Than you for your time ans patience.

Summary: We were looking for a place to stay for a trip to Disneyland that had a kitchen where we could make some simple meals and found this Homewood Suites to be significantly cheaper than other similar hotels in the area so we thought we'd give it a try.  The room was nice and clean, the breakfast was decent enough and they have an evening social M-Thurs, which has small bites, but was enough for us to have dinners there.  We did have 2 complaints - 1)The elevator is ridiculously slow, absolutely terrible and 2)There was no oven, so we couldn't make frozen pizzas.  Other than that, with the shuttle that comes right to the door (different than ART and slightly more expensive), it was easy to get to Disneyland and the rooms were nice for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear your stay with us was a pleasant one. Thank you for your feedback, I am sorry about the elevator inconvenience. I appreciate your time and patience and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: This is an older property but the rooms were redone this year.  The staff is very helpful and friendly.  Complimentary breakfasts and social hour are good.  Excellent location near Disney.  Watch out for parking and wifi fees.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit, I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Not recently updated as stated on website when booking.
Summary: When I booked the room, the website stated that it was going under renovations. It didn't look like it from the inside of my room. If I had known that I would've waited to book at the newer location closer to Disneyland. There weren't enough utensils in my opinion to cook certain foods in the room, so I ended up eating out vs. saving money and cooking.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I sincerely apologize about the experience you had with us, I am terribly sorry about the inconvenience you experienced with the kitchen supplies. Thank you for your time and patience and thank you for giving us the chance of accommodate you.

Summary: The pull out her the bed was unusable had to sleep on the individual couches instead.  Mattress was paperthin and you felt all the springs.  Light for the bathroom was on the exterior which made it majorly inconvenient when you have people you didn't want to wake up in the middle of the night.
Manager Response: I am terribly sorry about the inconvenience you experienced during your stay. I apologize about the quality of the mattress and the light inconvenience. Thank you for your time and patience and we hope to see you gain if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Ammenities were good......hotel location convenient.   Loved the space and accommodations in the room, well worth the money spent.  Would have liked to have housekeeping come earlier in the day.  Would  stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for giving us the chance of accommodate you. We appreciate your time and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: We booked and 8 day stay at Homewood suites to experience that home away from home experience.  Traditionally when our family vacations in California for the summer we stay with Marriott Courtyard.  Big mistake, after reading multiple room tips by other guest I requested a room on the  fifth or sixth floor  facing Chapman street to view the  Disneyland fireworks at night. When I checked in I was give a room on the third floor (321) facing Chapman. I was told sorry  your are staying for a long time and we don't have a another room available for those days.  I would have to wait and check periodically during my stay when other guest check out.  Wait it gets better!  before we could check in our room we had to wait 20 minutes in the lobby for maintenance to make sure the dish
Manager Response: I sincerely apologize about the service you received on my behalf. I deeply regret the lack of follow through and the inconvenience you had to experience with your sink during you r stay. I am terribly sorry about the way I handled your room move and the fact that I was not able to assist. Thank you for your time and patience and please let me know what I can do for you.   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Guest Service Manager  Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Luis.Vazquez2@Hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary: The overall experience was good. The food staff and food was great. They missed cleaning our room one day and forgot clean towels on two days of stay. The front desk staff was great. The pool and hot tub was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for giving us the chance to accommodate you. Thank you for your time and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: After reading several good reviews, we decided to stay here while visiting Disney Land.  I started having misgivings as soon as we walked into the lobby to register for our room.  The hotel has an odor that lingers in the lobby area.  It smells musty and like the outside dumpster.  They are clearly under renovation at this time, but the lobby is very outdated and feels (and smells) dirty.  There was only one elevator that was available to us to take to our 7th floor room and we ended up using the stairs several times so as not to have to wait for the elevator.  Our room was one of the updated ones and was very spacious and clean, however the same odor from the lobby was present in our room (smelled like a trash can).  On the last day of our stay, we finally figured out it was
Manager Response: I sincerely apologize abut the experience you had with us. I deeply regret the quality of our property and the inconvenience this might of caused. I am sorry about the elevator as well as the breakfast. Please allow me to be at your service if there is anything that I can do for you. Thank you for your time and patience and I look forward to be at your service.   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Guest Service Manager  Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Luis.Vazquez2@Hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary: They are in the process of remodeling the hotel and it looks fairly decent.  The problem with the hotel is the elevators.  There is one elevator at the front of the hotel near the lobby and it takes FOREVER!  The other elevator is located at the rear of the hotel and is obviously used as the freight elevator.  The breakfast is fairly decent for being free.  There were different items every morning unlike other hotels that usually offer the same items every day.  The outlet in the bathroom was not working and it took three phone calls and three days to get them to fix it.  We had to blow dry and curl our hair using an outlet in the bedroom and could not see what we were doing.  We called about the closet door and could not get that fixed until we flagged a maintenance guy in the
Manager Response: I sincerely apologize about the service you received during your stay. I deeply regret the lack of follow through and the inconvenience you had to experience with the power outlet during your stay. I am terribly sorry about the inconvenience you experience and the lack of service, please allow me to be at your service. Thank you for your time and patience and please let me know what I can do for you.   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Guest Service Manager  Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Luis.Vazquez2@Hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary: Good location to disneyland and near by restaurants and shopping. Has ever erything you need. Bathrooms smell a little musty and need ventilation. Breakfast was just ok. Overall good for the price, would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am terribly sorry about the experience you had the cleanliness of the bathroom and the ventilation. I appreciate your time and feedback and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Better accommadations in regards to the rooms. The toilet was never fixed by maintenance. They tried, but, it still would not flush. My husband had  to keep jigging the handle, and working the handle in order for it to flush. That was a nightmare. However, the Homewood Suites Hotels are still the best that I have ever stayed at.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your stay. I am terribly sorry about the experience you had with us, I deeply regret the lack of maintenance on our behalf. I appreciate you patience and time and I am terribly sorry about the inconvenience. Please feel free to let me know if there is anything that I can do for you.

Summary Heading: Great staff at front desk, but their service is deserving of a much nicer property.
Summary: This property is dirty, run down, and smells horrible. We were welcomed by several large bags of garbage on our floor. The shower smelled like mildew and the portable crib had a large blood stain on it. Someone finally collected all the garbage, but put it on the elevator with us.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location, great staff, incredible room and a super value. Skip the breakfast, terrible, go out to eat DONT eat free breakfast, there is a reason it is free. If you pass on the breakfast you will love this place. Huge clean suites with full kitchens!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am terribly sorry about the quality of breakfast. I deeply regret the inconvenience this might of caused. I do appreciate your time and patience and thank you for your feedback. We hope to have the pleasure of accommodate you again in the future.

Summary: good location and value for your money.  Nothing fancy,free breakfast is always a plus.  elevator is very slow and looks like half of the first floor is still being renovated.  Would recommend for families of 5-6 instead of getting 2 rooms
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay I am sorry about the elevator inconvenience.  We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: The front desk staff Noel has an attitude problem, the rooms are out dated, instead of them putting more furniture in the rooms they need to paint and change carpet. Elevators are very SLOW, took 6mins for the elevator to come that some times we had to walk 4 flights up and down. Rust and dirt were in the tub. Not worth what we paid nightly.
Manager Response: I am terribly sorry about the experience you had with us. I deeply regret the lack of service and I am sorry about your experience. Please allow me to be at your service if there is anything that I can do.   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Guest Service Manager  Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Luis.Vazquez2@Hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary: This hotel and its staff treated us much better than we deserved. We did a lot of walking in order to take advantage of their free socials was, but the value was irresistible. The shuttle was two dollars a day per person, so we walked. The rooms are large and beds comfortable. I slept through the night. I usually wake up at least once in the night. There was a little noise from the trucks passing by at night and the air conditioner. Not enough to bother me. The complimentary meals were worth taking advantage of. They were well rounded, hot meals. Beyond that, our room had a full kitchen with utensils and a dish washer. The staff was very friendly and hard-working. They offer coffee throughout the day and night. We'll definitely come back!
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you. Thank you for your comments and feedback I will ensure to share this with my team as they always strive to ensure the best service possible. Thank you again and we look forward to see you again.

Summary Heading: Great stay and perfect place for Disney visit
Summary: We loved our stay at the Homewood Suites. The location is perfect (not as hectic as further down Harbor, but only a few minutes from Disneyland). I stayed here with a family for a conference and park visit. We loved the large suite, the pool, the breakfast and evening dinner/social and more. The dedicated shuttle to the park was amazing and well worth the small price ($15 for 3 days for adults, $7 for children as of July 2016). We will definitely stay again. The only caution I would give is that the elevator is slow, so I was happy to be on the second floor and just take the stairs.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to know you had a pleasant stay. Thank you for your feedback and comments and I apologize about the elevator. Thank you again for your time and we hope to see you again!

Summary: Wonderful hotel, staff is fabulous. Rooms and complimentary breakfast and dinner was such a bonus. The location to Disney was great. I would choose this hotel again. Anything we wanted to do the staff arranged it for us, they gave us all the information we needed to make decisions for our day. They were fun to be around!
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear your stay with us was an enjoyable one. I appreciate your comments and thank you for your feedback, I will ensure to share this with my team a they will be happy to hear they made you stay pleasant. Thank you for giving us the chance of accommodate you and we hope to see you again if your travel bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel/ close enough to Disney
Summary: I chose this hotel because it had a mini kitchen as well as complimentary breakfast for my large family. There is a shuttle that runs often to Disney Parks which made it very convenient. Breakfast was great but they put away promptly at 9am. If you choose this hotel, I would recommend to be at breakfast as early as possible. There was a lot of construction going on in the hotel which we were not made aware of until our stay. We were limited to one elevator and were on the 6th floor. This was very frustrating for us as we had all children under 10. Overall, it was a good pick.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am terribly sorry about the inconvenience you experienced during your stay with the construction. I sincerely apologize about the troubles this might of caused. Thank you again for your time and patience and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: very happy with the location, the complementary evening food is a surprise to us and glad to have it after a long day trip. the room is spacious and the kitchen is great. only concern is the first floor is still remodeling and the elevator is very small. Overall the experience in this hotel is great and would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I appreciate your time and feedback. I am terribly sorry about the inconvenience you experienced with the elevator as well as the construction. Thank you for giving us the chance of accommodate you and we hope to see you again.

Summary: Fantastic place to stay. Easy to get to Disney and close enough to the beach. The front desk staff were welcoming and helpful. The hotel is a super value, especially when you add in the cocktail hour and breakfast. Would absolutely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your stay, I am happy to hear you enjoyed your visit and the amenities we offer. I appreciate your comments and feedback and thank you for giving us the chance of accommodate you. We look forward to see you again if your travels bring you back our way!

Summary: Great place . Great people! Great location! A pretty nice breakfast with a nice selection. Good coffee even if it wasn't Starbucks! Food is cooked in house. Nice accommodating folks. Room were clean. Lobby was nice. Easy transportation around the area.
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear your stay with us was an enjoyable one. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area and thank you for your feedback. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Breakfasts were hot and cold options everyday.  Dinners were offered M-THU and were adequate.  Food was convenient and food service was excellent.  Wait staff was fast, friendly and kept the food and dining areas clean.  HVAC was good.  Elevator access was limited, providing one elevator for 7 floors, but OK.
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for sharing about your visit and thank you for your feedback. I appreciate your time and comments. We hope to be at your service again if your travels bring you back our way!

Summary: Rooms a bit tired, but lots of space and very clean. Beds comfy. Loud, but windows are double glazed which helped. Very helpful staff and good value. The complimentary breakfast is helpful in getting an early start to the theme parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am sorry about the quality of your suite, and Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area. Please feel free to let me know if there is anything that I can do for you, once again thank you for your time and patience and I hope to be of assistance.

Summary: Apartment has great space with living room and full kitchen. The hotel is under renovations and the elevator is extremely slow, so people uses the stairs.The quality of the food is low compared to other hotels of the homewood chain.In the  breakfast kids can not prepare their whaffes what in a hotel near disneylland is a  missing point.The happy hour food is bad also, no taste at all.Expensive based on what has been offered.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am terribly sorry about the inconvenience you experienced with our breakfast and evening reception as well as the elevator. I appreciate you comments and thank you for your feedback I will ensure to share this with my team. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you and if there is naything that I can do for you please do not hesitate to ask. Thank you for your time.

Summary Heading: Don't go unless you want to hear construction
Summary: I was very disappointed in this hotel they used mattress pad for sheets. Had to ask for blankets for the couch. Construction on the 1st floor was suppose to be completed was not. Had to walk all the way from the parking area to the front lobby after along day in the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am terribly sorry about the inconvenience you experienced with the construction. I sincerely apologize about the lack of amenities on your suite. I appreciate you comments and feedback, thank you for your patience and time and if there is anything that I can do for you please feel free to let me know.

Summary: Get ready to be crammed into this behemoth of a Homewood Suites and struggle for resources with the Disney tourist crowd. Amenities are scarce and service is absent or rushed. The food is awful and the rooms are only half-cleaned. If you're visiting local attractions, get better value by staying outside of the area and driving in. This location is not worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I sincerely apologize about the experience you had with us. I deeply regret the lack of service and cleanliness. I am truly sorry about the food quality as well as the lack of amenities. I hope to be at your service if there is anything that I can do for you. Thank you for your time and patience.

Summary: the hotel is good but with construction first floor is a no go. also only 1 elevator works and good luck getting on it. stairs are the option to go for and floor 3 or higher. the staff was friendly and helpful. the parking is lacking but is limited due to the location. overall the hotel is good but until the construction is done which looks to be not for at least a year from july 16 id stay somewhere else unless its all you can get for a trip
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am terribly sorry about the experience you had with our construction. I deeply regret the inconvienice you had to gothrough durng your visit. I appreciate your time and patience and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area. I hope to be of assistance if there is naything that I can do for you.

Summary: Truly spectacular customer service,  lovely rooms and a delicious and varied breakfast.  The room was clean,  big fluffy towels,  and every employee we talked to was friendly,  conscientious,  extremely helpful,  professional and dedicated to making our stay great.  Thank you!
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear your stay with us was a pleaseant one. I am happy to know we were able to be at your service and making your visit a pleaseant one. We hope to have the pleasure of accommodate you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Terrible hotel! Rooms are not cleaned and serviced thoroughly daily. Room furniture is cheap and uncomfortable. Don't try to sleep on the sofa bed, the springs poke you in the back. Floors are not vacumned or mopped.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I really enjoyed staying at the hotel. The food was good, and the service was awesome!  The pool was large enough to swim in, and the hot tub was very relaxing. The cleaning of the suit worked around our schedule, which was very convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: First thing I would like to make clear is that the staff and manager at this hotel were wonderful and accommodating.  I let a Hilton representative book my hotel stays thinking they would know what was best after I explained in detail what I needed and was looking for. This hotel is under renovation which the rep did not mention! A woman I met in the elevator had a black eye from some construction thing falling on her !! Upon arriving to our room I used the bathroom and the toilet did not flush. We went out for food and told the deskclerk, he said he'd call maintenance to fix it. When we returned it still hadn't been addressed. Outlets didn't work,  light bulbs were burnt out,garbage disposal didn't work... We set alarms early so we could go to Disneyland when they opened. ..I
Manager Response: none

Summary: You team was wonderful my aunt love Nola and Stephanie. Her Best friend loved everyone at breakfast. You staff made the trip feel like home for myself and my guest. Your new remodeled hotel look excellent. All the beaches you told us near by we also enjoyed. Thank you
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and I am very happy to hear Nola and Stephanie were able to make your stay an enjoyable one. Thank you again for your itme and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: The air conditioner was noisy and therefore difficult to get a good night's sleep...... mattress was uncomfortable   requested a king size bed but got  two doubles instead   (was told due to construction).    Not a Hilton quality hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was comfortable, clean, and the staff was nice. It has full kitchen so that was cool. They could use a little management of the contractors who install doors crooked, making it a little bit frustrating that you can't close the bedroom door, or properly close the bathroom and closet doors.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I appreciate your feedback and thank you for giving us the please of accommodate you. I sincerely apologize about the inconvenience you experienced with the doors. I appreciate your comments and will ensure to work with my team to look into these. Once again thank you for your time and patience and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: I felt this hotel gave a personal and caring experience which must be hard to do in an area with so many travelers with children visiting Disneyland. However as a single person I felt quite at home there.I had a full kitchen but with the food provided at the happy hour often did not use it as a full meal was provided, not just snacks, Monday through Thursday
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for giving us the chance of accommodate you. I appreciate your comments and thank you for your time. We hope to have the pleasure to be at your service once again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Aging Property, w/ great staff & reasonably close to Disney -
Summary: The main challenge with this property is for the price you can stay a couple of blocks closer to Disney (perhaps within walking distance for some) at a brand new Homewood Suites.   I've stayed at this location on a few occasions over the years primarily for the good complementary breakfast and the ability to sleep 5-6 in a suite. Staff is always great.   The property is under a remodel and hopefully will be brought current once complete. As of June 2016, one elevator is closed, the rooms are in some mixed state of improvement and for what you'll pay ($200+/night) better/closer options are available.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I appreciate your feedback and comments. I apologize about any inconvenience you might of experienced during you stay with our renovation. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: First timers here at this location and loved our stay. Free wifi and clean rooms. Stephanie was super helpful and made us feel at home. We will definitely recommend this hotel to family and friends because of her.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and I am delighted to hear Stephanie was helpful. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: I was blown away by the service we received from the employees! I arrived very late and the overnight front desk agent was so pleasant and helpful! I was alone with my 2 young kids and he offered to bring my luggage cart to the room and park my car for me!!! The shuttles to Disney was on time- frequent and easy!!!!! After our long day at the park - we went to the bar for some late night snacks- the bartender was very friendly, and the food was great!!!! The rooms were clean, spacious and exactly what you would want for a quick trip!!! Highly recommend this hotel!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: First night experience my room, there is no light bulb on the table lamp by the entrance, our alarm clock radio is not working at all. My parents rm the smoke alarm suddenly triggered for no reason and it kept on going the maintenance doesn't know how to shut them off, until my brother told him to removed it. My brother's rm there is no smoke alarm and the aircon is not working at all instead of cool air, it was a hot air coming out, my brother called the front desk to send a maintenance, front desk respond that he send a maintenance, an hour past no one showed, then my brother went down to the front desk to inquire when is the maintenance will check the AC, front desk replied that the maintenance went home, my brother asked the front desk if there's available room that they can
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry about the experience you had during your stay. I deeply regret the lack of service and working condition of our facility. I sincerely apologize about the issues you encountered with your suites and the unresolved items.  We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. Please allow me to be of assistance if there is anything that I can do for you. Thank you for your time and patience and I look forward to be at your service.   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Guest Service Supervisor  Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Luis.Vazquez2@Hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary: Great stay very clean friendly  staff I would highly recommend this place.Great location with shopping across the street plenty of restaurants to chose from in the same parking lot. And a shuttle to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hare you enjoyed your stay and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disney
Summary: The hotel room was adequate for a family and the staff was great along with location the location for our trip to Disney.  It was an easy shuttle ride to Disney.  The shuttle cost extra and the hotel was under construction.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time and thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and the amenities we offer. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Friendly front desk personnel made me aware that room renovations do not make a king room available, so I received a spacious 2-QN suite. Newly remodeled with full kitchen and living room. Bath was upgraded too, except the rusty handle bar in the shower and mildew in the corners. This hotel is close to Disneyland and loaded with Families/children. Plenty of restaurants in walking distance. Harbor Blvd is very busy, many traffic lights, plan travel accordingly. Breakfast offerings hot/cold and plenty. Nice to have china and silverware instead of styrofoam and plastic.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us we are delighted to hear your stay with us was a pleasant one. I appreciate your comments and feedback, I am happy to liked the new room upgrades we had and I appreciate you letting us know about the handle bar in the shower. Thank you again for your time and patience and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: The room is a good and the staff is friendly. I liked the location so close to Disneyland. The complimentary evening reception and breakfast was really good. The shuttle to Disneyland was worth the extra cost.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and the amenities we offer. I hope we can be at your service again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: This was a great hotel, minutes from Disneyland.  The staff was very friendly and helpful. They safely stored our luggage until we could check in. They helped us with supplies we had left at home  The suite was spacious and very clean. The breakfast was a real treat with fresh items with lots of variety.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay, we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way!

Summary: The price point for this hotel was reasonable, but only if you are willing to compromise on some things.  I feel that they need to work with their janitorial staff in regards to the standards of cleanliness.  The problems I experienced here could have easily been remedied.   Refrigerator smell - horrible rotten milk smell.  So bad that i went to target to buy lysol and baking soda.    Dirty Sheets - pull out bed had dirty sheets, which indicates to me that they didnt change them.   Television glitches - TV kept shutting off...  So again, if i didnt have any other choice i would suck it up and stay here again, but I would definitely research all my options!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. I sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry about the terrible experience you had with us. I deeply regret the lack of cleanliness throughout your suite during you stay and I am terribly sorry about the inconvenience this caused. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. If there is anything that I can do please feel free to let me know as I would be more than happy to be of assistance. Thank you for your time and patience and I look forward to be at your service.  Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Guest Service Manager  Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Luis.Vazquez2@Hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary: Nice spacious room perfect for families or any party of 4. Great location BUT there was only 1 elevator in service in the whole hotel+loud construction on my last the morning 6/13. I would call to see the status upon construction/elevators !
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us, I am terribly sorry about the experience you had during your stay. I sincerely appologize about the elevator and the constaruction. Please allow me to be of assistance if there is anything that I can do for you. Thank you again for your time and patience.

Summary: The trip was great.  It was a large family reunion.  The rooms were clean and accommodating. The staff was great and handled all the craziness that can go on.  They were always willing to help with whatever was needed.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to know you enmjoyed your stay. I apprecite your comments and thank you for sharing about our staff. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: This was our second time staying at this hotel. The staff very helpful, and greeted us when we arrived. The food served for breakfast and social hour was very good.  Parking was never an issue even with two hotels right next to each other.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: First experience as a Hilton vacation owner
Summary: Nice and clean rooms, definitely will come back, this is our first time staying at one of the Hilton bros properties, I was skeptical at first, but after a good experience I definitely come back if I have the chance
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for giving us the chanec to accommodate you. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: This is the second time that we've stayed at this hotel. The staff is still friendly and courteous and we love the shuttle to Disneyland. It's great that they still have a complimentary breakfast and evening social, though the variety and quality of the food has declined since we were last there 3 years ago. Be aware that the pullout bed is not for those with bad backs.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us aboutyour visit. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you once again. I am sorry aout the quality of our breakfast, I will ensure to share this with my team. Thank you again for your time and we hope to be at your service again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: with shuttle service to Disney i would definitely return and recommend this hotel to family members. The breakfast was great pool was nice snack shop for your late night cravings including beer!!! :-)
Manager Response: I wanted to say thanks for your recent stay here at our hotel! I hope you felt at home. We can‚Äôt wait to welcome you home again soon!

Summary: Front desk did not offer other sulotion to address my issue with room or offered to compensate for all the inconvenience of our stay in room. The bed sheets was not change and had to ask for it to be change. The carpet look like it was not vacuumed when they did room service.  Several times had to tell front desk that there is an issue with the bathroom shower and toilet. I had to fix it myself.  I hope the next person that stay in room does not experience what we had to endure during our 9 days stay. This room was the updated room but my family feels it was not completed. The renovation is not completed why have a guess stay on a room that is not 100% ready for a guess to enjoy and be relaxed instead of having to fix the toilet and show that gets cold and hot water all the
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am terribly sorry to hear about your experience with us, I deeply regret the lack of service and the condition of your suite during your stay. I appreciate your feedback and thank you for your comments, I will ensure to work with my team to get these addressed. I sincerely apologize about the way your issues were handled and I completely agree with you as your stay with us was not 100% relax, as a vacation should be.  Please allow me to be of assistance if there is anything else that I can do for you. Once again thank you for your time and patience and I look forward to be at your service.   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Guest Service Manager  Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Luis.Vazquez2@Hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary: The hotel is very old and rundown. The pool area is dingy and unclean. The service and menus items for the Evening Social are sub-par for this brand hotel. The carpets are extremely filthy and worn out. This hotel definitely needs a makeover, I believe it to be one of the oldest ones in the neighborhood. If your choice is Homewood Suites, and your destination is Anaheim,  stay at the one on Convention Way. You will find it to be TOP NOTCH in every way!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we‚Äôre very sorry you were unhappy with our suites. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We appologize about the quality of our property and the service you experienced. I hope to be at your service if there is anything that I can do for you. Once again thank you for your time and patience.   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Guest Service Supervisor  Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Luis.Vazquez2@Hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary: Very spacious for just 2 of us - LOVED having a kitchen - great for keeping leftovers or groceries. The separate living and bedroom is helpful to a family for TV viewing - the bathroom and bedroom doors overlapped into the vanity area which was frustrating but other than that it was a great stay. The staff is OUTSTANDING!!
