Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for givng us the pleassure of accommodate you. I aprecite your time and feedback and we hope to be at yoru service again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Room was dirty and cupboard doors and drawers were falling off. Kitchen was a joke and is not like the pictures show. They sing you for hotel parking and taking the shuttle to Disneyland. One of those should be complimentary.
Manager Response: Thank you for shairng with us about your visit. I am terribly sorry about the experrience you had with us. I sincerely appologize about the quality of appliances and the condition of the kitchen. I deeply regret the lack of quality, please allow me to be at your service if there is anything that I can do for you. Thank you for your time and patience and I look forward to be of assistance.          Luis Vazquez  Guest Service Manager   714-740-1800  ext.443 Luis.vazquez2@Hilton.com

Summary: I stayed there 13 days on business  everything was tops.  I loved my room.  and always  good view,  lots of room  full kitchen.   Recently remodeled.  Staff members were always available,  cheerful,  and helpful in every way.    I give them the highest rating - and I stay at a lot of hotels. I will definitely  return,  or continue to use this brand Homewood Suites.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am dlighted to hear your stay with us was a pleaseant one. I apprecite your feedback and thank you for your comments. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accomodate you while in the area, and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: The hotel is under construction...I was not told this upon booking my room.  Upon arrival the phone in the room did not work I had to call to the front desk on my cell phone.  When they sent up a person to look while we were out of the room.  The phone was then removed.  Upon arriving back at the hotel to dress for dinner the shower has dirt and plaster and there was a huge black/brown spider crawling up the sink.  I have a picture of it.  The water took approx. 15 minutes to get hot and the best part was the toilet didn't flush.  We again had to call down to the front desk with my cell phone...maintenance came up and showed my husband how to take the lid off and flush the toilet that way.  He told us it was fixed...after dinner we returned to the room the toilet did not work
Manager Response: Thank you for shairng with us about your recent visit. I deeply regret the alck of service and working condition of the ammeneties on your suite. I sincerely appologize about the terrible experience you had and I am sorry about the quality of service you experienced. Please allow me to be of assistance if there is anything that I can do for you. Once again thank you for your time and patience and I look forward to be at your service.          Luis Vazquez  Guest Service Manager  714-740-1800  ext.443 Luis.vazquez2@Hilton.com

Summary: fantastic staff. rooms are suites with separate living room, full kitchen, so easy to relax here.  target is across the street and several good family restuarants within walking distance. complimentary breakfast is diverse,  great expense saver
Manager Response: We are very happy to see your stay with us was an enjoyable one. Thank you for your time and comments, we appreciate your feedback. We hope to be at your service if your travels bring you back in the future.

Summary: The room was very large with a sitting area and kitchen and a separate, decent sized bedroom.  The plumbing was kind of odd with the toilet sometimes taking a long time to flush and we had to wait about 5 minutes to get hot water initially.  The AC/Heating was excellent and very quiet.  We easily kept the room at a desired temperature.  The hotel is in a great location, near Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center and near many restaurants.  Overall a very decent, comfortable, but not great hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and the ammeneties we offoer. I apprecite your feedback and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: What a lovely stay we had!
Summary: I took my three teenage sons + a friend to Disneyland in March and spent 3 nights at this Hilton.  We stayed in a 2 Queen bed suite.  It had a full kitchen, was roomy, super comfy and the reception staff could not have ben nicer.  The rate was affordable too.  We do not travel often because I'm a single mom of 3 and so getting to go to Disneyland and having a nice hotel stay was an extra special treat.  We will be back - it was a great place to stay for three full and tiring days and Disneyland.  Breakfast was great too.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit with us. I am delighted to hear you and sons had a pleasant time while in the area. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you and we appreciate your feedback. We hope to be at your service again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Those were my 8 year olds first words upon checking into this hotel room. After a long trip from Saskatchewan, Canada, we were so looking forward to relaxing in our room. The hotel is extremely dated. And had an "off" spell as soon as you entered.  The smell in the room was unbelievable. It smelled of smoke and exotic cooking-not in a good way, and body odour. Our rooms curtains were torn- not just a small rip-two big handfuls of fabric were missing. The couch upholstery was just threads in places. We were so disappointed. And still can't believe people rated it so well. We stayed the night as we were too exhausted to search for a new place, as we had done so much searching/reading reviews etc to finally decide on this place. The shower had no hot water and the coffee maker
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your stay. I deeply regret the lack of cleanliness and I am terribly embarrassed about the experience you had with us, I definitely understand the importance of a clean and fresh room especially during your vacation and I am sorry we were not able to deliver that for you. I sincerely apologize about the service you received from my staff at check out and I apologize about the quality of our property. Please allow me to be of assistance if there is anything that I can do for you. Thank you for your time and patience and I look forward to be at your service.   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Guest Service Manager  Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Luis.Vazquez2@Hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary: This hotel was wonderful.  We had traveled to attend our daugher's college graduation and the distance was so great that we needed to stay over.  We loved having the in room kitchen to heat up the food we purchased.  The bed was comfortable and the separate living room and bed room areas allowed us to maintain our normal family habits.  Great stay and great staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear your stay with us was a pleasant one. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area and thank you for your comments. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Great place to stay really liked the 2 tv's in 2 separate rooms. The stay was almost perfect but for the construction workers being rude and taking up both elevators most of the day. The furniture moving crews manager was the only one that was rude the hotel staff was great rooms clean
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear you enjoyed stay but I sincerely apologize about the construction crew. I will ensure to relate this to our team, thank you again for your feedback and time and if there is anything that I can do fo ryou please feel free to let me know.

Summary: One of the best priced hotels for Mother's Day weekend! The service was excellent and the room accommodations were wonderful. Wish we could have stayed longer. I will definitely keep Homewood Suites in mind for future travel.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: The staff was really nice and were extremely helpful when we had questions.  The room was large and having a little kitchen was extremely useful with 2 toddlers.  The bathroom was old and was very loud when other rooms flushed their toilets or used the shower.  You could hear it as if it was in our room which was a problem when you have little kids going to bed early.  I also had problems keeping a constant water temp as it would get extremely hot or extremely cold in seconds.  Breakfast was great and the area was large enough to accommodate many families trying to get ready for Disneyland.  Location was great if you don't mind a short shuttle ride ($6/adult).  There were many restaurants within the same parking lot.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear you enjoyed the amenities we offer. I apologize about the the quality and cleanliness of the bathroom as well as the issues you encountered with the water temperature. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area and I hope to be of assistance if there is anything that I can do. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Nothing to fault with this hotel. We were on a short trip to Disney and everything was as they claimed. Location, room quality and service were impeccable. I'm sure there are more luxurious options available in the area but this hotel will be hard to beat for value.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear your stay with us was an enjoyable one. We appreciate your time and feedback. We hope to be at your service again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Front desk staff was helpful and friendly.  However, the room left much to be desired.  The tub did not drain and the toilet made a sound every 5 minutes all night.  When told about the problems in the morning, I was not offered a comp or even a partial refund despite the 100% satisfaction guarantee.  Breakfast buffet also going downhill.  No bacon or waffles.  Sausages tasted like soy.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I apologize about the experience you had and deeply regret the lack of service. Please allow me to be of assistance is the re is anything that I can do for you. Thank you again for your time and patience and I look forward to be of assistance.

Summary: While travelling to Orange, CA on business I ended up booking a room online for this property near Disneyland.  I had never stayed at a Homewood Suites before so I did not know what to expect.  I was well pleased with the check in process and even more impressed with the spacious suite that I had for the evening. Even more of a surprise was the buffet dinner that was included which included wine and beer.  I had an excellent nights sleep followed by a wonderful breakfast.  My only unpleasant surprise was the $15 parking fee which was not disclosed when I booked online.  However, I understand that is common among the Disneyland area hotels due to the shortage of parking in the area.  Overall, i really enjoyed this property.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear your stay with us was a pleasant one, thank you for your feedback and thank you for giving us the chance of accommodate you. I sincerely apologize about the parking fee being a surprise to you. I deeply regret the lack of communication from my staff. Please feel free to let me know if there is anything that I can do for you and we hope to be at your service if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: My family of 5, just spend the last week at the Homewood Suites, and although it is a bit out dated (but currently being remodeled) we were very pleased with the hotel.  The staff were amazing, they were very accommodating with any requests that we had and quick to address them.  The breakfast and social that was provided by Homewood Suites was fantastic. :)  We would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear our amenities and staff were able to make your stay with us an enjoyable one. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of serving you and we hope o see you again in the future.

Summary: Recently our business, located in San Diego, had an extended stay at Homewood Suites by Hilton -Aneheim/Garden Grove. All of the staff, especially Jessica Perrine, was extremely helpful in reserving all of our hotel rooms and taking care of our employees. Anytime there was an issue, they took care of it right away. Their prices are extremely reasonable, they provide a complimentary breakfast and happy hour (witch our guys really enjoyed after getting off of work). Our company is now working on another project in the area so we have now reserved another extended stay and Jessica made it so easy to reserve all of the rooms that we need. I am extremely satisfied with all of their customer service and i would recommend anyone to stay at this hotel, business related or not.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us about your experience with our property. We appreciate your time and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you and your team while in the area. I am delighted to hear their visit was a pleasant one and we look forward to make them feel like home if their travels bring them back our way. Once again thank you for your time and comments.

Summary: This Hotel is going through a renovation which is not the problem at all. The problem is the sewage smell coming from the bathroom sink and dirty towels left in the room. Also, calling front desk manager and stating that after maintenance confirming smell they would take 20.00 of my stay and to call Hilton Honors. I had three rooms in the hotel that I was paying for so this was not the right answer.  This Hotel should not be in the Hilton portfolio because this is not the kind of service I have come to expect from Hilton
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I sincerely apologize about the quality of service I provided you during your stay. I deeply regret the lack of service and the experience you had. please feel free to let me know if there i anything else that I can do for you. Once again thank you for your time and patience.   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Guest Service Manager  Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Luis.Vazquez2@Hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary: Disappointed in staying at this particular Homewood Suites: 1.  Stale dated decor 2.  No functional bathroom 3.  Poor quality breakfast   I had stayed in other Homewood suites which provide much better quality.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry about the lack of service during your stay. I apologize about the quality of breakfast and the lack of follow through with your request before your arrival. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. Thank you for your time and patience and please feel free to let me know if there is anything that I can do for you.   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Guest Service Manager  Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Luis.Vazquez2@Hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary: Great stay! All staff was pleasant, friendly, helpful and very knowledgable. The rooms were clean spacious and very welcoming. The beds were comfortable and we had no problems or complaints at all. The whole stay was very pleasant.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and we were able to make your vacation an enjoyable one. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Excellent Location and Well maintained Rooms. Easily accessible from disneyland and other locations. Breakfast was really nice and we all liked the varities in breakfast.  Staffs were fully cooperative and very helpful!!!
Manager Response: I wanted to say thanks for your recent stay here at our hotel! I hope you felt at home.  We can‚Äôt  wait to welcome you home again soon!  Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Guest Service Supervisor  Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Luis.Vazquez2@Hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary: I had asked for cushion top for mattress due to wire in mattress,was told 2x by different employee's that they would send one up.When I didn't get one I called back again and was told by the 3rd employee that they do not anything like that...I asked why I was told they 2 other times. He said I don't know..never apolohizing..nothing ..I got nothing but I don't know. There was mold on the ceiling in the bathroom..wall paper coming down off the walll.Overall was not impressed ....
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. I deeply regret the lack of service and communication of my staff. Please allow me to be of assistance if there is anything that I can do for you. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience.   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Guest Service Supervisor  Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Luis.Vazquez2@Hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary Heading: Full kitchen, close to Disney, good breakfast
Summary: This was our first stay here, and overall, it was very good for families. The rooms are like small apartments- a full kitchen / living area, and a separate bedroom with 2 closets. Each room ha 2 TVs-1 in the living area and one  in the bedroom. The wifi was good and is included.   The other strong points are: The full breakfast buffet, included in the price, which has a nice variety of choices and a attractive dining area, and the closeness to Disney- only about 8-10 minutes away.   The evening snack Mon-Thursday- also included, which has something to snack on, along with some beer and wine. The night we went, it was chees, crackers, pretzels and nuts.   The room itself-  nicely decorated, clean, and the beds are comfortable. There is a pullout sofa also.   The kitchen-  fridge,
Manager Response: I am delighted to see you enjoyed your visit with us. I really appreciate you r feedback and thank you for your comments I will ensure to share these with my team. I apologize for any inconvenience you might of experienced with the room amenities. I appreciate you giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while n the area, and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way!

Summary: The overall experience,y first stay, was very good! The hotel is in a good location, friendly staff, competitive prices and the accomodations are very good. I would definitely recommend a stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and the amenities we offer. I appreciate your feedback and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: The property was nice and clean, some small renovations going on but overall was good, breakfast was good variety of juices, coffee, bacon/sausage eggs, French toast.  The pool was nice although the hot tub was not working during our stay.  There was a target across the street which was a plus brought ice cream for the kids and food to cook on the stove top in the room. the staff was great anything I asked they were very pleasant. Definitely would come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and the amenities we offer. Thank you for your feedback and thank you for giving us the chance of accommodate you wile n the area. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: This hotel is great, staff is courteous and very helpful; I highly recommend this hotel. There are many options out there when visiting the Disneyland area, however this option you definitely won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: I am delighted to her you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for your comments. I hope we made you feel like home. Thank you again for your time and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: We had a good stay overall. The rooms were nice and roomy. I enjoyed the breakfast however it gets crowded depending on the timing. The worst thing is paying to park. The Orange Outlets are not far away so that pleased my wife and kids. It was not far from the Next Level Sports complex where we playing our games during the weekend. Roscoe's Chicken and waffles is just down the street. Free WiFi is very beneficial.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Not a great example of a Homewood Suites
Summary: I am a fan of Homewood Suites hotels and I would not recommend this location.  First the location.  They call themselves Anaheim Main Gate but this is very far from all things Anaheim.  Second they charge for parking even though they are not in the heart of anything.  Plus the parking is extremely inconvenient.  I traveled with my husband, two teenage sons, and my 81 year old father who uses a walker.  The handicap parking was in the back of the hotel and you had to walk through an active sprinkler to get in the building.  NOT ideal.  Third the general upkeep of this hotel is not up to par for Hilton.  The walls are VERY thin.  The door knob in our room fell off (thank goodness there wasn't a fire).  The fridge in my kids room wasn't working.  The tub in their room didn't drain.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I sincerely apologize about the experience you had during you stay. I am terribly sorry about the quality of of property and the lack of maintenance of your suite. I apologize about the breakfast area not being managed properly. I appreciate your time and patience and I deeply regret the lack of service and amenities we offer. Please allow me to be at your service if there is anything that I can do. Thank you again for your time and I look forward to be of assistance.   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Guest Service Supervisor  Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Luis.Vazquez2@Hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary: I notice now online warning about renovations, but I was not provided a verbal warning when I booked directly with the hotel, not is there any mention of it on my booking confirmation.  Usually I would not care, but they were jack hammering in the suite directly above mine, started at 9am finished around 4pm.  So here for Disneyland, like most others.  Left early to be there for park opening, returned around 2 for a nap and relax before heading back, room not serviced yet, jack hammering above us sounded like they were in our room.  Left an hour or two later, now cleaners have gone for the day, became a pattern of unmade room.  The bus was full of families returning for lunch in same situation, surely something can be done to service earlier so you don't have unmade room for
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I sincerely apologize about the terrible experience you had with us. I deeply regret the lack of service from my housekeeping staff and I am terribly sorry about the noise you experienced. I can definitely understand after a day at the parks all you want is to get some rest and I am terribly sorry our construction was an an inconvenience. Please allow me to be at your service if there is anything that I can do for you. Thank you for your time and patience during your stay and I look forward to be at your service.   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Guest Service Supervisor  Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Luis.Vazquez2@Hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary: We had a great time.  The room was great, a little tight for 5 of us, but we spent most of our time at the parks.  There is a Target conveniently located across the street, but the hotel also has a small store if you need something.  We also made use of a shuttle bus that leaves from the hotel every half hour for a small fee.  We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit and the amenities we offer. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay-- excellent customer service by staff. Breakfast items were very good. Clean and comfortable rooms. Our room was quiet and every night, we could watch the Disneyland fireworks show from our window.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to see you enjoyed your stay and the amenities we offer. Thank you for giving us the chance to be at your service while in the area and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Overall, this is usually a nice hotel. Currently have some renovations going on.  The staff is awesome, but hotel accommodations is average at best. Good location. Hotels have aged over time and they're trying to make it right and up to the Hilton Family standards.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff were very helpful, the rooms were big enough, with everything that u need , refrigerator , stove and microwave. Excellent location. I am a coffee lover and I drink coffee anytime of the day so the coffee in the lobby were a plus... Will definitely stay in this hotel again. I had my mom and my mother in- law, we got 2 rooms and even both of them made a comment and said they were definitely happy in this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and the amenities we offer. I appreciate your feedback and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area. We look forward to see you again in the future and please feel free to let us know if there is anything that we can do to assist.

Summary: I used my Honors points for a free two night stay, but the value would have been better than hotels closer to Disneyland. I brought my own car. Parking was about $25 for two nights. The drive was about minutes to Disneyland parking. The room was clean. Beds were hard and pillows were soft, but I prefer it that way, and I didn't wake up with any pains. The only thing I would suggest is don't get a room above the 3rd floor. The wait for the elevator was long, and it was warm in the elevator. We preferred to just use the stairs instead after the first two trips. We noticed many others doing the same. There is a Target right across the street and an outlet mall about 6 minutes away in case you forget something.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and the amenities we offer. I am sorry about the elevator inconvenience you experienced. I appreciate your time and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Hotel has always been perfect.  It is our go to for last minute trips to Disneyland when hotels directly in front of the park are full.  Can accommodate our family of 6 easily and bus ride has always been great.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area. We appreciate your time and feedback and hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: This hotel is very new and you can smell the newness in the entire facility.  The amenities were awesome and the complimentary breakfast was perfect.  The staff was very nice and accommodating.  The location was close to Disney parks but not really walking distance.  The toy story parking lot was in walking distance and from there you were able to take a shuttle bus for free to the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit, I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay but it seems as your vacation took place at the Homewood suites Convention Center. I will ensure to share this with them. Thank you for your time and we hope you have a wonderful rest of the week.

Summary: This was one of the best places where we have stayed at for our Disney vacations.  Friendly supportive staff. Clean spacious living space.  We will definitely return to stay next time we come to visit the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay, and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: This is the perfect hotel for your Disneyland family vacation.  The facility is perfect for families and very close to the park.  The staff is excellent and very helpful with all information about Disneyland and the surrounding areas.  Perfect for a weeks stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and the amenities we offer. I appreciate you giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the are and hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Always nice to come back to Homewood Suites!  Couldn't ask for a nicer staff!  Comfy beds, easy shuttle to Disneyland, fun time swimming in the sunshine at the pool--we'll be back!!  Next to Red Robin, Outback. Joe's Crab Shack and Target!!
Manager Response: I wanted to say thanks for your recent stay here at our hotel! I hope you felt at home. We can‚Äôt wait to welcome you home again soon!

Summary: Very good for price and location. A little problamatic as far a room and service. Staff was great at recovering after issues but there were issues. Like no towels in room. No dish soap etc. Elevators always overused. But pretty clean and comfortable
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear the staff was pleasant and I am sorry about the issues you encountered during our stay. I deeply regret the lack of service and I am sorry about the inconvenience. I hope to be at your service if there is anything that I can do for you. Thank you again for your time and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: The rooms were very clean. The breakfast was amazing both mornings of our stay. The staff is very helpful in any way. Love that we had a kitchen in our room so when we got back late at night we could warm up food to eat.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: We were suppose to stay at this location for 11 days, after the 1st night we decided to switch for many reasons.  If you are a regular homewood suites/hilton guest you will be disappointed. Hotel is currently under going renovations while staying open, horrible idea. Might be a nicer hotel once completed but right now it doesn't meet normal homewood suite standards drawing in a different crowd.  1. 2 elevators for the whole building. The one at the front is slow and had people get stuck while we were visiting.Terrifying for my kids hear the workers trying to find the person. The 2nd elevator is at the back of the hall and everyone has to use it.  2.back door to hotel was open. there are lots of homeless people around the area, did not feel safe.    3. rooms were dirty. bathroom
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and thank you for your patience. I deeply regret the lack of service and the quality of our property during you r visit. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience, and if there is anything that I can do for you please do not hesitate to ask. Thank you again for your time and I hope to be at your service.   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Guest Service Supervisor  Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Luis.Vazquez2@Hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary: The rooms were never cleaned for the 3 nights stay. I asked to clean the room on the second day when we returned to the hotel for the nap from Disney around 1:30pm. But when we returned to the hotel around 11 pm, nothing had been done. We asked for towels,waited for 45 min, but my husband had to go the front desk to ask again to make it happened.   Another frustrating thing was that the card key would desensitize or wouldn't work each day when we returned for the nap (TWO DAYS IN A ROW). Our room was the farthest one from the front desk, so it was so frustrating when I had to walk around the hotel to reprogram the key when kids were with dad waiting outside in the hot weather tired.  We would hear the bathroom noise from the room above or next door. No staff would listen to our
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I sincerely apologize about the terribly experience you had with us. I deeply regret the lack of service from my staff and I sincerely apologize about the poor quality of costumer service. Please allow me to be of assistance to you if there is anything that I can do. Thank you for your time and patience and I look forward to be of assistance.   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Guest Service Manager  Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Luis.Vazquez2@Hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary: Great hotel for families. The front desk staff are the best, always willing to help with a smile on their face. Location is great, restaurants right out front and Target across the street. Can't be beat for the price.
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for your comments. I am happy to hear the staff was pleasant and I hope you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: For the short amount of time at the hotel we had a great stay.  The room worked out well.  The kids slept our on the pull out couch and me and my friend each had our own bed.  Then we got up and had breakfast and went to our second day at Disneyland and Cal Adventure.  Which was not far at all.  There was a shuttle.  We did not utilize this as I have prepaid parking with my season pass.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and the room amenities we offer. I appreciate your feedback and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Our 1st experience with a Hilton property
Summary: I was a little disappointed in this hotel. This was our 1st stay at a Hilton property and I expected more quality. The hotel was adequate but nothing special. We chose this hotel because of it's proximity to the Disneyland park, the shuttle to the park, and the opportunity to experience a Hilton product. The shuttle was not free.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit and I appreciate you giving us the pleasure of accommodate you. I sincerely apologize about the quality of our property especially being your first experience with the Hilton brand. I can assure you we strive to provide the best service and quality accommodations and I apologize we were not able to make your stay a memorable one. I hope I can be of assistance to you if there is anything that I can do and please let em know if your travels bring you back our way as we are working on our renovation. Thank you again for your time and patience.

Summary: Nice hotel staff. Shuttle to disney. Decent breakfast.  Starbucks and target pretty close.  kids TV channel included. Cons - definitely needed furniture and bed upgrade though it wasn't bad it looked old and dirty.
Manager Response: Thank sharing about your recent stay with us, I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and I am sorry about the quality of our property. I am happy to share with you that we finally have started our renovation this week and we are looking forward to get all of our new bedding and room amenities. Thank you again for your time and hopefully we can see you again once our renovation is done!

Summary: Very pleasant staff, they go out of their way to make you feel at home. Daily hot breakfast is good. Freshly baked cookies daily as well is a nice touch. They have a shuttle to Disneyland for a small fee which is so worth it! I highly recommend it. Wirth the price!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and the amenities we offer. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Good no frills hotel, daily breakfast will get you by, self service laundry at the ground floor. Stayed for 3 nights for a convention. The ART Bus stop is just a 3 minute walk from the lobby. Stay at lower floors, there is only one elevator, the wait can take a while.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear you enjoyed the amenities we offer and thank you for giving us the chance of accommodate you. I sincerely apologize about the elevator wait. Thank you again for your time and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: was overall a really good experience for a family reunion and a first time trip for my family to LA and Disneyland. Had a fun time and will use this hotel again if another trip is planned for Disneyland. Thank you
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you. I appreciate your time and comments and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Was there for business and didn't realize it was Spring Break. Walls are a bit thin, so a little noisy, but otherwise rooms are very large and comfortable. Best part was being able to watch Disneyland fireworks from the parking lot!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am sorry about the noise you experienced during your visit and thank you for your patience. We appreciate you giving us the pleasure of accommodate you wile in the area, and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: A little run down, but I've found that's to be expected in any hotel around Disneyland. There was a bit of mold in the calking in the tub, but other than that, it was very clean. The breakfast had a large selection and was kept very well stocked, in spite of the vast amount of people. There is a shuttle that will take you to DL. It costs $10 a day and only picks up/drops off at 2 hotels. There is also the ART bus very close that will take you around Anaheim, including DL. It has more stops, but is less expensive (check the routes, we stayed to go to the Convention Center and it went there. It also went to Knotts Berry Farm). The suite was nice and the kitchen was nice. There were a lot of stores and restaurants within walking distance, which was very convenient. You could see
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area. I appreciate your time and understanding. Thank you again for your your feedback and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Good for multiple days at Disney
Summary: Stayed March 5th through March 10th for kids spring break at Disney. Free breakfast without Disney lines was a great way to start the day. Breakfast attendants were always pleasant & helpful--2 thumbs up for the staff. Starbucks is across the parking lot for those that need this, again--with shorter lines than the one in CA Adventure or on Main Street in Magic Kingdom. Shuttle bus to Disney came twice per hour & was always on time. Purchase bus tickets at front desk. Stayed in room 201 (2 queen suite, kitchen, sofa bed) and could see from our window shuttle bus stop. So we knew when to go down to catch bus! Although this is an older hotel, was fine with us, as price was right & we were out all day. To drop back in around 5:00 M-TH for free snacks (hotel calls it dinner), was a
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and the amenities we offer. I appreciate your feedback and thank you for your comments. We hope to be at your service again if your travels bring you back our way!

Summary Heading: Our Go To Hotel for Disneyland
Summary: The entire staff are incredibly friendly and so helpful.  We've been staying at this hotel for most of our Disneyland trips since our kids were young.  I'd say the last time we stayed about 3 years ago I thought the hotel needed updating. Pleasantly surprised this visit that it is being remodeled and we were on a remodeled floor.  Great job and can not say enough great things about the staff from front desk, cleaning personnel and staff helping with meals.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you once again while in the area. Thank you for your time and we hope to see you next time!

Summary Heading: Great hotel and close to Disneyland.
Summary: My husband and I searched many hotels trying to find one that would accommodate our family of six. We were excited to find home wood suites had enough room for our family. The bonus was that since we were staying mid week we not only received complimentary breakfast but also complimentary dinner as well. Staff was great, food was tasty and hotel was clean. We will definitely recommend and stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share with us about your visit. I am really happy to hear your stay with us was an enjoyable one. We appreciate you giving us the chance of accommodate you while in the area and thank you for your feedback. I appreciate your time and we look forward to see you again.

Summary: Kindest front desk staff!  Clean hotel, comfortable beds, GREAT FOOD (it's free! Breakfast AND dinner!!)!  The shower is a little testy and the water does  fluctuate between cold and hot frequently but that was minimal to how awesome the staff is!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and I am happy to hear our staff was pleasant. I appreciate your comments and thank you for your feedback. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Nice, friendly staff greeted us upon arrival. We were early and they held our luggage so we could head over to Disneyland. The complimentary breakfast is really good. The dining room staff is helpful and keep the area very tidy.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear your stay with us was an enjoyable one and that our staff was able to assist you. I appreciate your time and feedback and we hope to be at your service again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: We stayed here while my husband had a knee procedure. Most of the guest stay here for the location to Disneyland. A lot of family's and it was spring break. The kitchen was great to be able to use instead of eating out every night. The staff were friendly and efficient.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit, I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you fir giving us the pleasure of accommodate you. I appreciate your time and feedback and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: This hotel wasn;t horrible, but I have definitely stayed at nicer places for the same price.  This hotel needs remodeling and updating.  The free breakfast is average and the rooms are average.  Unless remodeled, I will not stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I sincerely apologize about the quality of our property and amenities we offer. I really appreciate your time and feedback and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you. Please feel free to let me know if there is anything else that I can do for you.

Summary: the staff were outstanding. kitchen could have been better stocked for use.  but totally suitable for what we needed.  very good value for our big family.  hot tub was kind of a let down......but still useable.  got the room for an average of 110/night......
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I appreciate your time and feedback, I sincerely apologize about the hot tube. I know that vacation is meant to relax and enjoy the facility and I am terribly sorry our hot tub was not up to part. Thank you again for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you and please feel free to let me know if there is anything else that I can do for you.

Summary: This as a very nice property with a great location.  Very close to Disney and within reasonable driving distance to the beach.  There are some great restaurants and shopping nearby.  I would return for business or pleasure.  The complimentary internet is modestly reliable and a little slow for the business traveler but more than acceptable for vacation purposes.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear your stay with us was a pleasant one, it always makes it better when you can actually vacation while doing work. We appreciate your feedback and thank you again for giving us the chance of accommodate you. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Excellent location for a Disney Destination
Summary: LOVED the convenient shuttle service with nominal fee, LOVED the suite orientation of the room, LOVED the oh-so comfortable beds after 12 hours walking CA Adventure, LOVED the customer-service orientation of the staff at the front desk - very friendly, helpful and accommodating (got to check in early, yay!)
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear you loved your visit. It is our goal to ensure you have a great vacation and I am happy to hear you enjoyed very moment of it. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way, we would love to be at your service!

Summary: My husband, myself, and our 1 year old daughter stayed at this hotel and we all loved our experience. Staff was exceptional, friendly, professional, attentive, prompt, informative, could go on and on. We loved the pool, loved our room, especially that it had a full size fridge, cooktop stove, microwave, table, door separating bedroom and common area. Very clean, very comfortable, wouldn't change a thing. The complimentary breakfast and munch and mingle social at night were well prepped, delicious, and kept us full and happy. The shuttle service to disneyland was on time and affordable. We will be staying at homewood suites by hilton when we come to disneyland again and we will look up other locations for future vacations.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you. I am happy to hear the staff was able to assist and make you feel at home, we look forward to see you again if your travels bring you back our way!

Summary: We stayed here before and returned because it meets our needs. A kitchen so I can prepare food for my son with bad food allergies, a suite to give it a home feel, breakfast was just what we needed good quality and variety.Dinners were kid friendly and good. Hotel is near stores and restaurants and only 2 mi from disneyland. Staff was friendly and helpful. Rooms were clean. All this at a great price. This is our goto place when visiting Disney!
Manager Response: I am very happy to hear your stay with us was a pleasant one. Thank you for giving us the chance of accommodate you while in the area. Thank you for your loyalty and we appreciate your feedback. I look forward to see you again next time and please feel free to reach out to us if there is anything that I can do.

Summary: I was very pleased with the price, the room size was very nice and loved having a separate living area and kitchen.  The staff was very friendly, helpful and accommodating to our needs.  Loved having the full breakfast each day of our stay and having a shuttle bus service right at the hotel was great!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed the amenities we offer and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way!

Summary: Homewood suites was an excellent place to stay after my wife's neck surgery, it was close to the surgical center and close to target, in which her prescriptions were filled. breakfast was excellent, overall the experience was great, even though we weren't able to go to Disneyland this time, I did notice they have a shuttle that goes to the park every half hour,
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit, I am delighted to hear we were able to make you feel comfortable during your stay specially after your surgery. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed the amenities we offer and thank you for your feedback. We hope to be at your service again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: I had a very positive experience staying at the Homewood Suites in Garden Grove, CA. It is an affiliate of Hilton, and I really liked my accomodations there better than the actual Hilton, probably because you get so much more for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed the amenities we offer and thank you for your feedback. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Stayed in the Garden Grove/Maingate Homewood Suites [the taxi driver pointed out that we weren't in Anaheim, exactly]. Pre-check in/pick your own room was fun and expedited access to our room [even early - thanks for that] The front desk staff were cheerful, helpful and knowledgeable, making change for visitors to do laundry, quickly getting the shuttle tickets in hands in the morning. The breakfast room/evening reception servers/workers were efficient and attentive.  The morning crew helped children put whipped cream on their waffles.  The food kept coming out as the families fueled up for the park. The beds were very comfortable and quiet. It's not quite 2 miles from Disneyland so the shuttle makes sense considering how much walking will happen in the Happiest Place on Earth.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and than you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate yo while in the area. I appreciate your feedback and thank you again for letting us be at your service. Please feel free to let me know if there is anything else that we can do for you and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way!

Summary Heading: Happy Days in Happiest Place on Earth
Summary: The staff at this Homewood Suites were friendly and helpful. I was greeted immediately upon walking through the front doors. The staff at breakfast was on top of everything and also very friendly. I will stay here as often as I visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit and the staff was helpful. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way!

Summary: We have stayed at Homewood Suites Garden Grove for over 7 years, with approximately 6 separate stays each year. We always experience superb, friendly customer service and are routinely greeted with a genuine, "Hello, how are you today?" The staff is willing to do whatever it takes to satisfy your every need.   Luis Vazquez, Guest Service Manager, takes offering superior customer service to another level, and goes over and above what is expected of him. He has clearly set the bar extremely high and it's obvious he prides himself on delivering excellent customer service, and has trained his staff to follow his lead. When Luis has not been available to assist us, Stewart has stepped in to help and we were equally satisfied. A great manager always leads by example and Luis does just
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share with us about your visit. I am truly honored by your comments and I really appreciate you giving me the pleasure of assist you. I am delighted to hear Stewart was able to assist in anyway possible, I personally agree that he is an amazing person and he strives to provide the best service possible every time. Thank you again for your feedback and giving us the chance of accommodate you we look forward to see you again and please feel free to let us know if there is anything that we can do for you!

Summary: Furniture torn, carpets in dubious colors and hallways that are not cleaned over night ... this property is not up to the Hilton standards. I sure hope their internal quality control gets to work soon. So, make your reservation at the Homewood Suites at the Convention Center down the road instead. You'll be happy with that choice ... we did.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am terribly sorry to hear about the experience you had with us during your stay. I definitely agree with you when it comes to the property, Thank fully our renovation schedule is set and we are getting ready to get a full renovation very soon. I really appreciate your loyalty to Hilton and I am terribly sorry about the quality being below your expectations. Please allow me to be at your service if there is anything that I can do for you. Once again thank you for your time and I hope to be at your service.   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Guest Service Manager  Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Luis.Vazquez2@Hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary: Over all this is a very nice hotel. There were some small problems with house keeping and Maintenance. I was also disappointed in the evening reception. It used to be meals, Monday - Thursday. They only had snacks the 2 nights that we were there, during those days. My grand kids didn't like most of the food and it was not a meal for them. I had to go out and buy other food for them. A main reason that I go to this chain is so that when we come home from a busy day, we can have a relaxing meal. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The pool was clean and towels were refurbished regularly. The shuttle is a little cheaper than the parking (depending on the size of your party) and much closer to the park entrance.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am terribly sorry to hear about your experience with us. I deeply regret the lack of service and quality you received. It is our goal to ensure your stay with us is an enjoyable one and it saddens me to hear we were not able to accommodate you as a valued Hilton Honors member. Please allow me to be of assistance if there is anything that I can do for you. Once again thank you for your time and patience and I hope to be at your service if there is anything that I can do for you.   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Guest Service Manager  Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Luis.Vazquez2@Hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary: The suite had everything we needed and there was plenty of room for our family of four. The complimentory breakfasts were very good.  A lot of variety and the staff was very friendly and helpful.   Even during the busy mornings, there seemed to be plenty of room for everyone.  The heated pool was nice during or mid-February visit.  The nearby restaurants served us well.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone staying near Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and the amenities we offer. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area and we hope to see you gain if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: I'm a Flight Attendant for a major airlines & a Hilton Gold Honor member. I receive & know great service around the world.. WELL.. Trust me when I say, this property is the best!!! Luis & Alan @ the front desk treat ALL of their guests with the most hospitable greeting!! I have stayed here often thru the years. There is a shuttle service to Disneyland Park. Monday thru Thursday-Dinner. Tonight I'm enjoying wine & Carnitas. Every day of the week is breakfast. The rooms are suites with full kitchens-that is, a full size refrigerator,microwave & stove!!! I can't say enough about this property-remember, I fly around the world!! The service is the best!!
Manager Response: Dear Bev B,   Thank you so much for sharing with us and thank you for your comments. Alan and I feel honored to have the pleasure of serving you while in the area. I am happy to know we are able to make you feel welcomed, I really appreciate your loyalty and the time you took from your busy schedule to share with us. Thank you again and we look forward to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: From the moment we arrived, the hotel was amazing! The staff were very friendly and accommodating. They remembered it was my birthday and had a little gift basket waiting for me in my room. It was a very nice surprise! Me and my boyfriend just enjoyed Alan Solis and Jeremy service. Also, the hotel and room were very clean. I wished we would have stayed longer.It was a very nice birthday for me and thank you Homewood Suites Anaheim! We will defiantly come back for a leisure stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you. I will ensure to share this with Alan and Jeremy as I know they will be thrilled to hear their quality of service is exceptional. Thank you again and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Great place to base a holiday from
Summary: Stayed here for two weeks and couldn't expect anything more.  We used the Hilton mobile app and booked our room on the 7th floor,  great view of the fireworks from Disneyland.  Breakfast in the morning is a bonus if not a little chaotic but a good way to start a full on day of shopping,  theme parks or sight seeing.  Handy to good family friendly restaurants, Target and a pharmacy just across the road and serviced by a hotel shuttle to Disneyland or a 400m walk to an ART stop.  The pool area is great and a nice way to unwind after a long day.  Staff were very friendly and helpful. The elevator lives up to its reputation but if you're on holiday "who cares"
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you. I appreciate your feedback and thank you for your comments. Thank you for your patience and understanding and please feel free to let me know if there is anything that I can do for you. Once again thank you and I hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Not Homewood Standards - but take a look
Summary: For the family travelling to Disney - this is close and the shuttle is great.  For someone who regularly stays in Homewood Suites across the country, this property does not meet the usual criteria. Families - the room is clean, and the two rooms are great when travelling with numerous people.  You will have a fridge and microwave and two burner stove.  Breakfast is served in the morning and an evening reception offers a light meal if you are back from the park by 7 pm.  You can even get a beer/wine/soda. Shuttle - For $5/person, you can ride a shuttle to the park that is very easy and leaves every half hour, with a short walk to the entrance. Otherwise parking your car is $18 at the park. Park tickets are sold at the hotel desk saving you a line in the morning.  Joe's Crab Shack
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us about your visit. I really appreciate your feedback and thank you for your comments. I agree with you when it comes to the condition items and I am happy to share that we are starting our room renovation at the end of this month. I thank you for your time and patience after the issues you encountered during your stay and please feel free to me let me know if there is anything that I can do for you. Once again than you and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a Disney vacation
Summary: I came here with my wife, 1 year old, and in-laws and we had a great time. There was lots of parking, we were greeted and serviced promptly, every single staff member was friendly and professional, and breakfast was free every morning! The rooms were comfortable and the kitchen was well stocked. My wife loved that coffee was always available, no matter what time of the day it was. Disneyland was about a 7 minute drive away. Target is across the street, and Outback Steakhouse, Red Robin, Joe's Crab Shack, and Starbucks were all within walking distance! We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us, I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for giving us the chance of serving you while in the area. I really appreciate your feedback and thank you for your time. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: I loved checking in and getting a fresh baked cookie! How cool is that? I also liked using the mobile app and picking out my own room. Jeremy was great upon check-in he was very friendly and hospitable. I've stayed at a lot of hotels, so I like feeling at home, and that's how I felt here. Kevin was the best.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear your stay with us was a pleasant one and thank you for your feedback. We appreciate you giving us the pleasure of accommodate you and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: If you were looking to be cost effective in Anaheim, this is a valid option. Not a resort but clean enough. The suites make it nice for families but I wouldn't sleep on that hide a bed. The free coffee is bad. There is an ATM in the lobby but it cost $3.50. Seemed like plenty of parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I appreciate your time and thank you for giving us the Chance of accommodate you while in the area. I am sorry about the quality of the coffee as well as the fee you had for the ATM, I apologize for the inconvenience. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: We were very pleasantly surprised by this hotel.  The room was quite spacious and we could cook for ourselves & prepare snacks to take to Disneyland.  The breakfast and evening receptions were very good, with a variety of food and helpful staff. We skipped dinner most nights as the snacks were substantial enough - we saved a lot of money (and calories) on restaurants by staying here.  Also a great pool which is even long enough to swim laps.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us about your visit. I am really happy to hear our amenities were a pleasant part of your stay. I appreciate your feedback and thank you for giving us the chance of accommodate you, we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Front desk: very friendly and professional. The associates at the front desk were welcoming and very accommodating.    Amenities: Good size pool area and spacious lounge. Restaurant/dining area  seemed like a nice spot, there were alot guests there, not  empty table in sight. Fire pits are a nice touch as well.   Room: very clean and spacious.   The room had 2 huge HD TV's free HBO. Very modern looking room also. The Kitchen area has everything you need in order to cook if you need to. And we also had a very nice view of the busy street down below and Disney fireworks. The beds were very comfortable as well. The noise level was superb, slept like a champ. All in all, I will be staying here again and I HIGHLY RECOMMEND you do too.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: GM is bad - staff are nice - Standards for Cleanliness are non-existant
Summary: The condition of the hotel was very poor. Our bathroom was covered in black mold, the sofa was ripped, soda stains down the side of the couch, dirty dishes in the cabinet, and our freezer stopped working and thawed all our food purchased from the store. The hot-tub was disgusting and left a pungent odor on myself and my kids, and the pool deck was cracked. The elevator inspection certificate expired in December of 2014. The resolution offered by the front desk was initially to refund our HH points and relocate us to another hotel, though since it was the day of, all properties points totals had increased to 50k+ points/night, so they said they could not make the transfer without us having to pay for additional nights. I requested they pay for the additional nights since we
Manager Response: ‚ÄúDear Philip H,  Thank you for your feedback of your recent stay with us. I understand you were unhappy with the cleanliness of your initial room and apologize for this experience. We work hard to ensure the comfort and satisfaction of our guests and apologize that we were unable to meet that expectation. Our General Manager has attempted to contact you to further discuss your concerns as our guests satisfaction is of the upmost importance to us. We hope that if you travels bring you back to the area that you will consider staying with us again.

Summary: We have stayed here several times, it's no the newest & shiniest but the hotel staff are great, the rooms are nice sized & we like having the kitchen area.  Plus their shuttle to Disneyland goes much quicker than it used to (only shared by Mariott next door) so we buy the shuttle passes & skip the rental car!  Of course having Target across the street to buy snacks & other food stuff or water is handy as is having the pizza place, Joes Crab Shack & Outback literally on the same corner is super!  We like it here & their breakfast choices are super & the managers reception Mon-Thurs we love - no restaurant hunting and saves BIG $$!  Just works well for us!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and the amenities we offer. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights with my wife and 3 children. After reading a few bad reviews I was a bit afraid to boos here but decided to go ahead and book here. I must say the staff were VERY helpful, and the stay was GREAT! The complimentary breakfast was perfect for my family of 5, and the happier hour and dinner are okay, if you don't feel like going anywhere. We only enjoyed it one night but was a nice dinner and the beer was great!  All in all I would recommend this hotel to any family looking for a hotel while visiting Disneyland. *$12 a night for hotel parking *5 shuttle to Disneyland per person.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us about your visit, and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for your comments and feedback. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: My adult daughter and I recently stayed here for a short Disneyland trip and overall would recommend it.  The hotel is showing it's age in places with chipped paint and carpeting that needs restretching. It is clean however, so I had no concerns about staying.  The walls are a bit  thin so if you are a light sleeper, you may want earlpugs.  I would not recommend this hotel to business travelers. Due to its proximity to Disneyland,  there are a lot of families with small children, so it can be a little noisy and crazy.  Now, the positives - which I think outweigh the negatives:  The staff is fantastic! They are very friendly and accommodating.  The breakfast is very good, with hot items (eggs, potatoes, pancakes) along with the usual cold items. There is plenty of seating.  The
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear my team and amenities were a pleasant attribute to your stay. I incompletely agree with you about our tear and wear, our property started to show its age. I am happy to share with you that we are starting our major renovation very shortly to ensure all those areas you mention get upgraded. Thank you again for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Great family place to stay by Disneyland
Summary: We've stayed at many resorts by Disneyland (Anaheim) with varying levels of service, If you have a family, need a great place to stay, clean big rooms, close proximity to Disneyland, with shuttles, complimentary breakfast, and tons of meal options located close by, then this is you place.The service was excellent and the staff bent over backwards to make sure we had the best experience. They will even do your grocery shopping. We will always stay here going forward.
Manager Response: Than you so much for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for giving us the chance of serving you. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: I stayed during a big convention and needed a close proximity. This was the only thing available. The price was close to what the hotels at the convention center charge, but the quality of the experience was not the same value. Slow elevator service, unclean carpets and hair on the shower walls. For $75 a night...okay, but for $200+ a night, unacceptable.  I expected a 3*, I got a 2*. I will book earlier for next year so I can stay in a 4* closer to the convention.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel.  HHonors member, you are among our most valued guests. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future. Thank you again or your time and patience and please feel free to let me know if there is anything that I can do for you.   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Guest Service Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Luis.Vazquez2@Hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary: We have stayed at many hotels in the Anaheim/Garden Grove area, including D-Land hotels and by far, this hotel is the BEST!  Nola checked us in and she is fantastic and totally rocks the pixie cut!  The room was spacious for 2 adults/2 kids and it had a full kitchen.  We were able to order groceries online through Vons (free delivery) and had snacks to take with us to the park.  The daily breakfast is off the charts with pretty much something for everyone!  The ham was not greasy and the sausages were cooked to perfection.  Also, the eggs weren't old and dry.  Plus they had oatmeal, cereal and fresh fruit!  Another bonus is the managers reception M-F.  Super great food and you could easily make it dinner.   The pool area is clean and heated so we were able to enjoy it.  The hot
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and the amenities we offer. I am really happy to hear Nola was able to provide you with her usual excellent guest service. I will ensure to share this with her and thank her for the awesome work she does. Thank you again for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: We were booked in for 6 days to experience Halloween at Disneyland.  The hotel is a little worn in the lobby due to the high level of traffic and use and the pool needs some TLC but the service more than made up for it.  The staff were extremely friendly and helpful. As for perks you got a full breakfast every morning and on Mondays to Thursdays there was a happy hour from 5-7 with enough food to make a meal.  The walk to Disneyland is a good 45 minutes but they offered a shuttle service 5 days for 20.00 and it ran from 6 am to 1 am.   A special acknowledgement of Andres Mender who provided service during happy hour - as he never stopped working or catering to the guests.  The rooms were a bit tired looking but most importantly they were clean.  I don't mind it looking tired as
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear you had a pleasant experience with my staff and thank you for joining us during our amenities. I definitely agree with you about the tear and wear of the property. Luckily we are working into renovations this year. I hope to be of assistance if there is anything that I can do for you and than you again for giving us the chance to be at your service.

Summary Heading: If I could give it ZERO stars I would
Summary: I took m kids to Disneyland and decided to stay the night, so I just walked in to make a reservation here.  We were given a room near the back elevator.  The kids and I unloaded all our stuff in the room.  As I looked around, I was horrified by the grunginess of the place, but we were tired, so we all took turns in the bathroom. I could not believe my eyes when it was my turn.  There was mold all over the bathroom ceiling and walls- on the wallpaper, etc.  I immediately went to the front desk, and they apologized and gave me a room closer to the front.  I decided to check that room before I dragged all of the kids to it.  It was absolutely no better, so I went straight back to the front desk and cancelled my reservation. They very quickly cancelled it for me.  The guys at the
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am terribly sorry about the terrible experience you had, I sincerely apologize and deeply regret the lack of cleanliness. Please allow me to be of assistance if there is anything that I can do for you as I would like to make it right. Once again I am terribly sorry we failed to provide you with a clean suite and I look forward to be at your service.   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Guest Service Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Luis.Vazquez2@Hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary: This was absolutely the worst hotel experience of my entire life! Because of the issues at stake, I will send off a copy of my complaint letter to Head Office first, as Management was not accountable or effective, especially with the last incident we were subjected to. We were kindly offered shuttle tickets at the beginning of our week stay....but, I still felt we should leave & try & get in next door at The Marriott. They were full except for one night, so I thought we should just stay put & make the best of it as it was a congested time of the month. Big Mistake! Let's just say that from the time we arrived at approx.11+ am, & actually got our room about 4:45 the first day...until we left 8 days later it was a daily nightmare. Thank God for some of the great people we met
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us about your visit. I am terribly sorry to hear about the terrible experience you had with us during your vacation. I deeply regret the lack of service from our shuttle and the inconvenience of the room not being ready for early check in, please allow me to be of assistance as I would be happy to help. I sincerely apologize about the experience you had with us, I am sorry we were not able to provide the quality service you deserve. Thank you for your time and patience and I hope to be of assistance to you in any way I can.   Sincerely,  Luis Vazquez Guest Service Manager  Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Luis.Vazquez2@Hilton.com  714-740-1800

Summary: Always a great stay.  staff really tries, I can tell.  even though this is a big company, the staff seems like they sincerely want to make the customers happy.   the onsite managers seem to be very caring persons if you ever need them...
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you and We appreciate your time and feedback. I am happy to hear my team was able to make your stay an enjoyable one and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Stayed here on a recent trip to Disneyland. It was walking distance  to some restaurants, Starbucks, Target and other hotels. Thought it would be within a short walking distance to Disneyland since it had 'Main Gate' listed in the name but it wasn't. They offered shuttle service for a small fee (we paid $5 per person per a day) which made it convenient to go back and forth to Disneyland without having to deal with finding a place to park and paying each time we went. They  also charged us to park our car but I think most of the hotels there do and think it was around what the other hotels in that area charge.   Hotel was completely smoke free which was nice since one of my kiddos has asthma so we like to stay places that are smoke free. If you'd like to stay somewhere that is
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and the amenities we offer. I am terribly sorry about the confusion of our title Main Gate Area. I am terribly sorry about the quality of our property as well. I personally agree we are in need of a renovation, and thankfully we started this year so by the end of summer time we will be good as new.
