Thank you so much for your patience and giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area. Please feel free to let me know if there is anything else that I can do for you and thank you again for your time.

Summary: I've been staying at this hotel for most of my Disneyland trips since 2001. I always return to this hotel mainly because of the excellent value of the accommodations. The suites are spacious and the full kitchen is so convenient and a great money saver instead of buying food at the parks. The continental breakfast is always a must. They have REAL food: eggs, bacon, waffles (that you make yourself), and more. Over the years it has just gotten better and better. I recommend going as early as possible because the dining area gets crowded.  The staff also is genuinely kind and is always eager to help. I love that the hotel is small and less overwhelming than other hotels in the area. Looking forward to my next trip!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and the amenities we offer. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you once again while in the area and thank you for your feedback. We look forward to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: The rooms are perfect and breakfast is delicious with an evening meal Monday - Thursday, which helps keep our expenses to Disneyland much more affordable.  I can't say enough about the excellent staff.  Luis Vasquez and his staff are the best in the business. Excellent value!!!!  Thank you for everything!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us about your visit. We are really happy to be able to accommodate you while in the area, we appreciate your loyalty and thank you so much for your time. I am sorry this time around there was the move of rooms due to the bathtub renovation and thank you for your patience and understanding. From everyone on the staff specially my  self, thank you for letting us be part of your family. Thank you again for your comments and we can't wait to see you guys again.

Summary: While most people visiting this area are visiting Disney Land we were here for a couple of days just to shop before flying back to Australia. The hotel is in a very good location, close to Disney (8min drive), good restaurants, lots of shops and has easy access with lots of parking.  The staff were fantastic. Very friendly and helpful.  The rooms are very good. They are large with good bathrooms and a large screen tv.  The breakfast is average so we only had this one morning but it is what one should expect in this kind of hotel when it is included in the price.  As for the price, it is very very good value. Each night from Mon to Thurs 5-7 pm, there is evening drinks (beer and wine) and small eats like nachos to go with your drink.  There is a coin laundry and a small shop if
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and the amenities we offer. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way and hopefully next time around you visit the theme parks.Thank you again for your time and giving us the pleasure of accommodate you.

Summary Heading: Homewood suites by Hilton Anaheim-Main Gate Area
Summary: We were very satisfied with all the services provided by Homewood suites by Hilton Anaheim-Main Gate Area 12005 Harbor Blvd. Garden Grove, CA 92840 we loved the breakfast and Evening Manager's Reception.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed the amenities we offer and thank you for giving us the chance of accommodate you while in the area. We hope to sea you again if your travels bring you  back our way.

Summary: The staff is very friendly and helpful. The facility is very clean. We did not have any complaints. The location was ideal and had shuttle service to Disney. It was easily accessible to other areas.  Although we did not use all of the facilities the hotel had to offer, it was very inviting.
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area, and thank you for sharing with us. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel 12/27/15-1/2/16.  Our room was clean upon arrival and the housekeeping staff did a great job through out the week.  It was very nice to have the living room and kitchen detached from the sleeping area.  The breakfasts were great and always had plenty of options.  The staff was always very helpful and FRIENDLY!  We did use the laundry facilities and our only suggestion would be to put a laundry room on each floor.  This hotel has easy access to Disney (via car or shuttle) as well as some great places to eat within walking distance.  We would stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. We are very happy to hear your stay with us was an enjoyable one. I am happy to hear the amenities and staff were up to part and thank you for giving us the chance of accommodate you while in the area. We hope to see you again if your travels bribing you back our way.

Summary: Chose this hotel since it is very close to the Disneyland resort in Anahiem. They operate shuttles to and from Disneyland. Parking in the hotel is not free.  Breakfast was excellent and staff were good.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay. We appreciate your feedback and thank you fr giving us the pleasure of accommodate you.

Summary: Traveled for Disneyland.  Two night stay, me and my family of 5. Arrived at night, clerk was helpful.  Wife found a "curly" hair on our sheets.  We were going to report it but we both forgot after a day at D-land.  Shower water was alternating from cold to hot, both days, Dec 25-27, 2015.  Very uncomfortable.  Toaster burnt our toast and set off the smoke detector.  Pretty quiet on the 4th floor, after the front desk stated they were all sold out.  Breakfast was common, with eggs, bacon, cereal, breads and oatmeal.  On our day of checkout, there was two ladies at the front desk, one dark and one not.  I asked one of them about the checkout time.  She did not even look at me, blinked her eyes in an irritating way and did not look at me not once.  I thanked her for the information
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am terribly sorry to hear about the awful inconvenience you experienced during your stay and deeply regret the lack of service. I sincerely apologize about my staff. I will ensure to correct this. Please allow me to be of assistance if there is anything that I can do for you. I appreciate your time and patience and I hope to be at your service. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you.

Summary: Our stay was great. Family friendly environment.  Staff were friendly, professional, and very helpful.  Hotel was clean and comfortable.  Manager's reception was a nice surprise.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for sharing with us. I am really happy the staff and the amenities we offer made for a pleasant visit. We look forward to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: We love staying here for Disneyland vacations
Summary: Staff was very helpful and friendly. This is a very nice hotel. Very spacious rooms. The kitchen and livingroom was a huge plus. Breakfast was very good. It was much more convenient for my family to take the shuttle to and from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and the amenities we offer. We appreciate your feedback and thank you for giving us the chance of accommodate you. We look forward to see you again if your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: For the amount paid, the location of the hotel, amenities, complimentary breakfast and some dinners Homewood Suites is an excellent place to stay.  There are many restaurants nearby and within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your stay. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed the amenities and accommodations. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Once again the Homewood aimed to please.  We were treated very well and Louis and his team are great.  Clean rooms, great service made our stay enjoyable.  They are starting to go through renovations and I can't wait to see the results. We will stay again on our next Disneyland trip!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us about your stay. I am happy to hear we were able to make your visit a pleasant one, we appreciate your loyalty and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you once again. We look forward to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Want to stay at a suite hotel but not pay through the roof and still have five star service? Then stay at a Homewood Suite hotel. We stayed the first time at one and we'll return for sure. The breakfast was great each day and the evening free food was good. Having a shuttle service every half hour to Disneyland was great and easy to use. There are great restaurants and shops in the area in walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit and thank you for sharing with us. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Amazing staff and service.  Treated my daughter extremely well and made her feel special on her birthday by leaving 6 balloons and a basket of goodies in our hotel room along with a signed card from the staff.  It was a very special treat for my daughter and my family.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear your visit with us was a pleasant and thank you for sharing your daughters special day with us. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: The hotel is obviously older. The elevator took over 5 minutes to come down from the upper floors. The ceiling in the first floor fell down near the back elevator. The couch was ripped, bathroom sink broken and mildew in the shower ceiling.
Manager Response: I am terribly sorry about your experience with us. I sincerely apologize about the elevator and the construction you encountered during your stay. We had just installed a new Air Conditioning unit and unfortunately the re patching of the ceiling took a little longer to be repaired. Please allow me to be of assistance if there is anything that I can do for you. Thank you for your time and patience and Happy Holidays.

Summary: This hotel was close to the parks, offers a shuttle to the Downtown Disney area for a small fee and has all the normal perks of a Homewood (awesome hot breakfasts, cozy rooms with full size fridge and stove top with cookware). It's conveniently located near restaurants, Starbucks and a Super Target for your food/souvenir needs.  I only hate that they charge for parking... if you're going to charge me to park, at least offer the Disney shuttle for free... I would stay here again, though! Good value for the price!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and the amenities we offer. I am sorry about the parking fee, I know that it could be an inconvenience. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area and we are delighted to hear your vacation was a pleasant one. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: As a family of seven, we had two double suites.  Everything was in working order.  We had plenty of space to move around. The value for what you pay is great.  Rooms are quiet, staff was friendly.  Breakfast was great.  They put us in suites across the hall from each other without requesting which I thought was a nice touch.  Overall, would definitely recommend this brand.
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear your visit with us was a pleasant one. Thank you so much for sharing with us and than you for giving us the chance of serving you while in the area. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Don't Let These Reviews Scare You Away
Summary: We are a family of six who normally stay at Embassy Suites. I booked this hotel as it had larger beds and we thought we might use the kitchen to save some money. I started reading some of these reviews after booking and I was terrified. I was worried I booked my family in a dive and started searching for other options. With our group size and the holiday overlap, there weren't options so I left the reservation and prepped the family that it might be terrible.   What I have found this week is very far from terrible. To hit on a few of the points in other reviews:  breakfast - Embassy wins in terms of total offerings daily, however, Embassy offers the same things every single day. Homewood changes it up each day which can be nice when you are here for multiple days. Embassy
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear your stay with us was an enjoyable one. I appreciate your time and your feedback, thank you for your comments and thank you for giving us the chance to accommodate you and your family during your vacation. Once again thank you for sharing with us and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: My family stayed at this hotel during our vacation to Disneyland. Loved having a kitchen in the room, kids loved being able to make popcorn. We've heard great things about the buffet, but only managed early breakfast, which was okay. The helpfulness of staff was amazing. Everyone from lobby to the maids were amazing.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Best Food Around and it's INCLUDED!
Summary: We had a family of eight and fit very nicely into a suite. They were very accommodating with a baby crib too. The food was fantastic, a great mix for children as well as adults and a good variety. We would definitely go again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us. I am truly happy to hear you enjoyed your visit. Thank you for giving us the pleasure to accommodate you while in the area and we thank you for your feedback. We hope to see you and your family again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Of course there are lots of hotel choices in this area, so I'll just give you the highlights. Hilton quality at every level of service; staff, room quality, kitchen, pool. Excellent view of Disney Fireworks from entire north side of hotel. Buy Shuttle tickets to get you to the park at the front desk.  Free beer at dinner on selected evenings. TIPS: Get a high fllor for fireworks, Use rear elevator when hotel is busy.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us about your experience at our property. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for your comments about our staff. I really appreciate your feedback and time. We thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: This is a great hotel with friendly staff who care about you and go the extra mile when needed.  The breakfast and dinner reception are top notch, and good for both the individual and the family.  The pool is long enough to lap swimming, and there is a wading pool for the smaller kids.  My kids especially liked the Disney movies that ran on the TV screen in the lobby!  Great hotel overall.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for your comments about the staff. I will ensure to share this with my staff and thank them. Once again thank you for your time and we appreciate you giving us the pleasure of accommodate you. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: A very clean, friendly and homely Hotel.
Summary: We recently stayed for four days at this property, as a base for our visits to Disneyland and California Adventure.  The Reception staff were great from the moment we arrived. We arrived quite early in the morning, and didn't expect we would be able to check in.  Reception staff informed us that our room was available and we could check in straight away. As it was quite early they invited us to have the complimentary breakfast, as it was still being served.  We were able to purchase our Disney tickets at the hotel which made things easy. And a $5 per day shuttle to Disney.  One of the tickets we purchased had an sue went we went to use it. I called the hotel and they sent a representative down to Disneyland to meet us to get the ticket sorted out. This we were very pleased with.
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit with us. We appreciate your time and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area. I am happy to hear the staff was able to assist you throughout your stay, I will ensure to share this with them and thank them for their awesome work. Once again thank yo u and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Stayed here on business because of its proximity to the convention center.  When checking into my room, I noticed that the tub was dirty and stained.  I informed the front desk and was told they would take care of it.  It was never cleaned in the four days I stayed there.  The ceiling in the breakfast area has significant water damage.  The entire place is falling apart with no sign of Hilton working to make changes.  Most of the guests seem to be families going to Disneyland.  If you just need a cheap place to stay with your family, then this might suffice.
Manager Response: i sincerely apologize about the experience you had during your visit. I am terribly sorry you had to such such quality at the property. I deeply regret the lack of follow up from my staff when you asked to have your bathtub clean. Thank you for sharing with us and giving us the chance of accommodate you. Please feel free to let me know if there is anything that I can do as I would like to be of assistance to you. Once again thank you for your time and patience.

Summary: My family and I took a vacation to Disneyland and the beach. We stayed at the Homewood suites from Monday to Saturday. The room was ok for the price but lacked the added features of other Hilton brand hotels that we have stayed at. The evening managers happy hour (snacks and drinks) was ok but it was not available on Friday.  The pool area was ok and the kids loved the wading pool.  The breakfast was adequate compared to similar hotel offerings. I would recommend the hotel for anyone with a family due to the full sized fridge and kitchen. I would spend the extra money next time for a higher rated hotel but the hotel was ok.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear you enjoyed the amenities we offer and I am sorry if you encountered any inconvenience throughout your visit. Thank you again for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you and we hope to be at your service again.

Summary: This is our second time staying at Homewood Garden Grove. The Staff are fantastic Louise your a great leader. Anyone who want a vacation and close to Disneyland this is the place to stay. Breakfast buffet is always lovely. Can't recommend Homewood enough.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us about your visit. I appreciate your comments Thank you so much it means a lot. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area and I hope to have the chance to see you again if your travels bring you back our way. Thank you again for your time.

Summary: This is the place when you have an extended stay for visiting the Disneyland Resort. One bedroom apartment, hot breakfast and awesome staff. Can't really miss staying here. They have a semi-private shuttle service to Disneyland (shared sometimes with neighboring hotel. No big deal). Very convenient and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear your visit with us was an enjoyable one. I appreciate your comments and we thank you for giving us the chance of accommodate you while in the area. I hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Great time, great stay, great staff!
Summary: The staff at this Hotel is absolutely Wonderful! I cant say enough of the staff and their helpfulness! After checking in we went to our room and the house keeping lady in the hall gave my girls a balloon which was left by prior gifts, we found that very sweet. Once in the room we decided we'd like to be on the other side of the hotel to see the fireworks, we called down to the front desk and they not only let us switch rooms no problem but they came up to the room to give us the new key. The room was great and we had no issues with it at all.   Just a little "secret" there is a back elevator which we found is rarely used. Our room was on the 7th Floor right next to the elevator. At first we were slightly worried about that but didnt have a single issue with it. For the life of
Manager Response: I am delighted to see you enjoyed your visit with us. Thank you so much for your feedback, I really appreciate your comments and I will ensure to share them with my team. I thank you for sharing with us and I hope to be at your service if your travels bring you back our way. Once again thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you .

Summary: We stayed here 4 nights while visiting Disneyland and CA.  Our room was not ready when we arrived, but we only had to wait 30 mins or so.  We had a nice corner room on the second floor right by the stairs.  We walked to Disney the first day and then took the shuttle from the Disney lots the other days.  We found the Disney shuttle option to be very convenient.  Lot was 1/2 mile or so down the street and shuttles were there regularly.  This was a cheaper option than using the hotel shuttle.   We were disappointed with the breakfast provided.  There was no waffle maker and scrambled eggs and potatoes were served every day.   They did not offer a pastry other than toast and bagels.  We have had much better breakfast in other hotels.  We did not try the dinner since we were
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I sincerely apologize about the inconvenience you experienced with out breakfast, and I am sorry about the wait for your suite to be ready. I hope to be of assistance if there is anything that I can do for you and thank you again for giving us the chance of accommodate you.

Summary: Hot breakfast was less than desirable.  Stayed across the street at the residence inn in the past and was far better.  Stayed in room 202 and noise from housekeeping laundry was absurd as well as window view was HVAC system.  Were too tired/busy to move rooms due to being at Disney most of day and already unpacked.  Mentioned noise issue to 3 front desk staff with no follow up.
Manager Response: I am terribly sorry to hear about your experience with us. I sincerely apologize about the lack of follow up from my staff and the inconvenience you experienced. I will ensure to utilize your comments to work with my team about this issues. I deeply regret we were not able to make your stay with us a pleasant one, specially when you want to relax after a day at the theme parks. I appreciate your time and patience, I hope to be of assistance in any way possible so please feel free to let me know if there is anything else that I can do for you. Thank you again for giving us the chance of accommodate you.

Summary: The staff were some of the most friendly and accommodating I've experienced.  The rooms and facilities were very nice.  Transportation to/from Disneyland and accessibility to Target and other restaurants was wonderful.  The rooms were ample and great for families.  I would stay again.  My only recommendation is for improvement in the food offered.  Items were often cold, but there were other options so it was not too troublesome.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to see you enjoyed your stay with us and we appreciate you giving us the chance of accommodate you. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: My wife and I arrived only to wait 1 1/2 hours past check in time for a room.  This happened with many other families as well.  The only thing that was done, was we were given free parking.  The manager never made an appearance to explain what was going on, nor try and resolve the situation. Our room's garbage was overflowing when we got in.  There was a wet spot on our bedroom floor.  A housekeeping employee walked right in without knocking.  And this was nothing like any of the other Homewood Suites I have stayed at.  Old appliances in the kitchenette and dirty.
Manager Response: I am terribly sorry about your experience at our property. I deeply regret the lack of housekeeping and service you received. I am truly sorry about the lack of follow up on our behalf and I apologize you had to wait past check in time to receive a room.  I want  to ensure you that I can be of assistance to you in any way I can. Please feel free to contact me if there is anything that I can do for you. Once again thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you and I hope to be of assistance in any way possible.

Summary: Stayed at Home wood suites from October 17th through October 21. Main purpose was Disneyland with extended family. Yes, it looks a little old but so what.  The service from the staff, the excellent breakfast, and the free manager's special every Mon-Thu evening more than made up for it. Many families with kids make the manager's special reception their dinner also. All in all an excellent stress free, very reasonable cost to stay in a Hilton property so close to Disneyland. Wouldn't think twice before visiting again.
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear your visit with us was a pleasant one. Thank you for sharing with us and I appreciate your feedback. I definitely agree with you, we are showing wear and tear around our property but we are excited that soon we will remodel. I appreciate your comments and thank you for sharing about our staff. Once again thank you for giving us the chance of accommodate you and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Room was dirty, there was a loud pounding noise at different times throughout 3 days (sometimes as late as 11pm), and the staff was not helpful when these issues were brought up.  Also, ensure you are aware that there is a fee for the shuttle and self parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am terribly sorry to hear about your experience during you vacation. I deeply regret the lack of service you received from my team. Please allow me to be of assistance if the re is anything that I can for you. I am sorry to hear about us missing to give you the information about of shuttle fee and parking, I sincerely apologize. Please feel free to reach out to me at anytime. Thank you again for your time and I hope to be of assistance to you.

Summary Heading: Great Disneyland trip for our family!!
Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed out stay at Homewood Suites!  It was our family's first trip to Disneyland and our girls loved coming back to our suite after a long day at the park!  They enjoyed the breakfast and the pool as well!!
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit. Thank you so much for sharing with us and we appreciate you giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area. Once again thank you for your time and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: We stayed here almost a week, Saturday to Thursday.  We had a room on the second floor in the back, where there was very little foot traffic so it was quiet. The room was spacious, plenty of room for 4 adults and a child.  However, thats the end of the good part.  There was mold on the ceiling and the floor in the bathroom.  The shower temperature changed by itself, going from freezing cold to scalding hot with no warning and no adjustment by the user.   It was almost unbearable. My sister-in-law found a bedbug in the pull-out couch.  When she reported it to the manager, she was told an exterminator would be called immediately to check the room, and was told they found nothing after the examination.  Not sure if anything else came of it after that.  The breakfast was misleading,
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit and I am terribly sorry to hear about your visit with us. I sincerely apologize about the lack of amenities and I am sorry about the lack of follow up on your incident. I believe I was able to assist the day of the report you made to us about the insect on the room. Please feel free to contact me at any time if there is anything that I can do for you. I am very sorry to hear you experienced issues with the shower as well, I want to ensure you that I am here for you and I would like to make this right. Thank you for your time and your feedback we truly appreciate you giving us the pleasure of accommodate you and I hope to assist on any way I can.

Summary Heading: Family friendly and close to amenities
Summary: Thank you so much for a fantastic stay for us kiwis with a party of 6 (2x Ad 4x Ch)!  With our busy itinerary that week it was nice to enjoy the complimentary breakfasts and dinner Mon-Thur particularly after long days at the theme parks. Yes the elevator is slow (there's another one down the hall or use the stairs), it may be dated (I understand renovations are coming soon), but here are our positive points to note: 1) easy location - Target for your grocery shop as well as other stores across the road and restaurants 2) shuttles every half hour to/from Disney 3) full kitchen in your own room - great when you get tired of eating out and you feel like a home cooked meal 4) knowledgeable staff - they recommended Mr Hugo as our private shuttle driver to Knotts to avoid catching
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and I really appreciate your comments. Thank you for giving us the chance of accommodate you and your family. I really appreciate your feedback and thank you for your time when writing this. I hope to be of assistance if your travels bring you back our way next time you come to the area. Once again thank you and we look forward to see you and the family soon.

Summary: As others have said, this hotel does have wear and tear. However the rooms-we had 3- are spotless, and the customer service is excellent in many ways. From Luis and Alan at the front desk to Andres in the food service area, and the many room cleaners and other front desk folks whom I am ashamed I don't have names for, we have nothing but praise.  We enjoyed the breakfast and felt it was quite complete for our needs, and quite extensive given how inexpensive the suites were. The cost and the excellent customer service helped us to overlook the age of the hotel. We used the shuttle to go to Disney, great efficient service; enjoyed the pool, and appreciated the 24 hour guest laundry. Good job to Luis and crew.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time out of your schedule to share with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit and we thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you. Thank you so much for the feedback I will ensure to share this with my staff and I know they will be thrill to hear their dedication is being noticed. I appreciate your comments and I hope to see you back if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Hotel staff are awesome!  The hotel needs some TLC.  We have stayed at this hotel 3 times, once a year for the pasted 3 years, and have seen it go down hill.  This is our last stay at this hotel until improvements are made.  I hope the corporation puts some money into this hotel.  Our bathroom was poor, the shower curtain would not stay closed because the curtain rod was bent.  Where there was once a handle in the tub, was poorly covered up, and the beds were worn.  It was embarrassing, I recommended our family to stay at this hotel with us.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I appreciate your feedback and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodate you while in the area. I can agree with you that we need some work to bring back that quality of Hilton hotels and I am exited to share that we will be starting our remodeling project soon. I hope to be of assistance if your travels bring you back our way as I would love to have you back once all our construction is done. Once again thank you for your time and comments.

Summary: Stayed 4 nights primarily to visit Disneyland with kids.  Yes, the hotel is not upto the high Hilton standards but this is reflected in the price also.  Can't say enough good words about the breakfast and the evening reception.  Indeed, many families with children were making the evening reception their dinner. Very friendly staff.   Keep up the good work.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to see you enjoyed your visit. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you while in the area and I really appreciate your feedback. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Yes the hotel does need some updates. The staff is amazing. Alan helped us find the best restaurants and gave us valuable tips on the area. The breakfast and dinner free makes it a great value. Have stayed here 3 times, never disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your visit and thank you for the loyalty. It is our pleasure to accommodate you while in the area and thank you for giving us the chance of serving you. We look forward to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: This hotel does have a lot of wear and tear. However, the customer service is SUPERB. We had a great experience with the staff and the responsiveness of the manager was amazing. The cost and the excellent customer service helped us to overlook the age of the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your visit and I appreciate your feedback. I can agree with you about the wear and tear of the property and I can not wait for this upcoming renovation to be done so we can look like a brand new property. Thank you for your time and I hope to be of assistance if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: When we first checked in and went to our room, it was already occupied. The person already checked into the room was not present but his/her laptop was open on the table and other personal belongings were present. So we went back to the desk and were moved to another room. The 2nd room had small red bugs under the mattress. Hotel staff came and said it wasn't bed bugs (but that they had brought bed bugs from the hotel to their home in the past) and then moved us to another room. The 3rd room smelt strongly of smoke. So we ended up in a 4th room (after moving our luggage and kids around at 9 pm). The next morning we were sitting on the shuttle to Disneyland and saw a ‚ÄúHeat Treatment‚Äù truck show up at the hotel. We called the desk and they said yes, the hotel was being treated for
Manager Response: I am terribly sorry to hear about your experience during your visit with us. I sincerely apologize about the issues you en countered and please feel free to contact me if there is anything that I can assist you with as I will ensure to follow up on this. Thank you for sharing with us, your time, and patience.

Summary: The quality of the breakfast was sub par. The appearance was not attractive.  The taste of the food was not appealing.  Perhaps the meals could be made to order like Embassy Suites does.  It appears the hotel had full occupancy the entire time I was there, so it appears the hotel could afford to change their kitchen area to make meals to order.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit while in the area. I really appreciate your feedback and I am sorry if the breakfast was not up to standard. I sincerely apologize about that and I thank you for sharing with us I will definitely share this with my team. Thank you again for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and we hope to be at your service if our travels bring you back.

Summary: The only serious probelem we had was the very slow elevator.  The complimentary meals were very good, the staff was friendly and helpful.  Overall we enjoyed our stay,  They ofered complimentary breakfast AND dinner.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am sorry if the elevator was an inconvenience during your visit. I can definitely agree on the elevator issue and I am just happy to get our renovation done soon so they can help us with making it a little more efficient. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating while in the area.

Summary: Generally Homewood Suites are a reliable place to stay.  Not here.  The heavily stained furniture in the lobby is the first sign that this place is a disaster.  Dirty, worn, large bags of trash sitting in the hallways (at all hours).  This is one place to steer clear from.
Manager Response: I am terribly sorry to hear about the bad impression you had about our property during your visit. I deeply regret the lack of cleanliness throughout the property and I am embarrassed you ad to experience such. Please allow me to be of assistance if there is anything that I can do for you. I can assure you we do not mean to have that impression on our guest specially when you are vacationing. Thank you so much for your time and feedback, I hope to be of assistance to you and thank you again for giving us the chance of serving you.

Summary: I enjoyed my stay in this hotel although the hotel is dated and it needs a refresh. This is a good choice for family travel to Disneyland and the surrounding area. I found plenty of restaurants and CVS, Walgreens, and Targets within five minutes walking distance. Homewood suites offers the typical amenities like breakfast and managers dinner in the evening. Friendly staff through out hotel.  I was here for a convention and walked a mile and a half to the convention center.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us, I am really happy to hear your visit with us was a pleasant one. I appreciate your time and feedback. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you while in the area and we hope to see you next time you come down our way.

Summary: When it works, it's good! This is an excellent family hotel, that we had the pleasure of staying at in June 2015. The GM, Kevin Escoto has a hand on approach that makes for great guest service. The staff was so friendly and amazing, thank you to Jordan at check in giving us tips on what to do and see around LA. The hotel was clean and child friendly. The room had a great view of the Disney fireworks. What made it more amazing was the F&B served, tasty, wide variety and the staff was friendly and efficient. For more reviews on the hotel and an interview with the GM feel free to visit MrsHospitality's website.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay. I really appreciate your feedback and comments. I hope to be of assistance if your travels bring you back our way. Thank you again for your time and we hope to see you again.

Summary: While this was are first time out with all five of our kids we have stayed at The Trump in Las Vegas and at The Pyramid so we aren't totally clueless about what hotels are like.  This hotel was awesome.  Yes, it is aged, but still a great clean hotel.  Yes, the elevators are slow, but if you are that worried about time leave five minutes earlier or take the stairs.  The room was smaller than I expected, but was still enough for what we needed them for, sleeping.  The full size fridge was also nice to keep our water, coke and other food we had. The staff was great.  My clumsy 4 and 6 year old spilled their chocolate milk on two different days in the lobby and the staff did not sneer or look down upon us.  We told the kitchen staff one day ( I think her name was Veronica or
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share with us about your visit. I appreciate your feedback and I am delighted to hear my team mates were able to assist you, I will be more than happy to share this with my staff as it helps them see the difference we can make by helping. I thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you while in the area and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: I was very hesitant at booking this hotel however after my 11 day stay here, i could have not found a better place. My review for this hotel is way overdue, as i stayed in july when it was loaded with guests, yet not only me, but my family was also in love with it. From the receptionist (dont remember her name but she had red hair :p) who was extremely calm and sweet to the housekeeping i could not pinpoint a single mistake.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am really happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your visit. Thank you for taking the time to share with us I really appreciate your comments. I hope your travels bring you back to our area as we would like to accommodate you again. Thank you again for your time and your feedback.

Summary: As other reviews have pointed out, this hotel shows its age and needs a renovation. It does offer decent accommodation for the price including breakfast and evening reception. Front desk staff is very pleasant and always greets guests walking by them. Good: location to Disneyland with shuttle service, spacious room, comfy bed and pillows. Bad: slow elevators, clogged up drains in kitchen and bathtub. I would recommend this hotel if you're on a budget and don't have too much expectation for what you pay (and don't mind inconsiderate parents, who let their kids roam around the breakfast room and leave behind a huge mess of their leftovers!!!)
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am terribly sorry to hear about your experience. We appreciate your feedback and thank you for giving us the chance of serving you while in the area. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: I just arrived from a long flight from NY. Airline lost my bag so I was needing some toiletries.  Never stayed at this Hilton before but figured my trusty Hilton hotels would come through (I am a Diamond member). Asked for a toothbrush, toothpaste, and a disposable shaver. Was given a toothbrush, ONE packet of toothpaste (no not a tube, the little one time use packs), and was told I would have to buy a shaver. I looked at this woman like she had three heads. I had just explained the predicament I was in however she did not care and couldn't have provided less help. I let it go because I'm exhausted, so just wanted to get upstairs to my nice cozy room.  Oh my god I wish I never walked in here. The hallways smell of mold right off the bat. It's noticeably damp. Walked in the room
Manager Response: I am terribly sorry to hear about your experience with us, I personally feel embarrass about the inconvenience. The lack of service and cleanliness overall. Please feel free to contact me if there is anything that I can do for you.

Summary: Mold in bath room, shower curtain too small, water temp in shower went from warm to cold to hot to cold. Our stay was very miserable, I would not recommend this hotel. We have truly enjpyed our Hilton Stays in all there other hotels.
Manager Response: I am terribly sorry to hear about your visit with us. I sincerely apologize about the issues you had with your suite. I deeply regret the lack of cleanliness and I am terribly sorry about the shower temperature. I can personally imagine the frustration this can cause so please feel free to let me know if there is anything that I can do for you. Thank you for your time and patience and I hope to be at your service.

Summary: This hotel gets a lot of family traffic, and it shows.  there is mold in many areas of the tub and walls, and the toilet.  the toilet bowl only fill sup when I open the back and move the float around to a certain spot.  My cell phone and personal internet did not work much of the time.  The elevator is slower than a slug!!!!  I will not stay in this property again, or in any Hilton property in that area for that matter as I imagine they are all heavily used and not maintained.
Manager Response: I am terribly sorry to hear about your visit with us. I sincerely apologize about about the issues you encountered during your stay. I deeply regret the lack of cleanliness and maintenance throughout the building. Please allow me to be of assistance if there is anything that I can do for you. Thank you for sharing with us and I hope to be at your service.

Summary: Overall a good place to stay. They have a free evening meal (albeit a light one), which was perfect for our large young family. The motel is showing it's age (watermarks in bathroom, for example), but for the price we were satisfied.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I really appreciate your feedback and I am happy to hear you enjoyed our amenities. Thank you for giving us the chance of accommodating you and I hope to see  you again in the future, I can assure you that by next year once our renovation is done we will look much better. Thank you again for your time.

Summary: Nice hotel, with good ammenties, and a great, friendly staff. The rooms are nice size, with a nice size kitchen, living area and bedrooms. Air conditioning was more than enough to keep the room cool, and again, and great, friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit and that we were able to accommodate you. We appreciate your feedback and I will ensure to share this with my team. Once again thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and we hope to see you gain in the future.

Summary Heading: This location is Not for Business travels
Summary: Aging hotel with lots of bumps, bruises, stains and inconveniences.  I stayed here while in town for business so chose a higher floor to avoid the inevitable noise of kids above me. It was Sept 21-24 (not high season for Disney) so I thought I would be safe booking a place near attractions but I found out I was wrong.  There was only 1 very slow elevator that went to the 7th floor. On the 7th floor the ice machine didn't work any of the days although I reported the issue to the front desk.  The room was clean but showing it's age.  The main hallways and elevator had stained carpet, gum spots and there were many areas that showed poor maintenance.  The parking is ok but plan to pay for it and park far away from entrances.  This area is busy in general so plan extra time if you
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I sincerely apologize about the issues you encountered. I can definitely agree with you that our property is in need of a renovation after all the tear and wear it goes through. I am happy to share that we area starting our renovation soon to get all those areas back to what a Hilton brand should have. I thank you for your comments and we appreciate you giving us the pleasure of accommodating you. I hope to be at your service if your travels bring you back our way, Thank you again and feel free to reach at me if there is anything that I can do.

Summary: Our 6th floor room was comfortable and quiet. My other room across the hall was also quiet. Not bad for being close to the elevator. It even had a great view of the Disney fireworks. The full hot breakfast was delicious with many choices.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share with us. I am delighted to see you enjoyed your visit and the property. I look forward to be at your service if your travels bring you back our way, and thank you for giving us the chance of accommodating you.

Summary: We have now stayed at this hotel three times.  We had two really great experiences and one not so great.  The not so great stay was because our shower was broken and they moved us twice and then didn't clean the the room once.  Homewood Suites, inparticular, Luis apologized and credited us for all the problems with the not so great stay and made sure on our third stay that everything was perfect.  We would definitely stay at this hotel again.  Breakfast is a big perk especially if you are hauling the entire family to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you again. It is my pleasure to be of assistance on anything that I can do. We look forward to see you again if your travels bring you back our way. Thank you again for sharing with us.

Summary: We really enjoyed the convenient location and shuttles as well as the complimentary breakfasts and dinners.  Overall a clean well taken care of hotel which was very friendly and convenient as a base for our family Disney vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am very happy to hear your stay was an enjoyable one. We really appreciate the feed back and I will be more than happy to share this with my team. Once again thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you while in the area and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: This hotel is starting to show it's age!  Portable air conditioning units in the lobby and the rooms and bathrooms are looking worn out!  We stayed at this hotel 5 years ago and I don't think there have been any upgrades since that stay.  We loved the option of the shuttle to Disneyland and the staff was very kind and helpful when any problems arose.  The breakfast was good and of great value.  The hotel is located well for restaurants.  Hilton is building a new Homewood Suites closer to Disneyland and we will stay at that location for our next trip!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am truly sorry to hear your visit was not as pleasant, I can definitely agree with you that we are in need of a renovation. With that being said I am happy to share with you that we are looking into our renovation starting very soon. Once again thank you for sharing with us and please let me be of assistance if there is anything that I can do for you. I really appreciate your comments and I hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: it is good, according to the price paid
Summary: The check in was easy and very fast, our room was very clean. The room was very quiet, not noise from outside...There were two TVs but only one was working... The complementary breakfast was not good... In general I may choose it again in my next trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am sorry to hear about the issues you had during your stay with the tv. I sincerely apologize. Thank you for sharing with us we appreciate your comments and hope we can see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Home away from home ready for spruce up
Summary: We have stayed here a number of times and are always impressed with the genuine friendliness and helpfulness of the staff (especially Andres and Luis). It is like home away from home. We just visited again at the end of August after what was probably a busy summer season for the hotel.  I believe there will be some renovations happening soon and that is a good thing as some of the common area carpeting could do with replacement, and windows a thorough cleaning.  We look forward to returning in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to share with us. I am really happy to hear I can be part of your vacation and I will ensure to share with Andres as well. We thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and we look forward to be your home away from home for future to come. Thank you for your time.

Summary Heading: Disney half marathon & 4 days at the park
Summary: Good continental breakfast every day  and Monday though Thursday light even meal is included as well. We had chicken salad the first night we were here, it was enough to get our family through the evening, saving $$$$ on dinner.  Staff is very friendly and housekeeping did an excellent job.  We used cab or uber to get to park cost between 6-15 dollars depending on time of the day.
Manager Response: I am very happy to hear you enjoyed your visit with us. Thank you for taking the time to share, we appreciate your comment. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Good place to stay for a quick trip
Summary: We stayed here August 19-23. The hotel was convenient for the trip we planned which included college visits, Disneyland and a family wedding. The staff was very nice, informative and helpful during our stay. We only had breakfast here one morning, but the Starbucks across the parking lot was good for another morning.  The A/C was broken for the main areas while we were here, and it got a little stuffy in the hallways. The elevators were sometimes slow also.  Not a bad place given the shuttle service to the theme park. That was quite handy when we just wanted to go to Downtown Disney for shopping and lunch. The parks are a little too far for walking, especially at the end of a day. There are also a wide variety of restaurants in the same property area, and a Target very nearby.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your vacation. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit. I am sorry about the issues you encountered during your stay, I sincerely apologize. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you while in the area, and we hope to see you again if your travel;s bring you back our way.

Summary: elevators could not handle guest capacity.  long waits. no AC in elevators or hallways.  Bed mattress very soft and woke up with sore backs. windows very dirty and air in room felt musty.  overall very disappointed in a Hilton Hotel.  would not return to this location.
Manager Response: I am terribly sorry to hear about your experience with us. I sincerely apologize for the issues you encountered and I personally feel embarrassed to hear about the cleanliness part. I thank you for sharing with us about your visit and appreciate your comments. Please feel free to be of assistance if there is anything that I can do to make this right. Once again thank you for your time and patience.

Summary: Stayed here for 5 nights. First night the two trash cans at the entrance were overflowing onto the ground where one had a pile of broken glass with the trash on the sidewalk ( where kids are running g around in flip flops or no shoes). I went straight to the front desk and reported this as a safety concern that should be a dressed immediately. " yeah ok ...so are you checking in ?...do you have a reservation ?.........I say..." go outside now and clean that up and then we will talk ". The whole time he is slothing his way to the door he calling housekeeping. OK problem got corrected. Day 3 I use the lobby restroom before we shuttle the magic kingdom. There is a guy in a toilet room making weird noises and wrapping and un wrapping paper. I'm out so I tell my son in law.  He goes
Manager Response: I am terribly sorry to hear about your experience with us. I deeply regret the lack of security and cleanliness. I thank you for sharing with us bout your stay and I sincerely apologize about the inconvenience. Please feel free to let me know if I can be of assistance in any way. Once again thank you for sharing with us and giving us the chance of accommodating you.

Summary: Arrived late Saturday - check in was quick and efficient. The room was spacious and clean. Breakfast was great, lots of choices and something for everyone as well as two large rooms for seating. The air conditioning unit for the lobby was not working so there were portable units around the lobby but the air in the rooms worked and we were very comfortable. My only complaint, if that is what it is, is only two elevators. The elevator off the lobby serviced floors 1 - 7 and there was always a line up. The elevator at the end of the main hall serviced floors 1-6 and never had much of a line so we took that elevator to the 6th floor then walked up one flight of stairs to the 7th floor.
Manager Response: Than you for sharing with us about your visit. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your visit, and I am sorry if you had any issues during your stay. I thank you for your comments and feedback. Once again thank you for sharing with us and we look forward to see you again, I can assure you next time we will be up and running the way it should be.

Summary: Went here with my grandchildren the room was clean and well maintained just right for family. Great Breakfast the staff was friendly and helpful I will be back with another family of grand kids we try to take one family a year and we plan on staying here every time we go to Disney Land
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit with us. Thank you for sharing with us about your visit and we are really happy to hear the amenities and staff were to standard. We hope to see you again in the future if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Not the best place I've stayed!
Summary: This hotel is isn't the cleanest and it's not maintained as best as it could. Our bathroom had wall paper coming up and the couch was stained to name a few things. The maid didn't clean our room one day while we were at Disneyland. The air conditioning was broke I guess in the hallways and lobby so it was hot and muggy all 7 days we were there. The rooms had air however. The laundry room smells like really strong mildew and mold. The lobby at breakfast is VERY crowded and loud. I thought it was nice that they have dinner for the guests Monday thru Thursday and there pool looked nice. Won't be staying here again.
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear about your experience with us. Thank you for sharing about your visit I really appreciate the comments. However I truly apologize about the issues you encountered and the lack of cleanliness. Please let me know if I can be of assistance of any kind on this matter. Once again than you for your time and patience.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for the third time since 2008 because it was familiar and we had a good experience in the past two trips. This one was the worst. The hotel is dated and in need of renovations. The furnishings are stained or ripped and a lot of things are loose or broken. Upon arrival the sink in the room was plugged by a bar of soap which should have been noticed by the cleaning staff when they cleaned the room as the sink would not drain at all so either they never cleaned the sink or it drained slowly over the course of time. The shower curtain was too small and we were wiping up water every night after showers. I think the boiler was also broken because we had two nights of cold showers. The ice machine outside our room was beeping one night and I had to call the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to share with us about your visit to our property. I am terribly sorry to hear about your experience this time around. I am truly sorry for the lack of cleanliness and maintenance. issues you encountered. I am sorry to hear about the parking charge as well I will ensure to look into this and make sure we are catching errors like this as I can assure you we would hate to charge fees that are not supposed to be there. I sincerely apologize and please let me know if there is anything that I can do for you, as I would like to be of assistance and make this right for you. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and I hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: The pictures of this hotel make it look better than it actually is. The service is good but the cleanliness of this hotel is very poor. If you are any sort of clean freak this is not the hotel for you. The free breakfast is not as it seems in the pictures either. The food looks good but thats about it.
Manager Response: I am terribly sorry to hear about your experience to our property. I sincerely apologize for the lack of cleanliness. Please allow me to be at your service if there is anything that I can do for you as I would like to make sure I make it right. Thank you for your time and patience.

Summary Heading: Lots of happy kids running around
Summary: This hotel is very popular, during my visit there were lots of families present. This is a very family friendly hotel. Complimentary breakfast and dinner is served and actually tasted decent. There are plenty of restaurants on the in the area if you would like to adventure out. The WI-fi was horrible everything else about the room was on point. To my surprise there is a pricey parking fee, so be prepared for that.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share with us about your visit. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your visit, however I am very sorry for the issues with the wi-fi as well as parking. We hope we see you again in the future if your travels bring you back our way and if there is anything that I can do for you please feel free to let me know.

Summary: Well, Homewood Suites Anaheim seemed to have a really rough summer and a lot can happen from May-August. I gave our stay a three stars because the staff were amazing and really trying to accommodate their guests during a chaotic heat wave, boiler exploding, no hot water and everything soaking wet kind of week. I couldn't tell if that mess is what made the hallways seem dirty or if it was a housekeeping issue. We were still happy with our meals, the pool, the staff and the shuttle service is great.  We will give this hotel another chance since our first visit was so great.  I am hopeful that our next visit will be cleaner and will include a hot shower.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am sorry to hear about the lack of  cleanliness you experienced. I appreciate your feedback as it allows me to see what we need to improve on. I hope to see you in the future and please let me know if I can do anything for you. Once again thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and I hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Works for a Family Trip to Disneyland
Summary: Overall we had a good stay here, however, it is not for everyone.  This is not a typical Homewood, or Hilton property.  It is very worn and starting to look run down.  However, it worked great for our family trip.  The lobby is nice and open and the friendly staff greeted us immediately.  They had Disney movies playing in the lobby the whole time we were there which was nice for the kids to sit and watch as we waited for the shuttle. We were early and already checked in through the Hilton app the prior day, and the room we selected wasn't ready yet but they checked with housekeeping and we were told it would only be about 30min.  They offered to get us a different room that was ready, however, the room we had (odd numbered side, 6th floor) would have a good view of the fireworks
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to share with us about your visit. I am happy to hear your stay was a pleasant one for the most part. However I sincerely apologize about the issues you encounter during your stay. Please allow me to be at your service if there is anything that I can do for you and I really hope to see you next time you come to the area. I hope if you come back next time is after our renovation which I believe will make the whole property look much better. Once again Thank you for your time and we hoe to see you again.

Summary: I could not believe the condition of this hotel...  it was DIRTY, there were rips in the couch in my room plus in the drapery, there was furniture missing in the bedroom, one of the lights was burned out, no fan/circulation in the bathroom, windows & sills dirty, laundry room filthy, hallways and main lobby uncomfortably warm... it was definItely NOT worth the $150+ parking fee I paid! I would NEVER recommend this hotel to anyone.  I was VERY disappointed and wished I would have stayed at another hotel...
Manager Response: I am terribly sorry to hear about your visit. I appreciate you sharing with us about your stay and I sincerely apologize about the lack of cleanliness and service. Please allow me to be at your service if there is anything that I can do for you. Once again thank you and I hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: More like a musty motel than part of Hilton
Summary: This hotel is absolutely detrimental to the Hilton brand. Of all the different locations I've stayed at with Hilton and other brands, but mainly Hilton, this location was extremely off brand, run down  and the worst Hilton I've ever stayed at. I was wondering to myself how this is allowed to stay as part of the chain and started thinking if SPG has these motel like locations as well.  The internet was so slow I had to use my mobile hotspot, the AC was too cold in one room, but ineffective in the other. There was a door missing from one of the closets and no hangers while the other one had hangers but  the doors would not close. All the drawers were stained in some fashion and the couch had flattened cushions with holes and rips in them as did the curtains. Not surprisingly, the
Manager Response: I can not express how sorry I am about all the issues you encounter during your visit. I completely agree with you that this time around the Hilton standards were not there. I deeply regret the lack of cleanliness and service you had but I can assure you this is not usual to us. I can honestly tell you we had a rough summer but it does not make it an excuse to provide such poor service.  Please allow me to be at your service if there is anything else that I can do for you. We value your Hilton loyalty and your patience so please feel free to contact me at any time. Once again thank you for sharing and I hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Great stay but needs some TLC
Summary: The hotel staff has always been accommodating and friendly, but this time, the building itself seemed like it needed some TLC.  The AC in the Lobby and Common Areas was broken for the duration of my stay, the carpets in the elevator were not vacuumed for three days, a shutter in the common area was broken, and there is only one elevator to service 6+ floors of families. We love the Reception Monday-Thursday and will stay here again. We do hope that they can do some renovations and maintenance on their rooms and common areas, before we do.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share with us about your visit. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your visit. I can personally assure you it is not usual for us to have such issues. I do hope I can be at your service if you travel back our way and I hope you come back after our renovation, which it should start around November. Thank you so much for your time and patience.

Summary Heading: Not what I had hoped for or expected
Summary: This hotel was extremely disappointing on several levels.  I am not sure if they do not have a vacuum for the hotel hallways or are just unwilling to use it...The breakfast was equally disappointing as it was far from good.  The rooms have been very beat up and need renovation and some serious TLC.  For the rate that was charged, this was almost a joke (200.00 plus)... I am a very loyal Hilton Honors Member (Diamond), but will never stay at this property again.  I stayed here two nights and moved promptly across the street to the Embassy suites for 3 more nights which was fantastic...That review will go up next.
Manager Response: I sincerely apologize for the [experience you had. I deeply regret the lack of cleanliness throughout the property. We value your loyalty to Hilton and I am sorry we were not able to meet the standards during your visit. Please allow me to be at your service if there is anything that I can do to make this right. Once again thank you for your patience and time.

Summary Heading: Second stay here, disappointing on several levels
Summary: Our stay here was Aug 10-15, I will start with the simple fact that the weather in Anaheim, mid 90's.  Air conditioning not working!!! Muggy and hot in our room, this was reported to front desk but not fixed.  The lobby seemed to also be experiencing the same problems, the air seemed cooler outside then inside. Room- we really like the size of the room and the kitchen. Which is why we stayed here, (stayed here 2 years ago also during Xmas time) plenty of room for a family of 6 for a short stay.  However the beds in this room this time were not very comfortable and the couch pull out is awful.   The shower water goes from hot to cold with EVERY shower!  It is not dependent on toilet flushing or use of dishwasher.  And bring shampoo and conditioner...you will be stocked with one
Manager Response: I am very sorry to hear about the issues you encounter during your visit. I am truly sorry for the inconvenience you had I can not begin to explain the ordeal we have gone through this summer but it does not make it an excuse to ensure your stay with us is what you would expect from a Hilton brand. Please feel free to contact me at any time as I would like to make this right for you. I know is past your stay now but please let me know how I can be at a your service. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and I hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Very nice hotel and accommodations.  Probably better for adults or older children.  Not right outside Disneyland but taking the shuttle makes it easy and fun.  Clean hotel with nice size suites for family trips.
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit with us while in the area. Thank you for sharing about your visit, and giving us the pleasure of accommodating you while in the area. I hope to see you again in the future if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: The hotel smelled and we had to strip the sheets after finding brown stains. (The front desk just gave us new sheets without even an apology or expression of concern) The tub barely drained and rugs were stained and torn.  Extremely run down hotel.  They also called this the "frontgate" of Disney and I was told by Hilton it was outside the frontgate. It is well over a mile away and they charge for the shuttle to Disney.  When I asked why they called this the frontgate when it was not the frontgate, the manager laughed and said they called the entire area "the frontage" -- an obvious deception that we fell for in making a non-refundable reservation.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us. I would like to sincerely apologize for the experience you had with us. I regret the lack of cleanliness as well as the information you received. I can not express how unfortunate this was and I would like to be of assistance if there is anything that I can do for you. Please feel free to contact me at any time. Once again thank you for your time and I hope to be able to make this right.

Summary: Wonderful stay at Homewood Suites... Spent 8 days there. Bedroom was really nice for the kids to be able to play and unwind while I cooked dinner while taking a break from Disneyland. Morning breakfast and afternoon reception were done nicely. Staff was very friendly!!! Definitely will be back!!!!
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit while in the area. Thank you for taking the time to share with us and we are happy you enjoyed the amenities. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Gave this Homewood Suites another chance and stayed in a different area in hopes of eliminating some noise from other guests. It was a drastic improvement but still not the best. We were awakened at least once every night by very loud and inconsiderate guests, but that can happen anywhere. What I did notice though was the wear and tear on the hotel. It is time to invest some of the profits and update and clean the place up. Carpets are gross, bathrooms are moldy and the overall smell of the place is bad. My kids spent a couple of nights at the Grand California Disney hotel and when the wife and I returned from a visit with them we felt as thought we walked into the slums. It was that drastic, and yes we know that the price comparison is not even close between the two places but
Manager Response: I am truly sorry to hear about the experience you had during your visit. I agree with you the cleanliness should be a priority and I am very sorry we were not able to meet the standards. I appreciate your feedback and comments as it allows us to see what we need to work on. Please feel free to contact me if there is anything that I can do to make it right. Once again thank you for your time.

Summary Heading: Hilton needs to review this location for branding
Summary: This location was chosen because of its brand. I love a Homewood Suites. This location gave the appearance of being a Homewood suites, but it was not equivalent to what was expected. They offer dinner which is normally a fun, quality supper. However, this particular meal was not great. Every guest that was around talked about how poor it was. Alphabet soup, probably dumped in from a can. On my way back from "supper" I met a man in the elevator with a pizza. He said he has never seen a meal of that variety at Homewood and had to go out to get food. He was ticked. The breakfast they offered was of good quality and variety to cater to families appropriately.  The room looked right on the surface, but had several problems upon inspection. I stay in nicer hotels so that I can take a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to share with us about your visit. I would like to start by sincerely apologizing about the room issues you had while staying with us. I can only imagine the inconvenience this was, I agree with you completely, when it comes to looking forward to a relaxing evening after a long day. I deeply regret the lack of cleanliness and operations. I do want to thank you for sharing with us and please feel free to contact me at any time, as I would like to make this right for you. Once again thank you for your time and patience.

Summary: Hotel is dated  and the hotel staff is nice but this is not the Hilton standards. The rooms have mildew in the bathrooms on the wallpaper . The water leaks in the tubs and the main elevator is extremely slow.  The  side door is broken and does not lock all the time.  My room was not cleaned one day during the stay and I was not given a reason . It was left off the list and we got in late that night and had no service . The wifi service was terrible and dropped all the time.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I would like to sincerely apologize for the experience you had with us. I am terribly sorry for the lack of cleanliness and housekeeping. I appreciate your feedback as it allows us to see what we need to do to improve, and for that we thank you. Please feel free to contact me is there is anything that I can do in this matter. Once again thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and we hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Awful & Terrified Experience with 2 false fire alarms & 1 elevator trap for an hour
Summary: My family of 6 with 2 seniors 2 adults and 2 kids stayed at the Homewood Suites on the 7th floor for 7 nights from 7/15 to 7/22/2015. The hotel welcomed us with the 1st false alarm only 15 minutes after checking in. A couple of days later, the 2nd false alarm went off, which scared my parents of 70 years old to run from the 7th floor. The worst incident was the elevator trap that put my mom's life in danger for an hour and her being admitted to the hospital. The hotel management and its group Hilton have pointed their fingers to the hotel insurance - Hanover. The hotel insurance denied their liability on the ground that the hotel contracted an elevator company to perform maintenance. If that was true, why did the elevator not function and trap people? Being guests at the hotel,
Manager Response: I am terribly sorry to hear about the horrible experience you had with us during your vacation. I can assure you that we do not mean for anything like this to happen to any of our guest, so I can't stress enough how much i regret the issues you encounter. I personally can agree that it is not what you expect from a Hilton property and for that I am sorry. Please allow me to see if there is anything that I can assist you with in regards of this matter. I know that at this point is a bit too late from when you you stayed at our property but please feel free to contact me at any time. Thank you for your patience and time.

Summary: I stayed here for three nights in August 2015. E-Check in was very fast and comfortable. Employee at the Reception was friendly and fast. The Room was not that clean, like we know from other Homewood Suites. It smelled a little bit and the furniture was a little bit old. Dust on the table, bedsite cabinet and sofa. We cleaned it up a little bit. Dirt on the carpet all over the Hotel. Breakfast was busy but very good organized. Top!! Hope the new Homewood Suites will look like 2015 and not like 1995. I wouldn't stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I am truly sorry about the inconvenience you encountered during your stay. I know we are a little older compared to the properties around us, but I am happy to say we are looking into remodeling very soon. Once again thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: All I could say is the worst experience ever with Hilton's chain. We are Hilton's member so we usually stay at Embassy by Hilton or Hilton.  We booked this hotel on August 02-05, 2015. The hotel is old and shady. The water is cold most of the time.  I would not recommend this hotel.
