Manager Response: I would like to sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you had during your stay. I am truly sorry and deeply regret the water issues as well as the cleanliness. Please feel free to contact me if there is anything that I can do to make this right. I thank you for your time and patience and hope I can help in some way. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you.

Summary: We stayed here for seven nights.  Stewart, one of the concierge managers, made sure our stay was wonderful!  Our room was clean (kudos to Housekeeping!).  Our suite had a fully-equipped kitchen with a full- sized fridge, stove, microwave. Dishes and flatware were also provided.  There is a Target directly across the hotel (we bought bottled water and stored them in the fridge).  The shuttle to Disneyland ran every 30 minutes; this made our trips to DL very convenient. The trip is 15 minutes each way, we left our car in the hotel's parking lot and took the shuttle everyday.  There is a nominal fee per adult and per child, but this is much better than taking the OC bus line to Disneyland, since the hotel shuttle picks up and drops off right in front of the hotel.  We all liked
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear your visit with us was a pleasant one. Thank you for taking the time and sharing with us about your visit. I will make sure to thank Stewart for making sure you felt like home. Once again Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you, and hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Convenient location to Disneyland with all inclusive kitchen and really great room rates.  Great for families and has a good daily breakfast and from Mondays to Thursdays, a simple manager's reception (can be assumed as a simplified dinner) that can be filling.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. We are really happy to hear yo enjoyed your stay. We hope we see you again in the future if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: We were very happy with our stay at this hotel. Our suite was clean and spacious. The beds were seriously comfortable, although the pillows were too soft. The breakfast foods were well stocked for 3 hours. When we arrived, we enjoyed warm chocolate chip cookies fresh out of the oven. Wish we could have enjoyed the evening offerings on Wednesday and Thursday but we arrived late and we were at Disney the 2nd evening, but it was great the hotel offered this extra. You will definitely enjoy your stay at this hotel, but be sure to ask for extra rolls of TP at the front desk as you will run out.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. We are happy to hear it was an enjoyable one. We appreciate your feedback and will ensure to share this with our staff. Once again thank you for giving us the chance of accommodating you and we hope to see you in the future.

Summary: Stayed here a number of times and always been good. Family of 5.  Not so good this time.  Bedding on sofa bed was taken away on 3 occasions and not replaced so we had to go down and ring for more.  Not good after a long day at Disney.  Main lift catatonically slow.  Evening reception which until last year was a meal now simply a snack and given the hotel is fairly expensive poor value.  What are you up to Hilton?  Merging Embassy and Homewood on the planning horizon?  Disappointing.  We are loyal Hilton customers but now may move chains.
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear about the inconvenience you experienced during your visit. I am truly sorry and apologize for the issues. Thank you for giving us the chance of accommodating you again while in the area, and please feel free to let me know if there is anything I can do for you as we would love to be at your service again.

Summary: Great breakfast and light dinner - helps the vacation budget for sure!  Also, the staff arranged a taxi for us to go to the Angel's game and it ended up being a town car limo for the same price of a taxi!  Made us feel like VIPs!  Shuttle to Dinsey was perfect.  Highly reccomend this hotel. Having a kitchen is also really nice when you are away from home for a few days.  And there's a nice Target across the street to pick up groceries.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear your visit was a pleasant one. Thank you for sharing with us, and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights in this hotel. It was very conveniently located to everything. Very spacious. I would stay here again in a heartbeat. The breakfast and meals were top notch. Nice pool area as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the chance of accommodating you while in the area. We are happy to hear you visit was a great one and we look forward to see you in the future.

Summary: Overall good hotel, clean.   Staff where o.k however sometimes it felt like that it was an effort for them to respond to tourist style questions (directions, transport options etc).  Food court and bar/restaurant facilities onsite. Short walk to downtown area.  Around 15 minute walk to the main entry gates at Disney Land.  Some areas of hotel look tired- coridoors and lifts.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here two nights and has a great shuttle to disneyland. Clean rooms, but hallways need to be a better upkeep. Has a toddler pool a regular pool. Breakfast is good and night reception was also good. This is a great family hotel and hopeful they address the hallway issue.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us, we are happy to hear you enjoyed your visit. I am sorry about any inconvenience you experienced in the hallways during your stay. Please feel free to contact me if there is anything else you would like to share. Once again thank you and we hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel for Disney or local stays
Summary: The hotel was nice. They had some perks like breakfast and a light meal and wine/beer in the evenings Mon through Friday. It was convenient because there were several nice restaurants within walking distance and a Starbucks in next hotel 50 feet from hotel front door which was very nice. Pool looked nice but I did not use it.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our property as well as the amenities we offer. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: My family was going on their first trip to Disneyland. I researched the best hotels with possible suites for two small children. The Hilton name, along with the good looks of the website, plus the free breakfast and one bedroom suite really drew me in when deciding to stay at this hotel for 5 nights with my family.   When we arrived the foyer was very dirty with crumbs everywhere and left over food when breakfast was over hours before. The bathroom in the lobby was dirty and had no toilet paper in any of the stalls.   Our suite was smaller than expected along with a ripped sofa that had a piece of different fabric attempting to cover the hole. There were small pieces of laminate missing in the kitchenette. The bathroom sink was cracked and the bathroom door was FALLING OFF OF
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide this feedback. It is clear that your recent stay with us was anything but great, and I can empathize with you on every regard. I cannot apologize enough for all of the inconveniences you've experienced while staying here with us. Please know that your feedback will not go unheard, and I will make sure to pass along all of the important notes you have left. In an effort to make it right by you, when time permits, can you please contact the hotel at your earliest convenience by phone at (714)740-1800 or by email laxhw_gm@hilton.com. I look forward to speaking with you in regards to what we can do to make it right.

Summary Heading: Feels like home away from home
Summary: First and for most just want to say High fives all around to the staff there. We were greeted by a friendly and helpful gentlemen at the front desk. The free breakfast Buffet was delicious! The cleaning staff do a great job and were friendly in the hallway when we would pass by. We also had free wifi which is always nice. We did have to pay for parking but it wasn't that bad. We were close to 3 restaurants, Starbucks, Walgreens, 24 hour target and much more. Disneyland was a close and quick drive which was nice. The room was well equipped with a kitchen, kitchen table, living room area. The only thing was the bathroom had no fan and seemed dark and gloomy. I would definitely stay at this location again without hesitation. Highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us about your visit. We are really happy to hear we were able to make your stay with us a great experience. Thank you for your comments I will be sure to share them with the team. Once again thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Mold growing in the bathroom, pool crumbling away
Summary: I had high hopes for this vacation, we were staying for a full week and had many activities planned. When we were finding our room, the interior of the hotel was very shabby. The carpets and walls were visibly dirty throughout the halls and in the lobby. When we arrived in our room, the bathroom had mold growing on ceiling and on the shower walls and in the corners of the tub. The walls of the room were dirty with dirty fingerprints all over. The shower would have hot water for a few minutes, then turn ice cold, then turn scalding hot, all within 5 minutes. We were all tired since we had a late flight so we thought we would just deal with the situation the next day. The next morning we went to the pool and found it was poorly kept as well. there was trash all around the pool,
Manager Response: I am extremely sorry to hear that your recent stay with us was far from pleasant. I cannot express how discomforting it is to read a review such as yours, however, I can completely empathize with you in every regard. From the cleanliness of our lobby and corridors to the temperature of the water in your shower, I cannot apologize enough for all of the inconvenience. Also, the fact that you were not able to speak with a manager during your stay bothers me very much. We all do our best to provide a great guest experience, however, it is clear we have dropped the ball on more than one occasion during your recent stay. When time permits, please contact myself or the General Manager, Kevin Escoto, at your earliest convenience so we can discuss what we can do to make it right. You can reach the hotel at (714)740-1800, or by email at Ben.Ly2@hilton.com or Kevin.Escoto@hilton.com, and we look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: This hotel is great for families. Rooms have a separate kitchen/living area. Free breakfast and evening social. Pool area is ok. The only thing I didn't like was being charged for self parking as the room rate is already higher than other hotels in the area.
Manager Response: Than you for giving us the chance of accommodating you while in the area. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our amenities. I am sorry about the parking fees, Please feel free to contact me if there is anything that I can do for you. Once again thank you for your time and hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: I travel every week and have stayed in this hotel every time. This past week when I was there, I noticed a definite decline in the service. I came back after work one day and my room hadn't been touched. Although I do online checkin every time, I had to wait for my room to be ready. I normally say I'll be checking in an hour before I actually do because I have had that problem multiple times. The hotel is on the older side. It seems fairly clean and I like having a kitchen but this last week had uncharacteristically bad service. I'm staying there this week, so we'll see if it's better.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share with us about your experience. I am truly sorry to hear about the issues you encounter during this stay. I sincerely apologize and hope to make it better. Please feel free to contact me if there is anything that I can do for you. I look forward to see you on you next visit and ensure everything is up to the quality you deserve.

Summary: I read that this hotel was one of the top 10 family places to stay for Disneyland, and it was! The value of the rooms beat almost any other hotel we looked at, and if you include the benefit of breakfast and the manager's reception at dinner time, a great pool for the kids, a full kitchen and room for 5 of us, if was terrific! Plus the shuttle to Disneyland runs every half hour, so we went to the parks and back a couple of times each day. I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear your visit with us was a pleasant one. Thank you for giving us the chance of accommodating you while in the area, we are happy to hear you enjoyed the amenities we offer. Once again thank you for choosing us and we hope to see you again.

Summary: We stayed at the Homewood Suites Anaheim last year and definitely made it a point to return.  Our family loved the roominess of the suites and having the use of full kitchen facilities, which is important when traveling with children.  The complimentary breakfast is fantastic and so convenient.  Our children loved it!!! The availability of laundry facilities is such a plus and the friendliness of the staff is so appreciated.  Disneyland was awesome but Homewood Suites made us a home away from home!!  Mahalo
Manager Response: We are really happy to hear you had a good experience while visiting the area. Thank you for letting us be your home again during your vacation, and We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: As many other reviewers have noted, this is a great hotel for a Disneyland visit! My wife and I visited in December 2014, and we found the hotel to be clean and well-maintained. Even though we were there for the holidays and the hotel was fully booked, it never felt crowded. The rooms are spacious and have a full kitchen, nicely sized living room and a separate bedroom. My wife and I appreciated the sink outside of the bathroom that made it easier for two people get ready for the day, plenty of storage, and the full size refrigerator in the kitchen was great for storing beverages and other groceries we purchased directly across the street at Target. It is in a great location with restaurants (Red Robin, Joe's Crab Shack) nearby. The hotel is close to the parks and it has plenty
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share with us about your visit. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and the amenities we offer. I apologize about the check in process I hope it was not an inconvenience. Once again thank you for giving us the chance of serving you and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: We had a great experience with the Homewood Suites and have nothing but good things to say. The staff were very nice and friendly, the hotel was clean, our room was very comfortable and the breakfast was more then enough. We visited Disneyland while there was loved the shuttle service provided for us for a reasonable price. Overall just a great experience, we would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear your visit with us was a pleasant one. Thank you for sharing about your stay, and thank you for letting us serve you while in the area. We look forward to see you again in the future.

Summary: Not a five star hotel, more like a 3.5 star. The staff is friendly and the free breakfast is very good. Lots of parking and good location. The kitchen ware needs upgrades, and better beds. With a renovation, this place would be awesome.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay, and thank you for giving us the chance of serving you. We appreciate your comments and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you our way.

Summary: Very affiance and courtesy, very nice hotel Breakfast could use help, hash browns biscuits and gravy, so tired of Eggs. Pool and hot tub very nice. Parking a little pricey, when a lot offer free parking and shuttle service.
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing with us about your visit. Thank you for your feedback, I will ensure to share this with my team. We thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you while in the area and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: SUPER staff, less than average hotel accomodations
Summary: The staff at this hotel were VERY helpful and nice.  They went overboard with accommodating our family of 5.  However, the suite was old and very used feeling.  The towels and bed linens felt very used and the entire suite being carpeted didn't help.  This hotel is used mostly by families going to Disneyland and I think that it's had its share of use.  It's a fine hotel if you don't mind the used-feeling linens and accommodations.  The sofa bed was not comfortable either.   I can't say enough about how great the staff was though.
Manager Response: thank you for sharing with us about your visit. We are happy to hear our staff was able to accommodate you, at the same time I am sorry to hear about your suite accommodations. I am sorry for any inconvenience you experienced.  Please feel free to let me know if there is anything I can do for you and we look forward to see you again.

Summary: Rooms were excellent and roomy. Clean. Took advantage of the free breakfast and dinner on certain nights of the week. Local resturants in walking distance as well as a lounge next door. would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear your visit with us was a pleasant one. Thank you for sharing with us, we are happy you were able to join us during our amenities. We appreciate your time as well as your feedback and we hope to see you again.

Summary: Booked two rooms for 8 nights which were comfortable and spacious. Lift is very slow. Pool great for kids. Good location for Disneyland. Good restaurants nearby. Evening complimentary dinners a bit disappointing in standard.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing about your visit with us, we are happy to hear you enjoyed your visit and the amenities our rooms offer. I am sorry to hear about the evening reception. Truly sorry about any inconvenience you experienced. We hope to see again in the future.

Summary: This suite met my expectations for my 11 day business trip.  The room was big, even by American standards.  Europeans will find this room cavernous compared to their hotels.  The hotel serves a complementary full breakfast and a weekday dinner/snack that are edible, but nothing to write home about.  This definitely saved the company some money.  Excellent location is your visiting Disneyland, and not bad for business either.  Fireworks at 9:30P every night, but they're done by 10PM.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear your visit with us was a pleasant one. Thank you for sharing with us we really appreciate your feedback. We hope to see you again in the future, maybe for vacation. Thanks again for the time.

Summary Heading: Bit far from Disney but a step up from some others
Summary: We recently stayed there for 5 days as there was no other hotels in this price range available. For a Homewood Suites, this property is everything you expect if you know Homewood Suites. It's an average property on the side of needing extra cleaning and maybe some repairs and updates. I felt the need to wear socks in our room was I felt the carpet was on the dirty side. And the elevator is slow. Very slow. There are stairs and another elevator at the other end of the hotel but after walking around all day, it's not what you want to do. Our room was on the 6th floor and faced to pool. I was worried about the pool noise as it was very active but they seem to enforce the 10pm rule.   The other thing to note is that not just Disney visitors stay there. On the two occasions we
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to share with us about your visit. We thank you for giving us the chance of accommodating you. I apologize if you had any inconvenience during your stay, as well as the cleanliness part of the room. Once again thank you for your time and we hope to see you again .

Summary: My daughter, and I and my four grandchildren celebrated a week at Disneyland. It is the 60th Diamond Anniversary for Disneyland and also two of my grandchildren celebrated birthdays. We stayed six nights at Homewood Suites, sharing a suite with two queen beds, a pull out hide a bed and a side sofa. The room had a small kitchen. The hotel provided a full breakfast each morning. What impressed me most was the friendly, respectful staff who provided everything we needed in a timely manner.  There  is a daily shuttle to DL park that is exactly on time every 30 minutes; there is a fee to ride the shuttle but worth the extra expense.  We were busy at the DL parks five days but the grandkids did enjoy the hotel pool for a swim one of the days, and ate dinner on the patio by the pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit. Thank you for your feedback, We are glad your visit was a pleasant one. We hope to see you again in the future if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: We made the decision to make a quick trip out to visit Disneyland and we wanted a hotel that was economical as well as on the Disney bus route.  The hotel was conveniently located to the park and numerous restaurants in the area. The hotel was very active, however, the rooms remained quite and peaceful at night.  I was very family friendly and a great location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate you giving us the chance of accommodating you and we are happy to hear you enjoyed your visit. We look forward to see you again.

Summary: Breakfast is great, location to Disneyland with a shuttle (about $5 for all day ride) is good.  But the rooms are small for a Homewood and very out dated, the furniture looks very used and for the first time in a Homewood Suites I did not feel comfortable showering without wearing sandals.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share with us about your visit. I am truly sorry about the inconvenience you experienced with your suite. Please feel free to contact me is there is anything that I can do for you. Once again thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again .

Summary: Loved this hotel. Spacious rooms for great prices. Beds were comfy and soft. Breakfast was delicious. Huge lobby. Staff were very helpful and welcoming. There's a Starbucks nearby. Target is a short walk from the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing about your stay with us. We are happy to hear you enjoyed the hotel and we thank you for giving us the chance of accommodating you. We hope to see you again in the future if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for 2 days on business and by the end of my stay the staff had learned my name and recognized me with a "hello" every time I passed someone in the hallway for front desk. The breakfast area was always extremely busy and full of families but I was always welcomed and was very impressed to see several manager's attending to the buffet, cleaning up and answering guest's questions along with the breakfast staff. The hotel is in great proximity to several chain restaurants and there is a Starbucks just outside the front door. Kudos to the team at this hotel for a wonderful experience, I will be back again soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the chance of accommodating you, and we are delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit. I am happy to hear we were able to make you stay a pleasant one and we can't wait to see you soon.

Summary: I was hesitant to book a hotel that close to Disney but it worked out pretty well. If you select your room online the day before, go with an odd number so you can watch the Disney fireworks every night at 9:30pm. Picking an even number will get you a view of the pool area.  The breakfast was really good. Even the eggs were good!  The service in the breakfast area was great.  I didn't get the woman's name but she was super friendly every day. The front staff was exceptionally friendly as well. The cleaning ladies were indifferent.  I passed them by the elevator all the time and they wouldn't acknowledge me.  It was a little weird. Target is within walking distance and Oggie's (pizza) is next door to the hotel.  The parking lot is shared pretty much with a Marriott hotel that has
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing about your visit with us. We are happy to hear you had a good stay overall but I apologize for any inconvenience you might of experienced. thank you again for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and we hope to see you again.

Summary: We reserved 2 suites, one had no issues but one had a broken AC.  The carpet was soaked from the AC and my luggage got soaked because I didn't notice it when we first got there and I had put my luggage down.  After I took my shoes off and walked on the soaked carpet we called the front desk.  Long story short, it was late at night and they didn't have another suite available so we had to wait for the morning to get help.  The next day we had maintenance in the room for hours.  It was a nightmare trying to take showers and get dressed with workers in the room.  We wasted half a day and missed out on half a day at Disney.  My husband spoke to them about possibly getting a room for a future stay to go back to Disney but we haven't gotten anything yet.  The suites are a nice size
Manager Response: I am very sorry to hear about your stay. I can only imagine the inconvenience and frustration while trying to fix the issue. I apologize for the lack of service as well as the follow up. Please feel free to contact me so I can get the future night stay  taken care of. (via email luis.vazquez2@hilton.com ) Thank you for your patience and I hope to be able to help.

Summary Heading: Been Here A Lot - Good Value But Moving South
Summary: We stay here almost every time we go to Disneyland.  Concept is if it is during the week, we get breakfast and a dinner (which this is the only place that provides).  In this park area and for a family of 4 - the two meals means our room of $120-$150 per night is in financial aspects free.  Staff is fantastic.  No doubt.  My concern right now is up keep.  I can tell over 5-7 years staying here that things are running down.  Tell the staff - I am sure they will do their best to help make sure you are good and I am NOT saying things are bad.    My wonder is that there is a new Homewood being constructed closer to the park, and not sure how that is playing into things.  With that said, from what you get compared to what you pay.  NO Comparison.  The hotel is 1.3 miles from the
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. We are glad that we can have you back. We appreciate your feedback, and we are happy to hear you enjoy the amenities we offer as well as our service. We hope to see you again if you travel back to the area. Thank you for your time.

Summary: We chose this hotel because they offered a kitchen for a family of 5 (1) child under 3, it was perfect!  Although breakfast and a light dinner was offered this enabled us to make meals for the little one between that time.  We did visit Disneyland we weren't planning on using the shuttle offered but chose to do so on several occasions and was pleasantly surprised at how convenient it was.  We did have a car but even if you choose to take it you are still utilizing a shuttle from the Disney parking lot to the resort at least with the hotel shuttle you are picked up and dropped off directly in front of the hotel.  There is a fee to use the shuttle as well as to park in the hotel parking lot it would be advisable to offer one of these as free.  Other than that no complaints here.
Manager Response: We are really happy to hear you enjoyed your visit with us. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you while in the area, and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Bathroom had some mold issues, the toilet didn't work properly, asked for a quick spruce up of our room...the only thing they did was provide us with lots of towels that we didn't need.  Beds were not made, trash was not emptied, etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I would like to apologize for the issues you had during your stay. We deeply regret the lack of cleanliness, and the service. I truly am sorry for the inconvenience. I know that it is a little late now but please feel free to contact me if there is anything that I can do about the issues you had.once again thank you for giving us the chance of accommodating you and I hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: I chose this hotel because of the fairly good ratings and the rate was perfect for our family of seven! I was happy with free breakfast but when we got there found out that dinner was also free from 5-7 p.m. Monday through Thursday!  It wasn't a huge or heavy dinner but you could certainly make a good meal of it!  The hotel was surprisingly clean, our check in/ check out were super simple, every employee I ran into was friendly and kind, and on the 4th floor we had a quiet night's sleep every night. The meal times were busy but we always managed to find a place for our family of seven to sit - that is usually hard anywhere.  We got the kitchenette suite and it very comfortably slept all of us without having to put 3-4 kids in one bed LOL.  One thing I didn't like was having to
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for sharing with us about your visit, and taking the time to share about your experience. We appreciate your feedback as it allows us to know  how we do as a team. We hope to see you again in the future if your travels bring you back our way. Thanks again for staying with us we look forward to see you.

Summary Heading: Very comfortable and great value for family of 5
Summary: We have 3 boys - 6,8 & 9. Loved our stay! Spent 6 nights there while visiting Disneyland of course! The bedroom is very spacious, with 2 closets and chest of draws to stash our stuff. Two QUEEN beds. I did not ask ahead of time, but did get a cot upon request. This fit in the bedroom as well, with room to still walk easily around the room. We had thought we would let one boy sleep in our bed until we were tired and then move him to the sofa in the living room, but since we had the cot, we did not have to. This was a relief because we were all so exhausted at the end of the day, it was nice that no boy had an interrupted sleep. There was also a tv in the bedroom.  The bath tub was smallish, and indeed there was no fan, kind of strange. The sink is outside the toilet and tub,
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear your visit was a pleasant one while staying with us. I am happy to hear the staff, as well as the amenities were helpful while vacationing. Thank you for sharing with us about your visit and thank you for giving us the chance of accommodating you and your family. We hope to see you again in the future and feel free to contact us if there is anything we can do to help with future stays. Once more thank you for your feedback.

Summary: I have been staying here for the past 9 yrs.  Always an excellent staff.  The accommodations are great for both business and family.  4 restaurant chains in parking lot nearby keeps the variety from getting stale.
Manager Response: We appreciate the loyalty and thank you for giving us the chance of accommodating you once more. We will ensure to share this with our staff to remind them of all the good work they do. Once again thank you and we can't wait to see you again.

Summary: The hotel does show signs of wear and tear, probably due to the high traffic it gets because of its proximity to the Disney parks.  The rooms were adequately clean and the breakfast area was large enough to accommodate the high number of Disney tourists, presumably up at 7am to get to the parks early.  Overall, it was a pleasant stay with no issues.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing abut your visit with us . We are glad you enjoyed your stay. We appreciate your feedback and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: Well placed self contained hotel - with a water issue
Summary: This is our 2nd stay at this hotel.  I would've like to have given a rating of 3.5 stars but unable to do so due to rating system. I'll start by saying we would stay here again on our next Anaheim holiday.    I had been told previously that some of the hotel was undergoing a renovation - but I didn't see any changes, other than possibly the beds - the pool and spa area seemed the same (talking about the pool and spa - this hotel has the tiniest little pool towels - more like a face flannel than a towel to go around your body - just a funny thing we picked up on), the restaurant area seemed the same, the lift was the same, same d√©cor in the rooms, same reception/lounge area - so I'm not sure if renovations are still planned perhaps. So room was good - comfy beds, two TV's, the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to share about your visit with us. I am sorry to hear your stay with us was not as easy going as it should be. We deeply regret the lack of service and the inconvenience the ATM caused for you. Please feel free to let me know if there is anything else that I can do for you. Once more we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and we hope to see you again. Than you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you.

Summary: The staff was Wonderful!! They were polite, clean, eager, friendly, knowledgeable in their area... The information and friendliness on the phone before I came (answering questions)was why I gave this hotel a chance and I was very pleased!!Though it turned unusually cold the week we were there (weather can't be controlled) the experience was wonderful. Great food also!
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear your stay with us was an enjoyable one. Thank you for taking the time to share with us about your vacation and we also than you for giving us the chance of accommodating  you while in the area. We look forward to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights while we went to Disneyland.  The hotel was very nice and clean. The bed was very comfortable after spending the day at the parks.  The complimentary breakfast was very good every morning.  We were not around for dinner and did not have time to go in the pool.  The shuttle was always on time and nice and clean.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you enjoyed your visit. Thank you for sharing with us about your stay and we also thank you for giving us the chance of accommodating you. We look forward to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: I would like to give this Hotel a better rating--but they had too many broken things
Summary: About 2 miles from the Disneyland Main Gate--easy drive.  Could see the fireworks from the parking lot.  Nice hotel.  Adequate parking--shared with other hotels.  Very nice rooms as expected for a Homewood Suites.  Free wifi, but had to pay for parking.  My biggest issue is there were lots of broken things--enough to be an inconvenience.  The elevator cert was expired.  The elevator was down for maintenance and then it was broken.  With a pretty full hotel that slowed things down.  The ice machine on our floor was broken.  Breakfast was a bit of a struggle several days--they didn't seem to have the rhythm of the crowds down and were out of things often.  I need my Diet Coke and the day the fountain didn't work was not a good day for me.  The staff was very nice and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share with us about your visit. We are very sorry you encounter so many issues during your visit. We deeply apologize for any inconvenience these made during your visit. Please feel free to let me know if there is anything that I can do for you. Once more thank you for your feed back, I will ensure to share this with my team and avoid this from happening in the future. We hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: If Hospiltality is what you want, then you have found it at the Homewood Suites in Anaheim!!!!
Summary: My family and I stayed at the Anaheim Homewood Suites in early May.What a wonderful experience! I have stayed in alot of Hotels in the Disney Area, and I have never seen such a a friendly and caring staff! All the employees I encounted seemed to be glad to be there! The front desk was marvelous. The maintance dept. was wonderful.,even helping my grandson put togeather a  toy he had purchased at Disneyland!  Housekeeping always had a smile and  good morning for you.Such a wonderful family enviroment. They have 2 pools. One is very shallow ,perfect for toddlers! The breakfast every morning was wonderful, and they have free dinner Mon-Thurs! The employees in the dinning area were wonderful as well!! Someone was alsways willing to help.The beds were comfortable and the noise level
Manager Response: We are very happy to hear you had a good time while staying with us. Than you for sharing with us about your visit and we thank you for giving us the chance of accommodating you. Once again thank you for sharing with us and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary Heading: The staff here is very good, customer friendly, and helpful!
Summary: I'd like to rate this property a 5 but it's not possible.  The hotel staff certainly gets a 5 star rating.  They were always very friendly, courteous, professional, and helpful.  Thank you all!   Unfortunately, the room conditions are not up to par.  The property interior / rooms need a FULL remodel.  The furniture is old, worn, in some cases dirty.  The first room we stayed in had two mattresses that squeaked and groaned every time you moved an inch on them.  The mattresses were very uncomfortable.  This made for a terrible night's sleep.  We had to change hotels after two nights of unrest.  We wanted to stay with the friendly and helpful team here but couldn't handle the room conditions and terrible mattresses.  We ended up moving down the road to the DoubleTree hotel which
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share with us about your visit. I am very sorry to hear the issues you had with your suite while staying with us. We deeply regret any inconvenience you experienced and please feel free to contact me if there is anything that I can do for you. Once again Thank you for giving us the chance of accommodating you and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay at Hilton Homewood Suites in Anaheim
Summary: My family recently enjoyed our stay at the Hilton Homewood Suites in Anaheim!  We had two suites - one for myself and husband and two grandchildren located  beside another suite used by my daughter and her husband and two other grandchildren. We had a wonderful time at this hotel. The full breakfast buffet was absolutely delicious ! Even the teenagers got up in time to enjoy it - especially the waffles - so good ! There was something for everyone to love to eat each morning before we set out on the shuttle direct from the hotel to Disneyland for a very nominal fee. The managers evening buffet (during the weekdays)  was so good. The family really looked forward to a really good dinner provided by the chefs.  So nice !!  Each evening was a different menu and really yummy. The pool
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit with us while in the area. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you during your vacation. We appreciate the feedback and I will ensure to share this with my team so they can see the importance of their customer service. Once again thank you for taking the time to share with us about your visit and we look forward to see you again.

Summary Heading: Some goods and some not so goods
Summary: for the price of the room i was expecting a lil bigger and a lil more comfortable. we washed our clothes and whites came out yellow. we left an item behind, i called right away & had to wait on a callback, was told it wasn't there, we went through all of our luggage and the item wasn't there, i called back and had to wait about 10 min for call to be answered, then had to wait again for a callback to see if they were able to reach lostandfound/housekeeping. No one was available. I explained where the item was and was told to call back in a few days to see if item was mixed with the bedding.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share about your visit with us. We deeply regret the lack of follow up about your forgotten item. Please feel free to let me know how I can help with this. Once more thank you for sharing with us and please feel free to let me know if there is anything else that I can do for you.

Summary: Check in could not have been simpler, and the room matched the description. Having a few restaurants on site was fantastic, and the free breakfast made it great value for money. The only negative was that the shower would constantly go from hot to cold after a few minutes. Couldn't trace the problem in the few days that we were there. Staff were friendly and overall a great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share about your vacation with us. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience of the shower temperature. I am truly sorry for the issue and please let me know if there is anything that I can do for you. Once more thank you for staying with us and we look forward to see you again.

Summary Heading: Great location, perfect for the family n great service
Summary: We stayed in this hotel for 5 nights and it was perfect.  Location is very near Disneyland. Breakfast buffet and dinner included. There is even an outdoor grill if you decided to have an outdoor dinner of steaks.  I stay at this hotel every time I visit the Disneyland area.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit and thank you for giving us the chance of accommodating you. We hope to see you in the future if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: We have found our favorite affordable hotel for Disneyland. We stay in a Homewood Suites in Albuquerque and saw that there was one near D-Land so we decided to book our stay there. The hotel was clean, comfortable and budget friendly. Staff was very helpful answering all of our questions.  Breakfast is more substantial than your typical free breakfast. My family was able to get on the shuttle to D-land with full bellies. We made it back one of the nights for the managers reception. Free food and beer.  Was not award winning meal but free is for me!!  I felt like we got our money's worth and will return again for future trips.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share with us. We are really happy to hear you enjoyed your visit and we hope to see you again in the future. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and we hope to see you again.

Summary: We love this hotel, the service is excellent, the complimentary breakfast is ideal, the extra space and kitchen is helpful. We use this hotel for any family vacations. It's nice with kids to have a fridge, microwave, stove and coffee.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share with us, we are really happy to hear you enjoyed your visit. Thank you for letting us be part of your vacation and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back in the future!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay, clean and beautiful views
Summary: I would totally recommend to stay at this hotel. I had family stay at a near by hotel where they paid more and weren't given as much ammenities (such as a kitchen) as homewood suites. It was clean and the service was awesome. I would totally like to stay here again. It's really close to Disneyland and close to plenty of restaurants. Great for the family. I felt like we were well taken care of. My daughter loved the swimming pool and we enjoyed the hot tub.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit with us. Thank you for giving us the chance of accommodating you and we definitely look forward to see you in the future.

Summary: I love Homewood Suites. The staff here was exceptional however the hotel seems worn.  Its near Disneyland so it has seen a lot of use.  They are building a new Homewood Suites just down the road, I imagine because this one has seen its day.  Great value though.  You really can't go wrong with Homewoods.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us, We appreciate you giving us the pleasure of accommodating you while in the area and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: My family and I really enjoyed this place. From the moment I would call about about my reservation to the moment we left, every employee treated us kind. Hotel room was a good size. Looking forward to staying here again.  I would recommend this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share with us about your visit. We are really happy to hear your stay with us was a great one. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you on your vacation and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: This hotel was perfect for a Disneyland trip. Great breakfast each morning. Large two-room suites. Shuttle for the parks picked us up at the front door and run twice an hour. Very friendly and helpful staff.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear your visit was a pleasant one. Thank you for giving us the chance of accommodating you while in the area. We appreciate the feedback and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel twice, with children and without. They are slammed with families because it is close to Disneyland, breakfast is crazy but they do an excellent job of managing it. The staff is very cheerful and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share about your visit with us while in the area. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit. We look forward to see you again if your travels bring you our way!

Summary: I'm very satisfied with our stay. The quality of the room and service came as a very pleasant surprise to us. Every evening when we returned to the room, it was kept as neat as we checked in that night :-) I don't need to say that the complimentary breakfast and internet connection adds lot of value to the price that you pay for the room.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you while in the area and we hope to see you again.

Summary: Whenever we stay at this hotel it is a very special experience. I have stayed in many hotels, but this hotel always feels like home. My 5 year old daughter has even asked why can't we live there. The hotel staff is the best and most efficient you will ever find.
Manager Response: We are really happy to hear your visit with us was a memorable one. Thank  you for giving us the chance of accommodating you while in the area, we really appreciate the loyalty. We hope to see you again in the future if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Not a fancy place but it was clean and the staff were very friendly.  Parking is $12.00 a day and the shuttle pass for Disneyland is $5.00 a day.  There's a full kitchen and Target right across the street.  They feed you breakfast and dinner (included in price) or there are several restaurants in easy walking distance.  Starbucks next door too.  You can purchase Disneyland tickets at the front desk.  The bed was VERY comfy!!  No noise issues even with the pool area below.  The only complaint I have is the lack of water flow restrictions in the shower.  We have a serious drought issue in Calif. and there is no way to make the water not come out full blast from the shower.  Also, don't put your dishes in the dishwasher if you just have a few items or the maid service will run it
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share about your visit with us. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and we thank you for giving us the chance of accommodating you while in the area. Thank you for your time and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: I wish I had known about the parking fee. I did see it though on the site. I could have stayed at the Embassy for the amount charged for two cars. 1399.00 plus 120.00+ 1519.00. Embassy 1599.00 and a better hotel even though owned by same company.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing about your visit, I am sorry about the inconvenience you experienced with the parking. Please feel free to contact me if there is any thing that I can do. We truly apologize and we hope we can see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Hilton Honors member worst hotel experience
Summary: I am a Hilton Honors member because I can usually rely on Hilton hotels to be some of the best run.  Homewood Suites Anaheim, however was terrible.  I realize its a busy place because it is located near Disneyland, but this place needs new management.  Our room was missing several amenities such as trash cans and paper towels for the kitchenette area.  Our room was never cleaned.  Took trash to the front desk to complain to manager.  Oops, no manager.  So disappointed will never return.  Hope this is a one time thing.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share about your visit with us. We deeply regret the lack of service during your stay. Here at the Homewood suites we want to ensure your visit is a pleasant one and I am terribly sorry to see we did not make it work. Please feel free to contact me at any time as I would like to ensure we can make it right for you. Thank you for your Hilton loyalty and giving us the pleasure of accommodating you. We look forward to see you again.

Summary: Separate bedroom was ideal.  Rooms were comfortable clean and quiet.  Too far to walk to Disneyland but shuttle is convenient.    There is a Target across the street for supplies.  Breakfast was decent with plenty of seating.  The kids loved the pool.  The negatives.   Smoking is permitted it seems on the pool deck.   Complete absence of recycling or composting in the common dining area.  An incredible amount of plastic and food going to the garbage.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing about your visit with us, we are happy to hear you enjoyed the amenities we offer and we hope your stay was a pleasant one. Thank you for the feed back on the items you notice while vacationing we will definitely look into this and utilize your comments to help us out to fix them. Once again thank you for sharing with us and we look forward to see you again.

Summary: My husband and 8 year old daughter had a recent stay here and we loved every minute of it.  The staff were very helpful and nothing was ever too much trouble for them.  Luis was amazing and went out of his way to ensure our disneyland experience was the best ever, Breakfast each day is great and there is a shuttle bus to the parks every 30 mins from the front of the hotel.  I would highly recommend this hotel to anybody wanting a warm, professional Hilton experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide such wonderful feedback! From the Suite Start Breakfast, to the wonderful services provided by our Guest Supervisor, Luis, it looks like your recent stay with us was a great one! I am very happy to read that "nothing was ever too much trouble" for you, your husband, and your 8-year old daughter. Thank you again for choosing to stay at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim-Maingate Area, and we look forward to welcoming you home again very soon!

Summary: Fourth stay at Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim-Main Gate Area.  Booked three rooms -- two were adjacent to each other and the third was across the hall.    Front desk staff very courteous.    Breakfast was very convenient and avoids having to feed hungry kids as soon as you get to the park.  Good start for the day without waiting in line.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you. We are happy to hear your stay with us was a pleasant one. We look forward to see you again if your travels bring you our way.

Summary Heading: Great place to start your Disney adventures
Summary: We were a family of four, this hotel is value for money. It was clean, furnishings were excellent and it has a pool/hot tub. a great way to relax after a big day. The free breakfast (everyday) and dinner (Mon-Thur) was excellent.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit with us. We thank you for sharing your experience and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: This is a standard Homewood Suites. Nothing particularly special, but clean, welcoming, and easy to get to.   It is not really at the Disneyland main gate - it's more than a mile from the park. If you want to walk to Disneyland, choose a closer hotel. Also, beware that the hotel charges $12 per night for parking. There is no gate you enter and no sign in the parking lot that says a fee is charged. The desk clerk did not ask if I had a car and did not tell me there was a parking fee - I simply had it on my bill the next morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit. I truly apologize for the parking fee, I deeply regret the lack of communication from our staff and making this a unexpected charge. Please feel free to contact me if there is anything that I can do. Thank you again for giving us the opportunity of serving you and we look forward to see you again.

Summary Heading: Not a bad place to stay
Summary: My family and I stayed  a week and it wasn't bad at all. It's a little ran down  but the price is right. If you are looking to save money and go to Disneyland this is the best bang for your buck. With the price of your stay they give you Breakfast and Dinner. Breakfast is from 6 am to 9 am and it is hot and good. Dinner is from 5pm to 7pm. It's not bad ether. Problem is if you are having fun at Disneyland you have to leave to eat dinner. But if you are saving money it worth it. Staff is nice and willing to help you. If you are wanting to go to Disneyland and you need to go cheap. Look at Homewood Suites.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit and our amenities were helpful. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you while in the area and please feel fee to let us now if there is anything else that you like to share about your stay. Once again thank you and we look forward to see you again in the future.

Summary: I was looking for a hotel to fit the needs for my family. I was excited to find this hotel would allow 5 to a room. The lobby was clean, and the hotel was busy. We stayed there April1-5 to take the kids to Disneyland. I can honestly say the free breakfast and free dinner were great for a budget family trip. The staff was nice and friendly. The room was an ok size. I did notice the glass on the closet door was broken and the toilet was leaking so very loud, not quite sure how they missed it. On the last night at the hotel I was trying to make use of the kitchenette and found that the stove was broken. Luckily there were 2 burners and the second still worked. I did call and they offered to have maintenance come look at it but we were checking out the next morning so I let it be.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide such important feedback. I am happy to read that the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim-Maingate area was able to accommodate your family comfortably. However, I would like to take this time to apologize for the mediocre housekeeping service you received during your recent stay with us. On all, but one day, you received poor service, our goal is to exceed your expectations every day while you are here with us. Please know that your feedback will be communicated and we will work to correct this deficiency. If there is anything that I can do for you, please do not hesitate to contact me for any reason at (714)740-1800.

Summary: We checked in at 2am and was a breeze and we were exhausted after our long day of travel.  We did opt for a room on the first floor after reading about the elevators being slow and we had a stroller so we preferred not to deal with elevators.  Beds were comfy, our son slept on the L-shaped couch and did not pull it out ever and he did not complain.  Bfast was good and it seemed to help to go there before 8am and it was less chaotic.  Enjoyed the weekday supper 2 of the nights we were there.  Nothing over the top but it was free (well the cost of the room) and saved of some money.  We did get annoyed with the shuttle being full mid-morning and got a refund at the front desk with no problem even though the shuttle lady told us no refunds.  We had lunch reservations and they told
Manager Response: thank you so much for sharing with us about your visit. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our amenities and we thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you while in the area. Thank you again for your feedback we truly appreciate it and please let us know if there is anything else that you would like to share with us. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: This is the PLACE to stay in Anaheim
Summary: My family and I stayed here, April 1 through April 7. We absolutely loved it. From the moment we checked in, we were greeted and welcomed by the front desk staff. They were extremely helpful during the check in process and quickly made us feel right at home. We were first greeted by Ben, (I think he was the manager, but I'm not entirely sure.) From reading previous reviews about this hotel, I knew that there were only a handful of rooms that provided a clear view of the Disneyland fireworks. Ben made sure that he reserved Room 609 for us and made sure that the room was prepared for us right away as we did arrive at the hotel way before the 4pm check in time, we arrived at the hotel around 1 PM. He suggested that we utilize the pool while we waited for our room and told is that
Manager Response: We are really happy to hear your stay with us was an enjoyable one. Thank you for sharing about your visit and we are glad to hear we made your trip a pleasant one. Here at the Homewood suites we want to ensure your visit is as easy as possible so you can spend more time vacationing. We look forward to see you again if your travels bring you our way.

Summary Heading: Convenience and Service out way the Negative
Summary: We just got back from staying 5 days, 4 nights, with 3 days in Disneyland. We booked through Costco so some of the reasons I loved this place was due to Costco providing a lot of the perks. Such as free parking for my car the entire time and free shuttle service. With these and the free breakfast and dinner Mon-Thur it made this place super convenient for us.   The hotel itself is kept up very well, sparkling clean! The staff was amazing! Even though breakfast and dinner was self serve there was still staff that would accommodate anything that you may need and even would come around and clean your plates. The one downside to the meals is that it was chaos! There is no rhyme or reason and its kind of a free for all. Like animals:( However the food was always good, dinner not as
Manager Response: Cassie C,  Thank you for providing such wonderful feedback. It is always a pleasure to read about positive recent stays with us at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim-Maingate Area! As for the housekeeping service, I cannot apologize enough for the difficulty in receiving service, but please know that your feedback will be communicated to the staff so we can work to correct this deficiency. Again, thank you for choosing to stay with us and for the patronage!

Summary: The rooms were nice and clean and the hotels staff were very friendly and helpful. Free breakfast (served everyday) and dinner (only served Mon thru Thurs) was very convenient and pretty good. Free Wi Fi was also a bonus, I would definitely recommend Homewood Suites.
Manager Response: I am very happy to read that your recent stay with us was a great one! From our Suite Start Breakfast to our Evening Manager's Reception, it looks like you enjoyed it all! We were happy to have you as our guests, and we look forward to welcoming you home again soon!

Summary: Great location. Shuttles available to Disneyland, even though we took our car. Rooms were kept clean and comfortable. I LOVE the complimentary breakfast and dinner. And the staff was superb. One of the managers walked around during the mealtimes and visited with everyone. Great service!!
Manager Response: With Disneyland in our backyard, it only helps to cater to those visiting the parks. I am happy to read that you were able to join us for our Suite Start Breakfast and Evening Manager's Reception. Thank you again for the patronage and for choosing to stay with us! Hope to have you back real soon!

Summary: Homewood Suites is in the Hilton family of Hotels, and they do a pretty good job of living up to their name. I love that the Suites can accommodate a family of six without needing rollaways, and that they have little kitchenettes. I wish the rooms had a different setup with 2 separate bedrooms, but I'm sure they were trying to make the most of their space. It also sucks having your room at the back end of a mile long hallway, so if you can request a room on the front end of the hotel, it might be worth it. The beds were comfy, the ice machines worked great, if you are staying because they are a Disney Good Neighbor hotel you will love it, they are all about Disney. That's not why we were there, but Disney was felt everywhere in the hotel, which my kids loved. Parking was a
Manager Response: I am happy to read that the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim-Maingate Area was able to accommodate you and your family comfortably. However, I would like to apologize for the chaos during our Suite Start Breakfast, but please know that your feedback is extremely important and we are currently developing ideas to better serve our guests that are dining with us. Thank you again for taking the time to provide this feedback to us, and we hope to have you as our guests again very soon!

Summary Heading: Still as good as it was back in 2009
Summary: We enjoyed returning to this hotel as we once stayed there in 2009 and was impressed then and are still impressed now. The breakfast has good variety. It was too cold to use the outdoor pool but we have good memories of the last time we were there. I would highly recommend this hotel especially due to it's close proximity to Disneyland.
Manager Response: I am extremely happy to read that the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim-Maingate Area was able to provide another great stay for you and your family. Thank you for the great loyalty and patronage over the years, as it always brings us joy when we have returning guests. Again, your feedback is extremely important, as well as your loyalty to our hotel!

Summary: I came with my two girls and their friends and this suite had enough room to accomodate all of us and provided food and drinks which was awesome!  The girls loved the pool and hot tub.  this location and the hotel fit our needs perfectly
Manager Response: Glad to read that our suite accommodated you and your girls comfortably! Thank you for taking the time to provide such wonderful feedback and we look forward to welcoming you home again very soon!

Summary: Oh my...I hardly know where to start. My sister and our husbands and 6 kids drove all the way down from Canada looking so forward to this destination. It looked like it was going to be an amazing stay. Our first step into the lobby...floors were FILTHY. Going up to our room the elevators the walls, floors everything was greasy and fingerprinted. Mold along the ceilings in both bathrooms, carpet so dirty, bathtub just icky, floor tiles had filthy grout. The lampshades were dirty, intake air grate was just full of dust and grime, wallpaper along bathroom edges was starting to come up with chunks of gyproc on it. Sooo depressing. We went and talked to manager and asked to opt out but were told we needed a 24 hour cancellation. Well...obviously that wasn't possible. The area around
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share about your visit with us. I truly apologize for the experience you had during your vacation. We deeply regret the lack of cleanliness through out your visit. We know how important it is to have a great experience especially when going to Disneyland and I am sorry to hear we did not delivered what we promised you. Please feel free to contact me if there is anything that I can do as I would like to make it right. Thank you again for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and we hope to hear back from you.

Summary: The customer service was the best. The staff was awesome, the food was cool and the dinners where a pleasant surprise. However, the room was rundown looking and it was hard to time the housecleaning. Cleaned once out of 6 days. I did the cleaning and got the clean towels and dish soap I needed. Also, the kitchen has no oven. We arrived early and were told no rooms ready yet. They offered to call when ready, yet no call at all! Good thing I grew up in area to know to kill time. First full day and housekeeping not on floor til after 530pm. The couch has two holes in it and a door was broken. The staff did fix door within an hour, but how do you miss that in room inspection? I called the general manager Kevin after I got home. He was so nice and apologized many times. He explained
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share about your visit to our Homewood suites. We deeply regret the lack of room cleanliness during your stay. We are truly sorry about the inconvenience that might of caused. We really appreciate the feedback since we want to ensure your vacation is an enjoyable one. Kevin is a great Manager and definitely working on eliminating all these issues. We definitely look forward to see you again when your travels bring you our way.

Summary: Stayed here for a week for Disneyland at Christmas with my daughters. We wanted a good place that had breakfast and dinner included in the stay that was close to Disneyland and that was what we got. Shuttle bus to Disneyland was convenient and our room was clean. As long as you realize this is not a 5 star hotel by any means but it is nice and clean and good for a Disneyland vacation you will be fine here.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit while in the area. We thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and we hope to see you again if your travel bring you our way.

Summary: I enjoy staying at the Homewood Suites because it gives my family more space and flexibility with meals. The room rate is always reasonable. With free breakfast every day and weekday manager‚Äôs special dinners Monday through Thursday, that‚Äôs two less things we need to think about when traveling. Each room has a kitchenette so if you wanted to put together sandwiches for a picnic, keep your beer cold for the evening when you return to the hotel after sight-seeing all day or even make a home-cooked meal, you can. It is our usual go-to hotel for lengthy stays. However, I was disappointed with the Homewood Suites Anaheim Maingate during our recent weekend stay.  The hotel had all the amenities we‚Äôre used to: kitchenette, free breakfast, manager‚Äôs special dinners (although these are
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy schedule and sharing with us about your visit to our Homewood suites Main gate area. I am sorry to hear all the issues you encountered during your visit. Here at the Homewood suites we try to make your vacation an enjoyable one, and I deeply regret the lack of cleanliness and service. We often try to ensure you are satisfied and I do not believe we accomplished that for you. Please feel free to contact me if there is anything that I can do for you. I would love to see you again in the future. We thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and we hope to see you again.

Summary: The men and women who work here are amazing at customer service! They go above and beyond to smile and make you feel welcome. The rooms are worn out to say the least. Grout in the tile is dirty and stained and the rooms are tight. The food at dinner time is not good so don't count on it. Highly disappointed since it was a Hilton. Won't be back until they remodel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share with us about your visit. We are truly sorry for any inconvenience you experienced, we deeply regret the food amenities as well as the room. Please feel free to contact us if there is anything else that we can do for you. We definitely look forward to see you again if your travels bring you our way.

Summary: I am a group coordinator who, along with my wife, hosted 51 people in a nine-night trip to Orange County, California.  We stayed all nine nights at the Homewood Suites.  We were very, very pleased overall with the accommodations and especially felt the customer service was second to none!!  We utilized 25 rooms and all were found to be very clean.  We were surprised to find that maid service not only made our beds and changed out our linens, but vacuumed our floors every day!  We ended up telling them they didn't have to do that...we don't vacuum our house every day.  Our group had breakfast at the hotel every day and it was always very, very good with a huge variety of food available that changed daily.  There were always egg, but the style varied.  There was always a meat
Manager Response: I cannot thank you enough for choosing Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim-Maingate area for your gathering! It was a pleasure accommodating all of the guests in your party, and if I might add, everyone I spoke with were great and happy. However, I do want to apologize for the maintenance of our suites, please know that your feedback will be communicated to our maintenance staff to ensure these deficiencies are not overlooked. Thank you again for staying with us, and we look forward to accommodating your next group!

Summary: The staff is the reason I give this a 4 star. The people at the front desk were very accommodating and went above and beyond. Once the room was cleaned we were allowed to check in which was hours before the actual check in time. The dining room was kept very clean during breakfast and dinner service. All except one breakfast had decent food. 1 meal out of 7 isn't bad.  This hotel is located right across the street from Target. It was easy to run to target for snacks and dinner items and go back to the hotel and prepare them. Target also had a great selection of Disney souvenirs that were so much cheaper than anything at Disney. I highly recommend buying your souvenirs from there rather than at the park.;  One issue I had every day during my stay was every time I took a shower
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to recognize the wonderful staff we have here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim-Maingate Area! We all do our best to provide a great guest experience! However, I do want to apologize for the hot water issue. Please know that this has been communicated to our maintenance staff so we can work to correct this deficiency. Again, my apologies for any inconvenience this has caused. Thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you home soon!

Summary: In the last few stays, we have found the rooms in declining condition. This stay we had a smelly room, lights not working, stained carpet, warped and beat-up front door. The breakfast was poor and no one ever cleaned up much of anything. We will be looking for a different hotel from here on out. We have stayed at this property 3-4 times over the last 5-6 years, just for reference.
Manager Response: I am extremely sorry to hear that your recent stay with us was not a great one! From the maintenance of our suites to the breakfast quality, I cannot apologize enough for any inconvenience we may have caused you and your family. Your feedback is extremely important, and please know that we will work to correct all of the areas you have brought to my attention immediately. If there is a chance in the future you will be visiting the Anaheim area again, please contact myself at Ben.Ly2@hilton.com so I can make an arraignment to accommodate you and your family to make your next stay right by  you.

Summary: My family and I stayed here like other families, during our Disney vacation.  I liked the fact it's away from the main Disney drag, while still being close.    This hotel is very busy, and that is especially evident during breakfast.  Make sure you show up early in order not to have to wait in line for food. Tables are plentiful, but fill quickly during peak meal time.  We tried the dinner type meal one night, because I'm all for saving money, but it was not worth it.  Undercooked spaghetti, and rolls that tasted like the soap that the pan must have been cleaned with.  The salad was good though.  Breakfast was much better.  Also, a note if you are taking a shuttle to Disney- Two different times the shuttle had to call for back up, because it was full.  Once for pick up, and once
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your schedule to share with us about your stay with us. I am truly sorry about the inconvenience you ran into while at our property. We deeply regret the lack of service on our behalf. If there is anything that I can do to make this better please fee to contact me. Once more I apologize for the inconvenience and we thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you.

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights with our adult children and there was plenty of room for all of us although the rooms did not seem as large as other Homewood Suites I have stayed in.  The public areas of the hotel are very clean and the breakfast area was kept well stocked and cleaned. We used the shuttle service for Disneyland and it was on time and all but one of the drivers we had was very courteous and safe. The one that was not would not wait 2 minutes as we rode the painfully slow elevator down. Our daughter asked him to wait as we were on our way, he had no other riders at that time and would not wait. He left with an empty bus. Both of the other drivers waited for families and no one was upset. Petty maybe, but aggravating. Our room was kept mostly very clean however the
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit to our property. I am truly sorry about the issues you had during your vacation. I deeply regret the lack of communication and housekeeping service. Please feel free to contact me if there is anything that I can do for you. Once again thank you for taking the time to share with us, and we will ensure to pass this on to our staff. Once again than you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and we look forward to see you.

Summary: This hotel was the BEST! The staff was extremely polite and helpful. Clean rooms and wonderful breakfast. And free dinner with wine and beer is hard to beat. I will be returning to this hotel the next time I am in Anaheim!
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear your visit to the area was a pleasant one. I will ensure to share this with my team as it will allow us to see the impact we make on your trip. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you while in the area, and we look forward to see you again.

Summary: Small home away from home. It was great to fix some meals in the little kitchen instead of eating so much at Disney. Saved us money and is much healthier. Will definitely stay here again! When I had a panic trip to get my son's forgotten Disney pass over to him (with his group) the front desk got me a car and driver instantly that rushed me over. Saved his day!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share with us about your stay. We are happy to hear you enjoyed the amenities, and we thank you for giving us the chance of accommodating you. We look forward to see you again in the future if your travels bring you our way.

Summary: This hotel is about a mile from the Anaheim Convention Center and even though is within walking distance, the bus service ($5.00 per day) is very accessible. The hotel is very clean and the staff is extremely helpful. We were there for business, but it was fun to see the children and their families in anticipation to visit Disney.
Manager Response: Hello ArthurKM,  Thank you for taking the time to comment about your recent stay at our hotel.  I'm extremely pleased that the cleanliness and helpfulness from our Team created a pleasant trip for you.  I also love seeing the kids in their princess costumes and mickey mouse ears each day, it makes me smile.  Thank you,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary Heading: Disappointed in the condition of the burners and TV
Summary: The hotel itself was very nice. The meals were good and very convenient when trying to enjoy the parks. The burner knobs were missing and the cable wire was broken to the TV. Other kitchen things were not great. Parking cost is a little too expensive compared to some other closer hotels to the parks. Shuttle was very convenient, but should be free for kids. The park tickets are expensive enough  and the nightly room rate.
Manager Response: Hello Donna L,  Thank you for the comments regarding your recent stay with us.  I'm pleased that the hotel accommodated your family well but am very sorry that the knobs were missing on the stove.  It is very atypical that this was missed while we serviced and inspected the room prior to your arrival.  Your feedback was shared with all of our Team members in our morning meeting and ultimately, it is our responsibility to correct the details before our guests check in.  Thank you,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: Shuttle was timely!  Great food.  Clean room.  Everything I could ask for and more!  There are plenty of options and the best reference I could give is that my wife would rather stay here than at the Disney hotel in the future!
Manager Response: Hello Daniel R,  We appreciate the wonderful feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  I'm thrilled that our hotel  made your trip memorable.  We hope to see you again very soon!  Thank you, Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: This is primarily a Resort hotel for Disney and would not recommend it for a business stay.
