The rooms are typically what you would expect from a Homewood, but the noise level with families and kids is an issue. Also the elevator in the front of the house is one of the slowest I have even seen. If you're looking for a family hotel, then this is it, but its packed! If you're a business traveler, think twice and check to stay in the far end of teh hotel, the high teens to high twenties room numbers on the top floor.
Manager Response: Hello Anthony V,  Thank you for your valuable feedback.  I feel terrible that your stay was not as productive as you wished.  Our Team try hard to accommodate business guests as well as families visiting the Parks and I'm sorry that we let you down.  Feel free to contact me personally on future visits and I'll ensure that you're placed in a desired area of the hotel that will keep you staying productive.  Thank you,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: I was in town for a conference and stayed at the Homewood for three nights. As a hotel near Disneyland, I expected hordes of children, scuffed walls, and frayed carpeting. As a Homewood, I expected drab, dark colors and a quirky layout.  In some ways, this property exceeded my expectations.  The good: - The staff in the breakfast & evening meal area were terrific. They were constantly on the move cleaning, always polite, helpful, and smiling. I can imagine that their jobs are challenging with roving packs of families but they were very nice. The best part of the stay. - The colors in the rooms were more modern than anticipated. It wasn't the standard dark hunter green with heavy drapery that I've seen at other Homewoods. Pretty buttery yellow walls in good condition unmarred by
Manager Response: Hello Member 3,  Thank you for your feedback regarding our hotel.  I'm very pleased with your comments about our Kitchen Team.  We are expecting to upgrade many areas of the hotel during 2015 so changes are coming.  We hope to see you again!  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: I tagged along with my husband on a business trip.  Front desk staff was great...very friendly and helpful.  I was not impressed with the cleanliness of the room.  Dirty sock on the bottom of the closet so it wasn't checked and cleaned before we checked in.  I also left a pair of expensive boots in the closet when we checked out and they were not "located".  Breakfast was just ok.  Not much of a choice, not hot, and even though the time for breakfast was advertised until 9:00, I was unable to get toast or a bagel at 8:45.   I will not be starting there again.  There are many comparably priced hotels that offer much better service. I really wanted to like this property, but I just did not.
Manager Response: Hello Debbie B,  We appreciate the feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  I'm pleased that our staff took good care of you but am very sorry for the housekeeping service that you received.  Your experience should have never passed our inspection process.  I apologize for the lack of food options near the end of breakfast service, this is very atypical for our hotel since we're usually serving food beyond the service time based on the number of guests in the dining area.  We will absolutely use your comments to improve our hotel, thank you.  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: We stayed in Homewood Suites as we celebrated our 26th wedding anniversary at Disneyland. Our experience was wonderful. Nice room.  friendly staff.  Great food.  Well worth the price.  We will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Hello Cleveland C,  Congratulations on your 26th wedding anniversary!  I'm very glad that we were a part of this special celebration and we're looking forward to hosting another trip for you soon.  Thank you,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: We stayed here and loved it! Great variety for breakfast and dinner, everyone in our family found something they liked! Great shuttle to and from the parks! The staff was fantastic, we are looking at booking our next vacation here again!
Manager Response: Hello Catherine C,  Thank you for the wonderful comments about your recent family vacation with us.  I'm thrilled that the dining, shuttle and service created a memorable trip for you!  We're looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: As a Hilton Honors member, I was disappointed in this particular hotel. This was my first negative experience with Hilton. Upon check in, we found dirty socks and left over trash from the previous guest. Overall outdated and not as clean as my other Homewood suites and Hilton  experiences. Front desk management was able to accommodate for the lack of cleanliness and provided us with some complimentary services. Staff members were friendly, but gave inconsistent answers on some concerns we had with the room. Close to Disneyland and local eateries. I personally would not stay here again in the future until it is refurbished.
Manager Response: Hello Yma314,  We appreciate your feedback regarding our hotel.  I apologize for the inconsistent answers given by our team and especially for the quality of housekeeping service that your experienced when you arrived.  We are expecting to upgrade many areas of the hotel in 2015 so changes are coming.  Thank you very much,   Darin / General Manager

Summary: Hotel is in excellent location, close to attractions, restaurants and not far from freeway. Front desk staff us excellent. Parking at this location is close, easy and well lit at night.   Room accomodations are excellent value for area. Two burner stove, fridge and microwave are excellent. Living room in 2 queen bed room was on smaller side, great for a couple, more adukts or multiple children may be a tight fit.  Beds are comfortable. Housekeeping needs to be stepped up a bit, one bed had hair in it and a stain on the sheets.   I will return to this location in my future trips.
Manager Response: Hello GtiFreak04,  We appreciate your feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  I'm pleased that the room accommodated you well but am sorry about the quality of housekeeping service.  We will use your comments to improve.  Thank you,   Darin / General Manager

Summary: What I enjoyed the most is the free breakfast in the morning.  Do not have to drive to eat and spend more time at Disney.  Especially nice that the guys can grab breakfast and take to the room while the ladies get ready:)  Manager reception is not available Fri-Sun:(  Disney shuttle is $5 adults/$2 children, every half hour and only stops at two Hilton properties.  Very convenient and WAY BETTER than parking at Disney.  Oggi's Pizza right next door (very popular and delicious pizza from San Diego) and so is Starbucks.  Cant comment on the hotel amenites because only used the hotel to sleep at night and eat in morning, but the 2 Queen bed suite (queen pull-out) was excellent for the 6 of us, can't go wrong.  Overall, excellent stay for Disney travelers. Would not mind staying
Manager Response: Hello Baltazar F,  Thank you for the comments about your recent stay with us.  I'm glad that the hotel's location, nearby restaurants and meal service created a successful Disney trip for you.  We hope to host another trip for you soon!  Thank you,   Darin / General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for 25 days, and enjoyed it. The staff were very friendly and as far as we are concerned the kitchen staff were exceptional and very helpful. The morning and evening meals were enjoyable and certainly more than adequate. Our rooms were clean and we could not ask for more. Cannot wait to come back again, good job.
Manager Response: Hello Pat L,  We greatly appreciate your feedback regarding your 25 day stay with us.  I'm very pleased that our room, staff and meals made it a pleasant experience for you.  We can't wait to see you again!  Thank you,   Darin / General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place with a great price!
Summary: I stayed her with a coworker a couple of weeks ago and we were both impressed.  This is a great place to stay with kids and worked for us as business travelers too!  The staff was super friendly and when my travel companion had an issue with her room they had it fixed in a matter of minutes!  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Helix88,  Thank you for the outstanding comments regarding your recent stay with us.  I'm glad that your stay was productive and am very pleased that you experienced a "super friendly" behavior from our Team, which exactly what we aim for.  We hope to see you again soon!  Darin / General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Hotel.  Near Disney and Conv Center.  Nice to have a Kitchen!
Summary: I havent been to this hotel in a couple of years.  I try to stay here when I work conventions at the Anaheim Convention Center.  This hotel is not fancy, but it is clean and comfortable.  The rooms are all suites where the separate bedroom has a real door, which is a huge plus.  I dont care for the typical suite hotel where there is a sitting area in the bedroom and they call it a suite.  This is the real deal.  There is a full kitchen, with a stove top, microwave, residential size fridge, and all the pots, pans, utensils and silverware you need to cook and eat just about anything.  There is a small table between the living room area and the kitchen area where you can eat and work.   The living room area has a couch and a separate flat screen tv.  There is no safe in the room,
Manager Response: Hello BradWorld,  Thank you for the impressive comments regarding your recent stay with us.  I'm very pleased that the room and location was suitable for you and especially pleased to hear that our staff took good care of you (as we should).  My apologies for not having an in-room safe, I know that it isn't as convenient but we do have a safe for you to use at the front desk.  We hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: This was our 2nd stay but definitely not our last.  The rooms are clean & quiet. Suitable for a couple, family or a large group.   Hotel staff is exceptionally friendly.  And great value added with the breakfast and manager's reception.  We look forward to our next stay!
Manager Response: Hello Norina F.  I love reading your comments regarding your second visit with us, we especially appreciate the wonderful feedback about our staff.  We are looking forward to hosting the 3rd trip for you.  Thank you very much!  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary Heading: First bad experience at a Homewood Suites
Summary: This location is dirty. Staff not very friendly or even acknowledge guests.  This is a family hotel because it is near Disney and California Adventure.  I would not bring my family to stay.  This hotel is the first Homewood I have stayed that seems to be very run down and old and dirty.
Manager Response: Hello Karin K.  Thank you for taking time to provide us with feedback regarding your recent stay.  I feel terrible that we left you with a less than perfect impression of our hotel.  Our staff typically receives outstanding reviews but it appears that we we did not provide you with the service that we all expect and I apologize.  We are working hard to keep the hotel fresh and new, so many changes will be happening within the next year.  Sincerely,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, nice rooms, good location
Summary: This "extended stay" type, all-suite hotel is a great value, especially for the location. Rooms are well-appointed, but not luxurious. The rates are reasonable and breakfast is available for free daily. The walk to Disneyland from here may be too much for a little one, but ART buses are available for a decent rate. I will keep this one on the list for the future.
Manager Response: Hello Joshua M.    Thank you for the excellent comments regarding your stay with us.  I'm pleased that our service and accommodations created a pleasant trip for you.  We hope to see you again soon!  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: First time at this hotel while attending the NAMM show in Anaheim.  This hotel rocked it in every way.  From check in to check, breakfast to evening cocktails I was really impressed.  I highly suggest you stay here on your next visit to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Hello Michael G.    We appreciate the fantastic feedback regarding your stay during the NAMM event.  I'm thrilled that we made it an enjoyable experience for you!  Rock-on!  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: I used this hotel for the disney half marathon.  The route ran by twice, so great for your family to easily watch the race.  Great breakfast, which provided an easy way to fuel up before a day at Disney (with it's $20 hamburgers).  Spacious and clean rooms.  There were regular buses to Disneyland for the family.  I highly recommend.
Manager Response: Hello Timothy B,  Thank you for making our hotel your home base for the half marathon!  I'm very pleased that you had an enjoyable time.  We hope to see you you again soon!  Sincerely,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for three nights on a quick trip to Disneyland. The rooms were nice. The beds were comfy and the staff was very friendly and helpful. We also enjoyed the convenience if the shuttle which was a nominal fee. Breakfast was great, we'd stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Cheryce W,  Thank you for the wonderful comments regarding your recent stay with us.  I'm glad that you were pleased with the room, beds, transportation, breakfast and most of all, our service.  We'll love to host another quick (or long) Disneyland trip for you!  Sincerely,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: Have stayed here multiple times.  Their shuttle to DL makes it very easy to get to and from.  Rooms are great size with little kitchens and fridges which is nice.  Free breakfast options are good (love the waffle makers).  It's pretty quiet even with so many kids staying.  Will probably stay here again when I go back to DL later this year or next year.
Manager Response: Hello Deborah M.  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to our hotel.  I'm pleased that the room, transportation and breakfast made your trip successful.  We're looking forward to seeing you soon!  Sincerely,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: I already stayed 2 times n the Orlando Homewood and that is why I was almost sure that the hotel will fit in my requirements. The room has a very good size and equipped with 2 TVs and a small kitchen. The staff is very friendly and gave me all the directions and suggestions for a good stay. The hotel is located very close to the Disney area (5 minutes by car) and has a lot of good restaurants nearby. There is a Target in the other side of the road. I recommend
Manager Response: Hello Reinaldoviola,  We appreciate your feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  I'm very pleased that the location as well as the accommodations were suitable for you.  We hope to host another Disney trip for you in the near future.  Thank you,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: This hotel has the best staff of all the Hilton family of hotels.  Friendly from the moment you step in to the moment you leave.  You get free breakfast and dinner (during the week) which saves a ton of cash.  You can also pack a few snacks ahead of time before you head off to Disneyland which saves you from taking out a second mortgage to eat at the park :) The shuttle was relatively inexpensive and runs every half hour, much easier than parking your vehicle.   The rooms are big and quiet.  We got the two queen bed room and with three kids, there still was plenty of room to move around. This was our second time staying here and will continue to come to this property.
Manager Response: Hello Marius G,  We appreciate the wonderful comments regarding our staff and I'm thrilled that we made your stay enjoyable.  We are looking forward to hosting many more Disney trips for you!  Thank you, Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: I stayed here on a weekend trip to Disneyland. We arrived at around 2am and check-in was quick and easy. We had a two queen bed suite with a sofa bed. The room was clean and the beds were comfortable. There's free wi-fi and free breakfast available. The shuttle to Disneyland costs five dollars and only serves this hotel and the hotel right next door, so it's very convenient. The only thing I didn't appreciate was being awoken at 7am by a marathon going on outside on Chapman Avenue after spending the entire previous day at Disneyland. Obviously that is beyond the hotel's control so I can't hold that against them. Overall, this hotel is a solid option when visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello OscarS91,  Thank you very much for the comments regarding your recent stay.  I'm pleased to learn that our hotel was a good fit for your Disney trip, however I am sorry about the marathon disturbing you in the morning.  These races occur periodically and we rarely hear of any inconveniences caused by them, but this particular race was making too much noise, too early in the morning.  We are addressing this with city officials to prevent it from happening again.  Sincerely, Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: We chose this hotel based on Hilton Honors reward, previous stay (2 yrs ago), and tripadvisor reviews.  We came in on a rainy Saturday evening with the intentions of getting up early and going to Disneyland.   The hotel location is fine. Next to other hotels, with a few restaurants within walking distance on the same lot and Target across the street.  Upon arrival we were greeted by friendly staff. Check-in was super fast! We were upgraded to a 2 bedroom suite and comp parking, both of which we appreciated very much. The 2 bedroom suite consisted of a 1 bedroom w/living area and adjoined/connected studio suite, with each room having one queen bed.  When we got off the elevator I was unimpressed. The room doors looked a little dirty, and the door across the hall looked as though
Manager Response: Hello mrssirfun,  I appreciate your comments regarding your recent stay, although I am please that you enjoyed our service, check-in / check-out and breakfast, I am very sorry about the concerns with your suite.  Housekeeping and Maintenance addressed your concerns as soon as we received your comments.  Our entire Team strives for an outstanding stay for every guest.  Sincerely,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: The first day of our 7 day stay at this "Good Neighbor" hotel I was ready to write a scathing review of how inattentive the staff is. You can tell the difference between staff who truly care and want to make your stay comfortable and those that just smile and speak pleasantly enough and then do nothing really. This property has the latter. At least they're not mean or rude.  They are especially nice, I noticed during my week long stay, when the general manager Darin is right there.  Darin is an amazing general manager, pleasant, friendly and you can catch him around property a lot - from checking in at the front desk to busing tables after dinner. There's a lot to be said for a General Manager giving out his personal cell phone number on your welcome letter in your room.  I
Manager Response: Hello Medha311,  Thank you for the comments regarding your recent stay with us.  I'm very sorry about the wait for your package and the blanket, it should never take that long to honor such simple requests.  Our service and performance must be better than average and I apologize that your experience wasn't better than average.  We take all comments very seriously and our Team is collectively reading the details in your comments so that we can improve.  I understand that vacations are precious and we need to do a better job making your vacation more magical.  Sincerely, Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice, convenient and inexpensive than the others
Summary: This place was nice, not luxurious as you would think a Hilton would be but it has a nice kitchenette with a dishwasher and a full size refrigerator.  The beds were on the Plymouth rock side on the comfort level. The room was not maintained like you would think of a Hilton.  But it was clean and tidy. The breakfast and dinner is a really nice touch. They have a shuttle to Disneyland for 5 dollars which is also nice and convenient.  The employees were nice and friendly.  They have 4 nice restaurants right off the front entrance which is awesome.
Manager Response: Hello TravelerDave007,  We appreciate your feedback regarding your recent stay with us.    I'm please that you were happy with the location, shuttle service and the breakfast but am sorry that you weren't completely satisfied with the bed comfort and the maintenance / upkeep of your suite.  If you have a moment, I will appreciate any additional details so that we can continue to improve.  Thank you very much, Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: This is a very comfortable hotel for families visiting Disneyland California. All its rooms are suites (1 bedroom & a sitting room a long with kitchenette), the beds are large enough to fit two people each. & there's a sofa bed in the sitting room(not that comfortable though). No variety in breakfast. The shuttle to Disneyland is charged (ask the reception for tickets). We stayed there for two nights, it was a very good overall experience.
Manager Response: Hello YasAdvisor6,  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I'm please to learn that the room was comfortable for your family.  I agree with you, the pull-out sofa doesn't provide the most comfortable sleeping option.  We hope to host another Disney trip for you in the future.  Thank you.  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: We stayed here just after Christmas through New Years day. There were three adults and three children in our suit. There was plenty of room but the first thing we noticed was that we didn't have a shower curtain and had to call the desk to get one brought up. Then the dresser drawers would not stay closed so we put a stack of napkins under the bottom to try an level it.  No DVD player and no cable in our room so not much to watch during our down time. Not sure if we could rent one we didn't ask. The kitchen had a dishwasher but no soap so we hand washed what we used. I noticed most rooms just sat their dirty dishes outside their doors to be picked up.  The only thing housekeeping did was make the beds and empty the bathroom garbage. The kitchen garbage was never touched. When I
Manager Response: Hello Roberta S.  Thank you very much for the comments regarding your stay with us, I feel terrible that we left you with a less than perfect impression.  There is no excuse to have items missing from your room and to have certain areas not refreshed each day, especially when we tell you that we will do it.  I apologize that our service was sub-par.  We will use your feedback to improve.  Sincerely, Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: I stayed during the Christmas and New Years weekend. The rooms are starting to show their age, however the staff made up for it. The food is decent, and considering that is complementary, I have no complaints. The shuttle service is convenient. The staff, especially the meal staff, are always attentive and very friendly. Although the hotel is getting a bit old, the staff is still excellent.
Manager Response: Hello Toaster093,  Thank you for the fantastic comments regarding our staff, I'll enjoy sharing your feedback with them, especially the kitchen Team!  We have a schedule to start an extensive renovation within the 1st quarter 2015, so most areas will be receiving an upgraded enhancement.  We hope to see you again in the very near future.  Thank you,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: We turned up well before check in and the staff were great offering to store our luggage while we went to Disneyland for the afternoon. When we returned and got to our room we found it dirty, the front desk offered us another room and that room was missing some blankets as well. The staff made a note for the manager to get in contact with me and we have now left and still never heard from the manager. The sheets also didn't fit the bed. Quite disappointing for what we paid, only upside is the staff were very accommodating. We wouldn't stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello Dave A.  Thank you for taking the time to comment about your recent stay.  I'm pleased to hear that our Team was accommodating but feel terrible that you were waiting for a call from us regarding your rooms, unfortunately I was unaware.  Please contact me at 714-620-2153 when you have a moment so that we can make it right.  Sincerely,   Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: I enjoyed my stay very much. The foo0d served both morning and evening was of a very good quality and quantity with which I really can't complain, but only give accolades about and if I returned to this area again or if I can find a Homewood Suites in the next place I have to travel to I will probably pick this branding first. Homewood Suites Thanks, Don Geist
Manager Response: Hello Geist,  We appreciate the wonderful remarks about your stay with us.  I'm pleased that our breakfast and dinner was well received.  We look forward to hosting another trip for you in the futureI   Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: Room include complimentary HOT breakfast.  Noted during week, also includes complimentary dinner.  Close to elevator.  Starbucks nearby in hotel adjacent to this one.  Outback Steakhouse and Red Robin in walking distance in same block.  To get to hotel if driving from Disneyland, turn on street before Outback as sign on hotel hard to see from Harbor Blvd.
Manager Response: Hello amindjc,  Thank you for the comments regarding your stay with us, I'm pleased that our location was a good fir for you, we hope to see you again very soon!  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for a weekend trip with the family to go to Disneyland for the holiday. Used my Hilton Honor points to stay. Hotel staff was friendly and helpful. Coffee in the lobby with flavored creamer was nice. Had two suites, nice size rooms were comfortable and having the kitchenette was nice. Layout of hotel was slightly odd with longest hallways in the world. Breakfast not over the top but tasty and definitely saves you money. Good location to Disney and the shuttle worked out well. All things considered a nice place to stay.
Manager Response: Hello Mervin Rex S.  Thank you for the comments regarding your recent stay with us.  I'm glad that you were pleased with your accommodations however I do apologize for the long hallways, riding the luggage carts makes them seem much shorter  :-)  We hope to host another Disney trip for you in the very near future!  Sincerely, Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: We stayed at this property a couple years ago around Christmas and really enjoyed it...  This trip we stayed over Thanksgiving and were somewhat disappointed...  Plus:  Location - easy bus ride to Disney Cost is reasonable Close to multiple restaurants Free breakfast They will shop at store for you and charge to room Kitchen/fridge  Cons:  Loud - could hear conversations through walls, and road noise...would strongly encourage not going for fireworks view if you are a light sleeper as you will get a ton of street noise (didn't bother me but wife had to go to ear plugs)  Room dated/worn - showing its age and lack of repair...night light out in microwave, toilet didn't work well, battled thermostat most of trip...  Smell - first entering the room, it smelled as though previously
Manager Response: Hello nvcowboysfan,  Thank you for taking time to comment about your recent stay.  I'm very sorry that you weren't 100% pleased with your second stay with us.  I apologize for the smoking odor in the room, we recently converted all of our 7th floor rooms into non-smoking and although we've completely refresh the area, there may  be a slight scent in these select rooms.  I'm sorry about the thermostat and the microwave light not working properly, we'll always correct these challenges as soon as we discover them.  I feel terrible that you were impacted by our front elevator as well, having a room on the 1st floor or on the west side of the hotel will make a difference.  We hope that you'll give us another opportunity to host a trip for you, I'll personally arrange your accommodations so that everything is perfect.  Thank you,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean rooms and nice kitchen amenities .
Summary: The elevator in the front of the hotel was sooooo slow it is not worth using. We used the back elevator for exiting the room. Spacious room with a pull out in the sitting area. Nice but I prefer to be in the park grounds and therefore would not stay here again. They also charge for the shuttle to the park. Most hotels do not charge.
Manager Response: Hello StellaPL,  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I'm pleased to hear that you enjoyed your room but am sorry to hear that you'd rather stay at the Parks.  Most of our guests enjoy the close proximity to the Parks with a more peaceful location.  Our shuttle service is an additional cost but we try to add value since the shuttle costs are often less than parking a vehicle at the Parks while adding the convenience of picking up and dropping off at the front door.  I apologize for the elevator as well.  We appreciate your feedback and your business.  Sincerely,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: This is a great hotel next to the Disneyland resorts and Downtown Disney District.  The price is very fair compared to others in the area.  Free breakfast and evening reception is the deal breaker.  Especially for families with children.
Manager Response: Dear 152catinal,,  We appreciate your feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  I'm thrilled to learn that your stay was enjoyable and that you were able to join us for breakfast and dinner.  We hope to host another Disney vacation for you in the near future.  Thank you,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: The rooms are comfy and the kitchen is clean.  The bathroom could use some upgrading.   Housecleaning was marginal...they left some stuff behind and coffee maker on, but no big deal.  Free WiFi and breakfast are a bonus.  The shuttle to Disneyland is convenient and the hotel is near several restaurant and a Target - very convenient.
Manager Response: Hello Makrouhik,  Thank you for the comments regarding your recent stay, I glad to hear that you enjoyed yourself but am terribly sorry for housekeeping leaving items in your room.  We will use your feedback to improve and bathroom renovations (as well as many other areas of the hotel) are coming in early 2015.  We hope to see you again very soon!  Sincerely, Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: We stayed again on Halloween this year.  As always staff is super accommodating and friendly. The breakfasts never disappoints and this time, the kids loved the dinners, they were definitely family friendly fare.  We had an issue with temperature control, it took us a couple of days to realize it wasn't something we were doing.  The A/C never shut off, and when you switched to heat it didn't shut off either.  I'm just going to say this. If you are going to bring your family of five six or seven here, eat their breakfast and dinner CLEAN UP AFTER YOURSELF OR GIVE THE PEOPLE WHO DO A TIP.  I saw so many people just leave a table full of dishes and uneaten food. Yet, the guys cleaning it up always had a smile on their face willing to help. Just unbelievably rude if you ask me, to
Manager Response: Hello Poodlepuffer,  Thank you very much for the kind comments regarding your stay, I especially love the comment regarding the service.  Regardless if we clean the dishes or our guests do it, we want each guest to feel as comfortable as possible while they're dining with us.  We have a security company that patrols the property each night, we share this service with other area hotels.  We hope to host another trip for you in the near future.  Sincerely,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: Nice suite accommodated six comfortably, clean and close to Disneyland.  Small kitchen was all we needed for refrigeration and microwave but you can actually cook something if you wanted. Hot breakfast included made it even more convenient and if you don't need your vehicle at the park, take the shuttle.  It runs every 30 minutes and $5 on and off privileges for the day. Beds were very comfortable but I wouldn't pay the extra again for a fireworks view.  All in all it was good value.
Manager Response: Hello Gary C.  We appreciate your comments and I'm very glad to hear that the room was accommodating with the kitchen, comfortable and that you enjoyed the breakfast as well as the shuttle service.  We hope to see you again soon!  Thank you,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: We stayed for four nights at this property over a long weekend.  The rooms were very spacious and felt clean.  We were disappointed that AMC was not offered at the hotel because we went back to the hotel from Disneyland to watch Walking Dead and it was not available to us.  We enjoyed the breakfast daily and felt the offerings were nice.  Unfortunately dinner was not offered since we were there on a weekend.   The staff was great!  Beware that the hotel shares a lot with the Marriott Suites next door and one night we got back from the parks and there was not one space in the lot due to a function at the Marriott.  We asked at the front desk and they told us there was nothing they could do.  This is unfortunate since there is a nightly parking fee.  We ended up parking across the
Manager Response: Hello Dizneguy,  We truly appreciate your comments.  I'm glad that you enjoyed your stay but am very sorry about the parking on Saturday night.  Due to the size of our parking lot, it is very rare that all spaces fill up and we do our best to control the parking and enforce that the spaces are reserved for guests only.  I feel terrible that you were inconvenienced.  We hope to host another trip for you in the near future.   Thank you,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: Sheets were never changed.  Found someone else's socks in bed.  Phone didn't work. Put the door sign for no maid service, but maid still entered room.  No quality control here.  Would never stay here again.  I'm a big fan of Homewood Suites from other cities I've stayed at, but this location needs real improvement.
Manager Response: Dear Ruby D.  I appreciate your comments and I'm terribly sorry about your experience, we did some research and we absolutely made an error with your room.  Please contact me at 714-620-2153 so that we can make it right.   Thank you,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for four nights, after staying at a Homewood Suites before (in Arizona) two years ago. Although our stay was fine, we definitely learned that not all Himewoods are as great as the first one we stayed in.   We did really appreciate the breakfasts and dinner options (M-Th). They changed up the hot breakfast options daily. The dinners were actually quite good. We only wish they timed the dinners to the closing times for Disney. We were only able to make it back in time once, as the parks closed at 8 when we were there.   The service was great- ver friendly and helpful when we checked in. We booked through Get Awat Today, so the shuttle and parking was included. The only issue we had was our phone not working in our room and our wake up call was never completed.   The
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time to share about your visit with us. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our amenities at the property. I am sorry about the inconvenience you might of experience with the suite. I truly apologize about the phones as well we deeply regret the issue. We thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and please feel free to contact me if there is anything else that you would like to share about your stay or if there is anything that I can do. Once again thank you.

Summary: My brother took us to Disneyland this fall and he booked this wonderful hotel! We had an amazing time! The staff was friendly, helpful, courteous...I cant say enough about them! The hotel was super clean. Breakfast was awesome (included with our stay). We had a full kitchen in our suites (Target was right accross the street so we were able to buy groceries right there). The beds were comfortable, the bathroom was clean...with complimentary Neutrogena products! We were able to barbecue by the pool, they have 2 barbecues for guests to use...the pool was clean, the grounds were well kept. There was complimentary coffee and pop 24/7...I would go back to this hotel anytime!! Really close to Disneyland...a magical and wonderful family vacation!
Manager Response: Hello Maite R.  Thank you very much for the wonderful comments about your stay.  I love hearing comments about how friendly the associates are but most importantly that your family had a magical experience, which is exactly what we aim for.  We hope to host another wonderful family vacation for you very soon.  Sincerely,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: My daughter and I have stayed here several times. Our last visit was in September 2014. I surprised my daughter for her birthday by getting our room here. We were in one of the larger suites in a corner. The room itself was nice although it was extremely cold. It took a very long time to get someone to fix it. And, because they did it while we were out, they did something with the lock. So, after a long day at Disneyland, I had to go back downstairs to the desk to get a new card key. The breakfast was okay. I had remembered it being better. And, the elevators are very, very, very slow. Still, it is one of favorite places to stay so we would book there again.
Manager Response: Hello Tina L..  We appreciate the comments regarding your recent stay.  I'm pleased to learn that the room was accommodating but feel terrible that the temperature control was not working when you arrived.  I am also sorry about the delay for the elevator and that your keys were not working when you came back to the room.  We try to rotate many items for breakfast each day to ensure that guests receive new items each day during the week.  Please let us now how our breakfast can improve.  Sincerely,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: Stayed at this hotel while on business. The rooms are spacious and comfortable. Staff is very friendly. Both breakfast and the Internet are free as are a manager's reception with food (Monday-Thursday). There are several good restaurants within a one-block walk.
Manager Response: Hello Mike A.  Thank you for the comments regarding your stay, I especially love hearing that the staff is very friendly.  We hope to see you again very soon, regardless if it is business or pleasure.  Sincerely,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: Not a luxury hotel but decent enough. My husband didn't like the old bathtub/shower.  My kids were fine being there.  There is a lot of room for kids and adults.  Weird though, they had a table to eat at but only one chair.  Next time, I am going to try other places but not against staying here if I have to.
Manager Response: Hello Francisco P.  We appreciate your comments and I apologize if the bathroom was not suitable for your husband.  A full bathroom renovation is expecting to start in early 2015 which will enhance the look with a more modern design.  The dining table serves as a desk as well, so each room has two chairs, although more are always available if needed.  We strive to be more than decent so I hope that you'll give us another opportunity in the future.  Thank you,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: The room was not clean two of our four days. We came back from Disneyland in the evening so it was too late to correct. Bath tub didn't drain and so we stood in gross water while showering and then it was slippery the next time because of the non cleaning.
Manager Response: Hello Jon V.  We appreciate your comments and I'm very sorry that we didn't address the tub drain immediately.  We show that it was requested and it was documented but it appears that we were unable to gain access to the room to correct it.  I also followed up regarding the housekeeping service and out of the 3 days you were staying with us, we serviced your room on 2 of those days.  The kids were taking a nap in the bedroom on the last day, we attempted to service the room twice but did not want to wake up the kids.  Our Director of Housekeeping called the room and left a voice message but we did not receive a call back.  Regardless, I apologize for the inconvenience.  Please feel free to contact me at the hotel so that we can make it right.  Thank you,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: Excellent location! Short drive from Disneyland and California Adventure (about three to four blocks away). Hotel was clean, hot breakfast was excellent. The hotel staff was very helpful and nice. We usually stay at an Embassy Suites. But this one being from the same Hilton Hotel chain, if Embassy Suites is not available because of no vacancy or because of high prices, Homewood Suites is the best choice for the money.
Manager Response: Hello Juan G R,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay at our hotel.  I'm glad that you enjoyed the location to the parks, our breakfast and most of all, our service.  We'd love to host another trip for you again.  Sincerely, Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: My stay was very enjoyable - friendly service and lovely breakfasts.  The location was good for business purposes, and there were also many families staying on vacation while they visited Disney.  The fitness center was clean and almost empty everytime I used it.  Each staff member I came in contact with made sure to say hello with a smile.  Thank you!
Manager Response: Aloha Kristy M,  We appreciate your comments and I'm pleased to hear that you had a productive business trip.  I especially love the comment about all of our associates greeting you with a smile, which is exactly what I look for when I'm traveling as well.  We hope to see you again very soon.  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: Im not even sure where to start with this Hotel.... The Breakfast was great. All the common items and then some but it was crowded, get there Early! There are kids running around everywhere and no parents to control them. We only had the "Dinner" one night which was ok, some type of "fajitas" with rice. It was enough to fill us and keep us Happy. I was traveling with my 80+ Yr old Grandparents, 50 Yr old Parents, and 1 and 3 Yr old kids. We never did venture out to the pool but the area was very nice and well kept. There are many resturants and stores close by within walking distance. We did have a car with us that was $10 a night to park and we didn't use it once! The shuttle is easy to catch and almost always on-time, just make sure to buy your voucher for it before trying to
Manager Response: Hello Unchie12,  We truly appreciate your feedback and we'll take every comment to make our hotel better.  The front elevator can challenging on busy days, we can always move you to a lower floor or near the back area of the hotel if it's convenient for you.  We also understand the guest laundry challenges as well, we should be receiving new machines, and more of them later this week, which will make a difference.  Thank you for the kind comments regarding Stuart, I enjoyed sharing them with him.  Your satisfaction is our top priority, if you're back in the area, please contact me personally so that I can arrange your accommodations to ensure everything is just perfect for you and your family.  Sincerely,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: this place was fantastic, just the right distance from disneyland and with fantastic service and inclusions. Extremely friendly staff. I would recommend to anyone looking to visit the anaheim area. The front lift is a little slow but the back lift is nice and quick.
Manager Response: Hello Simon H,  Thank you for the wonderful comments regarding your recent stay with us.  I apologize for the slow front elevator but am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay.  We hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: We chose this hotel as it was close to Disneyland but not right in the middle of the hustle and bustle, and were very pleased that we did. The shuttle runs every 30 mins either way, so there's never a long wait. The room we had ( a 2 bdrm disabled suite) was enormous! Heaps of room for the five of us. Breakfast, served daily, was always super busy but the staff were quick and attentive. Was great to see the manager getting in there, chatting to people and clearing tables. Dinner, served M-Th, looked good, but we only ate there one night. There are a few pretty good restaurants scattered within an easy walk if the dinner isn't to your liking. Guests laundry is a bonus when you're on the road for a while!
Manager Response: Hello Lucysmumnz,  We appreciate the wonder comments about our hotel.  I'm glad that your room was comfortable and the breakfast was enjoyable (yet busy).  The breakfast and dinner service is a fantastic time to talk with our guests and encourage genuine feedback so that we can constantly improve our hotel for you.  It was great having you as our guest, thank you!  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: An excellent choice when visiting Disneyland. Clean spacious rooms. The free breakfast was extensive and well presented. We stayed for six nights but only had the free dinner once. It was tasty and satisfying and easy with a very tired child. The staff were helpful and friendly. We would recommend this hotel unreservedly.
Manager Response: Hello Lucyznana,  Thank you very much for the incredible comments regarding your recent stay.  I'm very please to learn that our accommodations as well as the dining options were suitable for you and your family.  We are looking forward to hosting another family trip in the near future.  Sincerely, Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: Spent three nights here and have to say the room was sparkling clean.  Very spacious accommodations and the front desk staff was among the most efficient and friendly we've ever encountered.  Free breakfast (get there early) and we didn't partake they even offer free dinner.  Great location, easy to find and near everything you want to be near.  Hotel staff was very responsive to a special request.  For the price paid, this is one of the better bargains out there.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear your enjoyed your visit with us while in the area. We really appreciate the time you took to share about your stay and we look forward to see you in the future. Once again thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you.

Summary: This is a really great place to stay.  A free hot breakfast and dinner was included in our stay.  We have a handicapped daughter and the hotel was nice enough to install a hand held shower head with a hose to make our stay with her easier since there were no more accessible rooms available.  We reserved two rooms for our large family and they were nice enough to waive the parking fee for us.  We really liked this place and would recommend it to anyone.
Manager Response: Hello Diana W.  We greatly appreciate the wonderful comments.  I'm very pleased that we accommodated your daughter appropriately and that you enjoyed our rooms, breakfast and dinner.  We're looking forward to seeing you again very soon.  Thank you,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: Brought the family to Disneyland and made reservations here through AAA.  Beautiful rooms, more than adequate breakfast and good evening meal--all included.  The park shuttle (costs extra but you get a three-day pass) runs every half-hour on the quarter.  I feel that we got a very good value for what we spent.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing about your visit with us. We are happy to hear the amenities were helpful throughout your stay and we hope we can see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: The Good: - Location is great. Located where all the hotels are near Disneyland. Restaurants and Starbucks in the same parking lot. Very close to Target and other convenience stores if needed. Location is very ideal for family on a vacation trip. - We had the 2 bedroom 2 bath suite. Rooms are clean and acceptable to my family's standard. Kitchen area is very clean and spacious. Bathroom is clean as well and good size. - Where the value comes in is the complimentary buffet style breakfast! Continental breakfast and beyond! Great if you have a family to feed, just grab a table and see the savings! We were told by the front desk that Monday-Thursday there's also complimentary dinner. This is awesome! - Convenient and accessible electrical outlets for your phone chargers etc. This
Manager Response: Than you so much for taking the time and sharing with us about your visit. We really appreciate the comments and we will ensure we share these with our staff and department heads. We are delighted to hear your stay with us was a pleasant one and we than you for giving us the opportunity of accommodating you. I truly apologize for the Bathroom exhaust and doors in the suite we deeply regret any inconvenience this might of caused. We once again than you for giving the pleasure of serving you, and we look forward to see you again.

Summary: This is our second stay. We will be returning in December 2014 and again in April 2015.  We were here for our Disneyland/DCA vacation and this is the perfect place. Best rates for a suite with a full kitchen, offering free buffet breakfast and managers reception (it's really a dinner).  The front desk staff is awesome!  They are professional and friendly, always ready with a smile. The rooms are clean and comfortable, very roomy. The entire property/grounds are very clean. It's a few minutes drive to Disneyland or you can take the ART shuttle.  They have free wifi.  We usually stop at the Target across the street for our drinks and such. There's a Starbucks,  pizza place, Red Robin and Joe's Crab Shack on the same block and lots of fast food places close by.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing about your visit. We are really happy to hear the amenities and staff was helpful during your stay. I really appreciate the comments and we hope to see you again in the future is your travel bring you our way. Once more thank you for the opportunity of incommoding you for the second time.

Summary Heading: Excellent for families traveling to Disneyland
Summary: This is our "Disneyland" Hotel.  We have stayed here 3 times while visiting the parks.  We love having our own kitchen and being so close to the park as well as local restaurants and Target for the things we forgot.  If you are traveling to the Anaheim area on business this might not be your best choice.  The halls are filled with the sounds of excited children in the morning and cranky tired children in the evening.  The breakfast area is a little crazy and chaotic as families prepared for a day at the park.  We eat our breakfast in our room and we have always been at the park during the managers reception so we have never taken advantage of it.  This trip we did have a couple of bumps.  We arrived at 5:00pm and our room was not ready but the wait was only about 15 minutes.  It
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy schedule to share about your visit with us while in the area. We are delighted to hear your stay was a pleasant one and that the amenities we offer help make your stay comfortable.  I am sorry for the inconvenience at check in, I will make sure to pass this along with my housekeeping to avoid it on the future. I also thank you for the comments I really appreciate it as it my pleasure ensuring everything goes well on your visit. On behalf of my staff we thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and we look forward to see you again in the future if your travels bring you our way.

Summary: I just want to say thank you to the staff at this hotel!  We just returned from another fantastic stay!!  Luis and the rest of the staff go above and beyond to make us feel at home.  I was stressed out when I arrived home and realized my granddaughter had left some of her clothes at the hotel. I called and spoke to Luis who assured me the items were safe and he would mail them to me that day!   I have previously written letters to the Hilton Corporate offices commending the staff and I will be doing so again! Thank you Homewood Suites Garden Grove....you ROCK!!
Manager Response: Hello Becky V.  Thank you for the kind comments regarding Luis and our hotel.  I'm relieved to discover that your missing items have been found and are in route back home, as I understand how frustrating it can be when you leave personal items behind.  We love having you as our guest and YOU ROCK too!  Thank you very much,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: Wonderful hotel. Amazing staff; they were kind, helpful, and great with the kids. We will stay here every time we go to Disneyland.  We love Homewood Suites but this one in particular was great, thanks to the staff and front desk workers.
Manager Response: Hello Mary Beth U.  We appreciate the wonderful comments regarding your recent stay with us.  I'm extremely pleased to read your remarks about the service and your positive interaction with our front desk associates.  We are looking forward to hosting your next magical Disney trip!  Thank you very much,  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: I love this hotel. The staff is friendly, courteous and just great. Never had a problem that wasn't promptly addressed. Luis is usually the person there when I check in and he is very efficient, polite and has the warmest smile to great us every time. The rooms have plenty of space. Never stay any where else.
Manager Response: Hello Joy B.  Thank you very much for the positive comments and am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us.  I especially appreciate the comment about Luis, he is an outstanding representative of our hotel and your recognition means a lot to us.  We are looking forward to seeing you again!  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: We chose this hotel due to the proximity to Disneyland as well as the complimentary breakfast and week night dinner. We were very pleased with both. They had a new item everyday for our meals. The one thing that most stuck out to me was how friendly and helpful the staff was. Rooms were clean and a nice size for our family of four. We will stay here again!
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us while in the area. Thank you for giving us the opportunity of accommodating you, and we are really happy to hear the amenities and staff was able to make your stay a pleasant one. We can‚Äôt wait to see you again if your travels bring you our way.

Summary Heading: Found gross broken toe nail in my hotel bedding
Summary: Other than the disgusting broken toe nail I found in my bedding, parking issues and perhaps a slow elevator all else was fine.  I did enjoy the convenience of a full breakfast and helpful staff that would pick up empty plates when needed.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share with us about your visit. We truly apologize for the inconvenience the elevator might have caused, as well as the cleaning issues you experienced. Please feel free to contact me if there is anything else that you would like to share or if there is anything that I can do for you. Once more thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you.

Summary: Great location for a trip to Disneyland!  We loved having both dinner and breakfast served.  Saved us lots of money!  The pool was a nice break from all the walking.  Very friendly and helpful staff.  We had a big group for 5 nights and had a very positive experience.  Shuttle to the park was very convenient.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for the opportunity of serving you, and we thank you for the feedback as well. I am happy to hear the amenities were helpful while staying with us and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Perfect is the word that best describes my stay at Homewood Suites Anaheim Main gate. I booked this hotel for me, my wife and three children for our vacation to Disneyland. From the second we arrived the hotel was warm and inviting. Dinner was being served and a staff member seeing me check in with my family offered to make us plates of food while we waited. From that point forward I knew this hotel and its staff were different. Not only was the room large enough to accommodate a family of 5 it also provided us a hot breakfast and dinner during out stay. Not having to pay for two meals a day during our 4 night stay saved us an incredible amount of money on an already expensive vacation. Each morning after breakfast we would drive to Disney and park our car as it was cheaper then
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share about your visit. We are delighted to hear your stay was a pleasant one and we thank you for giving us the opportunity of according you. Here at the Homewood suites we try to ensure that all our amenities as well as our staff can provide the best quality possible. We hope our services were up to your expectations and we truly appreciate the feedback. We look forward to see you again if your travels bring you our way.

Summary: The staff at Homewood suites are very helpful and make really good suggestions. The room has a self contained kitchen. The hotel is not too far from Disneyland and California Park. It is very central to a lot of outlets and freeways. Across the main road is a shopping store where you can purchase food items. Next door you have a pizzeria and a couple of restaurants.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear your stay with us was a pleasant one. We thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you, and we look forward to see you again.

Summary: We have stayed here twice.  Nothing fancy, just a good, clean place to stay when going to Disneyland. Our son loves the "living room" and kitchenette.  The shuttle is great and on time.  The free breakfast is nice too. The price is great if you get it at the right time.  We paid less than $100 on a Friday.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay while staying with us. Thank you for sharing with us and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you our way. Once more thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here while on a family emergency trip. We arrived about 5 o'clock in the afternoon and our room was not ready. There were other people waiting also with small children. The front desk staff was courteous and tried to be helpful, but everyone waiting was tired and expected to check in right away. As my husband is a Diamond member, our room was the first one ready while the others, with small children, still waited. This hotel is OK. We have stayed in much better Homewood Suites. It's just a touristy family oriented blah place to stay if you are going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing about your visit with us. We deeply regret any inconvenience the wait at check in might of cause and we truly apologize about that. Please feel free to contact us if there is anything else that you might want to share with us. We thank you for the pleasure of accommodating you and hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Great Home Base for Disneyland Trip
Summary: My family and I had the pleasure of staying at the Homewood Suites in Anaheim for our Disneyland trip in September 2014.    As a family traveler, this hotel was great.  The suites are very accommodating and spacious.  As a note, I would like to mention, that we had one member of our group stay in a room with a King bed while myself and my family stayed in a 2 Queen room.  The person who stayed in the King room told me that their room was significantly smaller than ours, not only the bedroom portion, but also the living area and kitchen.  He said that the refrigerator was much smaller and that they didn't have the stove-top in their room, only a microwave.  So, if you're wanting a larger fridge and cooktop, definitely opt for the 2-Queen room both for space and larger kitchen
Manager Response: Thank  you so much for taking the time to share about your visit to our property. We hope your stay was a pleasant one and you enjoyed our accommodations. We truly appreciate the opportunity of accommodating you and we look forward to see you again if your travels bring you our way.

Summary: Very popular hotel for families.  This hotel is very similar in look and layout to other Homewood Suites. Located centrally and close to Disneyland and many other Anaheim attractions. There is an every day shuttle to DIsneyland from the hotel.  There are 2 elevators in this hotel, one by reception and the other down the hall at the opposite end of the hotel. These are 2 of the slowest elevators I have ever used. Slow Slow Slow !!!!!  Hotel pool and surrounds very appealing. Guest coin operated laundry was very useful half way through 3 week vacation. Free breakfast was usual Homewood standard although it was very busy. Did not attend Managers evening events as we ate at local restaurants in the evening.  Room was clean and tidy and the kitchen appliances and full size
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy schedule to share with us about your visit. We are happy to hear we were able to accommodate you while in the area and we thank you for giving us the chance of serving you. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you our way in the future.

Summary Heading: Worst hotel ever!  Black mold in the bathroom!
Summary: I am not sure why there are good reviews about this hotel because it was horrible!  The room was not only unclean but it was hazardous.  First there was a giant dried booger smudged on the wall, then there was fecal matter (either that or chocolate) on the phone cord of the phone that was in the bathroom (why is there a phone in the bathroom anyway, it's not a hospital) and worst of all there was black mold in the bathroom.  We called the general manager, Darin, who said they would fix all of these things immediately which DID NOT HAPPEN.  The molding was coming off the door and nails where visibly seen, the kitchen cupboards where also loosely attached to the wall and one good yank could have taken them off all together which obviously poses concerns with 3 small children.  My
Manager Response: Hello Matkin23,  We appreciate your comments and I feel terrible that you did not have an excellent experience.  I personally organized a team to correct all housekeeping and maintenance concerns as soon as you allowed us access to the room.  I followed up with our team and left a voice message for you in the room to ensure that everything has been corrected properly.  I'm very sorry if our efforts to resolve the concerns were not satisfactory.  Please contact me at 714-620-2153 when you have the time, we want to make it right.  Sincerely, Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: Excellent in every way:   Smooth checkin/out.  Great breakfast with lots of varied choices.  Evening reception was perfect for our four grandchildren. Didn't cook, but nice to have a refrigerator.  Pool area comfortable and well maintained.   Beds comfy.  Hallways/rooms quiet, even though lots of families.  Bus to Disneyland was easy to access plus prompt.  Staff cheerful, helpful, and positive.  Met lots of nice people - staff and visitors.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Homewood suites staff, I would like to thank you for taking the time to share with us about your visit. We are happy to hear you stay with us was a pleasant one. Here at Homewood we strive to ensure our guest have a memorable time. Once more thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you, and we look forward to see you again in the future.

Summary: I stayed at this Homewood while attending a conference on-site at the Disneyland Hotel.  Just a 3 minute drive to Disneyland and across the street from a Target, it has the perfect location.  Every employee was very friendly.  The guest room was immaculate.  Their morning breakfast was delicious!
Manager Response: Hello Paul C,  Thank you for spending time to comment about your recent stay.  I'm glad that our location, service and amenities met your expectations.  We hope to host another trip for you the next time that you're in the area.    Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: The staff was efficient and friendly. The front desk was fast check in/out and very helpful with additional local information. The accommodations are in good shape and quality despite not being brand new. The continental breakfast is delicious and varied in choices day to day. It is located near a Grocery store and the hotel will delivery any groceries that are order through them directly to your room. The Business room was helpful to print air travel tickets and other business needs.
Manager Response: Hello Blake N,  I'm happy to hear that you were please with your stay.  I love hearing about our staff being friendly and efficient!  Thank you for the wonderful comments and we can't wait to see you again!  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: I have mixed emotions about this hotel.  On one side of the coin, I paid a great price for a very nice suite with great amenities.  The full sized refrigerator, kitchen sink, stove, and microwave were all very nice.  The shower was clean and had high water pressure.  The beds were comfortable.  There was a TV in each room.  I didn't have to fight to find a parking space.  Our request for a pack-n-play was noted in our file as promised.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  The complementary breakfast was great.  Sounds perfect, right?  The problem is, the most important thing a hotel can provide for you is a good night's sleep.  Indeed, it's arguable that that's the only thing that really, truly matters.  In this regard, I had a horrible experience.  At about 2 AM a woman and
Manager Response: Hello Eric,  I appreciate your comments and feel terrible about the noise that you experienced during your stay with us.  We're currently researching the reason why your room phone did not work as well as the front desk associate not being available at that time.  We are here to be certain that you have a memorable stay and a good night's rest, and we don't expect you to pay if that did not happen.  Can you please contact me at 714-620-2153 so that we can make it right.  Sincerely,  Darin Fournier General Manager

Summary Heading: Book it! You cant go wrong with this place
Summary: My family took a trip just this past few days Tues 9-16 to Saturday 9-20 for my 2 year old son's first trip to Disneyland. In a nutshell this place isn't the newest place on the block but the warm, welcoming service we received will make this the only place we will stay when we take our future trips to Disney as our little boy grows up.   If you want to hear the full review  please read on...We like to stay at the Homewood suites because of their family friendly environment and kitchen in the suites.  We had originally booked different days but had a change so I called hotel directly to make the change and the gentleman I spoke with was beyond patient with me in changing my reservation. When i changed the reservation the rate also changed because we were changing one night on
Manager Response: Hello Jensavino,  We truly appreciate the fantastic comments about your recent stay, thank you very much for sharing!  I especially love the comment about "making your stay magical", which is touching and makes me very proud.  We can't wait to host your trips in the future!  Sincerely, Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: My family recently stayed here for 4 nights. It was great. We went with 3 families and had 3 rooms. We were on the second floor so we did not have to wait for the elevators. We never heard any noise from the corridor. The breakfasts and dinners were good and really helped our vacation budget. The people at the front desk were always friendly and willing to help. The shuttle was great. We normally stay within walking distance and I was worried about wasting time waiting for the shuttle but everything was timed very well. We stayed during a fluke heat wave, it was over 100 degrees each day in Sept. and our time in the park was rough...a lot of the staff at Disneyland seemed disgruntled (and newly hired) but the staff at Homewood Suites made up for it! After a long, HOT day at the
Manager Response: Hello Payson,  Thank you very much for the wonderful comments!  We did have a hot week and I'm sorry to hear that you felt that the Disney staff was affected by the heat.  I'm extremely pleased to hear that our team made up for it and we're looking forward to hosting another trip for you, hopefully a cooler one next time.  Sincerely, Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: My 6 year old daughter and I spent two nights here hanging out at the hotel doing arts in crafts, never needing to leave the room, it was exactly what she wanted and it was awesome.  Next time I'll remember to bring our own meals (except breakfast).  :)
Manager Response: We are happy to hear your visit with us was a great one. We appreciate the opportunity of letting us accommodate you and we hope to see you again in the future if your travels bring you our way. On behalf of the Homewood suites staff I thank you for your time to share with us about your experience.

Summary Heading: Great Small Suite - Perfect for visit to Anaheim area!
Summary: We were extremely pleased with our stay! We were warmly greeted by the staff who went above and beyond to make use feel welcomed. Extremely positive folks who helped with all our requests. The room was a little smaller than I had expected for a 2-queen suite. We were a family of 6 with 3 adults and 3 kids, it was quite congested when the sofa bed was open.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your schedule to share with us about your visit while in the Garden Grove area. We truly appreciate the pleasure of letting us accommodate you and we are happy to hear your stay with us was a pleasant one. I deeply regret any inconvenience the room might have caused during your stay, and please feel free to contact me if there is anything else that you would like to share about your trip. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you our way.

Summary: This hotel is great at making me feel at home.  My family has stayed here several times in the last few years, and it shows every time.  I am actually greeted by name when I walk in.  The breakfast is OK, nothing special.  They always have waffles, but sometimes their hot food is somewhat lacking.  We love the separate living room, and there is always plenty of parking if you are willing to walk a little.  The shuttle to Disneyland was always on time and never over full.  We are actually toying with the idea of going back next weekend.
Manager Response: Dear Gareth,  Thank you for sharing with us about your visit with us. We truly appreciate the opportunity of accommodating you during your travels. Here at the Homewood suites we strive on making our guest feel at home and I hope we are able to make this happen for you every time. We are happy to hear you are coming back and please feel free to contact us if there is anything we can do to help. On behalf of the Homewood suites I thank you for the time and we look forward to see you soon.

Summary: What a great staff...anything that needed to be attended to was dealt with promptly.Nice comfortable beds,with nice room layout in the 700 sq ft.room Kitchen was nicely equipped and a nice sized  fridge  .Breakfast options were delightful....Mon to Thurs supper meals were delicious.Shuttles were convenient and on time for Disneyland
Manager Response: We are happy to hear your stay with us was an enjoyable one. We thank you for sharing about your visit and we are glad to know our amenities were helpful during your visit. We appreciate you taking the time to share with us. On behalf of the Homewood suites staff I thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you.

Summary: The staff at this hotel is excellent!  They couldn't have been more helpful in making our vacation first rate.  I have stayed on the property of Disney before but for the value I would absolutely recommend staying at this location.  The shuttle was so easy and convenient to use.  The breakfast and nightly manager reception were excellent and the food was really good.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to share with us about your visit. We appreciate the opportunity of accommodating you and we are so happy to hear we could make your vacation a comfortable one. On behalf of the staff here at Homewood I thank you for sharing and I will definitely make sure to share this with my co-workers. Once more, thank you for giving us the pleasure of serving you and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you our way.

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights on the sixth floor with our kids, ages 8 and 6.  I am impressed with how much food was available for both the dinner and breakfast buffet.  All staff was warm and pleasant, introducing themselves at the meal and asking if we needed anything.  The hotel was teeming with families, as this was August, so I was impressed at how clean they could keep the property, in between the meals.  The shared bathrooms in the lobby/pool were also kept very clean. We spent each afternoon in the pool, which was a good size for kids to play in.  The room was spacious, we used the shuttle to Disneyland (unlimited daily rides $5/adult, $2/child), and appreciated the full kitchen in the suite. Great value, great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share about your visit while in the area. We are delighted to hear that the amenities were helpful during your vacation and we appreciate the opportunity of serving you. Once more thank you for sharing about your vacation and we hope to see you again if your travels bring you our way.

Summary: We stayed 8/25-8/27 2014 in room 501.  The Good: It was fairly close to Disneyland.  The suite was big enough to hold my family of 7 at a good rate.  Breakfast and Dinner are included Mon-Thur.  The food was pretty good, buffet style, better than going to fast food.  Had a kitchenette to be able to make own meals (big Target across the street to get food).  The Bad: Slow elevators.  The TV in the bedroom didn't work, called front desk, said they were going to send maintenance up, they never showed up.  The next day I informed the desk, the TV was then swapped out.  The microwave in my room didn't work, never got fixed properly.  There was signs of deferred maintenance, peeling wallpaper and loose base mold tiles in the bathroom.  Lamp shades with holes in them.  Speed dial
Manager Response: Thank you for providing such great feedback! However, I would like to take this time to apologize on behalf of the entire staff for such a poorly conditioned suite. We are in the process of preventative maintenance which will resolve all of the issues you brought up, but the fact that you brought an issue to our attention and no one arrived the first time is very troubling. I cannot apologize enough for that incident. I do hope that these issues did not taint your stay with us too much, but upon further review of your feedback, I want to thank you for joining us during our Suite Start Breakfast and our Manager's Evening Reception! Thank you again for your patronage and your future recommendations!

Summary: Every aspect of my stay was excellent. Full Breakfast and supper included. Breakfast had pretty much everything you can imagine. Lots to munch on. Waffles are yummy!!!!! Excellent car service, Hugo and Marcus rock!!!  Very friendly and helpful staff. Room was outstanding, very clean and roomy. Would recommend 100% :) Home to Homewood!!!!!!
Manager Response: Cannot thank you enough for such a wonderful review! I completely agree, the waffles are yummy! And the drivers we usually call, Hugo, is also a great asset to our hotel! Glad that you found our suites to be accommodating and refreshingly clean! We cannot wait to welcome you home again soon!

Summary: Stayed there August 15-19 room 106. First walked in room all doors on every cabinet open, all trash cans on table tops. Couch cushions stacked up. Front desk clerk was very good and made it right. At night when we got back from the parks the staff would go in and out of the maids room every few minutes all night long and let the door slam everytime. I put a sign on the door that stayed for a few hours. The door slammed so hard it rattled our door so I ended up sticking a pot holder in the door and the rattle stopped. Then every night around 11 until 3 people would walk through the halls hollering and talking very loud. Very rude to others. Having stayed there many times even back when the parking was free I now have a bad feeling towards this hotel. It has become like a motel 6
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share about your visit while in the Garden Grove area. I am very sorry to hear the issues with the noise while on your vacation. I deeply regret the incontinence with the housekeeping department. We will ensure to utilize your comments to avoid this in the future. If there is anything that I could for you please feel free to contact me. Once I sincerely apologize about the experience during your stay, and I hope to be able to help in some way.

Summary Heading: Not as good as they use to be
Summary: I have stayed here many times in the last 13 years.  I am not going back the staff is horribly rude.  the management does not control abnoxious guests and their children.  The complimentary breakfast is horrible cold and awful tasting and they keep the area too messy oh and at exactly 9:30 whether you are in line or not the cold /hot food is removed reguardless
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to share about your experience with us while in the area. We sincerely apologize about the inconvenience you encounter during our breakfast. We deeply regret the costumer service you experienced and we hope to have the chance of recovering from this. Feel free to contact me if the is anything that I can do for you as I will be more than happy to help. Once more thank you for your time and loyalty after all these years.

Summary: We couldn't have found a better value!  Luis at the front desk is the best!  He was very accommodating and let us preview a few of the rooms before making a choice.  We picked one on the first floor with a view of the pool, and got a cheerful sunny room, and avoided the very slooww elevators.
