The pool was bigger than it seems in the photo and was no deeper than 5 ft, and there is also a hot tub and kiddie pool.  It closed at 10pm so there were no issues with noise at night.  We took advantage of breakfast which was pretty good - no "hotel eggs" like what I was served at Embassy Suites LAX a couple weeks earlier, and they mixed things up to give some variety from one day to the next.  We didn't think we would end up taking advantage of the free dinner, but we did and it wasn't
Manager Response: Hello Jennifer, thank you very much for the wonderful comments regarding your recent stay, I'm very please to hear that you had a pleasant trip.  Luis has been a wonderful asset and I'll be sure to share your comments with him as well as our Kitchen Team. However,  I do apologize for the laundry equipment and please be assured that we're in the process of replacing the machines to avoid issues in the future.  We're looking forward to seeing you again!  Darin Fournier / General Manager

Summary: Mold and hair in bathroom. Pillows had other people hair and eyelashes in them. Floor in Kitchenette area was sticky. Crumbs all over the sofa. Breakfast ends at 9am and parking is not free. Dirty and disgusting. Do yourself a favor and Skip this place!
Manager Response: Hello Wendy,  Thank you for your comments, I feel terrible that you left with a less than perfect impression of our hotel.  Our housekeeping department strives for clean and comfortable accommodations for every guest and I apologize for letting you down.  We will use your feedback to improve our performance.  Darin Fournier, General Manager

Summary: Great hotel. The room was big and roomy. Bed were comfy. Bonus was the HUGE breakfast in the morning. This helped a lot not having to get breakfast every day. Waffles, biscuits and gravy, cereal, toast, eggs, oatmeal..everything!   We had a one room suite and it was perfect. We could even cook dinner in the room if we wanted. A good cost saver for anyone going to disneyland. The food in the park is expensive!   Its not walking distance, but they have a shuttle that is cheaper than parking at disneyland!  Would stay here again on any disney trip.
Manager Response: Hello Lindsay,   Thank you very much for the wonderful comments.  We're pleased to hear that you enjoyed your trip as well as the hotel and breakfast.  We're looking forward to hosting your next Disney vacation!  Darin Fournier, General Manager

Summary: the hotel is in a good location, close to Disneyland resorts and a good gateway to visit southern california.  It however needs a refresh as the furniture and bath tub are old and it shows.   The breakfast, pool and hot tub are great. Other amenities and the staff are great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your patronage and for choosing to stay with us! Glad to read that your recent stay with us was a great one! Also happy to read that you were able to join us during our Suite Start Breakfast and for using our pool area. I do understand your concerns with some of our accommodations looking dated, however, I assure you that your feedback is valuable and will be delivered to the appropriate personnel. Thank you again for your feedback and your patronage!

Summary: Grandkids watched Disney fireworks from the window each night. Hotel is clean. Breakfast is good with a great assortment to choose from. Hotel shuttle will take the group to Disney and pick you up for $17, which is well worth the money and cheaper and closer than parking at Disney.  The only complaint is the elevator is so slow! They only have one elevator to the 7th floor.  Numerous places to eat within a block and better yet..a Starbucks across the street!
Manager Response: Extremely happy that your grandchildren were able to watch the Disneyland fireworks from the suite! Also, thank you for joining us during our Suite Start Breakfast and for putting good use to our Disney Shuttle. Although there is a nominal fee to board it, it is quite convenient for guests who choose not to park their own vehicles at the park, and to relieve oneself from driving in general. Thank you again for the great feedback, and we look forward to welcoming you home again soon!

Summary Heading: Good value and location to Disneyland
Summary: Hotel meets all your needs for a family trip to Disneyland.  The rooms aren't terribly spacious, but the beds are comfortable and they have everything you need.  The furniture in the bedrooms don't fit the rooms quite right, so in a 2 queen bed, the tv is all the way across the room from one of the beds.  However, if you are high enough in the building, you have a great view of the Disney fireworks if you are already back from the park by then.
Manager Response: Glad to read that the hotel was of good value and provided great location to your family visiting the Disneyland area. However, I do understand your concerns in regards to the accommodations in our suites, but it seems like it did not hinder your stay too much. Again, thank you for your patronage and for choosing to stay with us!

Summary: Staff was excellent, from the front desk to the housekeeping staff, to the dining services. Food was very good, and considering that dinner is included 4 nights per week (in addition to a full breakfast 7 days per week), it is a very good value overall. It is one mile from Disney, and they have a shuttle that they share with Marriott next door--it worked well and was on time. We were able to see the Disney fireworks from our room (6th floor, facing the direction of the park), which was an unexpected bonus! The beds were extremely comfortable and the room was quiet. My son loved the pool. It is within walking distance (less than a block) from a Target and a Walgreens for anything you might need. The only downside was that there were some aspects of the room that needed updating
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for the future loyalty. From what I have read, it sounds like your recent stay with us was a great one! From our Suite Start Breakfast to our Manager's Evening Reception, and even to the unexpected surprise of the view of fireworks from your suite, I am glad that you and your family enjoyed the stay and we cannot wait to welcome you back home again soon!

Summary: We were very surprised by our stay.   The room was bigger than expected but this was not the biggest surprise  The meals (breakfast everyday and dinner Monday thru Thursday) were better than any complimentary meals we have ever had  The service was top notch and the staff was quick to answer any questions we might have had  It would be a 5 star review if not for a couple minor issues with the ice maker and our toilet   We will be back.
Manager Response: I am happy to read that your recent stay with us exceeded your expectations. However, I do want to apologize for the maintenance of our ice machines. Please know that I have brought this to the attention of my Chief of Maintenance and he has resolved the issues and they are operating up to par. Also, I want to thank you for taking the time to join us for our Suite Start Breakfast and our Manager's Evening Reception. Thank you again for your patronage!

Summary: This hotel was very clean, the staff was very friendly and professional they made us field like we were at home, breakfast was delicious and the room was cozy, the location was ideal for our vacations, we want to thank everyone in this hotel for making our vacations unforgetable
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us! After reading your feedback, I am glad to know we were able to accommodate you and your family very well! We do our best in providing the best service to all of our guests. Whenever you're in town again, please stop by and say Hi!

Summary: Previous Homewood Suites experiences have been beyond wonderful but the Anaheim location is subpar. Felt more like a transient hotel. The room was appropriately cleaned and kept but I couldn't shake the feeling of low end accommodations. Staff helpfullness is hit or miss. Disney shuttle IS NOT FREE! Found that out the hard way. Too little parking but the location and proximity to Disney was fine - to far to walk it but close enough to feel the magic.
Manager Response: I am very sorry that the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim/Maingate Area was subpar to the previous Homewood Suites by Hilton that you have stayed at. Also, the helpfulness of our staff is usually great, however, from your feedback, it looks as if we may have dropped the ball in some areas. For our Disney shuttle, there is a nominal fee to board it, which you are already aware of now, but after reading your feedback, the communication of this nominal fee was not delivered correctly. I cannot empathize with you enough on how inconvenient your stay was, and I can only hope that you will stay with us again so that we can make it right.

Summary: We checked into the hotel with a reservation for a Two Queen Bed, One Bedroom Larger Suite paying extra for larger. When we arrived in the room the living room area was extremely small. We were traveling with two teenage grandchildren and needed to use the sofa bed. When we pulled it out you could not even walk around it. We asked the front desk if we were given the correct room and they said it was indeed the correct room. The next issue was towels. We had to call and ask for towels and washcloths our entire stay. The first day we had 2 towels no washcloths in a room that would sleep 6. We called for more but again the next day only 2 towels and 2 washcloths and all 3 beds had been slept in. The breakfast area was awful, never enough room to sit and tables never seemed to be
Manager Response: I cannot empathize with you enough on this entire situation. I want to apologize for such an inconvenient stay with us! From the room type to the shuttle information, it looks like there was lots of confusion. The reason the Guest Service Agent wanted to double check your suite number was due to the fact that some guests purchase packages with us that include shuttle tickets, however, I do apologize if it seem a bit unsuspecting. In regards to your room type, it looks as though we may have dropped the ball, but if you do have the time, please contact myself via email at Ben.Ly2@hilton.com or by telephone (714)740-1800 so we can further discuss what I can do for you. Again, my apologies for any inconvenience, and I look forward to  hearing from you.

Summary: Unfortunately I do not share the great comments posted. The week we were there the sixth floor had a leak and large fans blew all night long in the halls to dry carpet and peeling wallpaper. The two bedroom suite was worn out with saggy furniture and ripped drapes in every room. The bathroom vents were covered with thick dust. My first bath I began to dry off only to realize I was drying with a dirty used towel that had been folded and left on the clean towel shelf. That required me to take another shower and hope the second towel was clean.The elevators were slow and the wait was long. Inside the elevators were hot as were the interior hallways. But, earlier in the week the elevators weren't working and people were climbing stairs to the 6th floor, so we got lucky better slow
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, as it is extremely valuable to us! You have outlined many areas of the hotel that need major renovations such as the elevators, and our suites. I can completely empathize with you, given the sprinkler leakage that occurred while you were here. I want to express my sincere apologies for such an inconvenient stay. I cannot express how discomforting it is to read how horrible your stay was, and if there is anything that we can do for you, please do not hesitate to contact us at your convenience.

Summary: This hotel was wonderful from the front desk staff to the breakfast. The rooms are spacious and very clean. The kitchenette is wonderful and just enough to do whats needed when traveling.  We loved the location, the transportation to and from Disneyland was quick and easy. We also loved that Outback, Red Robin and Joe's Crab Shack are 1 minute walking distance. All and all it was a BLAST and we will return again and again.
Manager Response: I am extremely happy to read that you recent stay with us was a "BLAST". Also, thank you for taking the time to recognize our wonderful staff here, we all strive to provide great service to all of our guests. Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us and we cannot wait to welcome you back!

Summary Heading: Good for families, not good for business travel.
Summary: When I booked this trip for business, I was a little skeptical due to location and proximity to the office I needed to visit, and the very attractive negotiated rate.  The facility is large, has a pool which looked clean and offered buffet meals that were included in the price.  Since the facility was packed with families on vacation, it was very "active" (polite way of saying loud) from early am until late in the evening.  This is fine for me, but just making a note.  My main complaint is, and can't blame the hotel for this, it's not business friendly.  Also, the elevators were VERY SLOW.  Something to keep in mind, stay on a lower floor if you can.    Otherwise, it was clean and the rooms were fine.  If would go back on a family trip, you can't beat the value, but I would not
Manager Response: I completely agree with your feedback, given it is the summer time in the Anaheim area. We do our best to accommodate our business travelers, but with so many leisure traveling guests, I can see why it is a bit of a concern while traveling for work. However, I am glad to read that your suite was up to your standards, and as you said, if you are planning on a family trip soon, please consider staying with us, as you and your family will always be welcome here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim-Maingate Area!

Summary: This hotel was the perfect place for my daughter's basketball team. Pros: 1) The service was consistently friendly and pleasant for the 8 days we spent there and 2) the breakfasts  (included in price) and dinners M-Th were plentiful, tasty and varied. Perfect for hungry athletes! 3) suites were a good size for the 2 of us and would have worked well for a family of 4. The cons are the following: 1) there is one very slow elevator (we called it "old Bessie") to all the floors at the main access point near the reception when you come in. During busy mornings or evenings it can be a long wait and my daughter and I frequently chose to take the stairs up and down the 6 flights when we were in a hurry. That would not be practical with very young kids, people with mobility concerns or
Manager Response: First off, I want to thank you for taking the time to provide such valuable feedback! I am glad that our service, Suite Start Breakfast, and our suites were great during your stay. However, I do want to apologize for the speed of our elevators and our Guest Laundry Facilities. I understand with the size of our hotel, we should have better washers and dryers, so please know that we are actually in the process of purchasing new washers and dryers to better equip our laundry facility. Once again, thank you for your feedback, and we cannot wait to welcome you home again real soon!

Summary: We stayed here for 7 nights in July. 3 adults and 2 kids we had the large one bedroom suite. It was plenty big enough for us. This place is well run and is such good value that it must be at full occupancy more often than not. The complimentary breakfasts and dinners allowed us to relax and enjoy the hotel - most nights we had dinner by the pool and our 9 year old son provided us with room service breakfast every morning. The shuttle to Disneyland is brilliant - it leaves at least every 30 mins. Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Sounds like your recent stay with us was a great one! Glad to read that you and your family were able to join us for our Suite Start Breakfast each morning via your son, a personal room service attendant! Also, I am happy that your family was able to join us pool side for dinner! Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we cannot wait to welcome you home again!

Summary: This hotel was an excellent choice.  The staff and managers were accommodating and friendly.  The Breakfast and Light Supper were all very well presented and tasteful.   This hotel was far better than a competitor located just blocks away were we stayed 6 months before
Manager Response: I am extremely happy to read that the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim-Maingate Area was an excellent choice for your recent stay in the area! Also, I am glad to read that our Suite Start Breakfast and our Manager's Evening Reception was great as well! I understand when planning a stay in the Anaheim area, you have many hotels to choose from, I just want to say thank you for choosing to stay with us and I do appreciate your patronage!

Summary: The hotel itself was ok. big concern was the laundry option. of the 3 machinces, only 1 worked. multiple basketball & baseball teams in hotel. very long lineups to wait for machine if wanting it. one machine had been broke over a week and no call out for a repair guy. Comp meals were ok at hotel. Elevators slow but ok if you like waiting or take the stairs
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear that you had just an "Ok" stay with us. I want to express my sincere apologies for the lack of operation from 2 of our 3 washers. We did contact a technician to come and service the washers, however, the time frame that was provided was unacceptable by our standards, so we contacted a new service company, and now we are in the process of purchasing brand new washers. Your feedback is greatly appreciated, and again, my apologies for such an inconvenience.

Summary Heading: Simply perfect for family Disneyland vacation stay
Summary: We booked an eight night stay for a family of five for our Disneyland Resort vacation.  It was our first time at this hotel and we will positively return again.  The room was nicely updated and was very clean!  We had a suite with two queen beds, pull-out sofa, and a kitchenette with extra goodies included.  The beds were comfortable with extra down pillows.  The shower was great also after long days and nights spent at the park; it had great water pressure and temperature.  Our first day we had an issue with the refrigerator not working well which we reported to the guest services in the morning and by the time we arrived back in the afternoon it had be replaced with a new one.  The hotel's staff were all very friendly and quick to handle any requests such as late night blanket
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us! Your loyalty and patronage are much appreciated! From what I have read, it sounds like your recent stay was a great one! I am glad you were able to join us for our Suite Start Breakfast and boarding our Disneyland shuttle. I hope that if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, you will consider staying with us again!

Summary: We would definitely stay at Homewood Suites again. Everyone we encountered was friendly and helpful. We loved the suite big enough and affordable enough to accommodate our family of 6. The breakfasts were delicious and filling. The shuttle to Disneyland was a BONUS!
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive feedback and for the future loyalty! I cannot express enough how much your feedback means to the hotel! Cannot wait to welcome you back as our guests!

Summary: I stayed at Homewood Suites with my family and was impressed by the great service provided to customers. The staff is friendly and professional and will try their best to accommodate the guests' demands and requests. The furnished rooms are what I expected. Nothing out of the ordinary, but they have a fridge, microwave and dishwasher. You could also wash your clothes in an area common to all guests. The beds are very comfortable with little noise at night (usually comes from people conversing in the parking lot). There is constant security with police officers scouting the parking lot. Parking space is always available. Although not of the highest quality, both breakfast and dinner are offered to the customers. Daily room cleaning service is also performed. The place is usually
Manager Response: Thank you for the great comments and for choosing to stay with us! We are glad that you took the time to recognize how our staff made your recent stay an enjoyable one! As always, whenever you're in town again, please choose to stay with us!

Summary: This hotel had friendly staff, great free breakfasts and dinners. A comfortable shuttle every half hour that went over and back to Disneyland. Better than the ART buses.  The rooms were clean and the only problem was with the thermostat in the room not working right. We had to keep turning it on/off to regulate the temperature.  A nice couch in the living area, kitchen, and comfortable beds and two TVs.  We would come back again.
Manager Response: Glad to read that your recent stay with us was a great one! From our Suite Start Breakfast to our Manager's Evening Reception, I am glad that you were able to join us during these times. Also, I am happy that our Disneyland Shuttle was able to accomodate you comfortably. We would be more than happy to have you back as our guests in the future!

Summary: The dinner was more than we expected.  The next morning we came down for breakfast only to find another excellent meal. The staff were all excellent.  Couldn't ask for better.  Room was comfortable and look brand new.  Location was perfect as it was close to everything we wanted to visit.  Would stay here again if our travels bring us this way in the future.
Manager Response: From what I have read, it sounds like your recent stay with us was an enjoyable one! Thank you for joining us during our Suite Start Breakfast, and I am glad to read that our Manager's Evening Reception was more than what you expected. Surprises are always great, and if your travels do happen to bring you our way again, please choose to stay with us!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel June 30-July 6th. We found the staff extremely friendly and accomodating. The room was clean and well appointed. There was a sitting room with a hide-a-bed where my son slept and a seperate bedroom for my wife and me. The room had a full kitchen (Full size fridge, microwave, cooktop, dishwasher, dishes and cutlery) which we found quite handy. The hotel provides a full breakfast buffet with lots of variety, but it can get hectic if you don't get there early. The staff do a great job of cleaning tables and refilling the buffet. The only minor problem we had was that the hotel only has two elevators so the wait for one can be long.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great feedback and for choosing to stay with us. Your patronage is much appreciated! Also, thank you for joining us during our Suite Start Breakfast, which I know is a little hectic in the morning, but I am glad you were able to join us. For the elevators, I can completely empathize with you on the speed of our elevators, however, I hope that it did not deter your stay too much. As always, we were happy to have you as our guests, and we hope that you will stay with us again real soon!

Summary: Our family of six stayed in a suite with two double beds and a sofa bed in the living room.  Plenty of room!  Reasonable prices.  Awesome breakfast buffet.  They even have a complimentary light dinner with wine.  Very friendly staff and a convenient hotel shuttle to the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us! We do appreciate your patronage! Also, thank you for joining us during our Suite Start Breakfast and our Manager's Evening Reception. I am also glad to read that our suites were spacious enough for your family of six. If you plan on visiting the Anaheim area again, please do consider staying with us again!

Summary: Stayed a week when we were there for a bowling tournament in Lakewood. Staff was friendly and rooms were spacious and clean. The breakfast provided a wide variety so it had something for everyone in our group. The only downside was the very slow elevator, but we were able to overlook that. Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us during your Bowling tournament! Hope all went well with the tournament and I am glad to read that your recent stay was a great one! Our Suite Start Breakfast is a great amenity to many guests and for all of the options provided, how could one not enjoy it? Also, I do want to apologize for the speed of our elevators, I can completely empathize with you on that fact, but I am glad that it did not hinder your stay at all. As always, we cannot wait to welcome you home again soon!

Summary Heading: First Stay at Homewood Suites - Impressed
Summary: Very nice hotel.  The room was very spacious with a living area separate from the bed/bath area with a TV in both rooms.  The kitchen area had a microwave, fridge/freezer and cooktop with dishes, utensils and fresh linens supplied.  A big benefit to us was the free hot breakfast served daily and the free dinner served M-Th.  The shuttle to Disneyland was also very convenient.  We did have a problem on our last day's stay where upon waking in the morning we realized that the toilet was stopped up.  A call was made to housekeeping and 30 minutes later no one had arrived.  Another call was made and the lady commented that the plumber hadn't come in yet.  There were restrooms in the lobby, so we had to go downstairs and use those.  We headed off to Disneyland hoping that the problem
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and for choosing to stay with us! I do want to apologize for the inconvenience of having to leave your suite to use the restroom in our lobby. However, I am glad that we were able to resolve the situation and leave you satisfied. We always feel the need to make it right by our guests. Again, thank you for staying with us!

Summary: This hotel's carpet and furnishings in the lobby, breakfast area, and halls were beyond filthy; when was the last time they were shampooed!? I arrived at night when things were very calm and quiet and upon walking in my immediate first impression was this floor needs to be vaccummed at least. The rooms are tiny, which I guess you get what you pay for, but the drapes were torn in multiple areas and the bathroom toilet and tub were not cleaned. My family had two rooms and the complaints in both were the same. I have stayed at Hilton Homewood Suites multiple times, this by far was the most disappointing stay. I had to switch rooms twice on the night that I arrived; the first switch was because the door knob fell off from the inside, and the second was because the floor in the
Manager Response: I cannot express enough my sincere apologies for such an inconvenient stay. The cleanliness of our public area carpets is a much needed area of restoration, which is evident in your feedback. Thank you for taking the time to provide this feedback and if you have any further questions or concerns, please feel free to contact myself or the General Manager, Darin Fournier (Darin.Fournier@hilton.com).

Summary Heading: Good size suites close to Disneyland
Summary: Nice hotel, furniture are not modern but big suites with bedroom, living room and kitchen area (microwave, fridge freezer and cooker), perfect with small children. Nice heated pool and small jacuzzi. Breakfast included, not the best but ok ( you can make your own waffle) 5 min drive to Disney car park (there a free Disney bus to take from car park to attraction parc) There is a small supermarket in front of the hotel and some take aways around
Manager Response: I am glad to read that you enjoyed your recent stay with us! Being so close to Disneyland, we feel that we do our best when catering to families traveling to this area. Also, I'm glad to hear that you were able to join us for our Suite Start Breakfast in the mornings. Whenever you're in town again, please choose to stay with us again!

Summary: Stayed here for 10 days and the place was great until the last couple of days when the elevator broke down.  Made checking out very difficult.  Free Breakfast/Dinner M-Thurs was well worth the price of the hotel for a family of 4.  Dinner was ok, don't expect steak and shrimp, just basic spaghetti and meat balls/hot dogs  etc.   Staff were friendly and helpful.  I would definitely  stay here again or another homewood suites for my future hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and I am glad to hear you enjoyed your recent stay! I would like to apologize for the elevator situation, it seems some maintenance was required. However, I do want to thank you for joining us during our Suite Start Breakfast and our Manager's Evening Reception. Next time you plan on visiting the Disney area, please choose to stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Wonderful experience had by this family of 6
Summary: My wife and 4 children, ages 5 months to 10 years, all had a wonderful stay at the Homewood Suites. We would comeback again in a heartbeat.  The location is not very far from Disneyland at all, and I thought we might have some problems checking in at 12:30 or 1am after the park closed. Checking in literally took about 60 seconds if that.   Our room was great and the kids all slept comfortably as did my wife and I. The next morning everyone enjoyed the breakfast. The scrambled eggs could be improved a bit, but literally that was our only thought or complaint.   Everyone loved the make it yourself waffles, even if you did have to wait a few minutes to do it. Hot and fresh.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us! We know in the Disneyland area, there are many hotels to choose from, so we are very appreciative for the fact that you chose to stay with us, and from what I have read, sounds like you and your family will be back again! Also, glad to read that you and your family were able to join us for our Suite Start Breakfast in the mornings. However, I do want to apologize for the wait on the waffles, but after enjoying a waffle, I'm sure you can see why everyone lines up for one! We cannot wait to welcome you back as our guests again!

Summary Heading: Great staff, okay room, but good price.
Summary: We had some problems in our room, the kitchen sink and the AC, that never really got fixed.  The room was smaller than expected but was very clean and orderly.  The breakfast and dinner is nice to not have to worry about food expenses for those meals.  We didn't use the dinner every night, but it was a nice option.  The shuttle to and from Disney is greatly timed and the staff here is fantastic.  We are still put off by the things not being fixed though.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us! I am sorry to hear that some of the maintenance issues that occurred during your stay was an inconvenience. I can completely empathize with you on that fact and I am sorry we dropped the ball on that. However, I am happy to read that you were able to join us during our Suite Start Breakfast and our Manager's Evening Reception. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact myself or the General Manager (Darin.Fournier@hilton.com). Again, my apologies for the inconveniences we caused and we hope to welcome you as our guests again soon!

Summary: I have only good things to say,  we stayed there for a week and it was a wonderful experience.  Any request we had was taken care of immediately.  We will definitely stay there on our following vacation. I strongly recommend it.
Manager Response: I am extremely happy to read that you had an awesome stay with us! We were happy to accomodate you in all of your requests and we thank you for your patronage. We can't wait to welcome you home again soon!

Summary Heading: Very good hotel but problems with water
Summary: The water was shut off from 3pm to 7pm on a weekday.  We were told it was necessary to shut off the water to test the entire water system for the hotel. Ok. But I think this maybe should have been done from say midnight to 4am instead of the middle of the afternoon.  I had been doing dishes in the dishwasher and it stopped.  Well the water came back on but another problem occurred.  The boilers did not work.  No hot water for most of the next day.  I had to take a cold shower to attend my national conference at the convention center.  When i asked when the hot water would be available the answer was that nobody knew for certain.  We were told to just give it some time. I have stayed at hundreds of Hilton hotels and not once were the guests without water or hot water for any
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback of your recent stay! We do appreciate you choosing to stay with us. I want to take this time to apologize about the entire water situation and how it was dealt with. Unfortunately, the time slot was mandated by the city, but I completely agree with you on the fact that it should have been done late at night. As a loyal guest, we should have compensated you for your stay in some way, be it monetary or complimentary services, however, I can see that nothing was done. Please feel free to contact myself or the General Manager (Darin.Fournier@hilton.com), so we can discuss what we can do to make this right by you. Again, I want to express my sincere apologies for the inconvenience and we look forward to your reply.

Summary: Overall, we were very pleased with our stay.  The breakfast had great variety.  We really enjoyed the pool.  When we had concerns the staff was friendly and prompt in their responses.  The beds were comfortable, and our price was great.  Our suite was made to sleep 6 and their were only dishes for four, but I think a request would get you more if they were needed.  You could see signs of cleaning needed, but that is understandable when a hotel caters to families with children, which is great for us - since we want to all stay in the same suite.  Things weren't perfect, but we had a great time and would be glad to choose this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great feedback on your recent stay with us! It sounds like you and your family enjoyed yourselves while you were here with us at the Homewood Suites! Also, thank you for joining us during our Suite Start Breakfast. If your plans ever bring you and your family to the Anaheim Area again, please choose to stay with us, we would love to have you as our guests again!

Summary: Great stay for a week in Disney for families. Business travellers may wish to opt for a less kid friendly hotel. However, you are in the Disney area so expect kids. We brought three and had a great time.   Shuttle service was very good. Complimentary breakfasts were great. It was busy but never seemed frantic.   Elevator is really slow so we did the stairs quite a bit. We were on the sixth floor and after long Disney days it was sometimes a challenge.   Hide-a-bed in our room was broken. I got an air mattress at the nearby Target and all was well.   Overall enjoyed the hotel.
Manager Response: Glad to read that your recent stay with us was a great one! I am also happy to read that you were able to utilize the shuttle for Disneyland and join us for our Suite Start Breakfast every morning. However, I do want to apologize for the pull-out bed in the livingroom, but I am glad that did not taint your stay with us. Next time you plan on visiting Disneyland, please keep us in mind. Thank you again for your patronage!

Summary: Several facts to know for non-Disney guests.   There is no shuttle from the hotel for guests that are not going to Disney. I was attending a conference at the Anaheim Convention Center that is within a mile, or so. Disney main gate is about another one-half mile further north.  Not sure about everyone else, but I am not particularly thrilled with ALL of the staff ALWAYS speaking only Spanish to each other. It is just not courtious.   Housekeeping allows their workers to determine whether your bed linens are soiled enough to change them. There is no "green policy" published anywhere and management was unaware of this. Am I to feel proud that I left my bed clean enough that after two nights, my bed linens had not been changed? (I left a folded piece of paper in between the top
Manager Response: From what I have read, it seems like we have dropped the ball on more than just one occassion. I apologize for the inconveniences we have caused you during your recent stay with us. I remember speaking with you in regards to the linen and the routine in which we change them. I want to let you know that this specific situation will be brought up to our management staff so we can configure how we would like to notify guests of this issue. Again, my sincere apologies for the inconveniences, and thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel for families but we did experience a few problems.
Summary: We enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The room was clean and the beds were comfortable. I did find the pillows too soft for my liking though. It was quiet at night we slept well. The breakfast was good and plenty, the hot dishes were different each morning. Some mornings it was packed so we took the food to our room. We did eat a few complimentary dinners at the hotel and found it good, this helped save on the food budget. There are plenty of eateries close to the hotel. We enjoyed the Outback and Joe's Crab Shack.  The hotel has a nice outdoor pool and we found the hotel staff friendly. Antonio was nice, he helped us when we had a problem with our room. We experienced water backing up in our sinks and tub and someone came to fix it but the bathroom sink still had some water back
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your 7 day visit to the Anaheim area. Also, I want to thank you for joining us during our Suite Start Breakfast and our Manager's Evening Reception, which ended up saving you on your food budget! I do want to apologize on the housekeeping aspect of your stay. You should have received service each and every day, except for the day you declined service, however, please know that I will pass this on to our team so we can prevent this from happening in the future. I am glad that you were able to overlook the housekeeping aspect of your stay and still enjoy yourself. Thank you again for choosing to stay with us!

Summary: The suites are ample room with two Queen beds in the bedroom and a pull out couch in the living room. Compleat with a kitchen. The hotel is located just minutes from Disnay, 1/2 hr to long each and Queen Mary 15min to NewPort and Huntigton beach, 20 min to Knottes Beerry Farm, and 1hr from Universal.  The hotel staff are very frendly and try and help where they can. The pool is nice for a family to splash and play in. The hot tub most days is good but sum times has a lot of sand on the bottom.  They serve a hot breakfast everyday, and a dinner Monday  -Thursday that Barry's daily from spaghetti and meatballs to tacos complete with salid, pop and for the adults beer and wine.  We continue to call this place home year after year.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for your patronage, and we do appreciate your loyalty with us! Glad to hear that we are in the perfect location for all of the attractions you mentioned. As always, we look forward to your next stay with us! Thanks again!

Summary Heading: I so want to like this property!
Summary: I have stayed at this property about 4 times in the last two years and I am just finishing up a 5 night stay during the Memorial Day weekend.I so want to love this property, but I just can't dismiss several of the misfires throughout the stay. This stay consisted of three paid nights and two nights with points, which can be confusing to the front desk, but it was seamless. I tried checking into the property at 3pm and was promptly told by Antonio that my room wasn't ready. I am only a HHonors gold member, but I did ask if anything was available to check into and was promptly told by Antonio, that check in isn't until 4pm. Really? I get it Antonio, but to think there was no other rooms available at that time was a little disappointing. From my questioning of Antonio about it,
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us, we do appreciate your patronage. First off, it is clear that we have dropped the ball on many occassions during your stay. From being bothered with the "Do Not Distrub" sign displayed to the maintenance staff changing the air filter. I want to extend my sincere apologies and I am saddened to hear that you will not be staying with us again. I completely understand why and if there were any other questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact myself or the General Manager, Darin Fournier (Darin.Fournier@hilton.com).  Again, my sincerest apologies.

Summary: close enough  nd not too close to all the nite time noise at Disneyland. Great , CLEAN and friendly staff. Choose to stay away from the elevator for quietness and not o the busy 1st floor. A reminder that check in is 4pm not the standard 3pm and since they ere very busy was not able to check in earlier. Good Luck
Manager Response: I am glad to read that you enjoyed your stay. I understand that being close to Disneyland, the noise can be quite displacing, however that does not seem to be the case for your stay. Again, thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we hope to have you as our guests again in the future!

Summary: First, I want to say the staff was great.  Friendly and knowledgable.  The rooms and hotel were clean but in my opinion my room was in need of some updating.  The spa was hot and pool quite warm, beautiful landscape around the whole hotel.  I did use the laundry the washer worked great but one dryer (the middle one) did now blow any warm air.  At the end of the cycle, when I check on my clothes, I had to place those items in another dryer to actually dry them.  Luckily, we were not in a hurry to go anywhere that afternoon.  Nice workout room - in my 3 visit, I only saw one other person using it.  We did not eat dinner but breakfast was more then adequate.  It is very busy as you might expect.  The day we went to Disneyland - we left our room at 8:30 am and returned at 3:30 pm to
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us, we do appreciate your patronage. I am also glad to read that you were able to join us for our Suite Start Breakfast served every morning. However, I do want to apologize for your suite not being serviced at the time you arrived back to our hotel. Also, our dryers have been malfunctioning, but we did let our maintenance team know of this and we will make sure to prevent this from happening in the future. Again, thank you for choosing to stay with us and I hope if your plans permit, that you stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Nice stay but not for business travelers
Summary: Im in the middle about this stay only because I wasnt here on vacation like 90% of the hotel was. So i have to understand that the hotel may cater to the vacationers than the business travelers. Every night or morning there were running down the hallways. The managers reception was ok as well but here comes the kids not being supervised by the parents and spilling food all over the place mixing the sour cream with the salsa mixing the salsa with the hot peppers.  Parking-I wasnt told I would be charged for parking but thats cool but having a sales tax on parking was crazy. Half the time i couldnt find parking because of the Disney crowd.  Lights out-so with me being on business I have to work during the day and when I got back tot he hotel room it was time to continue to work.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us, I am glad that you had a nice stay with us. However, I am extremely sorry for the lack of communication of parking, the noises throughout the hallways, and the failed internet connection on the morning of the power outage. In no way is this a representation of the service we provide, nor our standards, nonetheless, I do apologize for the inconveniences experienced during your stay. If you have any further questions or concerns you would like to bring to our attention, please feel free to contact myself, Benjamin Ly (Ben.Ly2@hilton.com), or the General Manager, Darin Fournier (Darin.Fournier@hilton.com).

Summary: My wife and I stayed here with our son and daughter, ages 4 and 1. Arrived on Sunday, went to Disneyland M-Th, checked out on Friday. It was great.   We really liked the separate rooms setup, having them in the living room and us in the bedroom. The pack n play crib was a tad lumpy but our daughter didn't care.   The location is great. We opted to take the bus instead of the shuttle to get to Disneyland--the stop is just across the street. And there's a supermarket across the street too! ~5 minute walk/jog one way. We loved that, it came in handy almost every day. It was nice to arrive and buy food n stuff for the week there, rather than pack our own. 3-4 restaurants also on the same block. Good location.   We liked the M-Th dinner, not having to figure that out helped us relax.
Manager Response: I am very happy to read that you had a good 4-day trip to Disneyland, and an enjoyable stay here. Also, I see that you were able to join us for our Manager's Evening Reception, which we feel is a great amenity to our guests. During peak times, the dinner service may get busy, but I'm thankful that you had a positive experience. I hope your travels bring you our way in the future, as we would be glad to have you as our guests again.

Summary: We booked a stay here as part of a Disneyland package deal from getawaytoday.com. The main reason we chose this hotel versus all of the other hotels offered on that site was because of the fact that, in addition to the typically offered complimentary breakfast, this hotel also offers a complimentary dinner including wine and beer Monday through Thursday nights. For the additional price we felt that it was well worth it to get both meals. That being said we hoped that the meals would be decent and they really were. The menu choices were posted on the refrigerator in our kitchenette so that we could plan accordingly and the meals offered were very good. The breakfasts were all similar, but with a few different hot choices, but generally there was eggs and sausage and a potato
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us, as I read, you had a great stay with us. From the menu options during dinner to the cleanliness of our suites, I'm very happy we were able to accomodate you accordingly. The next time you plan on visiting the Anaheim/Garden Grove area, please choose to stay with us again!

Summary: The rooms were very nice, and quiet.  The breakfast was good although the scrambled eggs almost tasted like they were powdered.  The staff working the breakfast area were very efficient.  The location to Disneyland was okay,  took car because by the time we would all paid for shuttle it would of cost more.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we value the time you spent to provide feedback! From what I have read, it sounds like you had a great experience with us at the Homewood Suites by Hilton. Also, I am happy to read that you were able to join us for our Suite Start Breakfast, however, I do apologize for the quality of our scrambled eggs. I hope the next time you are in town, you will consider staying with us again.

Summary: I should have known better than to stay here for work when they had a free Disney shuttle, but I've stayed at the Doubletree down the street hundreds of times without being put off by the Disney traffic and the Doubletree is closer to Disney. This hotel was infested with children of all ages--forget trying to get breakfast or dinner...kids hands all over the food and you'll have to wait in a pretty big line. Also, there is only one elevator in the front and the help uses it for cleaning supplies--so be prepared to wait 5+ minutes to take the elevator to the room. Rooms were not well insulated either...heard lots of noise from outside pool (and I was on the 6th floor!) and the hallway. I'm sure this would be great for a family trying to go to Disney on a dime...but not a business
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us, however, I want to apologize for the unpleasant stay you recently had with us. We do our best when it comes to accomodating our corporate travelers, but in this instance, it seems we may have dropped the ball. The Disney area is always a busy place, especially at the Homewood Suites, which could explain for all of the families and children around. You are indeed correct, we should have done a better job managing the breakfast area and in the noise level coming from the outdoor public areas. I can only hope, if your travels bring you to the area again, that you would choose to stay with us so we would have a chance to make it right with you. Again, my sincere apologies and thank you for your time and feedback.

Summary: We really appreciate the Suite, so that various family members can be up with lights on, while the others are sleeping in the bedroom.  The hotel and rooms were clean, and seemed safe and secure.  There was plenty of parking.  There is a parking fee and a tag is required in the car, but there are no gates or parking cards to deal with (nice to avoid the hassle).  Breakfast was OK, although it did seem that they closed about 15 minutes earlier than advertised one of the days.  The only big problem we had is with the shuttle service.  We happened to be there the week after Easter, but since Easter was so late this year it did not seem quite as crowded in the area as during previous Spring Breaks.  However, in the mornings and late evenings the shuttle was _always_ overloaded. The
Manager Response: I'm very happy to read that you would choose to stay with us again in the future. Thank you for your loyalty and patronage, it is very much appreciated. I want to apologize for the shuttle situation. We are aware that, at times, it does hit capacity during peak times at Disneyland, but you are correct, we should be monitoring the occupancy of the shuttles a bit better so we can accomodate accordingly. Our jobs here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton are to make sure you, our guests, have a pleasant and enjoyable stay, which for the most part, seems to be the case with your recent stay. Again, thank you for choosing to stay with us and we value your feedback.

Summary: This was our third time staying at this property. We were not disappointed at all. The staff is extremely pleasant and they are very welcoming. In fact we recognized some employees from our previous stays. Rooms are good in size and beds were very comfortable. I did notice that the room was looking a little tired but new paint would fix that up. The room was clean though. Breakfast is very good with a different hot item each morning. Always saw staff refilling the stations and if you needed something, all you had to do was ask the staff and they were more than willing to help you. Since we were visiting Disneyland, we never made it for the dinner reception but was able to enjoy complimentary beer one night. The shuttle service worked fine for us. We always made it on first thing
Manager Response: Happy to read that you enjoyed your stay with us! Also, I'm happy that you were able to join us for our Suite Start Breakfast, and hope the helpfulness of our staff exceeded your expectations. Thanks again for staying with us, and we look forward to welcoming you home again!

Summary Heading: Would (and have) Recommend to Our Friends
Summary: We're a family with 5 kids ranging in ages from 16 to 1. Purpose of the trip was Disneyland.   As the title of the review states we would not only recommend this property to our friends but insist they stay. It was clean, the breakfast and dinner was great (this alone saved us about $100/day) and the staff provided outstanding service. You know a place is committed to service when the manager and his assistants are out of the office on the floor greeting guests, serving juice and clearing/cleaning tables. Great example of leadership.
Manager Response: Thank you for the loyalty and patronage, we do appreciate that! Also glad you were able to save some money by joining us during our Suite Start Breakfast and our Welcome Home Managers' Reception! Thanks again for staying with us, and we look forward to welcoming you home again!

Summary Heading: Short Disneyland and Baseball Game Family Vacation
Summary: My family of 5 took a vacation to see Disneyland and a baseball game. We traveled from Vancouver Island, British Columbia and stayed at Homewood Suites in Anaheim (obviously) arriving on April 25th. The cost savings of having an included breakfast and dinner (Mon-Thurs) was an attractive offer and caused us to choose this hotel (not to mention the number of positive reviews this hotel has). And the fact that Target is a block away really assisted with the cost. We went to Disneyland for 2 days and took the shuttle from the hotel to the park. We would come back at around lunch time for a meal and a swim in the hotel's pool and then take the shuttle back to Disneyland. This routine worked well for my busy family. We also took a cab to an Angel's baseball game.   Their morning
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your trip to Disneyland and a baseball game! We do appreciate the patronage and I'm also very happy to read that you and your family were able to join us for our Suite Start Breakfast and our Managers' Evening Reception. You are correct about the shuttle that runs to Disneyland, it does seem to be busy during peak hours, but I suppose that is Disneyland for you, and I do apologize about that. Whenever you plan on visiting the Anaheim area again, please stay with us again, as we are always glad to welcome you home!

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay in Anaheim
Summary: We stayed here again for one night on our stop in Anaheim. This hotel is always clean and nice. We checked in at 4 and left for the ball game at Angel Stadium at 5.  Did not get to eat the free dinner that night because of the ball game but we had breakfast the next morning. Breakfast was adequate and we were back on the road. The room was great , beds comfortable, and refrigerator was nice to have for cold drinks.  Rate was a little high with the added charge for parking so we did not stay here on our way back through.  There are a few lower cost Hilton Honors options in the area that are just as nice.
Manager Response: I'm glad that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. With Angel Stadium being nearby, we're glad you chose to stay with us during your baseball game trip! Also glad that you were able to join us for our Suite Start Breakfast in the morning. Next time the Anaheim Angels are playing, please choose to stay with us again!

Summary: Not only was the food extremely mediocre (watered down juices, bland bagels, soggy homefries), and the hot tub filthy, but i noticed my retainer gone when i come back into my room on my second day.. There lost and found was closed when i left and when i called they said they had no news of it. That retainer is going to cost me $500 and for that money i would have been much more inclined to stay elsewhere where the cleaning ladies know the difference between garbage and a toiletry case.
Manager Response: I want to apologize on behalf of the hotel for the incident regarding your retainer. I will double check with my housekeeping department to see if they did, in fact, throw away your retainer. Also, I want to apologize for the quality of our breakfast items. If you have any questions pertaining to this matter, please contact myself at 714-740-1800, my name is Benjamin Ly or the General Manager, Darin Fournier, at the same telephone number.

Summary: The staff at this hotel are amazing, they really go out of their way to make sure your stay is great. Rooms are clean,breakfast is good and the dinner is just fine to. Location is great,the shuttle comes every 20mins to take and bring you back from the park. Trying to get a taxi is a little challenging ,however Armondo who has his own limo company was Awesome and his fares are cheaper then a cab. You can always find him at this hotel. We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: I am very happy to read that you had an "Awesome" stay with us! From what I read, it looks like you were visiting our nearby neighbor, Disneyland. I'm glad our shuttle was of great use during your stay, and I'm also happy that you were able to join us for our Managers' Evening Reception. Thank you for choosing to stay with us, we do appreciate your patronage!

Summary: Previously stayed at the Embassy Suites nearby & although that was ok decided to give this hotel a try.  I've stayed at other Homewood properties & found that this was on par with the others - free (decent) breakfast, internet & evening reception.  I was traveling on business with a group and although we had a mixup during reservations everything was sorted out by the front desk by the time we checked in.  Pizza joint nearby is worth a try.  If you want a good-sized room for an excellent value near Disneyland then this is the place, for sure when I bring my family I'll be staying here.
Manager Response: I'm very happy to hear you were pleased with your recent stay with us! Also glad to read that you were able to join us during our Suite Start Breakfast and our Managers' Evening Reception. As far as the confusion goes with the reservations, I'm happy that our Front Desk Agents were able to assist in that matter. Next time you plan on visiting with your family, or if work brings you to the area, please stop by and say Hi!

Summary: The staff was extremely helpful. Didn't partake in the suppers, but had breakfast every morning which was wonderful. Would definitely stay there again! The location is only 1 km from Disney so we had to shuttle, but there was one every half an hour which worked well. The beds were great, but the cot was maybe not the most comfortable as usually is the case with cots. The room was clean and had all the ammenities you could want. The only thing I might say is it might have been a bit nicer to have more room to walk around, with 6 people it could get a bit crowded in there.
Manager Response: I am extremely happy to read that you had a "Wonderful Stay" with us! Our Disney shuttle is a great amenity to guests visiting our nearby neighbor, Disneyland. Unfortunately, I see you were unable to join us during our Managers' Evening Reception, however, you did join us in our Suite Start Breakfast! Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to welcoming  you home!

Summary: Great 10 day stay from check-in to checkout. Luis was the best hotel manager we've had the pleasure of meeting and having served us at any hotel we've ever stayed. The hotel was excellent overall. All the staff we interacted with was extremely helpful and courteous. The breakfast and dinners were delicious and since they were complimentary it really helped with the budget. We usually stay at Embassy Suites but we decided to change it up a bit and try Homewood. Best decision we could of made. We'll definitely stay here next time we visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: I'm extremely happy to read all of the great things you had to say about the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim/Maingate Area. Luis Vazquez is the Front Desk Supervisor and also a great asset to the hotel as evidence in your feedback. Thank you for taking the time to recognize him and the wonderful staff we have here. Please keep us in mind the next time you plan on visiting the Anaheim area.

Summary: We spent 4 nights here, in late march 2014.  We were super happy with the staff and the room was clean and had everything we wanted and needed.  Free breakfast was very good, so was the free dinner. The shuttles were great.  Overall very happy.  Would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide such positive feedback about your recent stay with us! We do appreciate you choosing to stay with us and we're glad you were able to join us for our Suite Start Breakfast, and our Managers' Evening Reception. We hope to have you as our guests again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Great for Large Families! Budget Friendly!
Summary: Four kids, ranging from age 11 to age 1. Need more introduction? From Northern California we spent a day in the car to get here. Weary travelers rejoice, this place is a haven for your family!  +1 Try searching for a room in the Disneyland area and you'll be told you need to book two. Not so with Homewood Suites.  +1 We already know that Disneyland on a budget is a daunting process, and a few of the simple tricks like packing in our own food to the park cut costs tremendously. Add to that the fact that this Homewood Suites location serves a complimentary breakfast that puts most to shame (eggs, bacon or sausage, full cereal bar, fruit and yogurt, waffle bar, juice bar, coffee 24/7) and you add a hearty breakfast to start your day, included in the cost of your room.   +1 Back
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with us here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton. I'm very happy to read that you and your family had an enjoyable visit, and I'm also glad that we were able to accomodate your every need. We hope to welcome you home again soon, and when you do come to visit, please stop by and say Hi!

Summary: Homewood is a standard by Hilton that I'm always happy with, especially this location!!!  There is a full breakfast every morning. Monday thru Thursday- full dinner & wine & beer( complementary). There is a shuttle which will take you over to Disneyland Resort. I have stayed @ this property so many times that it had boosted me to HHonors Diamond Member. Spacious suites where a family can stay.
Manager Response: I'm very happy to hear that the Homewood Suites by Hilton is your "Favorite property" That really does mean alot, and by the looks of it, I'm glad that you're able to join us for our Suite Start Breakfast and Managers' Evening Reception as well. The Evening Reception is technically a light dinner, but I agree with you, with all of the options available, it does seem like a full dinner. Whenever you're in town again, please stop by and say Hi!

Summary: Very clean, beds are comfy and a shuttle that got us to the park with just no stops from our hotel. (They share the shuttle with the hotel next door). Very convenient. Parking was ample. Breakfast was ok. There is a restaurant across right next door with a bar and even pizza delivery. Oh and a Target across the street!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us, we do appreciate your patronage. Also, I'm glad to read that you were able to take our shuttle to our nearby neighbor, Disneyland. With our prime location in Anaheim, many restaurants and businesses, such as Oggi's Pizza and Brewery, is extremely close, and I'm happy to read that you were able to take advantage of it. Thanks again for choosing to stay with us, we look forward to welcoming you home again.

Summary Heading: Great place for families going to Disneyland
Summary: Great place to stay while going to Disneyland.  Fantastic staff.    Using their shuttle service is a great way to spend more time at the park as opposed to driving, parking and walking to the gates.  Going back to the hotel for the Manager's Reception is a great way to recharge before heading back out to the parks for the evening activities.
Manager Response: I'm happy to read you had a great stay with us recently. With our nearby neighbor, Disneyland, our Managers' Evening Reception is a great amenity for guests who need a break from Disney during their stay. Thanks again for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to having you as our guests again very soon!

Summary Heading: This is our 4th stay here and prob the last
Summary: I once wrote a 5 star review on this hotel. We have stayed here 4 times over the past 5 years. This hotel has gone downhill fast. The rooms are worn and need some up dating. Our couch had a big rip in it, our door handle was falling off and wouldn't shut, we had issues  with our air conditioner leaking all over the carpet into the closet area all over our suitcases. I brought the issue of the door up to the front desk and they fixed it. I also mentioned the air conditioner and how it had leaked on our bags. We left for the day and came back to a giant fan in our room. No mention if the problem was fixed or if they were working on it still. No compensation for getting all our stuff wet just a "we're sorry that happened". Really??!!  The food is about 2 stars. The potatoes and
Manager Response: I am extremely saddened to read that your recent stay here, may be your last. I want to apologize for dropping the ball on many occassions during your stay here with us. I understand that the condition of the suite was poor, but rest assured, we are taking care of that matter right away. Because your recent stay with us was not a pleasant one, please feel free to contact myself at Ben.Ly2@hilton.com or by phone at (714)740-1800, so we can discuss what I can do to make it right, not only for you, but on our part as well.

Summary: This hotel is great if travelling with children.  The full kitchen is ideal if you don't want to eat out all the time and the kids loved the pool.  A separate bedroom is perfect for putting the kids to bed early while allowing adults to stay up later without bothering them.  The breakfast buffet had lots of selection and the dinner 4 nights a week was an added bonus.  The Disney shuttle was a good value as we made 2 round trips per day, but we had some trouble with overcrowding one day and bus maintenance another day.  I would not consider the hotel to be walking distance to Disneyland if you have children, but it is located off the main streets a bit so it's quieter than some.  Parking is an extra cost which I don't love but I got a reduced rate since I was staying for 8
Manager Response: Glad to hear you had a great stay with us! We feel we are the perfect hotel for families traveling to the Disney area. With our Suite Start Breakfast every morning, and our Managers' Evening Reception, we understand that planning a trip to Disneyland may have high costs, so we're glad you were able to join us. Whenever you plan on visiting the Disney area, please stop by and say Hi!

Summary: Stayed at the Homewood Suites for 4 nights in Mid-march.  The hotel was fully booked, with lots of families and kids due to Disneyland nearby and many kids on Spring Break.  Even though my HHonors profile requests a room on a high floor, our room was on the first floor, but not a big deal.  The room itself was very clean, and also quiet (which surprise me given hop packed the hotel was).  Both the beds and the couch were very comfortable.  These are true suites, you get a small living area, and a small kitchen, in addition to the separate bedroom.  The kitchen has a full sized fridge, a microwave, coffee maker, plates and utensils, some pots/pans, etc. Breakfast is included, but it gets very crowded, and is hit and miss on it's mediocrity.  They do not have a true restaurant
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us, we do appreciate your patronage. We're glad that you enjoyed yourself amongst all of the children on spring break, as you mentioned, which you're completely correct. We were at capacity, especially during breakfast hours, but glad to see you were able to join us for that and our Managers' Evening Reception. Also, we're happy that you were able to take our Disney shuttle, which we feel, is a great amenity to all of our guests visiting our friendly neighbor, Disneyland. Whenever you're in town again, please stop by and say Hi, and hopefully, it'll be an even better stay!

Summary: Nice stay.  Free breakfast and Mon-Thurs Dinner saves a lot of money for family Disney Trip.  Shuttle every 30 minutes to Disney (reasonable rate) was convenient and cheaper than driving and parking at Disney Lot.  Only complaint would be that this is NOT a non-smoking facility.  First thing you notice in the rooms is the lack of freshness.
Manager Response: Glad to hear that your recent stay with us was a nice one! From our Suite Start Breakfast every morning, to our Managers' Evening Reception, it looks like you were able to join us for both. Also, I'm glad to read that our Disney shuttle was accomodating to your needs as well. Thanks again for choosing to stay with us, it was our pleasure having you as our guests.

Summary: From the time we walked into this hotel, the signs of a bad stay were right in front of us...  We arrived at the property shortly after noon, and check-in time is 4pm. Having said that, we asked at the desk if our room was ready. Once the young lady (Kaitlyn?) behind the counter deigned to break away from the multiple phone calls she was taking, she was very abrupt and borderline rude. Our room wasn't ready, so we should go shopping. She did offer to store our baggage, though...  Once we came back from lunch, someone else (Luis?) was at the desk, and after being told again our room wasn't ready, he gave us an internet upgrade for our trouble, and made a point of checking on our room with housekeeping. Once it was done, he was very quick with the actual check-in procedures.  Once
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback, as we use your feedback as a very important guest service tool. It appears that we have dropped the ball on many occassions during your stay and I want to apologize for the inconvenience we have caused. Corrective action will be put into place so incidents, such as yours, will not happen again. Because we failed to meet your expectations, I want to invite you to contact myself at your convenience so we can discuss what we can do to better serve you. My name is Benjamin Ly and I am the Guest Services Manager, you can reach me at (714)740-1800 or by e-mail at Ben.Ly2@hilton.com

Summary Heading: Return stay at Homewood, Garden Grove, CA
Summary: We returned to Homewood suites for a Disneyland trip.  The hotel was exactly as it was last visit, with the exception of a $12 self parking fee.  We enjoy the condo type feel of Homewood!  It is very comfortable, really like having a living room, kitchenette, bedroom and bath.  They serve breakfast and dinner every day, although we have not done dinner because we were always out and about with our trip.  Do, however, love having breakfast ready and going down to eat, with a good variety of food.  Our only problem was a slow draining bathroom sink.  Definitely a home away from home!  There is even a Target across Harbor Blvd for incidentals :)
Manager Response: I am extremely happy to read that your recent stay with us was a great one! We appreciate the loyalty and patronage, and I'm glad that our suites accomodate your needs. Also, I'm glad that you were able to join us for our Suite Start Breakfast every morning, however, I am saddened that you were not able to join us for our Managers' Evening Reception. Next time you plan a trip to your "Home away from home" please stop by and say Hi, and possibly make plans to enjoy dinner with us.

Summary: Staff was very friendly and accommodating, they went out of their way to make your stay a pleasant one. Our clocks had not been changed due to daylight savings time change, so we missed breakfast. When we went downstairs, the kitchen staff offered bagels and cereal, they were very friendly and helpful.  I would definitely recommend Homewood Suites and plan on staying here again.
Manager Response: I'm so happy to read that your recent stay with us was an "AWESOME" one! I want to apologize for not setting your clock for daylights savings. However, I'm glad that our wonderful Breakfast Staff were able to accomodate you with some last minute items from our Suite Start Breakfast. I know you plan on staying with us again in the future, so for next time, please do stop by and say hello!

Summary: Always enjoy staying at Homewood Suites because of all the space you can have and takes you away from a hotel feel. This one in particular has very nice staff to greet you and give recommendations for places to go if you don't want to do the Disney stuff. The rooms are also very modern with nice appliances. Would definitely recommend staying here
Manager Response: Glad to hear that you found our staff very "Friendly" We do our best to accomodate our guests in every way possible, even for our guests who are not visiting our nearby neighbor, Disneyland. Next time you plan to come into town again, I hope you choose to stay with us again.

Summary Heading: Excellent Customer Service for family Disney visit
Summary: Stewart Arevalo did an excellent job helping our party put together a Disney adventure with multiple tickets for different days. He was very patient and friendly and made it a great interaction. He gave us the correct information for us to get the right tickets for what we wanted to do. Thanks Stewart!
Manager Response: Glad to hear that your family had an excellent experience with us, especially with Stewart Arevalo! He is one of Homewood Suites' great Guest Service Agents and this is evident in the courteous service he provided with you and your family. Next time you and your family are in town, please stop by and say Hi!

Summary: This was our first trip to SoCal with our 4 older kids, it was a challenge to find a large enough place to stay. The room was large enough for all of us. Our kids are 12, 15, 18, and 20. We let the kids have the large bedroom and hubby and I slept in the livingroom on the sofa bed. The bed was uncomfortable but we were able to borrow a cot and once we put the cot mattress on the sofabed it was bearable... but the kids liked their beds. The only downside to the breakfast which was so great was the Styrofoam plates, otherwise the food was fresh and there was great variety. We also enjoyed the dinner's which were included M-Th,evenings (included wine or beer for us big kids!)...Saved us a ton of money and the kids enjoyed it. The pool was closed while we were there, but we were
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit to our property. We are also happy to know that the spaces of the suite as well as the amenities we offer were able to accommodate your family. I would also like to sincerely apologize for the bathroom incident. I deeply regret the lack of service and professionalism you experience when trying to inform us about the issues you had with your suite. I truly apologize for any inconvenience this might of cause during your stay. If there are anything that we can do or questions please feel free to contact me. Once more thank you for giving us the pleasure of  accommodating you and we look forward to see you again.

Summary: It's my family's 1st disney experience and this hotel make it more memorable! From the front desk staff who always helped us  and the housekeeper (Maria?) who always provide a good service . The room is great since we have a kitchenette a big fridge, microwave and our room is big enough for the four of us. The breakfast in the morning is really good. there's a lot of choices unlike other hotels. Since we're always on the go.. we don't have to prepare breakfast and we can even have fruits to go . We did not try the food they serve on dinner time since we're always late to go back in the hotel. The pool and the gym is nice as well we have 1 day just to relax in the hotel. The only complaint we have is there's only 2 elevator.. it's so busy in the am since most guests want to go
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you had a great time during your visit to the Garden Grove area. Thank you for sharing about your stay with us and I am happy to see that we were able to make you =visit a pleasant one, as well as the amenities that we offer. I truly apologize if the elevator caused any inconvenience during your stay, we will definitely utilize your comments to ensure we can work on resolving this issue. Once more thank you for giving us the opportunity to accommodate you and your family and we look forward to see you again.

Summary: I really can't specifically complain... the hotel had everything we wanted and needed. I got a great rate considering everything that was included. I really liked the spacious suite and convenience of the location of the hotel (right across the street from a large Target, and in the same parking lot as a pizza place, an Outback Steakhouse, a Red Robin, a Joes Crab Shack, and a Marriott Hotel that had a Starbucks in the lobby). We enjoyed the pool and large hot tub, even on a cold-ish day, and ate one of the free dinners (spaghetti night- typical "cafeteria"-style food, but for free, definitely worth it!). I used the laundry facilities and purchased items from the 24-hour general store. Prices were good. Beds were very comfortable. We also used the Disneyland Shuttle and it was
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your visit to our property. I truly apologize for any inconvenience you experience during your stay. Thank you for sharing with us the issues you encounter throughout your stay as it helps us work into ensuring these items are addressed for future stays. I deeply regret any help that was denied or any information that was not provided when asking for assistance; I will definitely look into this and utilize your comments to fix any missed communication. Once more thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you, we look forward to see you in the future and please feel free to contact me if there are any questions or anything else that you would like to share about your stay. Once again thank you for your feedback and thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to let us know how we can improve at the property.

Summary: My sincere thanks to Luis V and his team of Antonio, Fabiana & Stewart who made our stay exceptional. I am from Australia and visited USA for my very first time. Great suites overall - on the plus side they offer free dinner from Monday to Thursday. Breakfast is also included. One of the family oriented hotels close to Disneyland. Apart from Disneyland, there is Universal Studios, Warner Bros Studios and Knotts Berry Farm for families to enjoy with their children. The staff at the hotel are very courteous and helpful and never say NEVER!!! Service with a smile even from the extremely hardworking staff in the kitchen and housekeeping. Close by there are many restaurants like RED ROBIN, WENDY'S, DONALD'S, and other tasty options. I would highly recommend this hotel for its family
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy schedule to share about your visit to the area. I am really happy to hear we were able to accommodate you. On behalf of everyone here at the Homewood we would like to thank you for sharing your thoughts with us and I will make sure to let everyone know that they are doing a good job and I hope they were able to help on any way possible.  We would be honored to have you back if your travels bring you back so we hope to see you soon. Once more thank you for giving us the chance of serving you.
