Summary: We love staying here since we are Disney pass holders and it is just down the street from the park. Love staying next to a Starbucks and Joe's Crab Shack my two favorites!  (There are also many other restaurants in the same parking lot) But the service was the best. The clerks were all very welcoming and let us check in early since they had rooms available. There was always plenty of parking even times when we stayed there and it was booked.  As long as the price is good, we will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us about your stay at our Homewood suites by Hilton. We are really happy to hear that your visit to the area was a great one and I hope that we were able to make your stay just as good. On behalf of my team I would like to thank you for giving us the opportunity of serving you and we definitely look forward to see you again. Please feel free to contact me if there are any questions or anything else that you would like to share about your visit.

Summary Heading: Big rooms but not big beds
Summary: Great big rooms and suites. However, despite me being a Hilton Gold Member and having a reservation that said 2 queen beds, I was given two full beds. I didn't bring up this problem to management. They may have helped me.   If you are a Hilton Gold or Diamond member and would like points instead of water, have your preference indicated on line or they won't do it at the hotel during checkin.  It is nice to have food included in the price for both dinner and breakfast. The dinner wasn't amazing, and the line got long at times, but it was okay. Nice to have complementary alcohol.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing about your visit with us while in the area. I would like to first apologize for any inconvenience you might of experience during check in. We truly apologize and will definitely utilize your comment to ensure a better experience on the future. On behalf of the Homewood suites staff I deeply regret any issues you encounter during your stay, and please feel free to contact me if there is anything else that we can do for you. Once more thank you for sharing your visit experience with us and we look forward to see you again if your travels bring you our way.

Summary: Our recent stay at this hotel was a pleasant one.  The staff was quick and courteous.  The room was clean and quiet.  You have to have a parking pass to park on the property, but when we returned to the hotel one night, there was no parking due to a party at a neighboring hotel.  Staff handled this issue promptly and professionally.  The complimentary breakfast was good and had a large selection to choose from.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us about your recent visit to the Garden Grover area. We are delighted to hear your stay with us was a pleasant one. On behalf of behalf of the Homewood suites staff I would like to thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you. We look forward to see you in the future if your travels bring you our way.

Summary: Small bump in the beginning by not being informed we were on a smoking floor, but that got resolved.  Suite room was large enough for 4, with a teenager and younger sister. No hair dryer in room, needed a plug & mirror in bathroom to take care of yourself before stepping out into the bedroom. Slowest elevator ever and with lots of kids staying, certainly needed to speed it up. The evening meal (I was shocked they had one) was great as well as the breakfasts! Large dining area as well. Kudos to the kitchen staff! And kudos to the front desk and other staff, most professional I had been around in a long time!
Manager Response: On behalf of the Homewood suites staff I would like to sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you experience during your stay. I am happy to hear you were able to join us for the amenities we offer and I hope they were to your satisfaction. I would also like to thank you for giving us the opportunity of serving you while on the area, and please feel free to contact me if there is anything else that you would like to share with us about your visit. We look forward to see you again.

Summary: Hi, I stayed at this hotel from Dec. 29, 2013 until Jan 21, 2014 (23 nights). It was room # 216 Here it is my opinion: Against: Loud noise when the next room using the shower. You will feel it like it is from your room. For: Best ever service‚Ä¶ unbelievably nice team from the very low rank till the highest ranked employee. It worth mentioning the following two cases: 1- I found the 200+ cm high shower inconvenience to have a bath especially for small kids. So, I asked the reception just 30 min after I check-in to give us another room with a telephone type shower but they said that such showers is equipped only at the rooms dedicated for disability and none of them was available. However, within less than 48 Hours, I got the maintenance person (Mr. Michel‚Ä¶ many thanks to his
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your visit with us while in the Garden Grove area. I am happy to hear that our team was able to help on things that were important to you. We sincerely apologize if the shower noise was any inconvenience during your visit. We will definitely utilize your comments to see how my maintenance team can help with this issue. Once again thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and I hope that the stay with us was a pleasant one. Please feel free to contact us if there is anything else that you would like to share about your visit.

Summary: 2 night/3 day stay over Presidents Day weekend. Great front desk service.  Very attentive, fast, and professional.  They followed up on everything they said.  Solid full hot breakfast with well designed and maintained seating.  Well maintained hallways and rooms with full kitchens and full size refrigerators.  Great for family travel.  Everything was clean and d√©cor was very good.  Good size pool and large hot tub.  Only issue was a slow elevator shared with maids carts.  Highly recommend for families and for longer stays as the rooms are all two room suites.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to share your comments and posting them on TrtipAdvisor.  We are extremely happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to your return!

Summary: I stayed in the Homewood Suites for several nights while attending a trade show. The suite was clean and  comfortable and set up with a full kitchen which would be valuable for families. There is a breakfast and dinner provided but the location was very convenient with several restaurants near by and a Target across the street. The hotel is a comfortable walk from the convention center but there is also a shuttle  for those that don't wish to or can not walk. The outdoor pool is fairly large and is suitable for swimming laps.
Manager Response: Glad to hear we were your home away from home while at the trade show.  I want to thank you for a very thorough review and for taking the time to post it to TripAdvisor.  We hope to see you back with us if and when your show returns to Anaheim.  Or perhaps you'll return on pleasure to visit Disneyland!  Thanks again.

Summary: Everything was a 10 except your couch bed, lumpy and terrible! But everything else was excellent!!!! The free breakfast was pretty darn good considering it was a hotel free breakfast! Our room was very clean and it was only 2 miles to Disneyland, which is where we went! Good service and free wifi, what more could you ask for! Was the first time we stayed at Homewood Suites and I will definitely be back.
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear of the sofa bed situation.  Frankly if a comfortable sofa bed was found, the world would beat a path to that manufacturer's door!  Having said that, if you could forward the number of the suite you stayed in to me I'll take a look at that bed.  There may be adjustments that we can make to that sofabed.  My email address is robert.doran@hilton.com.  Glad to hear that aside from this you had a great stay.  We look forward to your return!

Summary: Have stayed at this hotel many times through the years and I am never disappointed. Staff is always super friendly and polite. The staff is very accommodating always!! Very close to Disney! Wonderful variety for the complimentary breakfast each morning. Just great a experience!!
Manager Response: Glad to hear that we are your hotel of choice!  You have many other options and we are honored that you continue to select us.  We look forward to your return once again!

Summary Heading: Very roomy, comfortable, full service suite at reasonable price
Summary: We stayed at the Homewood Suites because the rest of our family group was staying there, and were pleasantly surprised at the size of the accommodations, and all of the amenities offered for the price - full kitchen, huge bathroom with tub, and large televisions in both the bedroom and living rooms.  More like staying at an apartment than at a hotel.  The hotel could use a few more elevators, but otherwise, a good choice for a visit to Disneyland/Knotts Berry Farm.
Manager Response: Glad to hear that both you and your family enjoyed your stay with us.  You'll be happy to know that we are not leaving well enough alone and will be making changes shortly to improve our guest experience even further!  We hope to see you back with us soon.

Summary: It's tough to beat such a comfortable and spacious room when you are traveling with a family.  The experience being in a hotel of this type with young children makes the our vacation more enjoyable and for less than two separate hotel rooms would have cost
Manager Response: We are very happy that we met your expectations and was part of what we hope was a great visit to Southern California!  We hope to see you back soon!!!

Summary: We really enjoyed our week long stay.  The staff was friendly and quickly fulfilled all of our requests.  Perfect spot for a Disneyland vacation.  We were surprised by the quality and variety of food options for breakfast and the dinner reception.  Well done.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to post a review of your stay on TripAdvisor.  We're happy to hear that we livied up to your expectations!  Hope to see you back soon!

Summary: The complimentary breakfast and evening reception were awful.  The fitnes center was decent; one of the treadmills wasn't working at all.  Front desk staff wasn't as friendly depending on the time of day.  I had to wait almost 10 minutess just to get a bottle of water from the snack shop!  "Fabiana" wasn't too happy and friendly when she served me.
Manager Response: Please accept my most humble apologies for inconveniences we caused you.  The treadmill issue that you have noted is being addressed.  I am very disappointed that our breakfast and dinner did not meet your expectations, typically our guests enjoy our offering and I am very sorry that in your case we did not.  I am shocked and disappointed that it may have taken 10 minutes to make a gift shop purchase and will certainly look into this.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at this hotel.  There is free breakfast every morning from 6-9 and Monday-Thursday there is dinner from 5-7.  Breakfast was great, dinner was okay, definitely not gourmet, but in all honesty, the kids ate more at dinner time at this hotel then they did at their expensive meals at the parks! I didn't think we would come home every night for the free dinner, but we did.  It made it easy not to have to think about it and there was always salad so we felt good about getting some greens in.  Room was clean, lobby felt clean and updated.  Bathroom had some wear and tear-- some missing baseboard, door didn't latch properly, toilet seat wouldn't stay up, the handheld shower wouldn't move,  and it could definitely have used a fan!  Queen beds felt small-- they seemed
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to post your comments regarding your recent stay with us.  Note that your comments regarding improvements will be followed up upon.  Glad to haer that all in all it was a pleasant stay.  We hope to see you back with us soon!

Summary: front desk and kitchen/breakfast staff were great.  Bed was comfy.  Everthing well below average...even compared to a Hampton Inn as the standard.  My family and I are not super picky, but this hotel selection (for us) was a mistake.
Manager Response: Although the staff and bed met your expectations, I was sorry to hear that there were other areas that did not.  Please feel free to contact me by phone or email (robert.doran@hilton.com) regarding the areas in which you were disappointed so that we may follow up.  Having said that, I offer my sincere apologies for a stay that overall did not meet your expectations.  I hope that when your travels return you to the Anaheim area you will give us the chance to redeem ourselves.

Summary: I love the Homewood brand. The hotels are always comfortable and have a friendly staff. Rooms are large. We don't have that "squished in" feeling. Breakfast is excellent. Transportation to Disney is lovely!
Manager Response: We're extremely happy that we were part of what sounded like an excellent trip to Anaheim!  Come back to visit soon.

Summary Heading: Stay was good but problem with double charging is still unresolved
Summary: Last December I made a booking for my sister/family but give my credit card no during the booking. Upon check out she settled the bill using her card. However, I found out later my credit card was also charged the same day. When I called the hotel about two weeks ago I was given an email for me to contact to explain about my problem since I calling from oversea so timing & cost is an issue. We are 16 hrs ahead. Am writing in this forum with hoping that someone from homewood suites Anaheim will read this and provide me some feedback. Thank you.
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear that there remains an unresolved issue with your recebt stay.  Please feel free to contact me via email (robert.doran@hilton.com) and I will be happy to personally handle the situation.

Summary: We are season pass holders at Disneyland and visit the area often. We've stayed at many hotels/motels in the area and absolutely love Homewood. The staff is exceptional. The rooms are clean and comfortable and we love the full kitchen. Breakfasts are great, free dinners are convenient (though minimal). Luis is an amazing employee - always helpful, always professional. Fantastic staff all around. The shuttle costs extra, but is worth it. Drops you off right in front of Disneyland. They started charging for parking at the hotel which sucks, but the other hotels charge too. Great for families, great for those who don't mind being a bit off of the beaten path yet still be convenient to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to post a great review regarding your recent stay.  I will be sure sure to pass your accolades on to Luis and the rest of the staff.  As a pass holder we expect to see you back again soon!

Summary: We stayed there last week while we were in Anaheim for Disneyland. It is the second time we've stayed there. I love the suites and the convenience of the Disneyland shuttle literally right outside the doors that come every 1/2 hour that goes directly to the park and the shuttle is cheap. The complimentary breakfast every morning that includes the usuals plus waffles and either pancakes, French toast, eggs, sausage or bacon, hash browns (it changes daily) and the complimentary supper with wine or beer 4 days a week is handy as well as helps keep expenses down. There is 3 restaurants directly across the street and Starbucks next door. Yes the pool was closed but the hotel right next door was very accommodating so not a big deal!  Also Target across the street is very handy to pick
Manager Response: Thanks for a very thorough reveiw and for taking the time out of your busy day to post it on TripAdvisor!  We're glad that we meet and may have even exceeded your expectations.

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel 3-4 times and have never been disappointed.  The rooms are like small apartments with a fully stocked kitchen, living room and separate bedroom.  The property has always been clean and well kept.  Breakfast is included, and while not gourmet it is good and gives a good start to the day. Some of the rooms can accomodate 5-6 people so if you have a larger family, it can save you money.  The location is a short drive to Disneyland and in an area with other hotels.  Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your very kind comments.  We look forward to your return!

Summary: Great front desk staff, very helpful. Good morning breakfast. Free Dinners Mon-Thursday which is really nice. If you are doing Disneyland you can grab breakfast in the morning, catch the shuttle bus to the park (15 minute drive), come back in the evening for dinner and then go back to disney if you want. Shuttle service was nice because it was direct from the hotel to the park, no other stops. Our room included a kitchen which we didn't really use. Separate bedroom from living room area was nice for kids to sleep in. Room definately needed some updating though, furnishings are old feeling. Our room (307) was noisy (outside traffic noise), the toilet ran all night and we had to keep adjusting it, many TV channels didn't work. And the pool was closed while we were there for
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to post such a thorough review of your stay (which as a Senior Advisor you do often - much appreciated!).  We have followed up on the commode and TV issues you noted.  We had posted the pool closing on our Hilton site 60 days prior to the start of the project.  We also contacted all guests with existing reservations over those dates for whom we had an email address. Unfortunately we did not have email addresses for guests who booked through a third party (Expedia, etc).  I'm not sure if this impacted you or not but offer my sincere apologies for the pool being unavailable.  There is never a good time to do this type of work and we chose our slowest time of year to do it.  Nevertheless you were invonvenienced and again for that I offer my most sincere apologies

Summary: I stayed at this Homewood Suites property with my family on a post-Christmas trip. A couple of days prior to arriving, I phoned the hotel to both to request early check-in and to discuss my concerns about it's cleanliness after reading some disparaging online reviews. The request was noted and I was assured that my room would be thoroughly cleaned and reviewed prior to check-in.  On the day my family and I got to town, I phoned the hotel to see if we could check-in early. Since it was more than three hours before the 3:00 PM check-in time, I was told that my room would not be available until later and to check back. At 2:00 PM, since we were in the area, we went to the hotel. The woman at the front desk informed me that our room would not be available for 1-1-1/2 hours. Because
Manager Response: I am very sorry to hear oif the inconvenience we caused you.  We did have hotel-wide key card issues that took some time to sort out (we later found it was a system-wide issue).  I have to admit we were a bit stumped by it for a brief while.  I'm glad that tried to mitigate the long delay for your room to be ready by getting you out to the pool, however the delay in itself was unacceptable and again I apologize for that inconvenience.  We'll get that shower rod tightened up.

Summary Heading: Australian family of 7 that are well traveled
Summary: Firstly...about us. My wife and I (both 35) took our 5 kids (17b, 12b, 10 mixed twins & 8g) on a once in a lifetime family holiday. A logistical nightmare. Everything about the Homewood Suites blew us away. We have traveled all over the world and can't believe the value for money we got with our 8day stay. The location, facilities, hospitality, friendly smiles... With all staff happy to go the extra mile. One of the staff even brought a soccer ball in on our lazy day to play a game with the boys.  My wife and I had been to Anaheim 2yrs prior but stayed at the Annabella Hotel (also a good choice). But I MUST make it clear that Homewood Suites will always be our first preference from now on. My wife and I spend long nights googling hotels for our 7 weeks tour of USA and Canada and
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to post a review of your stay to TripAdvisor.  We certainly appreciate you very kind comments and would love to see you return for another "trip of a lifetime"!

Summary: My family decided to spend Christmas vacation at Disneyland.  Since there were eleven of us, we needed a suite hotel that would accommodate multiple ages.  Homewood is close with shuttle service to the park, has complimentary hot breakfast and a polite and helpful staff.  I would recommend this hotel for anyone.
Manager Response: Glad you chose to spend a special holiday with us and happy to hear you had a great stay.  We look forward to your return!

Summary: Hotel was terrific, staff was outstanding and a lot of fun. Very helpful with everything. Breakfast tater tots were better than most restaurants!  This hotel has the correct size coffee cups in the morning too! Most are very small and flimsy, this hotel gets it right! Little things make a big difference!
Manager Response: Thanks for a great review!  I appreciate your taking the time to pass it on to others via Trip Advisor.

Summary: I am a HHonors platinum member and have stayed at various homewood suites, this hotel is the worst.  I did not expect this from a Hilton brand, The hotel has bad smell and  customer service is poor,spoons were missing in my suite and I called guest services 4 times and still did not get the spoons. I will not recommend this hotel to anyone.  One more thing "Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim-Main Gate Area" is 3 miles from Disneyland main gate.
Manager Response: I am very sorry that we did not meet you expectations.  There is no excuse for the not following up on a guest request such as yours.  I do want to let you know that there are a number of improvements that are being made to our hotel in the very near future.  In early January we begin the installation of Homewood Suites' new bedding package which will make a substantial improvment in both the appearance and comfort of our beds and bedroom.  At the same time we'll be updating our pool area.  By March we will have upgraded both our breakfast anbd dinner service with new plates, glassware, and silverware.  There will also be a number of "behind the scenes" improvements that will make for a more enjoyable guest stay.  What is not changing is the great staff service ouir guests typicall enjoy.  Again, you have my heartfelt apologies that we uncharacteristically did not deliver in that regard  during your stay.

Summary Heading: Good place to stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: Decent pool, close to target and Starbucks close by. Sufficient parking. Continuous shuttle to Disneyland make it a place to stay. Breakfast selection was good and kids enjoyed it. Kitchen make it a bonus as kids wanted to eat something before going to bed on top of having dinner.
Manager Response: Thanks for posting a review of our hotel on TripAdvisor.  I note that you have mentioned that our pool is just OK.  I'm happy to mention that we will be refinishing our pool deck and pools in early January and adding new poolside furniture shortly after that.  One of the nicest pools in the Disney resort area will become even better!  We hope to see you back with us soon.

Summary: We stayed for a week trip to Disneyland. If you stay here with family, I recommend staying during the week if possible b/c of the free breakfast and dinner (Mon-Thurs) if possible. That's a huge cost savings when travelling to Disneyland.  As for the comments abt the state of the hotel, I think they are overblown. Our room was in very good shape considering the hotel is over-run with kids 12 months a year.  The shuttle was good and reasonable. I feel the parking fee was a little much as you're really not close enough to Disneyland to walk.  Another weird thing was the dishwashers. Not sure if anyone else experienced this, but the only word I could use to describe the dishwasher is "violent". It turns on and it is like having a freight train in the room. Plus, it washes so hard
Manager Response: I'm going to have to take a look at the dishwashers, as I've not heard of this comment before.  I certainly thank you for bringing it to our attention!  I also want to thank you for taking the time to post a review (and a favorable one at that!)

Summary: We have been staying here for years! They have a kitchen in every room and the bedroom is separated from the bedroom. They have great full breakfasts and dinners on weekdays. I recommend this hotel to everyone that goes to Disneyland.
Manager Response: I'm glad to hear that we have been your home away from home when visiting Anaheim.  Thanks for the great review and we look forward to your return.  By the way, you'll see some changes when you return - we are receiving very shortly Homewoods new bedding package which will give our bedrooms a new look and make the bed even more comfortable!  We expect this to be complete by the end of March.

Summary: This is our third stay at this hotel and every time the quality is still exceptional.  Rooms are clean, the kitchenette has a microwave, large fridge and dishwasher - not that you really need to use them as there is a complimentary full buffet breakfast downstairs, and between 5pm - 7pm there is a 'welcome dinner' on Monday to Thursdays.  But if you want to eat out there are several restaurants & a Starbucks just outside the hotel.  Also, Target is across the road where you can shop for anything, including food/fruit and drinks to stock up your suite.  Guest laundry is really handy especially when travelling with the family.  The shuttle bus service to Disneyland is great and runs every half hour to & from the park.  Although the price has gone up this year, it's still worth not
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a very thorough review of our hotel.  Your very positive comments are much appreciated.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: We stayed one night at this property and grateful that is was not any longer. This hotel is in need of serious room renovations.  Pros:  Breakfast/Dinner was edible Woman at check-in desk very pleasant  Cons:  Room smelled heavily of smoke and had a dirty feel to it Room was in desperate need of updating (torn curtains, damaged a/c vents, stained carpet, broken cabinet drawers, etc, etc. If you are going to provide free cookies, put a limit on the number one person can take. Watched a family of four take 5-6 cookies a piece leaving children standing in line behind them with no cookies and me with a bad taste in my mouth. Ridiculous.  I have stayed at many properties in the vicinity and good thing there are plenty of other choices. Will not forget this experience.
Manager Response: Please accept my humble apologies for the issues that you found during your stay.  I assure you that we take these comments very seriously and will correct them.  It is my hope that when your travels return you to Anaheim we will have the opportunity to redeem ourselves.

Summary: I was not provided with an accessible room even though I booked months in advance. I have difficulty getting inside bath-tub and the hotel did nothing. The walls of washroom had stains, floors looked poorly maintained, the corners had dark filth which is due to poor housekeeping techniques. The wall papers were looking ripped off, furniture's weren't wiped clean, kitchen furniture was peeling and floors sticky.
Manager Response: I am embarrased to read of your experiences while in our hotel and offer my very humble apologies for this.  I can assure you that we are addressing all points you raise and hope that when your travels return you to Anaheim, you will give us the chance to redeem ourselves.

Summary: Average Homewood. Generally, I love the brand. This hotel has really poor windows, no sound insulation. We were awoken before 6am two of the three nights we spent there because of trucks outside the hotel. Not a problem I've ever had with a Hilton hotel before.
Manager Response: Please accept my humble apologies for a less than restful sleep.  We are in the process of insuring that all windows are completely closed and locked, as I have a feeling that a prior guest may cracked the window open and we may have failed to catch this.  From my own experience this can make a large difference in the amount of outside noise heard in the room..  I will add that the trash hauler does arrive very earlier and I am also discussing with them a schedule revision.

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay. The staff was very helpful.  I had booked two nights and different times so they were not able to put me in the same room for both nights (it was a holiday and very busy).  However, they offered to move our things from the first room to the next room while we were at Disneyland.  This was done very efficiently and everything was waiting for us in our new room when we returned to the hotel late that night.  I appreciate that kind of customer service.
Manager Response: I certainly apologize for the inconvenience caused by the room transfer.  I'm glad though that you had a great stay and we look forward to your return!

Summary: This trip was to attend a family funeral and did not get a good experience. I usually stay at Starwood hotels but my aunt recommended this because it was a 'nice' suite. I want to start off an say the staff that welcomed me there were nice but everything else UGH! First off, there were bugs in my room! I stayed for 6 nights & found a bug every other night. And trust me...I have pictures. Big and small bugs! I called the front desk but the person didn't really respond to me so I just told him, "I'm calling to let you know." Then it was just an "ok." I hung up. Second, the door cards kept resetting or something. I had asked for 4 cards and before my stay was over, none of the cards were working. Also, I usually bring shampoo on my trips but this time didn't & there were days
Manager Response: Please accept my humble apologies for the issues you encountered during your recent stay with us.  I want to assure you that we are addressing all items noted and hope that when returning to our area, you will give us the chance to redeem ourselves.

Summary: This is my second time staying at a Homewood Suite and I must say this time it was not a great stay. Part of the problem due to the fact that there were more children than adults staying here. I've stayed at all the Hilton properties in Anaheim area and this one was not as good as all the others. We stayed during the week so we had their light dinner. It was ok, but the worst part were all the kids coughing and handling all the serving utensils. The hotel has nothing to do with this part, but there was not enough people cleaning up after all the messes that the children were making. I felt bad for all the workers trying to keep up with the mess. They told me they are used to it. The hotel was not very clean. The rugs in the hallway always had food spilled on them. The first
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review, although I do have to apologize for the issues you raise.  While a number of  the issues may be somewhat out of our control, we nevertheless do all we can to insure that a great stay is had by all.  You have my heartfelt apologies and my hope that when your travels return you to Southern California, you will give us the chance to redeem ourselves.

Summary Heading: Great value, and everything you need for your Disney Trip
Summary: A friend recommended staying here, and it was perfect for our needs.  We were looking for a suite for our family of 4, safe and close to Disney, reasonable cost, free breakfast, and a shuttle to Disney.  Staff was very friendly and helpful in every way.  The suite was clean and perfect, roomy and all the expected amenities.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time out of your busy day to post a review on TripAdvisor!  We were very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to your return.

Summary: We have stayed here at least six or seven times, maybe more  and have always been very happy. However, the last two times things weren't quite as good as they have been in the past.  Two months ago we got a room with several things wrong.  There were sugar ants in the bathroom and the shower curtain rod was broken causing the shower curtain to hang in the tub, the door between the rooms wouldn't close completely.  The front desk was super apologetic, and quickly switched us to a new room which was fine.  This time there was an earwig in the shower.  It wasn't that big of a deal, bugs happen, I figured it would just wash down the drain and that would be the end of that, but there was another one the next day.  There was mold in the bathroom,up high on the wall paper, and around
Manager Response: First of all, I want to thank you for your loyalty to our hotel.  I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of our hotel and assure you that we are addressing the items you have mentioned.  I personally inspect our suites and have found instances of the shower curtain rod  issue you mention and we are checking all suites for this.  Thanks again and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: Anytime we are staying in the Disneyland area, this is our first choice for lodging.  We have stayed here so many times that for the kids, they say it feels like coming home and they know the property by heart!  Highlights for us at this property are the generous size accommodations with the separate bedroom from the family room and almost a full kitchen.  I personally love the "L" shaped couch because it's conducive to family time if we want to watch a movie one evening and just cuddle with the kids.  I love the completely separate bedroom so we can put the kids to bed and watch TV and have a little Mom and Dad time before we head off to slumber.    The pool at this property is always a delight and we intentionally arrive early the day of check-in so the kids can have some pool
Manager Response: What a great review!  Thanks for taking the time to post your very kind comments about your recent stay with us.  We look forwartd to your return!

Summary: We have stayed at a few Homewood Suites in other cities and have enjoyed our experience. However, this location was not up to our typical Homewood Suites standards.  Rooms were fairly clean, however, we found a used dirty towel in one of the drawers.  There was no iron or blowdryer in the room so that had to be requested. Phone was broken, walls are thin so we could basically hear our neighbors all night long, and the list goes on and on. Location is convenient to restaurants, Disneyland, and the Anaheim Convention Center, however we would not stay here again.
Manager Response: I truly apologize for the suite condition during your visit. I thank you for sharing about your stay and we deeply regret any inconvenience this might have caused, we will make sure to utilize this information to ensure it does not happen in the future, and Please feel free to contact me if there is anything else that you would like to share or if there is anything else that I can do for you.

Summary: This Hotel and staff are so great they are awesome and treat us so well 4 times this year on family fun time and each time is a pleasure I want to live here at this hotel LOL but really we look forward to our next visit and see the staff I think we are counting the day's until we return
Manager Response: We are really excited to hear that you are planning on your next visit already. Thank you giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and we would love to have you and the family live here with us, on behalf of the Homewood suites we definitely look forward to see you again and please feel free to let us know if you need anything before arriving.

Summary: This was the most quiet stay that we have had so close to Disneyland. The options on breakfast and dinner was ok. The good location of being in the same parking lot as Joe's Crab Shack and red robin was great. The staff were all very friendly. Even the people that cleaned the rooms. We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing about your visit to our Hotel while in the area. We are happy to know that the location was great for your trip, as well as the staff being helpful. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you our way.

Summary: This hotel is excellent for families.  We travelled with our four and six year old children.  The breakfast each morning offered a pretty good selection for the kids to start the day off before going to Disneyland!  While the dinners were okay, there is a good selection of restaurants very close that were family friendly.  Also, there is a Target just across the street that has groceries too.  A good value for family travel.
Manager Response: We are delighted to see that you enjoyed the amenities we offer and  most important that the family had a good time while visiting Disneyland. Once more thank you for sharing about your visit and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Stayed 2 nights - The room was set up very nice. Dinner and Breakfast were super. Used the shuttle and just relexed when I wasn't in Company Traning. Nice area resturausts close by and even a Target accross the street. Had a Great time.  Thanks
Manager Response: We are really happy to know that you had a great time while in the area.Thank you for giving us the opportunity of serving you and we hope to see you again if your travel bring you back for business or pleasure.

Summary: A very nice hotel right by Disneyland. The room was spacious & clean. The only hotel where you could have 4 children and 3 adults in a one bedroom suite. The breakfast at Homewood Suites is always top notch.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay while in the area. We are also happy to know that the room space worked out for your family, and thank you for joining us for breakfast as we hope that the amenities we offer have meet your expectations. We look forward to see you again.

Summary Heading: It's good for your disney stay.
Summary: We stayed here with our family of 4 in October 2013 for our disney trip. We had NO problem with the shuttles. Always on the and very nice. The breakfast is super busy, and is ok. Different quality of food than in Canada so not a lot of healthy choices. Even the fruit is drenched in sugary syrup. The rooms have a nice layout, we did not get a full size fridge though. We never used the kitchen at all. There is a mini fridge(used to store snacks) dishwasher and microwave and stove. But we never cooked in our room as we were always out. I liked having a separate room and tv for the kids(we had a king size suite). Elevators take forever. Bathroom is dated but a good size with lots of storage. Hot tub and pool are ok...nothing fabulous, but clean and towels stocked. Any time anything
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing about your visit with us while in the area. On behalf of the Homewood suites I would like to apologize for any inconvenience you might of experience with the food and elevator, and please feel free to contact me if there is anything else you would like to share about your experience. I will utilize these comments to ensure we can make our services better every time. Once more thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and we hope that we can see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Great for an extended stay or a family
Summary: I just completed an extended stay (nearly 3 months) at Homewood Suites with my family of three.  Unfortunately for me and my family this was my second such stay here after an emergency at home requiring us to temporarily relocate while repairs were being made.  The first one was three years ago and we had a great experience back then, so we decided to return to the Homewood this time.  Because we were settling in for the long term, a few things are immediately obvious about this property: - Space, and lots of it!  The suites are spacious enough that my small family didn't feel overly cramped.  The bedroom itself is about the size of your typical hotel room, plus you have the living room/kitchen area which is also fairly spacious.  I travel quite a bit and stay in Hilton
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to share about your extended stay with us while your house was under repairs. We sure will miss having you and the family around as you guys became part of our family. We area really happy to know that the amenities and services were a good help during your stay. I truly regret any inconvenience you might of experience with housekeeping, and I will definitely utilize these comments to ensure we can avoid this in the future. We are really happy to know that your house was repaired especially with the holidays around the corner, and we will always be more than happy to accommodate you in the future. Once more thank you for giving us the opportunity of serving you again and we look forward to see you.

Summary Heading: Will stay again at Homewood Suites Garden Grove
Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights at the end of August for a Disneyland trip.  We were 2 adults and 2 toddlers.  The room was spacious and we loved the kitchen so we could cook the kids lunch to bring in to Disneyland via a thermos.  The suite provided all the cookware, silverware, glasses, and nice to have a fridge too.  We had a 3rd floor facing Disneyland, so we could partially see the fireworks the 1st evening we were there.  The breakfast was pretty good, there are too many complainers around here.  they had french toast, toast, cereal, egg, sausage, fruit, milk, juices, etc.  The 1 night we stayed for dinner they had chicken, soda, and free beer!   Plenty of kids using the pool and spa in the evening.  And nice to have the 1 foot kiddie pool for smaller kids.  Yes the front
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that during your stay with us our amenities were helpful to your trip to Disneyland. Thank you for taking the time to share about your visit to the Garden Grove area, as we really appreciate knowing that we are able to accommodate your needs and that we can facilitate curtain  things while staying with us. We definitely look forward to see you again.

Summary: We stayed at the Homewood Suites for our family Vacation to Disneyland. We had an issue with our bank account and Alan was the person at the front desk. He was very helpful and patient with us. We were able to work it out so we could stay and not have our trip ruined. This is the second time we have stayed here for a Disneyland trip and will not stay anywhere else.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing about your visit, we are sorry to hear about the bank account mix up but we are really happy to hear that Alan was able to assist you and hopefully able to resolve any inconvenience this might of cause. We look forward to see you again, and once more thank you for giving us the opportunity of serving you while on vacation.

Summary Heading: Best place to stay for any reason
Summary: WOW!!! I have had the pleasure of traveling in many countries and have stayed in hotels from 1 star to ten star and wow, I have never recieved such an amazing hotel experience. We had hiccups with our vacation and Alan, with the front desk, totally assisted us in solving all problems. Being a veteran, and a traveler, I know what it is like to stay in a dump and to feel like your home. We were welcomed home when we arrived and were recieved with waters and chocolate for the kids. We were there for disneyland and having both breakfast and dinner provided was absolutely amazing. It saved us money from another restaurant and it was good home cooked style food. I highly recommend staying here. It might be a few bucks more, but that is becasue you are being treated fantastically and
Manager Response: Virtual High Five back!   We are truly happy to know that Alan was able to make your visit, feel like home, Here at the Homewood suites we strive into providing our guest with an exceptional experience and for all of our staff to ensure your stay goes by really smooth. I will make sure to share this with Alan as well as our staff, also thank you for joining us to the amenities we offer since we try to ensure this helps with making your stay a more comfortable one. Once more thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to share about your visit to the area. We look forward to see you again if your travels bring you our way.

Summary Heading: Great Experience we already booked our next Stay
Summary: Was on a trip for our son's basketball tournament and stayed here at Homewood suites. First off the concierge up on arrival was amazing, were greeted by a young gentleman whom was very courteous and kind. we brought along all of our 3 children and two of them are under the age of 7, the room was spacious, clean and modern. Very up to date furniture and kitchen. We had a pool view which was kind of nice,we did not partake in the pool festivities but viewed the pool from our room. I must say I love the location you are in the area of some great food places/restuarnts. Joe's Crab Shack, Red Robbin, Outback to name a few and all within steps. It was great not having to move our car and loose parking. I was shocked and did not expect all of this from the Homewood suites however you
Manager Response: We are really happy to see you and your family were able to enjoy your visit during your basketball tournament. We are glad to know that everyone was able to enjoy the amenities we offer, as well as the room space. We hope that on your next trip you and your kids have a chance to use our pool, since it is a great time of year to have a swim. We thank you for you time to share about your stay and we truly look forward to see you again.

Summary: We stayed at the Homewood Suites for 5 nights and thoroughly enjoyed our stay.  I feel as though the rates are very reasonable, their breakfast provides a good variety of food items that would satisfy anyone's  taste buds.  The staff members are particularly helpful and friendly.  The rooms are very comfortable and a comfortable place to return to after a busy day.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit with us while in Garden Grove, Thank you for joining us for the amenities here at the property, we are happy to know the foods as well as your suite were to your satisfaction. We look forward to see you again if your travels bring you our way

Summary: We stayed for a week in October for our Disneyland vacation. We had two adults and two 12-year olds and the room was very comfortable for us. It is large with a kitchenette which really helped because we could buy groceries at Target and store them comfortably in the unit. The kids had their own area (living room with pull out couch and their own tv). The free breakfast and dinner was good to have and saved us a lot of money. Shuttle to the park was great and on time. Best part of the Homewood are the staff and especially Luis. He made us feel very welcome and accommodated all my crazy requests...sorry about that Luis. I have stayed at many places near Disneyland and this one is the best for families. We will definitely stay again and we usually go to Disneyland at least once a
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the opportunity of taking care of you while in the area, and making your visit with us a memorable one. I am really happy to know that you felt welcome with us, as that is what we strive on. Making sure your stay with us is comfortable is our priority and I hope we had the chance to exceed your expectations.  We are also glad to know you enjoyed the amenities we offer, as well as the room set up. We truly look forward to see you on your next trip to sunny California.

Summary: This all suites hotel is not within a walking distance from Disneyland Resort, however the shuttle service (every 30 mins) makes it convenient enough to travel back and forth. There is a Target store across the street, which comes handy if you need to buy groceries. The room itself is pretty decent size for a family of 5. Free WI-FI is a plus considering other hotels are charging the guests for access. Full kitchen is nice to have. The furniture needs to be upgraded as they are dated. The staff are friendly and accommodating. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share with us about your visit,. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay and that we were able to accommodate you. We appreciate the comments as it lets us know how we can provide a better service, and we will definitely utilize your comments. I will be sure to share this with my staff and we hope to see you again if you travel back to Garden Grove.

Summary: Stayed here for four days while visiting Disneyland.  It's a definite keeper and we will return.   Great value for all that is included.  Only downside was not having any kind of accurate TV channel guide available.....the one night we were back early from the park and could have used it.... and housekeeping missing our room one day.   Great breakfast each morning and evening dinner served Mon-Thurs.  The best quality with all the amenities at a reasonable price in the area.   Loved it!
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed the amenities we offer, and we hoopoe that your stay with us was a pleasant one. I truly apologize for any inconvenience the housekeeping service and the T.V. guide might have caused. I will make sure to utilize your comments to ensure this does not happen on the future, and we definitely look forward to serve you once more if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: We had a great trip to Disneyland and enjoyed our stay at Homewood Suites mid-September. Having breakfast included everyday was a huge convenience and savings. The shuttle service was reliable and convenient. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing about your visit to the area. We are happy to hear the amenities and shuttle were able to make your trip comfortable, and hopefully made a smooth vacation while in Garden Grove. We look forward to see you again.

Summary: Hotel was awesome! Service was awesome! Loved how close it was to both Disneyland AND Knott's! Appreciated how after 2 long days I was STRESSFREE knowing we were coming back to relax, clean up, and sleep in your hotel. We can't wait to come back!
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you had a relaxing stress free visit. Thank you for sharing about your stay with us, and we definitely look forward to see you again.

Summary: We stayed at this property from 24 September for four nights with our three children and I have to say this place was without a doubt the highlight of our USA holiday when it comes to accommodation.  As do most families, we visited Anaheim purely for the Disneyland experience and after choosing to stay at Homewood after reading many favorable reveiws on Trip Advisor it didnt take long to realise that this place lived up to everything that we had read on TA.  The two young guys on reception have the best customer service skills I have ever come across, extremely friendly and very willing to help as were the rest of the staff including the lady who served us complimentary beers during the managers reception/dinner.  The free meals (Managers reception & Breakfast) were more than
Manager Response: I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and your family while visiting the area, and also for sharing with us about your experience. We are really happy to see that the staff and accommodations we offer were to your liking. Here at the Homewood suites by Hilton we try to ensure that we provide an exceptional customer service every time, and I am delighted to hear we made that possible for you as well. It is our hope to see you again in the future if your travels bring you back our way and please feel free to reach out to me if there is anything else you would like to share about our property, as it would help us out to determine the type of service we are providing. Once again Thank you for your time and we look forward to see you again.

Summary: You will not be disappointed. This is an EXCELLENT hotel. Clean and reasonably priced. You also receive breakfast and Managers dinner (Monday to Thursday) at no extra cost. Our suite had a kitchen so you can visit either Target or Vons to stock up on some groceries, fruit etc. Short (10 mins) shuttle to Disneyland. Luis and the team ensured we were made to feel welcome at all times, they were always there to assist us. We loved it!
Manager Response: On behalf of the Homewood suites, I would like to thank you for taking the time out of your schedule to let us know how we were able to make your visit an enjoyable one. I am happy to know that the amenities and staff were able to meet and hopefully exceed your expectations. Truly appreciate the chance you gave us to make you feel welcome while in the area. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back to Garden Grove.

Summary: We were pleasantly surprised at the size of the rooms.  We had a one bedroom (2 queen beds) with the full kitchenette.  Although we did not do any 'real' cooking we did find it convenient to be able to keep drinks, snacks, and left overs in the fridge.  The provided breakfast every morning had good variety and some healthy options which was nice.  Overall, the room was cleaned to a decent standard each day.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share about your stay with us. We are really happy to know that your suite was up to standards and that you enjoyed our amenities as well. We hope to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: This hotel, just a few short blocks from the Magic Kingdom, was better than I could have possibly imagined. At half the price of the Disney Hotels, this residence delivered more than twice the amenities! Stay here!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you during your visit. We are delighted to see you had a great time, and look forward to serve you again if your travels bring you our way.

Summary: This was our second time staying at the Homewood Suites while visiting Disneyland.  It had been a couple of years since our last stay, so I checked TripAdvisor first before booking it again.  I was a little apprehensive after reading some of the negative reviews but after our stay I am very happy that we chose this hotel.  The front desk staff was extremely friendly when we arrived.  When I booked the hotel, the only room available was a 2-queen room, so I requested a 1-king room which they were able to accommodate.  The breakfast and dinner that is included really helped control expenses and while it wasn't the most amazing tasting, it was decent food and there were a lot of choices.  The free beer and wine are also a plus during the evening reception.  We bought season passes
Manager Response: We are really happy to know that your visit to the area was a good one. Thank you for giving us the opportunity of serving you, and we are glad to know that you were able to join us for the amenities we offer. On behalf of the Homewood suites staff I would like to thank you for giving the pleasure of accommodating you and we look forward to see you again.

Summary: Being a Hilton honours member I was greatly disappointed.  We stayed at the Homewood suite in Orlando Florida and booked this one because of our great experience in Florida.  The staff were really friendly, but definitely under staffed.  The phones in the rooms (and I say roomS because we were in a few) didn't work.  And because the main elevator was so slow we had to run up and down the stairs to ask the front desk a question.  Also used the stairs daily to leave and return from the hotel.  There is another elevator that's down an extremely long and dark hallway which is pretty much on the other side of the hotel.  The welcome back dinners were good, but there wasn't much varity at breakfast (with it being a Hilton chain).  We paid the extra amount and got a larger suite (which
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have never stayed at a Homewood Suites before yesterday, but was pleasantly surprised at all the perks a person receives at the hotel.  There is a full kitchen in the room, a nice desk, two couches and a king size bed.  Each room has a TV and the room was very clean.  The biggest surprise was a "dinner" that is served for free from 5-7.  The night we were there they were serving a taco dinner.....all you can eat.  I had a good salad.  They were also serving beer and wine, along with a selection of pop.  A breakfast is served in the AM.  There is a bus to Disneyland.  We didn't use it but walked about 1.5 miles to look at the Disneyland hotels.  The staff was very pleasant and the maid service was efficient.  The pool was great for kids.  Although we are bringing our family to
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you enjoyed your visit with us while in the area. Thank you for giving us the chance of serving you, as we are delighted to know that you were able to join us for the breakfast and dinner amenities. Once more thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and family. We hope to see you again on the future.

Summary Heading: Clean rooms, friendly staff, awesome breakfast!
Summary: We stayed here for our kids' first Disney vacation. I was recommended to it by another friend, and it turned out to be one of the less expensive places around. The room was super clean, everything was very nice. Hotel staff was friendly and always quick to help. Breakfast was fantastic, not your usual toast and coffee but full eggs, waffles, meats, etc. And finally, they have a Disney shuttle that runs every half hour so you can avoid the parking madness! The fitness center and pool were also excellent. 10/10, would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us while visiting the area. Also we are glad to know that you were able to enjoy the amenities we offer. We truly thank you for sharing about you r visit and we look forward to see you again.

Summary: I was impressed with all of the staff housekeeping was efficient and complete.  We needed to have the feather comforters pillows removed due to allergies.  The housekeeping staff were at our door almost as soon as we got to the room.  The staff at breakfast and evening reception were always working cleaning or assisting customers.  The front desk was very helpful and knowledgeable about the area Disney and other things.  The shuttle service to Disneyland was on time and had very pleasant drivers.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share about your visit with us, we are delighted to hear we were able to make your stay a pleasant one. On behalf of the Homewood suites staff I would like to thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you. We look forward to see you again if your travels bring you our way.

Summary Heading: Wonderful place to stay with a family
Summary: This hotel exceeded my expectations.  we got the room that had a 2 queens and then had a seperate area with kitchen and couch etc...  Was great to put the kids to bed and then close the door and stay up and watch TV and have some social time.  Pool was excellent especially the kiddy pool  Didn't have to worry about our kids in there.  Food was good and the staff were super friendly.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear your visit with us was a pleasant one. Thank you for giving us the opportunity of having you and your family here at the Homewood suites. We are delighted to know that the facility and amenities were to your expectations, and we look forward to see you again if your travels bring back our way.

Summary: Enjoyed my stay in this place. Reasonable price and close to all major motorway/highway. Staff was very nice and helpful also very warm and welcoming which made the stay a pleasant one. Rooms are a bit out dated and old fashion but nevertheless they make up for the service and facilities in the hotel.   Overall will definitely go there again!its been a pleasure staying with you guys!
Manager Response: We are delighted to see you enjoyed your stay with us, and we thank you for giving us the chance of serving you. We are happy to know that your visit was a pleasant one and we definitely look forward to see you again. Once more thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you.

Summary: Luis checked us in, and I was immediately struck by his passion for making guests feel welcome, as well as his ability to convey it. His talents will take him far in the hospitality industry.  My wife and I were in town to visit family. We knew that there would be many young children staying at the hotel who were there to visit Disneyland. We anticipated loud noises not normally experienced as a business traveller, but we both hoped for the best. We were pleasantly surprised. Of course, when children were loud in the hallway, they could be heard, but only if one were in the living room. Overall, though, the room was very quiet, especially the bedroom with the door closed.  The hotel's opportunities for improvement were minor, in our opinion. Breakfast was good, but not great. I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share about your visit, as well I would like to thank you for the recognition. I feel as everyone here at the Homewood suites strives on our guest satisfaction, and to know that we are making you feel welcome it‚Äôs the best feeling there could be. Thank you so much for that. We also are happy to know you enjoyed our facility and the amenities we offer. We thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you while in the area. We look forward to see you again.

Summary: My room and the hotel itself were extremely clean. I enjoyed having a kitchenette in the room. The kitchenette includes a full fridge, cooktop, microwave and dishwasher. The hotel serves a free breakfast daily which has some hot items. The breakfast is okay, not great. I was surprised that I did not see fresh fruit at the breakfast but maybe I just missed that. As an added bonus, the hotel also serves a free dinner Monday through Thursday. I saw the Thursday night dinner, it was nothing I would call exciting (salad, rolls, ravioli) but this feature would sure help a family trying to save a bit of money on their Disney vacation.  The hotel is across the street from a Target store which makes it very easy to stock your kitchenette.  The staff were pleasant and helpful. The beds
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of busy schedule and sharing with us about your visit. We are happy to hear you enjoyed the amenities and services we offer. We also would like to thank you for your comments as it lets us know how we are doing at the property, we will definitely utilize these to ensure we can provide our guest with excellent service every time, Thank you  for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you while in the Garden Grove area, and we look forward to see you again.

Summary Heading: Great hotel...maybe not for the business traveler though...
Summary: I was working in Ahaheim...I didn't realize this was a Disney location when I booked it. It is a wonderful hotel...clean...great decor.. But, lots of families and lots of kids. Busy, busy, busy. I would definitely stay here again though .. it is a really nice facility.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share about your visit with us. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay while working in the area, and we are happy to hear that we were able to accommodate you. We definitely look forward to see you again, and maybe this time you will have a chance to go have some fun at Disneyland as well! Once more thank you for giving us the pleasure of serving you.

Summary: My wife and I along with out 8 year granddaughter spent a week and had a wonderful time. The morning breakfast was always hot and fresh and the dinner was very good as well. The room was excellent, and having a full kitchen was great. I also wanted to give a special thank you to Luis. The customer service he gives is outstanding, and he make you feel so welcome. We will be staying here again when we return to Anaheim.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that your visit with us was a memorable one, and I am happy to hear I was able to make you feel welcome as our goal here is to make sure you feel like home. Thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating while in the Garden Grove area, and thank you for sharing about your visit. We look forward to see you again if your travels bring you our way.

Summary: Decent suite room with 2 beds, a/c, fridge, microwave, 2 tv's.  we had an upper floor with a view of the disney fireworks.  The pool is awesome; very clean and clear, saltwater system, and warm.  Also, hottub was nice. It was a great "home" for the week.  The only downside was the slow elevator.  There is another one at the other end of the hallway, but we never went down that way.  All in all, this was an excellent value.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share about your visit. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our facility, and we hope we were able to make your stay with us a pleasant one. Also I am truly sorry if the elevator cause any inconvenience. We look forward to see you again if your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: Hotel provided adequate accommodations for a family vacation.  The free breakfast was nice and the hotel was convenient to Disneyland.  The hallways could have been cleaner and we wish the shuttle to the parks would have been free.  The kitchen and room are only set up for four people even though it can accommodate six -- be prepared to call housekeeping frequently if you have more than four.  Reasonable hotel for the price.  Located very close to restaurants and shopping (walking distance!).
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing about your visit with us. We are happy to hear you enjoyed the accommodations, and truly apologize about the housekeeping service. We will definitely utilize your comments to avoid this in the future. If there is anything else that you would like to share, please feel free to contact me. Once more thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and we look forward to see you gain.

Summary: My friend and I spent Labor Day weekend at this hotel for the Disneyland 1/2 Marathon.  The room was extremely large and the staff very helpful.  The shuttle to Disney was always timely and what I consider to be very inexpensive.  The breakfast was a great quality with hot and cold items that were always fresh and filled.  The managers reception was great as well with neat menu choices and again fresh food.  The reception area was also warm with fresh coffee and water all day.  The rooms were comfortable and well furnished.  The only complaint I would have is the elevator was slow - but that really is not a big deal at all in my opinion.  The location is great - a very short walk (less than a block) to a number of great restaurants (local and chain).  Overall a fantastic
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy that our comfortable rooms, value added amenities, along with our location to local restaurants and shopping stood out in order to make your visit enjoyable and memorable.  We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Excellent hotel for the price!  The staff was so friendly and helpful.  The complimentary breakfast was wonderful, and so was the complimentary dinner (manager's reception).  We will definitely stay here again next time we visit Anaheim.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit with us, and we are happy to see that we were able provide you with great service while in the area. We definitely look forward to see you again if your travels bring you our way. Once more thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you.

Summary: I had a pleasant stay at this hotel- breakfast staff was not minimal- I did not have a long wait upon arrival although would have enjoyed if I was welcomed rather than asking me, "Checking in?" . I requested for linen and it was delivered timely plus there was a follow up call to inquire if items were received nice! Parking was hard at night but over all, we had a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your visit with us, we appreciate your feedback as it allows us to see how we are doing at the property. We will definitely utilize your comments to ensure we can deliver an outstanding service. On behalf of the Homewood suites I would like to thank you for giving us the pleasure of incommoding you and we look forward to see you again.

Summary: Excellent hotel.  Front desk clerks are great, very helpful for everthing.  Always smiling.  Great light dinners, pool was always clean and ready to go.  Rooms clean and spacious.  Would definitely stay here again and again.
Manager Response: Thank you for Sharing about your visit with us, we are delighted to hear you had a great stay while in the area. We are happy to know that you enjoyed our amenities and we look forward to see you again if your travels bring you back our way. Once more thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you.

Summary Heading: It's OK, but here's what you need to know...
Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights during our trip to Disney and I would tend to agree with other reviewers that this location was not in keeping with my stays at other Homewood Suites.  Having said that, it wasn't terrible; it was just OK.  Here's my take:  Pros: - good location for Disney - price was definitely a reason why this place is attractive  - decent breakfast - friendly staff - shuttle to Disney was efficient - Starbucks in Hilton next door  Cons: - front elevator was S-L-O-W; we were on 4th floor and climb the stairs most of the time.  Couldn't imagine being on any floor higher than 4. - hotel overall needs a makeover, but the price kind of dictates what you're going to get - room phones was old and one didn't work - had some issues with temperature in room; wasn't
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy to hear that our value added amenities and friendly team stood out, and were able to assist in making your experience a memorable and enjoyable one.  I do apologize about the elevator; I know it is difficult in the mornings during the Disney rush. I am happy to announce that we just completed our in room A/C refresh, and all units are working at full capacity.

Summary: Enjoyed our stay. The complimentary breakfast was awesome. The pool was great. The staff were very polite and friendly. The only issue we had during our stay was that the elevator was too slow and took forever during peak period.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you had a great stay with us while visiting the Garden Grove area. Thank you for taking the time to share this with us and we thank you for giving us the pleasure of serving you. We look forward to see you again if your travels bring you our way.

Summary: Hi stayed in the hotel late August 2013. Made the mistake of staying in one hotel for the whole 2 weeks holiday. As California is so big really you need to travel on and not return. Having said that we did enough in Anaheim/Los Angeles not to be bored in that time. The hotel location is great for Disney as its a 10 minute walk. My kids were older so we only went to Disney for the day. The road links are great in any direction. The actual hotel whilst not the best on this strip was definitely not the worst and I felt it gave great value for money.  I was surprised to find the hotel supplies a basic breakfast and dinner which we only used twice. The suite was nice. The only negative would be if the swimming pool was bigger for the amount of guests staying. But I suspect when you
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your visit with us, We are delighted to hear about your experience, and we thank you for letting us know about the amenities you enjoyed. Thank you for staying with us and please feel free to contact me if there is anything else you would like to share about your visit. We look forward to see you again if your travels bring you our way.

Summary Heading: Grandparent's trip with a five year old
Summary: This is our fifth trip with a grandchild on their fifth birthday to Homewood Suites, Garden Grove.  We find the distance to Disneyland is manageable with the shuttle, quiet rooms, a great pool and good service.  Trip one we landed at Homewood Suites by chance but were happy and continue to return.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us, and we thank you for the loyalty. We are happy to know that you are satisfied with the amenities, and we thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you and the family once more. We do look forward to see you again if your travels bring you our way.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel but not sure if I would stay there again
Summary: Got there early to pre-checkin and was going to leave to the beach. They told me room will be ready in 1 hour so I decided not to go to the beach and instead go to the pool and shop at target. I returned almost 2 1/2 hrs later and still not ready. Didnt seem to care about what he told us earlier. Other guests had same dillema. A lot of upset guests in lobby. Not a great start. Rooms very nice except pull out sofa bed, very uncomfortable. Food was okay to good. No waffle maker or fresh fruit, bummer. Take away alcohol and make food better! $12 for parking...ouch. Would I stay here again, maybe but would look for closer hotel first. Shuttle service great but can get crowded. Overall good experience.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  We will review this at length and ensure additional training, and focus is given.

Summary: Luckily I didn't read all the negative reviews before I booked or I might not have stayed at this great hotel.  We arrived at 6:55 and the staff sent us over to get our complimentary dinner before we checked in so we wouldn't miss it!  Stayed there Tuesday thru Friday, beds were comfy, rooms were clean. Loved the exercise room, music was too loud in there with the TV, but the front desk turned it off for us, the pool temp was nice for once as usually hotel pools are cold, hot tub was great.  It seemed like staff went out of their way to accommodate for everything.....here is the negative...never seen so many people destroying the breakfast buffet every morning, I always take a few things to eat later, but people were taking ridiculous amounts of food, I saw someone line up a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to share with us about your visit. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your visit, and we thank you for giving us the pleasure of serving you while in the Garden Grove area. We are really happy to know we were able to serve you and we look forward to see you again in the future. Please feel free to contact me if there is anything else you would like to share about your stay. Once more Thank you and we look forward to your next trip.

Summary: Fantastic hotel with excellent clean facilities and helpful staff. Hotel is with access to major attractions in the area. The buffet breakfast and complimentary Monday to Thursday  evening meals are additional attractions.  The facility is best suited for families. I will stay here again and again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us, and on behalf of the Homewood suites staff we are delighted to hear we were able to make your visit a great one. We do look forward to see you again and once more thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you while visiting the area.

Summary: Good Hotel all around. Pool area is fine. All the staff we met were very friedly and happy to answer our question. We stayed there for a full week and breakfast were very good everyday. They also offer complementary dinner between monday-thursday and for a family of 5 we save lot of money!  Family friendly hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your visit with us. We appreciate your feedback and we are happy to see that you had an amazing stay. Our guest satisfaction is our number one priority and I hope we were able to exceed your expectations. We look forward to have the pleasure of serving you once more if your travels bring you back to Garden Grove.

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights (6 of us) while going to Disney and Universal. The location was great as it was close enough to Disney parking for a short easy drive. Across from Target for all your shopping needs to stock the fridge. The continental breakfasts were great and so convenient. We had a great view from our suite of the fireworks each night. The room was a little small for the six of us at the prices we paid I wish there had been bigger suites with two bathrooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience while visiting the Garden Grove area, we are delighted to hear you were satisfied with the amenities and do look forward to see you again if your travels bring you our way. Please feel free to contact me if there is anything else that you might like to share about your visit. Thank you for giving us the opportunity of serving you once again.

Summary: This hotel has the worst service I have ever received from a Hilton Brand Hotel ever. The hotel cleaning staff is horrible and they are under staffed big time. The rooms are dirty and cleaned properly and the staff or management does not fix the problems ever. Would not recommend taking your family to this hotel. I am a Hilton Honors Member and would not recommend this hotel in the past it was a good place to stay but since 2009 it has gone down hill.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  We will review this at length and ensure additional training, and focus is given.

Summary Heading: Decent hotel and shuttle, improvement needed with staff
Summary: The issues we had could have totally been handled but unfortunately the staff seems to be lacking in customer service and attention to the hotel. It took 5 conversations to get a pack and play in room. The room phone did not work and the pool majorly needs a thorough cleaning (lots of tree leaves, sand, etc). The breakfast was just ok. Staff was rude to my husband when he went to go get milk from my 1 year old becuase it was "5 minutes early".
