Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  We will review this at length and ensure additional training, and focus is given.

Summary: Housekeeping left us without any towels on two different days.  On the first day, they also only half finished one of the beds.  I must have been a pretty normal thing, because they kept a long list of issues at the front desk.  Apart from that, we had a nice stay.  It's in a nice location, comfortable, and close to Disneyland.  We took advantage of all the meals (breakfast every day, and dinner on weeknights).
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to share about your visit with us. I truly apologize about the inconvenience with housekeeping service and deeply regret the constant issue. I will make sure to share this with my team to ensure that we can improve on this matter. Once again I do thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you while visiting Garden Grove, and we look forward to see you again if your travels bring you our way.

Summary: Always friendly, clean rooms, good breakfast buffet but miss the waffle machines. The staff is first rate, especially Luis. He always makes us feel special. The only bad thing we had to complain about was the lack of washcloths and hand towels in our room. We will be back and always recommend this hotel to our friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your visit with us. I am happy to hear that we were able to make your trip a good one, and thank you for giving us the pleasure of accommodating you. I deeply regret the lack of towels during stay, and we will definitely touch base with our housekeeping department on this regards. Once more thank you for your time and I am happy to know that I can make your visit special. Feel free to contact me if there is anything else that I can do for you.

Summary: Although this hotel delivers on the basic Homewood Suites promises, it has enough major flaws that I probably won't stay here again.   First, the good: A spacious, reasonably clean suite in good working order, free wi-fi, free breakfast, and uniformly friendly, helpful front desk staff. But the bad:  --Elevators work only intermittently. One of the two only goes to the 6th floor -- in a 7-story hotel. And when the main elevator does work, it's hot, excruciatingly slow, and makes weird noises. Kind of a Tower of Terror preview, minus the elegant detailing -- and the fun.  --Stairs marked"fire exit only." --The darkest, creepiest hallway I've ever seen in a nice-ish hotel, reeking of ancient cigarette smoke.  --Lackluster food at breakfast and insufficient seating area.  --Room
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  We will review this at length and ensure additional training, and focus is given.

Summary Heading: We love the Homewood Suites experience.
Summary: We got great customer service from Fabiana! She was helpful, courteous and friendly. We love this place and stay here every time we visit. Everyone on staff does an excellent job making us feel at home.
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing one of our amazing front desk agents, we are happy to see that we made you feel like home and we are delighted to also hear your visit with us was a pleasant one. We look forward to see you in the future if your travels bring you our way.

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel for an extended stay
Summary: We stayed for 8 nites during our trip to Disneyland August 2013.  I was very pleased with the hotel and the staff.  The breakfast had a good variety as well as the dinner.  My kids were happy with the pool.  We will be staying there again when we come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us your experience during visit. We are delighted to hear that the whole family enjoyed their stay; we would like to see you again if your travels bring you our way.

Summary Heading: My Favorite Hotel in the Disneyland Area
Summary: Our family makes a trip to Disneyland every year.  This hotel is my first choice to stay.  It is a little bit more expensive than some of the others in the area, but when you look at the value that you  get for your money this is a true bargain.  The rooms are large suites with room for up to six people.  The hotel has a complimentary hot breakfast buffet every morning and serves a complimentary light dinner Monday through Thursday.  There is a shuttle to Disneyland every half hour.    The staff here is wonderful.  The front desk staff, the cleaning staff, and the staff who take care of breakfast and dinner are all very kind, polite, and friendly.  This is a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for nice room tip you provided to our readers.  We like to thank you as well for taking the time to post this review regarding a recent visit to this hotel.  We appreciate your feedback as it allows us to see how we are doing from the perspective of our guests.  Thank you and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I wanted to give this 4 stars but couldn't quite convince myself it warranted that - maybe 3.5 would be right. I have had good experiences at Homewood Suites properties in the past and this one just fell short in a few areas. The main plus for this hotel is the one-bedroom suite. It is great for families, particularly if on a longer stay and wanting to take advantage of the mini-kitchen. The sofa-bed in the living room was terrible though - my daughter slept on the large couch without pulling out the sofa-bed - much more comfortable. Some of the furnishings were worn and there were a couple of minor cleaning issues upon our arrival in the room.  The staff were excellent and seemed very keen to ensure we had a good stay. However, the pool was a little cloudy with a number of bugs
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to complete a Trip Advisor review.  We deeply regret that you experience some minor cleaning issues upon your arrival and apologize that the sofa-bed was not very comfortable.  I‚Äôm glad you enjoyed your stay overall and found our staff very helpful.  On behalf of our entire staff here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton, we apologize for the concerns you have about your experience at this hotel.  We appreciate the feedback and will use it to fine tune our operations in the hope that upon your next visit, we will meet or exceed your expectations.

Summary: We had a very good time on our vacation.  The Holtel was a great value for my Family.  The FULL price was a little higher than we expected, and not all the FEES were explained.  Parking should be free and the bus to Disneyland should be included in the price of staying at the hotel.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us!  Thank you for taking time to complete a Trip Advisor review.  We appreciate your business and hope to see you again the next time your travels bring you to our area.

Summary: Very nice, comfortable, helpful,  we had a nice trip and the staff was very helpful and quickly responsive to questions. etc. So this requires 200 characters and I cant think of anything else to say, nice place...very nice
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this very kind and true words about of staff.  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to your next visit!!

Summary Heading: Great for any family visiting Disneyland
Summary: Just spent 3 days here during our visit to Disneyland. They were able to sneak us in a few hours early to accomidate our kids being able to take naps. Rooms were clean and there were no issues with staff. We ate 2 breakfasts and 1 dinner in the lobby area and were all happy with food variety. Shuttle service to Disneyland gates were a huge benefit to visitors.
Manager Response: Happy to hear we were able to accommodate your family with an early check-in and your feedback is greatly appreciated.  We are glad you were satisfied with the amenities and had found our staff helpful.  On behalf of our entire staff here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton we would like to thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again when your travels bring you back to the area!

Summary: Everything pretty much perfect from the gang who made up the room - Look out for Sonia, she made animals out of the room towels which really impressed the kids to the extremely attentive staff at breakfast and the managers reception.  One of of the staff operated the lift for us when our hands were full.  Wifi worked fine and good, regular shuttle to Disney.  Pool also good.  We've stayed before and will stay again.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us! We appreciate your feed and I‚Äôm glad you found our breakfast and manager‚Äôs reception staff to be attentive and helpful.  Thank you for taking the time to post this review and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: had problems with a/c leaked all over clean close, bathroom toilet ran entire stay told front desk. curtains had been shredded, housekeeping sent letter saying not cleaning room after 12 and it stated 3pm what last time they clean. not great hotel for 1400.00 6 days.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to complete a Trip Advisor review regarding your recent stay with us.  On behalf of our entire staff here at the Homewood Suites/Garden Grove, we apologize for the concerns you have about your experience at this hotel.  We appreciate the feedback and we will use it to fine tune our operations in the hope that upon your next visit, we will meet or exceed your expectations.

Summary: All I can say is I have never met such kind people at a hotel ever! They were all wonderful, Luis you're AWESOME!!!! Thank you for all your help with questions to locations and restaurants. Managers he is a special person....The rooms are very nice, beds very comfortable, free breakfast awesome and free coffee was wonderful, I really have nothing negative to say about this hotel, only thing I can think of is WiFi slow and need bigger room garbage cans...LOL!!! Shuttle to Disney great. Location wonderful for Disney! We will return if we ever come to California again.
Manager Response: Luis is AWESOME!! Thank you for your kind words and taking some time to praise our wonderful staff.  I‚Äôm glad you enjoyed your visit at our hotel and thank you for the helpful feedback regarding our trash cans and Wi-Fi connection.  We look forward to having the opportunity to ‚Äúwelcome you back‚Äù on your next visit to ‚ÄúSunny California.‚Äù

Summary: We stayed about a week for a sporting activity for my daughter.  The room was comfortable and had adequate space for my family of 5.  The two older kids fought over who got to sleep on the couch.  The complementary breakfast and managers reception (a complementary dinner) were great (as an additional service - for the convenience they really helped with the budget for the week).  Plenty of local dining if you don't like the menu for the evening.  Room was clean and well maintained.  The location was perfect for our needs.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us!  I‚Äôm glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and evening manager‚Äôs reception.  We appreciate your business and hope to see you again the next time your travels bring you to our area.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: Does what it says on the tin!
Summary: If you want clean, comfortable and affordable family accommodation close to Disneyland then the Homewood Suites Anaheim Main Gate fits the bill.    Regular shuttle services to Disney pick up and drop off outside the property from early until late which is what most people are there for after all.  It is also conveniently located for family style dining - Joe's Crab Shack, Buca di Beppo and Oggis (amongst others) after long days at the park.  I noticed Target across the road now offers fresh food too.  This was our second stay at this property, which is not as large as some of the other hotel chains in the area and a bit more friendly (a plus point having stayed at a frantically busy Embassy Suites and rather impersonal Doubletree in the past).    Following a friendly welcome at
Manager Response: I like to thank you for taking some time out of your busy day to post this review.  We greatly appreciate your feedback and thank you for the comment of how helpful the staff was.  We are glad you enjoyed the breakfast and our manager‚Äôs receptions during you visit.  We look forward to having the opportunity to serve you on your next visit!

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay.  The staff was professional and friendly. There was one guy, in particular, who every time we passed him, smiled really big and said "be sure to call the front desk if you need ANYTHING" - totally made us feel welcome.  The food was AWESOME!  Breakfast was a buffet of any/all breakfast food and drinks imaginable, and the hot dinner was delicious and a total $-savings!!!  The shuttle was great - prompt, happy drivers who were always helpful with wrangling strollers on and off :). Our room was comfortable and clean and having the fridge, microwave and stove was perfect for our fam.  The only thing we didn't like was the elevator seemed pretty old and iffy...and it took a LONG time to get to our floor (we were on the 6th), and when we got home and
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time out of your busy day to post this amazing review regarding your recent visit to Homewood Suites by Hilton.  It‚Äôs exciting to read that our staff was professional and friendly throughout your visit.  I‚Äôm glad you enjoyed your stay with us and please feel free to contact me if you have any further questions regarding the lost and found item.  We appreciate your business and hope to see you again the next time your travels bring you to our area.

Summary: Visited June 23rd and leaving June 30th (middle of August the two preceding trips).  The key card for our room has written "If this card could talk, it would say "Welcome home."" - this is EXACTLY how we feel every time we have been at the Homewood Suites - Garden Grove!  This was our third stay at Homewood - Garden Grove in the last three years consecutively - EVERY stay was as good as the last and we plan to visit again, guaranteed! Our 5 y/o calls it our "new home" by "the Diz".  All the staff (front desk, management, maintenance, house keeping, etc.) are ALWAYS offering warm greetings, excellent advice when questioned, offering extra services at no charge, etc.   For example, we did not have roomed cleaned daily - anytime we did not the staff left a personalized note under
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us!  Our guests‚Äô satisfaction is our #1 goal.  We look forward to having the opportunity to serve you on your next visit to the Anaheim and Garden Grove area.  Thank you for taking the time for the detailed review and glad to hear you enjoyed your visit.  On behalf of our entire staff here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton we would like to thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again when your travels bring you back to the area!

Summary: Our hotel was very clean.  The staff was extremely helpful.  It really was a bargain for what you get, and a great place for a family to stay.  The pool was really nice to use even at the end of the day.  The food was good and plentiful.  The manager's reception was also very good, and nice to have the added bonus of a light dinner if you wanted to avoid paying huge amounts of money for dinner at Disneyland.  The room was always clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review.  We appreciate your feedback as it allows us to see how we are doing from the perspective of our guests.  I‚Äôm glad you enjoyed your stay with us and enjoyed our delicious manager‚Äôs reception.  On behalf of our entire staff here at the Homewood Suites we would like to thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again when your travels bring you back to the area!

Summary Heading: Overall Good Stay, a Few Areas for Improvement
Summary: We stayed here with our family since the property is adjacent to Disneyland. We enjoyed the convenience to the park, and it was nice to be so close. Overall, the property seemed clean, and we didn't notice any issues in that regard. We definitely took advantage of the breakfast every day. It was filling, and the hot choices were different each day. The staff was friendly and accommodating, even when we had to call the front desk about the after-hours traffic at the pool (our room was directly up from the pool and it was full of loud teenagers after 10:00 p.m.). Our suite was plenty spacious, and we enjoyed having elbow room for kids and parents alike.  My only issues were the slow elevator, and the other guests who seemed to be part of traveling sports teams. Some of those
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and are delighted to hear that you will stay here again.  I‚Äôm glad you enjoyed your stay with us.  Please feel free to contact me if there is anything you would like to share extra about your experience with us.  We appreciate your business and thank you for your Hilton loyalty.

Summary Heading: Foul Smell and poor check in experience
Summary: When we entered the floor, there was a foul smell in the lobby and our room. We had to keep the AC running for atleast 20 minutes to let the smell go. seems there is no ventilation in the hotel.   the moment we entered the bathroom, there was no shower curtain / hair dryer, we called the hotel reception and after 1.5 hours some hotel staff came with shower curtain, when we asked abut dryer they said please call reception again. WE called the recepetion again and they said that they will send it which came during the next room service.  The complimentary breakfast is prepared without keeping the count of people staying in hotel in mind. we stayed there for 2 days and both days, people were struggling to get the breakfast.. Horrible experience. I would NOT recommend this hotel to
Manager Response: Your feedback is greatly appreciated.  We deeply regret that the ventilation in the room and the breakfast rush negatively impacted your visit.  We appreciate your feedback and we will utilize your comments to ensure we are providing the best experience for our guests.  Thank you for staying with us and it our hope that we will have the pleasure of accommodating you on your future visits.

Summary: We were here for 6 nights July14-20.  The desk staff were very friendly always a pleasant hello coming or going.  We had a room with 2 queens and there was lots of room.  Kinda nice not to have the sink in the bathroom it allows for more than 1 person to get ready at a time.  As per other reviews, yes the elevators are slow so I had requested a room on the 2nd floor, and we just took the stairs.  The shuttle service to Disneyland is very efficient and on time, every 1/2 hour and you can buy passes at the front desk for about $5 per person per day, and they can be purchased for several days.  The breakfasts were nice to have before heading out to the park, we were always down early so lots of food, good coffee too.  We were not back at the hotel to try the suppers.  Target just
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to complete this detail post.  We take pride in our hotel as we strive to exceed all of our guests‚Äô expectations.  I‚Äôm glad your enjoyed your visit with us and experience the fun shout out when you order a ‚ÄúShark Bite‚Äù from Joe‚Äôs Crab Shack.  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: This was our 2nd stay and we were again impressed with the outstanding customer service. The staff went out of their way to make us feel welcome and promptly attended to some minor issues and requests for more towels, sheets, etc.  Our one bedroom suite with kitchen was clean, spacious and comfortable.  The lobby/reception/breakfast area is spacious, light and welcoming with lovely decor.  Breakfast was excellent with quality food and great choices.  The mealtime staff constantly worked to keep up with restocking and tidying, and made an effort to greet guests as they arrived.  Andres provided especially personal service.  The full dinner Mon - Thu was delicious and a great saving for our family over a two week stay.  The pool area is well maintained, clean and very pleasant,
Manager Response: Thank you for the amazing feedback!!  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciated your feedback.  I have shared with Andres your post.  On behalf of Andres and our entire staff here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton we would like to thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again.

Summary: i thought the rooms were great. slept well. the problem was cold coffee in AM, working out was uncomfortable with bad equipment (treadmills), and  being asked if I was a guest when eating breakfast. I felt as if I wasn't welcomed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your Trip Advisor post regarding your recent stay with us, and we appreciate you taking the time out of your busy schedule to let us know how we are doing.  Our goal here is to ensure every guest has an exceptional experience while in Anaheim.  We deeply regret that the treadmills were not working properly during you stay.  We apologize for the inconvenience and hope that we will have the pleasure of accommodating you on your future trips to the Anaheim and Garden Grove area.

Summary Heading: We love this hotel - great value!
Summary: The staff is very helpful. The suite is terrific especially the two TVs for a family. Nice to have the Disneyland shuttle outside the front door. Love the free breakfast & dinner for the value! Don't forget to ask for the coupon for Oggi's across the street - great food!
Manager Response: The Homewood Suites team appreciates your feedback and we are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.  On behalf of our entire staff here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton we would like to thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again when your travels bring you back to the area!  Thank you and have a great day!!

Summary Heading: Great amenities but showing it's age
Summary: I've stayed at the hotel twice, once in 2009 and again during July 9-13 2013.  My overall reaction of this hotel has changed since it is getting well past it's prime. Previous amenities and facilities I was so impressed with before are now run-down and not maintained.  I have recommended many families to stay here when they were planning their trip to Disney, (and who actually booked and stayed there) as there is a shuttle, free breakfast and each room in a suite, which is fantastic.  (My positive experience this trip in 2013 was made because of the SUPERB front desk staff, who were always extremely friendly, professional and helpful.) However, when I experienced the hotel again this year, (as opposed to 4 years ago) I found that the facility has not been maintained. The
Manager Response: Your feedback is greatly appreciated.  Out guests‚Äô satisfaction is our #1 goal and I‚Äôm glad to hear that our front desk staff was SUPERB.  We appreciate your feedback as it allows us to see how we are doing from perspective of our guests.  Thank you for staying with us and it is our hope that we will have the pleasure of accommodating you on your future trips to Anaheim and Garden Grove area.

Summary: This hotel has everything you need for your family. Free hot breakfast, free wifi, a nice pool area (including kiddie pool and hot tub), outdoor grills for use, a nice kitchen area in every room, dinner Monday - Thursday, prompt shuttle service to Disneyland, free crib and high chairs provided... It was great!
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us!  We appreciated your feedback and look foward to having the opportunity to serve you on your next visit to the "Sunny" California.

Summary: Poor check in service, let us sit there for 15 minutes before checking in.  Dishwasher in room was very loud and difficult to close.  Only one burner of the 2 worked.  No oven in the full kitchen.  Air conditioner in the bedroom leaked and the floor was wet our entire stay.  Poor quality of food offered and not a wide variety of selection to choose from.  Had to ask for my bill upon check out to be able to verify it was correct before leaving.  Loud neighbors in next room and could hear everything they were saying.  States it's at the main gate area of Disney- actually about 3 miles from Disney- but do have a shuttle if you pay for it.
Manager Response: Hi Leslie, It definitely seems as if we have failed you and I would like to apologize and see what I can do to make this right.  Since I am unable to determine your reservation contact information off of TripAdvisor, I would request that you contact me at your earliest convenience.  Just to clarify and I apologize for any misrepresentation, the Disneyland entrance is 1.5 miles from Homewood Suites, and 1.1 miles to the closest edge of Disneyland.  Again my sincerest apologies and I look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: wonderful hotel, staff was freindly , room was large free breakfast everyday free dinner most nights couldn't ask for a better hotel. The girls at the front desk had great recommendation for sight seeing and help book tours and discount tickets to attractions. we will stay at this hotel again
Manager Response: Karen, thank you so much for taking your valuable time to reach out and tell us about your visit.  I am so glad to hear that our great team, along with our value added amenities helped make your visit memorable and enjoyable.  Thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites Anaheim Main-Gate, and I look forward to serving you again on your next trip.

Summary: rooms felt old and out dated, dark carpet, furniture and bedding.  Dark and worn looking lobby. Service ok...some staff acted indifferent to questions. location was perfect for experiencing the Disney Resorts - provided shuttle for a fee.
Manager Response: Elaine, I am so sorry to hear that our d√©cor was not to your taste.  I am happy to report that we are finishing up our rooms renovation, and will be changing our drapery, which will be complete within the week.  By the end of the year we will complete the bedding change, which should help lighten up our guest rooms a bit. Additionally I apologize about the staff; I typically get great feedback on my team.  If you would reach out to me, and provide me specifics I would greatly appreciate it.  I am glad to hear that our location to Disneyland helped make your visit memorable.  Thank you for your valuable feedback, I look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: We stayed at Homewood Suites in Anaheim California for our family vacation.  It was a very quite room and had breakfast everyday.  We saw the fireworks from Disneyland every night from our room on the 7th floor.  The poor was nice and warm.
Manager Response: Charlotte, thank you so much for taking your valuable time to reach out and tell us about your visit.  I am so glad to hear that our rooms, value added amenities and pool helped make your visit memorable and enjoyable.  Thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites Anaheim Main-Gate, and I look forward to serving you again on your next trip.

Summary: Very clean hotel and helpful staff.  The shuttle to Disneyland was very efficient, and the daily breakfast was great!  I would highly recommend this hotel for anyone going on a business trip or family vacation to the "happiest place on earth."
Manager Response: Jack, thank you so much for taking your valuable time to reach out and tell us about your visit.  I am glad to hear that our great team, location to Disneyland, along with our value added amenities helped make your visit memorable and enjoyable.  Thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites Anaheim Main-Gate, and I look forward to serving you again on your next trip.

Summary: "Staycation" for us. Room for the crowd. Nice to have more than just a room and a bathroom. It's nice to have space for everyone. The pull out couch for the kids was also a plus. Only one person per couch though, a little rough.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your valuable time to reach out and tell us about your visit.  I am so glad to hear that our spacious guest rooms were able to make your visit memorable and enjoyable.  Thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites Anaheim Main-Gate, and I look forward to serving you again on your next trip.

Summary: This is our second time staying here at this property.  It seems it has lost it's shine for us...let me just start by saying the pool was disgusting this visit.  We were there this past weekend (and it was hot in LA)!  It would have been nice to use the pool more than once but after our first dip in the pool I was totally grossed out.  The side of the pool had so much guck and build up on the side that people were scraping their names in it.  The corners of the pool and jacuzzi also had mold build up.  DISGUSTING!  Needless to say...we didn't get back in.  I am sorry to say we had reservations for this property for this upcoming August and November and I have cancelled because of this...and one of these reservations is darn near free with my Hilton points.    Also...tacking on
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I do apologize for the many challenges and for any disruption due to the renovation, but am happy to announce that the main component is now complete.  I am happy to hear that the team along with our clean rooms and comfortable beds stood out, and were able to make your visit enjoyable in a small way.

Summary: good location, close to Disneyland. Breakfast included. Suite with seperate sitting area and kitchen with full refrigerator was very nice. Was able to keep drinks and heat up a quick dinner to save some money. Several restaurants close, could walk and do take out very easily.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy that our comfortable rooms, value added amenities, along with our location to local restaurants and shopping stood out in order to make your visit enjoyable and memorable.  We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: Great hotel to stay in for our Disneyland vacation
Summary: Separate bedrooms and living room for lots of space; great morning hot/cold breakfast and also dinner (Mon to Thur); clean new looking room with coin laundry; everything I look for in a hotel.  I wish they didn't charge a parking fee (although I asked to have it waived due to our previous stays here) like at a similar sister hotel at Embassy Suites.  :)
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy that our refurbished rooms, along with our value added amenities stood out in order to make your visit enjoyable and memorable.  We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: After our four hour flight from Illinois we pulled into the Homewood Suites hoping that all would be in readiness for our arrival.  Realizing we were a bit before the 3 p.m. check in, we were hoping to get in early so we could take a quick nap.  Not only were they ready for us, but they surprised us that they had upgraded our one bedroom, two bed suite to a two bedroom, two bathroom suite at no charge so our family of four would be more comfortable!  What a terrific surprise!!  We were shocked as we had already been given a highly discounted rate because we are church tour group coordinators and had booked reservations for 27 rooms in March, 2015.  What a wonderful gesture on their part!  The hotel was involved in renovations with the room interiors completed.  The granite
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy that our renovated rooms, great team, along with our value added amenities, stood out in order to make your visit enjoyable and memorable.  We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: Great Value, Good Customer Service, OK property
Summary: We stayed with an infant and 4 year old for 4 nights. if i can i would have 3.5 stars. I have not made up my mind on if i will return to this property or not.   Some issues  :  Reservation was messed up. They changed daily rate of booked price just becuase it was high in demand. - it was later resolved but i just never heard that before and i have been diamond VIP with hilton.   Room cleaning : staff missed 2 days of cleaning while they had all day to clean. we had to remind it again   evening dinner : no real vegetarian choices  Room : Kind of small, dated furniture. had to call too many times to fix the drawer that keep rolling out, was hazard to 4 year old running around.  Noise : i was on ground floor, we heard a loud banging constant noise starting 3.30am. we called at 4am.
Manager Response: My apologies, for the situations you endured.  Please call me at your earliest convenience to discuss in detail.  Again, my sincerest apologies and I look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: We spent three days at Homewood suites and two of the days our rooms were not cleaned.  We would spend most of the day at Disneyland giving the housekeeping staff enough time to have rooms cleaned.  It appears that more staff are need to get the job done in a timely manner.  I will NEVER stay at the Homewood suites in Anaheim again.  And the complimentary food is not worth the reason to stay. TERRIBLE HOTEL.  If you decide to stay just know there is a 100% money back guarantee that was never mentioned by the front staff.
Manager Response: Dear Staci, I can't begin to apologize enough.  Please call me at your earliest convenience to obtain more detail.  Again my sincerest apologies and I look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: Just like staying at home! Allen was ABSOLUTELY very accomodating during our stay. i've stayed before but this stay meant so much more! After checking in to a nearby motel and having dire issues, i contacted Homewood Suites & spoke to Allen (Sat 6/15/13, 6:30am). I explained my situation and the immediate need for a room. Allen went above & beyond to assist me/my family - he immediately reserved our room and said would have it ready when we would come in. An hour later when we finally arrived, we checked in, and were able to get in to our room, which is not the ordinary protocol for checking in (Allen explained that typically we wouldn't be able to get in to our room until 3pm or after but because of our emergency, he'd get us in right away). Thanks Allen - we appreciate your
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy to hear that Alan was able to provide the ‚Äúwow‚Äù factor that we constantly strive for, and I am also happy to hear that our value added amenities along with our rooms stood out, in order to make your experience a memorable and enjoyable one.    We all look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Our first experience with this hotel was not a great one, whereas the staff treated us like garbage right from the time we walked in until the time we left. Staff at the hotel witness this first hand but did nothing to support us. After our horrific experience we received a call apologizing for what we had to endure and we were told that the company would like to make it up to us by having us come back and receive much better treatment then what he had to endure the first time and that they would make things right for us by offering us a huge discount rate about $80 per night which included parking and free shuttle service to the park. When calling the hotel back to try and book this they cannot find any such offer that my wife and I and our other guest who witnessed this call
Manager Response: Dear Mark, I am sorry to hear about your experience.  I would definitely like you to call me so that we can discuss the certificate that it seems would did not honor.  Since we do tract all certificates, I will be able to pull it up, even if you have misplaced yours, and I will be more than happy to refund any over-payment that you made to us.  Again, my sincerest apologies, and I look forward to speaking with you and getting this resolved.

Summary: From the warm, helpful greeting/check-in to check-out this was the perfect choice for a stay while visiting Disneyland.  At check in was able to purchase Disneyland tickets and $5 shuttle tickets.  These charges were just added to the hotel bill therefore got those extra Hilton points. Room rate quite reasonable for this location.  Love Homewood Suites.  The suites are spacious with full kitchens (nice to have a refrigerator); have separate living room area and bedroom area with tv in each area; their breakfast buffets are large and very good; and Mon-Thurs nights there is a light - but good - buffet dinner included with the room.  This location was in the same parking lot as an Outback Steakhouse and a couple of other restaurants.  We walked over to the Outback two nights.  The
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your valuable time to reach out and tell us about your visit.  I am so glad to hear that our great team, location to shopping and local restaurants, along with our value added amenities helped make your visit memorable and enjoyable.  Thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites Anaheim Main-Gate, and I look forward to serving you again on your next trip.

Summary: It was a great place to stay, we were on the sixth floor facing Disney and watched the fireworks on Friday, Saturday and Sunday it was beautiful to see.  The breakfast was very good and the Manager's supper was okay my husband really like it but I did not like it as much because I have  to watch what I can eat.
Manager Response: Hazel, thank you so much for taking your valuable time to reach out and tell us about your visit.  I am so glad to hear that your room facing Disneyland, along with our food helped make your visit memorable and enjoyable.  Thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites Anaheim Main-Gate, and I look forward to serving you again on your next trip.

Summary: This hotel was perfect for our 5 person trip to Disneyland.  Price was exactly right, complimentary full cooked breakfast, free coffee and soda all day and free beer and wine at night was awesome!  Staffmembers were very upbeat and helpful.  If you book your stay through hotel website you do pay nominal fees for Disney Shuttle and Parking - it is only free if you book through a Disney package - but shuttle to the park worked great.  Hotel in walking distance of restaurants (and a Target!).  Really great location and choice for people traveling with families.  The main areas in hotel were great and they are in process of renovating some of the dreary sleeping rooms --- but for price, proximity and amenities offered it is a great choice and you will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Hi Jennifer, thank you so much for taking your valuable time to reach out and tell us about your visit.  I am so glad to hear that our great team, location to shopping and local restaurants, along with our value added amenities helped make your visit memorable and enjoyable.  Thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites Anaheim Main-Gate, and I look forward to serving you again on your next trip.

Summary: Highly recommend this close to Disneyland hotel. Exceptional and friendly service. Quality complimentary breakfast. This was a top shelf experience for a long time Hilton Honors member. Nice brew pub next door.
Manager Response: Jeffrey, I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy that location in proximity to Disneyland, great team, along with our value added amenities, stood out in order to make your visit enjoyable and memorable.  We look forward to seeing you again.

The rooms were very quiet. The breakfast was average with many choices. They say the parking was $12 but it was waived.  The price of the room was average -same price as the embassy or the ayers or Marriott but with checking in early free and free parking, We will be back again for sure!

Some pillows on the couch would have been nice since it has a very flat back. We just used some of the extras from the bedroom. We have paid much more for 1/2 the room many times before. Summary: Overall this hotel was wonderful. Very polite staff and helpful. The only negative thing I have is that there are only 2 elevators for the entire hotel and they are very slow on top of it. We spent a lot of time just waiting for elevators with our strollers.  Not a big issue but my friend has stayed here before when they offered free shuttle service to Disneyland. Now you have to pay $5 a day per person.  That did add up to quite a bit of money I wasn't expecting to pay.  I would probably stay here again though.
