Summary: Was surprised by the size of the rooms, friendliness and helpfulness of the staff, and exceptional value of this well located property. I have stayed in hotels much closer to Disney, but the small inconvenience of the distance to Disney will certainly be offset by its many other attractive features.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy to hear that the team was able make your visit positively memorable.  Thank you again and I look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: The Suite and hospitality was unexpected for the price.
Summary: The Suite and hospitality was unexpected for the price.  They could have charged double their current rate!!!  Very friendly staff both during the day and at night.  They always went above and beyond any requests that I had.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy to hear that the team was able make your visit positively memorable.  Thank you again and I look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: One of the best hotel experiences I have ever had
Summary: I liked everything about my stay here. We came to go to Disneyland, and we were so comfortable. I would highly recommend Homewood Suites to anyone looking for the best value for their travelling dollars.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy to hear that the team was able make your visit positively memorable.  Thank you again and I look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: We had an aboslutey wonderful trip.  We always stay at this hotel, we love the staff...especially Luis and Connie!  They welcome us each and every time and treat us as if we are family. We enjoy the morning breakfast and evening managers reception, it really helps save money....we only have to pay for lunch at the Disney parks.... Thank you so much to the entire staff for making our annual Spring Break trip a success!
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy to hear that the team was able make your visit positively memorable.  Thank you again and I look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: We stayed here for several nights in mid March. Our room size was rather small compared to the other Homewood Suites rooms we have stayed in. The doors in the room would not close unless you pushed them rather hard, which wake everyone up every time someone got up to get a drink or use the bathroom doing the night. The room was also located on the first floor next to a side door which got used a lot and could be heard opening and closing every time someone used it all night. Housekeeping was vacuuming the hallway at 6am right outside the door that morning. We were told we could move rooms and that our luggage would be moved while we were at Disneyland, but when we returned at 10pm we were told no rooms became available, then when I asked them to check again there was a room
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know the challenges experienced during your visit.    I will be working closely with my housekeeping and engineering departments to ensure we put these issues are put behind us, and am sure our current renovation will help leap us forward as well.  Please accept my sincerest apologies, and am sure these will not be problems during your next visit.

Summary: The hotel was ok. PROS: The space with kids. We've stayed in Homewood Suites before and enjoy the room sizes.  The pool area was very nice.  The service of the front desk staff was great and the price was right. CONS: it is a tired property. The housekeeping staff didn't clean our room for 2 days despite continuous calls.  Food was pretty bad.   I am a Loyal Hilton member and love their properties, but this one left something to be desired. Like I said it wasn't great and wasn't terrible
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy to hear that the team was able make your visit positively memorable.  Thank you again and I look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: Rooms were good, appliances worked & were modern, convenient Disney shuttle. Pool broke down while we were there, but staff made arrangements with hotel next door to use there pool so worked out well. Great location - lots of restaurants close by and a Target with full grocery store across the street - great for saving money on eating when going to Disneyland, or if (like us) you have people with dietary restrictions and can't eat out a heck of a lot. Elevator very slow, but overall, very good experience. Would stay again.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy to hear that the team was able make your visit positively memorable.  Thank you again and I look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: One needed a PHD to figure out the possessed AC system and of course the windows would not open. Nothing like dragging kids around Disneyland and returning to a sauna only to find complicated directions on how to work the AC. I travel a lot and this thermostat was waaaaay tto complicated and went back to 80 degrees every night at 4 am. Go to the pool? Yeah right it too was out of commission during our visit. Kids loved that......great transportation to park though great staff and welcome reception with free wine was excellent after a Disney-Day. The temp thing woke us all up every night though and was a deal breaker.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I do apologize about the disruption due to thermostat programming challenges.  As we don‚Äôt get many of these complaints, on your next visit, please reach out to the team and we will have someone come to your room, to ensure it is programmed to your liking.  I do apologize about the pool as well.  Unfortunately the system was vandalized, and was out of service for about 3 days.  I am happy to hear that the team stood out, and that we were able to accommodate you in a small way.  I am also happy to announce our rooms and corridor renovation, so hopefully we will see you soon, and you will be able to enjoy our refreshed look.

Summary: This is a decent hotel.  The rooms have a full kitchen, however for a family of 6 its kind of a small suite. The sofa and carpeting is not the cleanest. It was a quiet hotel, we didnt hear noise from any other room. The front desk staff were very friendly. The hot breakfast is good, it just ends really early (9am). You have to cab it or shuttle ride to Disney but a cab ride is only approx $10 (much cheaper than a family to take the shuttle). Good restaurants are across the parking lot. We liked enough to stay here a second time.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy to hear that the team was able make your visit positively memorable.  Thank you again and I look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: Decent stay, but I have some concerns!
Summary: As stay at a lot of Hilton's and have been a diamond member for the last 6 years. I wanted to like this property and I will continue to come back due to some upcoming reservations, but I had issues. As everyone says, the elevators are bad! Use the stairs people, it is much quicker and better for you. So, I return on a Wednesday afternoon at 3:30 and the room isn't serviced. Ok, no biggie. I call the front desk and ask if they can send housekeeping as soon as they can. No problem sir. I go to the lobby and work from there for 90 mins, so it is now 5PM. I go back to the room and sure enough, the room is still not serviced. I am about ready to blow a gasket, but I calmly go to the front desk and tell the desk staff about my disappointment, they apologize profusely. I go back to my
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I do apologize for the many challenges.  I am happy to hear that the team stood out, and that we were able to accommodate you in a small way.  I am also happy to announce our rooms and corridor renovation, so you will be able to enjoy our refreshed look during your next visit.  This renovation should be completed by mid-June, so I will apologize in advance, as there may be some disruption due to this project.

Summary: What a bargain! The complimentary breakfast and dinner (even though we only took advantage of it a few times during our stay) saved our family of 3 over $150. The separate bedroom was so nice for mom and dad - to have a separate space from cartoons and toys - NICE!!! The kitchen allowed us to buy a few essentials (water, coffee, snacks, etc.) and not have to constantly pay for those additional items. The room was clean, the bed was comfortable, and the price was extremely reasonable. I will never stay anywhere else when visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy to hear that the team was able make your visit positively memorable.  Thank you again and I look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: Upon check in Luis the front office supervisor was so nice and cheerful he welcomed us as if we were Vip's. The complementary breakfasts was superb! Hot waffles; bacon; eggs; fresh fruit; oatmeal; cereal; potatoes and much more. They change it up daily so you won't have the same meal but consistantly hot and delicious...something for everyone. No frowning if you pack to go and feast privately in your own room . Worked out great for my little kids.  Parking is very convenient. Plenty of side exits so you can get in and out quickly. Rooms are clean and spaceous. A bit dark on the decor but beds are comfortable. Hskpg is great! Friendly staff throughout the hotel...thx to Alan! On our last night my husband brought an uncooked piazza to the Front desk. Luis insisted that the staff
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy to hear that the team was able make your visit positively memorable.  Thank you again and I look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: We arrived and we were warmly greeted by Bryan the front service manager. He gave our daughters some kit kats and acknowledged us as returning Hilton Honors members. Next, he changed up my room and my dad's room so they were closer together and gave us even better room pricing. Last, he gave us a coupon for Oggi's restaurant just outside the hotel. Bryan runs a tight ship as everyone we dealt with subsequently was as attentative friendly and upbeat as he was. Our daughters have some very serious allergies and when we asked for food ingredients our certain items at breakfast and at the evening reception, the cooking staff brought packaging for us to look at right away. When we had a few problem with Air Conditiioning in one of the rooms, Alan from the front desk immediately
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy to hear that the team was able make your visit positively memorable.  Thank you again and I look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for a Great Price!
Summary: We stayed at the Homewood Suites for 4 nights while visiting family who works at Disneyland. When we checked in everybody was so friendly. We get there early, and got our room around 1pm. The room was so spacious. It had a full kitchen, a pull out sofa, and 2 queen beds. It was plenty of room for 4 people. The breakfast was delicious. There was cereal, waffles, bacon or sausage, hash browns, fruit, bagels. They also had coffee, juice and soda. The dinner at night was also good. I can't get over how friendly the workers are. They would always greet you every time you walked downstairs. This was an amazing hotel. Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy to hear that the team was able make your visit positively memorable.  Thank you again and I look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: Room 620-618, a two room suite was a great stay.  Beds are comfy, room was clean, service is great, reception staff all men was good and very friendly, and breakfast/diner was very good. I would stay here again. The only thing I could think of was the cost was expensive.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy to hear that the team was able make your visit positively memorable.  Thank you again and I look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel near Anaheim Convention Center
Summary: I have stayed at this Homewood Suites for the past 3 years during the busiest convention week of the year.  Each time the room is clean, the staff is great, and my stay is very pleasant.  The rooms are large, with a little kitchen area, and a sitting room with a second TV.  It is nice when you are staying there for a work trip and you have the ability to spread out, relax, and cool some of you own meals.  It is a little bit or a walk to the convention center, but it is under a mile.  And there is a shuttle bus that takes you right to Disney.  There are lots of resturaunts within walking distance, and a giant Target across the street.  I highly recommend this hotel for Disney, or Convention Center visitors.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy to hear that the team was able make your visit positively memorable.  Thank you again and I look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: I travelled with my husbnad and our three children to this hotel from Canada.  We had spent the previous 8 days at Homewood Suites Liberty Station in San Diego.  It had been three years since we last stayed at this hotel and we were very dissapointed this time around.  The room was not clean when we checked in.  I had to get housekeeping to clean the room again and it still wasn't up to my standards when they were finished.  The carpet was very disgusting.  Everyday I would lay down bedsheets all over the floors so our baby could crawl around.  The bathroom was full of mold...and the welcome home dinners were nothing like what we had in San Diego.  This hotel is out dated and has gone down hill in the the worst way.  Although the staff was friendly and tried to make my stay
Manager Response: We like to thank you for taking the time post this review.  Like to apologize that your suite was not ready when you check-in. Our hotel is scheduled for a renovation this year in which our in-room carpets will be replaced.  We appreciate your feedback and on behalf of our entire staff here at the Homewood Suites we would like to thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again when your travels bring you back to the area!

Summary: We stayed at the Homewood Suites for three nights on our most recent trip to Disneyland. As it was a last minute trip, I found Homewood Suites to be a perfect place for my family of 4.  The suite had a separate bedroom and living area along with a kitchenette.  When we arrived, the front desk staff could not have been more helpful or cheerful.  We were greeted with huge smiles and an easy check-in process (we stayed from March 20 - 23 and checked in the late evening- I say this because the gentlemen who greeted us should be commended for his wonderful service). Our room was all ready and on the bed was a towel transformed into an animal.  A nice touch that did not go unnoticed.    We were able to partake in the complimentary breakfast, always plenty of food, just a touch crowded
Manager Response: At Homewood Suites we strive to deliver the BEST customer service to our guest and it sounds like you experienced this type of service during your stay.  Thank you for the great review and see you soon!!

Summary: When we travel to Anaheim, we usually stay at the DoubleTree Suites. On this trip, however, the DoubleTree was unavailable. So, after reading the reviews of this hotel on TripAdvisor, we booked two rooms at this hotel.  When we checked in, I discovered that the hotel had made a mistake in both of the types of rooms we had reserved. It was late, and because the hotel was sold out, no changes could be made that night.   The front desk agent, Eduardo, was very apologetic for the error. Without my asking, he made an adjustment to my bill. He also told me that he would talk with the morning front desk agent, and try to make the necessary room changes. Based upon previous experience with other hotels, I was skeptical that any mention of my problem would be passed along to the morning
Manager Response: Eduardo, Fabiana, Alan, and Antonio thank you for the amazing shout out in this review.  We have share this amazing feedback with our staff during our morning huddles and we all thank you for taking the time to post this review.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit and hope to see you soon.  Thank you again for taking the time to post this review!!

Summary Heading: I have to say it is average this time
Summary: I am sorry to say that during our stay at the Homewood, things were just average.  The staff was great!  Fabiana as usual her smiling, cheerful self, Louis the ever so kind looking after all our needs!  The other staff was also great.  There is new management and I don't know if it is a coincidence or not, but the stay was not up to the usual standards.  The room itself was like we remember from our previous stays.  It was the breakfast area that is feeling the new take over.  First off, we have stayed here many times over the years and the food was great and plentiful.  Now, there is no fresh fruit? No individual yogurts just a big bowl that kids help themselves to and thier fingers as well (yuck), the breads and muffins only one kind.  We didn't stay for the "dinner" so I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking some time out of your busy schedule to post this review.  Glad to hear Luis and Fabiana were very helpful during you stay and that we offered to purchased fresh fruit since we did not offered fresh fruit during breakfast.  Please don't hesitate to contact me if there is anything extra you wish to share.  (Byron Camacho. Front Office Manager. byron.camacho@hilton.com).

Summary: I travelled to this hotel with my husband and daughter in November 2012 for our very first trip to Disneyland.  The service at the front desk is excellent and we were informed that there is a shuttle to Disneyland Park which would cost us $4 each/day.  It was way more convenient to hop on the shuttle and be dropped off right at the front gates than to drive, find a place to park/pay to park, I highly recommend the shuttle.  Each time we arrived at the front lobby, we were greeted with a smile and an inquiry as to how we enjoyed the park that day.  It really made us feel welcomed!    One of the days we had just missed the shuttle and the gentleman at the front desk let us know when the next one would be.  We came down about 5 minutes before the next one was scheduled to leave and
Manager Response: We like to thank you for detailed review and excited to read that your a planning a visit this fall.  At Homewood Suites we strive to deliver the BEST customer service to our guest and it sounds like you experienced this type of service during your stay.  Glad we delivered a WOW factor as well by helping with a cab ride to Disney California Adventures Park.  Thank you again for the great review and see you soon!!

Summary Heading: Wonderful Hotel and Staff on all levels
Summary: Our first time staying at this hotel and the experience was beyond our expectations. The staff is very friendly and helpful.  The meals were very good with lots of choices. Being disabled I found the staff very helpful to any need I had. We were greeted everytime we entered with a smile.  Would stay here again and recommend it to friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!!  It's a great feeling to read that you found our staff to be very friendly and helpful.  We hope to see you soon during your next visit to "Sunny California."

Summary: The toilet in our room had simply not been properly cleaned before arrival.  Unless the prior guests had stayed there a long time it looked like this had been going on for some time.  We complained of the issue the first night and upon return the next day - after the room was serviced - it still had not been addressed.  Upon a second complaint maintenance did come to the room and clean the toilet somewhat but it never was cleaned to a condition I would expect to see in a reasonably quality hotel.  The rest of the stay was ok; not exceptional.  The room was spacious but was showing its age. I do agree the staff are friendly although they were not always good at following up.  The free breakfast is decent; food is not great quality but hard to complain at the price.  All in all -
Manager Response: Like to first apologize for the rocky stay you experienced at our hotel.  We have shared your useful feedback with our staff and will make sure this does not happen again.  Please don't hesitate to contact me if there is anything extra you wish to share.  (Byron Camacho: Front Office Manager: byron.camacho@hilton.com).

Summary: Would absolutely recommend this place to stay. Service was excellent from check-in to having housekeeping come to the room in the middle of the night to clean up the aftermath of a sick kid. Can't say enough good things about the staff at the hotel. Good location to Disneyland with a shuttle service (nominal fee). Would stay again with no consideration of other hotels in the area.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us!  Thank you for the fine post on TripAdvisor and on behalf of our entire staff here at the Homewood Suites/Anaheim we would like to thank you for staying with us.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I stayed here with my family about two weeks ago. By far this has been the best hotel I have ever stayed in.  The suite we stayed in was lovely, very clean and spacious for my family of 4.  Everyone at the hotel was very friendly and professional. Breakfast was delicious, Lorea in the breakfast area was always smiling and accommodating. Fabiana A at the front desk was extremely helpful and extremely friendly. My daughters were so happy to see her every morning, she always had a big smile on her face and a great amount of energy at 7 AM. She made my family feel at home and gave us great tips about the resort area. My daughters brought a memory of a new friend (Fabiana) home and we can't wait to go back. Homewood Suites is the best!
Manager Response: We have shared your amazing positive shout out with Fabiana and Lorena.  Thank you for taking the time to post this amazing review and it excites me to read that your daughters made a new friend.  Please feel free to contact if there is anything extra you wish to share.  (Byron Camacho-FOM byron.camacho@hilton.com).

Summary: We had an excellent stay this February. Our expectations were exceeded!  We were a family of 5 and we stayed for 5 nights.  The rooms were clean, tidy and spacious.  The beds were super comfortable!! The staff at the front desk were helpful and very friendly.  The breakfast was hot and there was a lot of variety.  We loved the complementary dinner Monday - Thursday night (such a great value!!).  We felt safe in this hotel as it was tucked away from the hustle and bustle of Disneyland.   Choose a pool side room as they are quieter.  The shuttle was always on time and had fun videos for the kids to watch.  It was a 8 minute drive to Disney.
Manager Response: Happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations during this trip to Disneyland.  Great room tip when trying to select a quiet room.  Glad you enjoyed our comfy beds and delicious fresh baked cookies.  Thank you for the great review and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: Our suite had a nice kitchen w/ the basics including a dishwasher.  2 queen sized beds in a private room and a fold out bed in the living room which was remade daily by the staff.  TV's in both rooms. Homewood is close to Disneyland and has a shuttle there every 1/2 hour for $4 a day.  They have a very nice breakfast each morning for free and a free dinners during the week.  All this for a very reasonable price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to post this review.  I'm happy to read that you enjoyed our free dinners and breakfast.

Summary Heading: best staff i have experienced in any hotel
Summary: The level of service by the staff is the kind you would expect at a deluxe resort hotel. they deserve a fancier lobby because the staff is at that level. If you stay in this area for more then a couple of days then the room amenities with the the kitchen/suites make this super convenient. The guest mix consisted of international groups, Disney families and biz travelers and the lobby,breakfasts and mangers happy hours were well managed with everyone mixing in very comfortably.
Manager Response: Thank you for submitting this review regarding your recent visit with us. The Homewood Suites brand is an exceptional group of hotels and we are pleased that we lived up to your expectations. We hope to see you again on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed here for a couple of nights for a quick Disneyland visit. Found the hotel to be a little tired but met our needs. The complimentary breakfast and dinner took a lot of the stress away at the end of a long day and was much appreciated. Staff were lovely and really helpful.
Manager Response: We like to thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to post this review.  I‚Äôm glad you enjoyed our hot breakfast and dinner and most importantly that you found our staff to be helpful during this memorable trip.  Please feel free to contact us if there is anything extra you would like to share about your experience.  Thank you again and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This is a great hotel for families going to Disney.  I was here for business and wouldn't stay for business again (which is my fault and had nothing to do with the hotel).  The staff was amazing and the hotel is in a great location.  I will say the room I stayed in was very dirty (black spots in the shower, food stuck on items in the kitchen).  Other then that, it was a good hotel.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to complete a survey regarding you recent stay with us.  We are delighted to hear that you found our staff to be very helpful.  On behalf of our entire staff here at the Homewood Suites, we apologize for the concerns you have about your experience at this hotel.  Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Everything was really good, except for one thing.
Summary: The room was great. Never heard anyone else around or above us. The staff was great and very helpful. Staying in a newer hotel that didn't have to cover up 50 years of use was nice. The only thing we didn't plan on was the bit of stress having to make the shuttle.  While we probably walked less than those staying right next to Disneyland, it came with a price of rushing tired feet out of the park to make the shuttle. Missing it once and being stuck for half an hour waiting for the next. Or pushing kids to shove the food in 'cause the next shuttle was about to leave the hotel. That momentary tension of 'making the shuttle' was a downside to an otherwise great hotel stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great comments regarding your recent stay with us, and we appreciate you taking the time out of your busy schedule to let us know how we are doing.  We deeply regret that the shuttle service negatively impacted your stay.  We appreciate your feedback and we will utilize your comments to ensure our daily shuttle rides run as smooth as possible.  Thank you for staying with us and it is our hope that we will have the pleasure of accommodating you on your future trips to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Perfect stay for the Tinker Bell Run!
Summary: The hotel accommodations were wonderful! Excellent breakfast each morning. The staff was super friendly and very willing to help with the smallest detail. The pool and hot tub were clean and well maintained. In fact the whole facility was top notch. Excellent value!  We flew in to Orange County Airport, and did not need to rent a car. SuperShuttle was very convenient and cost effective. Restaurants and shopping were within walking distance. The Tinker Bell entry fee covered our weekend of shuttle to and from Disneyland all weekend. We could not have been happier!
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us!  Our guests‚Äô satisfaction is our #1 goal.  We look forward to having the opportunity to serve you on your next Tinker Bell Half Marathon weekend.  Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to let us know how we are doing.

Summary Heading: The room was designated as non-smoking room.
Summary: Previous guests smoked in it and the staff did not get rid of the smell.  House keeping sprayed the room with air freshener, but it only make it worse, and a few hours later the odor return.  With the cigarette odor, everything felt dirty.  Also, the room door did not close properly and we have to slam it hare to engage the latch.  Overall this hotel needs some serious upkeeping.
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire staff here at the Homewood Suites, we apologize for the concerns you have about your experience at this hotel.  Our goal here at the Homewood Suites is to ensure every guest has an exceptional experience while staying in Anaheim.  We deeply regret that your room had an unpleasant odor during your stay and appreciate your feedback.  Thank you for staying with us and it is our hope that we will have the pleasure of accommodating you on your next trip to Anaheim.  Please feel free to contact me if there is anything extra you wish to share about your experience with us.  Byron Camacho-Front Office Manager (byron.camacho@hilton.com)

Summary Heading: Great place would stay here again
Summary: We stayed here with a party of 5 on disneyland/seaworld/universal adventures late sept 2012. For the price and service i would stay here again.  The good: Location - only a few minutes away from disneyland but easy to get to, across the road from target and food establishments. Recommend google maps to see all the eateries in the area.  It is easy to get around.  Rooms: are nothing flash but beds were comfortable, though the pull out sofa squeaked badly, teen wasn't too rapped about that. Loads of bedding and towels Breakfast: on the few days we got down for it, it was good though it is plastic plates, cups and cutlery which was a little disappointing but there was plenty of food, make your own waffles were a success with my kids even though they had to queue to make them.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to let us know how we are doing and sharing a nice room tip to our readers.  We are glad you were satisfied with the amenities and comfort of our beds.  We take pride in our hotel as we strive to exceed all of guests‚Äô expectations.  We apologize our staff was not able to help locate the ART transport pickup and thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you once gain.  Thank you again and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Stayed here with two small children during a Disneyland visit.  The suites are a great size and well equipped with fridge freezer, microwave, hob and coffee maker.  Four of us were able to sleep in the bedroom without having to bother with the fold-out sofa in the living room.  Hotel breakfast was surprisingly good - mix of hot and cold foods, which varied every day.  A great way to start the day before a long hike around the Disneyland Parks.  The shuttle to the parks is frequent and very reasonable.  There are no safes in the room, but you can take a safety deposit box in reception, or, for larger items, you can leave a bag in the managers office during the day.  Staff were uniformly helpful and friendly. I would stay here again - great value and convenience for the price.
Manager Response: We like to thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to post this review.  I‚Äôm glad you enjoyed our hot breakfast and dinner and most importantly that you found our staff to be helpful during this memorable trip. Thank you again and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Homewood Suites was great for the family. The kids loved making waffles every morning and swimming in the pool.
Summary: The staff was welcoming and very helpful, they even brought us hot chocolate and popcorn to make in our room :) We were greeted every morning and every time we entered and exited the hotel it was great to have the staff take the extra time to ask our kids about their day and if they needed anything.
Manager Response: Our guests‚Äô satisfaction is our #1 goal.  I‚Äôm glad you enjoyed your stay with us.  We appreciate your business and hope to see you again the next time your travels bring you to our area.

Summary: This was our first time staying here for a trip to Disneyland.  I would forgo the sofa bed as this was extremely uncomfortable for my children. Springs kept poking them.  Dont be fooled by the "Dinner."  The "Dinner" would be better at fast food.  We went the first two nights, but after the second night we decided it was better to eat in the room, or stay in Disneyland and eat.  The breakfast is ok, nothing great.
Manager Response: We like to thank you for taking the time post this review.  We deeply regret that the sofa bed and dinner negatively impacted your stay.  We appreciate your feedback and will love to hear from you regarding our dinner.  On behalf of our entire staff here at the Homewood Suites we would like to thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again when your travels bring you back to the area!-Byron Camacho-Front Office Manager (byron.camacho@hilton.com)

Summary: I usually use Priceline when visiting Disneyland and decided to try Homewood Suites this trip.  I was looking for a little more room and a hotel that offered breakfast.  Homewood Suites will be my choice for all future trips.  The room was great and I looked forward to coming back each evening.  The breakfast and dinners (from Monday to Thursday) was also good.  The shutter ran on a schedule which is nice.  Thumbs up to Luis and Lorena among the others working at Homewood Suites!  They are a wonderful group of people!!
Manager Response: We have shared this amazing shout out with Lorena, Luis, and all of our staff here at the Homewood Suites Anaheim.  We also like to thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to let us know how we are doing.  I‚Äôm happy to read that you enjoyed the amenities and shuttle service.  Please feel free to contact me if there is anything extra you like to share about your experience with us here in ‚ÄúSunny California.‚Äù ‚ÄìByron Camacho (Front Office Manager) byron.camacho@hilton.com

Summary: Stayed at this property from Dec 31 - Jan 4/13.  Great experience.  Staff extremely friendly and helpful.  One bedroom suite spacious with full kitchen.  Hot breakfast each morning, only thing lacking was fresh fruit.  Manager's reception Mon-Thurs with beer, wine and pop.  Also included a hot food item.  Families on a budget could have this as meal time.  Shuttle to Disney was convenient running every 30 minutes.  A number of restaurants within a block.  Target store across the street for supplies.  Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us!  Thank you for the fine post on TripAdvisor and on behalf of our entire staff here at the Homewood Suites/Anaheim we would like to thank you for staying with us.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Pretty good experience, could be improved.
Summary: This was our first time staying at this particular Homewood Suites.  We have always stayed in hotels withing walking distance to Disneyland, but with 3 kids, we now needed a larger room.  I was very impressed with the managment, and the staff was nice.  The breakfast was a nice option, although very crowded.  I liked the different options for breakfast every day, the food was very good.  The lobby was beautiful, and very child friendly.  The room however, did look a little dated.  The layout was weird, as the door to the shower and toilet obstructed the vanity.  A person drying their hair at the vanity would be hit by the door with peope coming in and out of the shower area.  The room was clean, but you could tell it had been put through a lot of use. We did have a handicap
Manager Response: We are glad your family enjoyed their first time staying at our Homewood Suites and like to thank you for allowing us to be part of this memorable trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate your business and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We are currently staying here at the end of a 5 week road trip through the southwest. This is one of the nicest of the chain hotels we have stayed at. The staff could not be more pleasant and helpful and the free breakfast is by far the best we have had during our travels. We would stay here again ANYTIME. Well done
Manager Response: Our guests‚Äô satisfaction is our #1 goal.  I‚Äôm glad you enjoyed your stay with us.  We appreciate your business and hope to see you again the next time your travels bring you to our area.

Summary: This establishment must have a fantastic training program for their staff.  EVERY employee offers you a cheerful greeting and a smile.  They all seem anxious to make your stay a pleasant one.   FRONT DESK STAFF who served us most pleasantly are:   Alan, Antonio, Luis and Kaitlyn.   Other notable employees are:  Misael from Maintenance and Housekeepers Olga and Patricia.   If I missed any other staff members by name, please know that you were awesome too.  ROOM;  We had Room #118 on  the main floor.  It was a very quiet area.  I really like the separate bedroom which enables me to get a good night's sleep in spite of my partner's loud "snoring".  With the bedroom door closed, it was soundproof and I could hear nothing ! ! We found the entire area clean and reasonably
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy to hear that the team stood out, and were able to assist in making your experience a memorable and enjoyable one.  We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: First of all, I would like to say that I have always liked this hotel. I had written a review previously about how we Loved this place! I received a response to that review from Joe Lienacker, the General Manaager, in which he thanked me for my review and asked me to e-mail him with the dates of my next stay so he could make it a special one.  I was thrilled and did as he asked, I e-mailed him to let him know the dates we were staying there. I wasn't expecting anything big, but maybe a personal welcome or something.  What we got was mediocre service. We were given a room right away, even though we checked in about an hour early. We were also given a kit kat candy bar wrapped in a note saying thatnk you for our loyalty. Again, I was not expecting anything spectacular, but when
Manager Response: Dear Becky V,  	I am so sorry we were not able to meet your welcome expectations.  As you noted, Joe is no longer at this hotel, and his email is not accessible to us, so unfortunately we did not receive your arrival email notification.  I definitely understand how this could be frustrating to you, but appreciate your understanding.    In regards to the other challenges during your visit, please reach out to me via email, or telephone the hotel, so that I can obtain details on your visit, since I am unable to determine specifics from tripadvisor.  Again I will apologize; we did have a hot water problem at the end of November, after a local house caught on fire, causing a transformer to blow, ultimately causing an area-wide power outage.  This caused our boiler to go down, but we immediately had a team arrive, and repair the problem.  They were here until late at night, so this may have been on the same date, and may have affected you as well.  Again, please accept my sincerest apologies, and I look forward to hearing from you, to discuss your visit.

Summary: We booked this hotel because of favourable reviews from trip advisor.  The hotel was clean, our suite was large and comfortable.  All amenities provided as stated.  We even had a great view to Disney's fireworks each night.  The bus to Disney came every 30 minutes.  Decent dining within walking distance.  We would stay there again.  No need to spend $300/night anymore!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your valuable time to review the Hilton Homewood Suites ‚Äì Anaheim Main Gate.  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your visit with us, and hope to see you and your friends in the near future.

Summary: The staff was outstanding.  I thought they posessed more of the "Disney Spirit" than the staff at Disneyland. Everything was perfect all of the time.  My son ended up throwing up in the middle of the night and one of the staff came up and helped us clean up and re-make the bed.  They could not have been more helpful.  I'll definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your valuable time to review the Hilton Homewood Suites ‚Äì Anaheim Main Gate.  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your visit with us, and hope to see you and your friends in the near future.

Summary: Indeed this was a great hotel to stay. Target located nearby is about 10 minutes walk. The hotel staff is every friendly and helpful. The shuttle to DisneyLand runs on schedule. But  I did not give a 5 star for the following reasons.  1. The coffee mugs were not cleaned. The coffee stains were distinctively noticeable. 2. The water seeps very slowly in the bath tub. 3. The breakfast opens at 6:30am on Magic Morning Saturday's. It would be great if breakfast opens at 6:00am even on saturdays. This way the kids could eat a little breakfast before heading out.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your valuable time to review the Hilton Homewood Suites ‚Äì Anaheim Main Gate.  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your visit with us, I am so happy to have you as our guest.  I hope to see you and your friends in the near future.

Summary: We had a two bedroom two bathroom apartment which was good for our family of 5 including two teenage boys. The kitchenette was great, as there was a Target in walking distance we could bring our own food and drinks back to the room easily. The breakfast was really good with lots of choices of hot and cold food. The complementary light dinner Mondays through Thursdays was really nice and it saved us alot of money on dinners .Location is great just a short shuttle ride to Disneyland and walking distance from shops and resturants. The staff are extremely welcoming and friendly, all of them, all of the time.The outdoor pool area is nice. A great place for families to stay the only negative I would say is the rooms are rather dated and when we first walked in the carpets felt dirty
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your valuable time to review the Hilton Homewood Suites ‚Äì Anaheim Main Gate.  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your visit with us, I am so happy to have you as our guest.  I hope to see you and your friends in the near future.

Summary Heading: Average and basic, needs a makeover
Summary: We have been to this hotel a few years ago and it has aged in those years.    Here are the pros of the hotel: -suite with 2 rooms that have a door that you can close to allow the kids to sleep while you relax outside -microwave, full fridge, dishwasher -front desk are very friendly but can get very busy at times and may not always answer the phone private shuttle they share with the Marriot next door but its $5 for adult and $2 for kids/day-cheaper if you buy multidays, but it's better than the ART shuttle, this one goes from the hotel straight to Disneyland -2 long miles from Disneyland -free breakfast daily, manager's dinner Monday-Thurs.  cons: no safe in room so we had to carry our computers everwhere with us, they have safe deposit box in front desk but very small-won't fit
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy to hear that the team stood out, and were able to assist in making your experience a memorable and enjoyable one.  I am also happy to announce our rooms and corridor renovation, so you will be able to enjoy our refreshed look during your next visit.  This renovation should be completed by mid-June, so I will apologize in advance, as there may be some disruption due to this project.  We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: Superior Customer Service in a Family Friendly Hotel
Summary: We stayed here for a week to celebrate our daughter's 10th birthday. We cannot say enough about this hotel. While on the surface, this is a standard Homewood Suites with comfortable rooms, good breakfasts and light supper fare Monday - Thursday, this hotel takes a standard hotel and turns it into a superior hotel with its excellent customer service. The staff caters to the kids. There is a Disney movie playing on a large screen in the lobby. With kids everywhere in the dining area, there is staff all around cleaning up after the kids. The front desk staff is very attentive, and always smiling. There is a shuttle that goes to/from Disneyland for a very small fee. If you are traveling with kids, I would highly recommend this hotel. You will never feel like your children are being
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your valuable time to review the Hilton Homewood Suites ‚Äì Anaheim Main Gate.  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your visit with us, I am so happy to have you as our guest.  I hope to see you and your friends in the near future.

Summary: I had a very pleasant stay in homewood suites and highly recommend it. The room comes fully equipped with a kitchen, small sitting area with tv, and separate bedroom/bathroom. Perfect for famillies or people on business trips. Doesnt have a hotel feel. Also, free breakfast and dinner which is great!  Have to compliment the staff, especially Gus V and the manager for taking such good care of us and giving very hospitable service.  Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your valuable time to review the Hilton Homewood Suites ‚Äì Anaheim Main Gate.  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your visit with us, I am so happy to have you as our guest.  I hope to see you and your friends in the near future.

Summary Heading: Great Family Hotel, Met All Our Expectations
Summary: Our family of four stayed here in October.  This property met all of our needs, and made our eight day stay very comfortable.  As everyone has stated, the staff is very attentive and nice.  We used the kitchenette to cook a few meals, but mostly took advantage of the free breakfast (every day) and dinner (Monday through Thursday).  The shuttle was very convenient and always on time.  We will be coming back again (soon, I hope) to this wonderful, family-friendly hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your valuable time to review the Hilton Homewood Suites ‚Äì Anaheim Main Gate.  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your visit with us, I am so happy to have you as our guest.  I hope to see you and your friends in the near future.

Summary: This hotel is simply amazing! Perfect location, not to far from Disneyland, but out of the hustle and Bustle and conveniently a shy 5 minute walk to a small shopping complex with a big Target! We took the shuttle to Disney everyday and the service was fantastic!   The rooms were great. Enough bedding for my large family. The size was perfect, very comfortable.  The kids used the pool, in late November, so the weather was delightful! We frequently went to Starbucks at the bottom! The free car parking was handy. The staff were just so accommodating and easy to deal with! Everything was perfect!  We also ate breakfast everyday, minus our Disney breakfast and it was just great. For our first stay-at Disney stay, all the way from Australia, we couldn't be happier!!   Because of this
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your valuable time to review the Hilton Homewood Suites ‚Äì Anaheim Main Gate.  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your visit with us, I am so happy to have you as our guest.  I hope to see you and your friends in the near future.

Summary: We stayed for a trip to Disneyland and the service was amazing!  Everyone was so nice and helpful!  The breakfasts were great and the warm chocolate chip cookies in the evening topped it off!   Thank you especially to Luis Valdez- you are the best and we hope you will get a promotion for your incredible service!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your valuable time to review the Hilton Homewood Suites ‚Äì Anaheim Main Gate.  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your visit with us, I am so happy to have you as our guest.  I hope to see you and your friends in the near future.

Summary: Like many other reviewers, I want to send kudos to the staff at the Homewood Suites.  They made our extended time at their hotel very enjoyable.  This is a great value for a hotel near Disneyland since it includes breakfast and a light evening meal Monday-Thursday, plus the benefits of a separate room(s) for sleeping and a complete kitchen.  The decor is clean and modern and there is plenty of parking available.  The pool area is nice and there is also a small business center with two computers you can use for free to catch up on email or news or print boarding passes.  A few other tips:  The elevator near the front desk is often busy, so either use the other elevator at the opposite  end of the room wing or use the stairs if you are on a lower floor.  Breakfast can get crowded,

Summary Heading: Happiest place on earth - even happier here!!
Summary: We just returned from a 4-day stay here at Homewood Suites.  We were so pleased!  What a wonderful value, not only is there a complimentary breakfast, but Monday-Thurs a light dinner is also served.  After a day at the park, the complimentary beer and wine was a perfect treat for parents. The full kitchen was a bonus too, we were able to save a great deal of money eating in and having our own cold drinks. The room was clean and newly updated.  The separate bedroom also allowed for napping kids or earlier bedtimes. Our kids enjoyed swimming in the pool as well. The hotel staff was also very friendly and the shuttle service was outstanding.   The only reason I am not giving 5-Stars is because our room was not made up.  We returned in the late afternoon to find our room was dirty
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your valuable time to review the Hilton Homewood Suites ‚Äì Anaheim Main Gate.  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your visit with us, I am so happy to have you as our guest.  I hope to see you and your friends in the near future.

Summary: We have stayed at many different properties in the area during our trips to Disneyland.  This is by far the best value I have found.  Our family of four (2 children ages 10 and 8) loved the extra space of a suite.  We had a large, clean room with comfortable beds, two large closets and hot showers with good water pressure.  Our family enjoyed the daily breakfast; waffles, eggs, cereal, yogurt, pastries and the like.  We also ate at one of the dinners, while it's not going to earn any Michelin stars, the food was wholesome, plentiful and hot.  Mom and dad especially enjoyed a glass of wine and a beer at the end of a long day ;-) The staff was genuinely friendly and helpful.  The kids enjoyed the pool.  The shuttle was on time and the drivers were very helpful.  The lobby was very
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your valuable time to review the Hilton Homewood Suites ‚Äì Anaheim Main Gate.  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your visit with us, I am so happy to have you as our guest.  I hope to see you and your friends in the near future.

Summary Heading: A true gem,made even better by staff and service!!
Summary: Recently spent 8 nights at this homey, pleasant, hotel, nestled among some huge hotels close to Disneyland.   The friendly, extremely accomodating staff made our stay comfortable and truly one of the best bargains in southern California.  We travellers have come to expect  free continental breakfasts , but the addition of a free happy hour/light (but very  adequate) dinner served Mondays through Thursdays was an unexpected bonus. Byron, Gus, Ben and the entire front desk and food service staff were welcoming and went out of their way to make us feel at home.  Rooms were clean; kitchen was handy and equipped with cookware and dinnerware, (no ovens except microwave),
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your valuable time to review the Hilton Homewood Suites ‚Äì Anaheim Main Gate.  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your visit with us, I am so happy to have you as our guest.  I hope to see you and your friends in the near future.

Summary: The cleanliness of this homewood suites and the staff was AMAZING. Location & shuttle great. Complimentary breakfast was great. We highly recommend Homewood Suites. The Staff was the best and their smiles were warming we stay at a lot of homewood suites and this staff was just amazing.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy to hear that the team stood out, and were able to assist in making your experience a memorable and enjoyable one.  We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: We booked 2 rooms and we were all extremely pleased with our 5 day stay. The rooms were clean and all the amenities were provided daily. The shuttle to Disneyland is convenient for a $4 a day pass per person.  The breakfast is awesome with make your own waffles!  The dinner from Mondays to Thursdays is such a welcome family time, especially if returning from a day of touring. Having the extra living area with full kitchen made it feel like home and not a hotel.  Our family will definitely return in the future.  Also, the front desk personnel were one of the best that we have experienced!.  Their genuine interactions with everyone was such a refreshing change from other places.  All the staff were wonderful! Starbucks and Oggis next door.  Target across the street.

Summary: We are a family of 6 on  vacation and we stayed at this hotel for 6 nights and were extremely happy with our stay.  The room was spacious and clean (ours had two closets and a sectional sleeper sofa) The breakfast was great (it's true that the breakfast is less busy the earlier you go--I went at 615am and was the only one there and by 815 you will wait in a long line to make a waffle). We stayed on the first floor and found it quiet and easy to get unpacked, to breakfast, etc because we didn't need to use  the slow elevator.  The complimentary dinner mon-thurs saved our family a ton of money and was yummy!  This is not within walking distance to Disneyland, and, having stayed several times at this hotel, we have used both the hotel shuttle service and driving our own vehicle to
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your valuable time to review the Hilton Homewood Suites ‚Äì Anaheim Main Gate.  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your visit with us, I am so happy to have you as our guest.  I hope to see you and your friends in the near future.

Summary: My family of seven stayed in late August for eight nights and we all can't say enough about the experience.   The staff is first class.  Ben was especially helpful that week.   The rooms are spacious and clean.  The breakfast was loaded with choices for all and very good.  The Monday to Thursday night managers meal was very good as well. The cost was excellent and very affordable.  Great location for Disneyland attractions. Highly recommend!  We thank Joe and his staff for a wonderful experience with excellent customers service skills and look forward to staying with Homewood again in the near future.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking your valuable time to reach out and let me know about your experience during your recent visit.  I am happy to hear that the team stood out, and were able to assist in making your experience a memorable and enjoyable one.  We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: The positives:  Very good hotel, located in very close proximity to Disneyland. Staff go out of their way to make your stay comfortable.  Shuttle bus service to Disneyland is cheap and runs every 30 mins at least. Breakfast is adequate and well prepared - waffles, eggs, sausage, cereals, pastries.  Pool was out of order when we were there, so cannot review - however, they had an arrangement with Marriott (next door) so we could use their pool - which was no hassle at all.  The drawbacks:  we booked this hotel through Disneyland Travel - which allocates a designated style of room for our family of five, which was on the small side (2 Queens plus Sofa Bed in small combined lounge/kitchen area).  however, as we were out all day and not spending too much time in our room, we didn't
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your valuable time to review the Hilton Homewood Suites ‚Äì Anaheim Main Gate.  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your visit with us, I am so happy to have you as our guest.  I hope to see you and your friends in the near future.

Summary Heading: Excellent customer service and extra services
Summary: I just returned from a two week stay at this hotel and want to let others know what a great experience I had.  There were three adults in my party and we were totally comfortable in a roomy one bedroom suite with kitchenette.  What made this stay exceptional was the friendly and helpful front desk and food server staff.  They responded to every request with a pleasant attitude and went out of their way to take care of our needs.  Byron, the hotel manager, checked with us frequently to see if we needed anything.  The daily breakfasts and week day light dinners with wine and beer were delicious and plentiful.  We received daily housekeeping service, which was a pleasant surprise for an extended stay hotel.  The pool and patio area was very nice and the location is walking distance
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your valuable time to review the Hilton Homewood Suites ‚Äì Anaheim Main Gate.  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your visit with us, and hope to see you and your friends in the near future.

Summary: Everyone at this hotel made us feel at home during our 6 night stay. From the kitchen staff that was willing to cook "plain" noodles and "plain" meatballs for our 4 yr. old, to the housekeepers that set up the toys in our room in cute displays, to the very helpful front desk staff, we were so comfortable!  We will definitely return to this hotel, and we will plan to stay at other Homewood Suites in the future.  The staff and the food are top-notch.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: It's ok...maybe slightly better than ok...
Summary: Our family of four stayed at the Homewood Suites in September 2012. We chose this hotel because of the excellent reviews from Trip Advisor, and this was the first time that I was a bit disappointed in my 'trip advisor choice'.  The hotel is in a good location. It is not far from Disneyland (but too far to walk), and has a shuttle going on the half-hour ($4pp). There is also a charge for parking of $12/night. In the walking-distance vicinity you will find several restaurants that are good - Outback, Starbucks, Red Robin, and a nice SoCal Mexican place across the street called La Casa Garcia.  The daily breakfast was okay, not terrible, not excellent. The selection included daily make-your-own waffles, fruit salad, yoghurt, granola, toastable items, plus a different hot food each
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Second stay was better than our first!
Summary: The title says it all and that means a lot since our first stay was great! Stayed for six nights on an extended road trip.   I'll start with the only negative thing that happened. When we got into the room and unloaded everything my wife took off her shoes and stepped into a big puddle of soda that had soaked into the carpet. I can see why housekeeping missed it because you couldn't see it at all and if you had shoes on, you probably wouldn't notice it. A call down to the front desk and they moved us into the next room over. They even waived the parking fees for us haveing to pack up our stuff and move!  Otherwise, everything was great. Food was good, pool was warm this time and the front desk was as helpful as ever.   We will be back in April!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for families
Summary: Nice, clean rooms.  Great breakfast choices.  We always went down every morning at 6:30 and never had a problem with the breakfast crowds.  I noticed between 8:00-9:00 the breakfast are was crowded.  Well worth getting up a little earlier to avoid that.  The staff was very friendly.  My only complaint was there was no towels by the swimming pool.  We came inside and asked for them three separate times within a two hour period.  They kept saying they would bring them out, but they never did.  Finally it was time to come in, so my kids walked through the hotel dripping wet.  They do have a shuttle, but we decided to park at the Disneyland parking and pay a few dollars more.  I am glad we did.  The hotel shuttle is shared with other hotels and we didn't want to make all of those
Manager Response: none

Summary: We chose this hotel for it's location to Disneyland.  An added benefit was the wonderful staff and amenities.  Our suite was big enough for our toddler to roam around, the furniture was very stylish yet durable and practical, beds and linens were comfortable and clean, pool was great, and breakfast was just right to get us going in the morning.  You can walk to restaurants, Starbucks for you coffee lovers, and Target,    If we had any issues or problems, Connie, Barbara, Ben, and Byrum were there for us.  They made sure the issue was addressed and handled appropriately and in a timely manner.  I really appreciated the service we recieved from them as well as the rest of staff.  It made our mini-vacation stress free.  I definitely would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Another excellent stay at Homewood Suites Garden Grove
Summary: We really enjoyed our latest stay here.  Thanks to the great staff!  This is the only place we stay at when we visit Disneyland. I can't believe someone in another review criticized the kitchen for using plastic cutlery. Are you kidding me? It would be dangerous to use anything otherwise with the amount of unsupervised children running furiously around the kitchen!   And what is it with people taking back enough food to their rooms to feed a neighbourhood?
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you are visiting Disneyland, this is our HOTEL of choice! This is our second visit and it was even better than the first. The hotel staff is so genuine and courteous and ensures your stay is enjoyable. The hotel is about 2 miles south of Disneyland, but never fear, they have a shuttle for about $2 per person per day that will take you back and forth. It's a steal and no hassle! The complimentary breakfast is delicious, and I look forward to making my own waffle. This is a great value for the hotel and a huge perk if you are hitting the theme parks. We went as a couple, but this is great for familes as you have a nice large suite with mini kitchen. This is now our hotel of choice when visiting Disneyland. I have stayed at many around the area and this one is our new home.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I cannot praise the staff enough, nothing was too much trouble their customer service second to none. The hotel was really clean with our rooms cleaned daily. Our son celebrated his 40th  birthday during our stay, the staff joined in the celebration by giving him a birthday cake and singing happy birthday to him, while we were sat on the shuttle bus, a memory that will remain with us for some time!  The pool was fantastic we had 5 children with us and they loved every minute of their time in the pool, which was clean and well cared for. Thanks to all at the Homenwood Suites for a lovely holiday I would recommend the hotel without hesitation.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Another Wonderful Stay at the Homewood Suites in Garden Grove!
Summary: This was our third trip to the Homewood Suites in Garden Grove, California. We have stayed a total of nearly a month and a half there over the past 2 years. Even with a few issues, I am giving it 5 stars (I would give it between 4 and 5 if possible).  The best part of staying at this Homewood Suites location is the staff. There is always a friendly face and welcome when arriving to the resort (every day). Luis at the front desk is incredible, and remembered us from our stay last year. The breakfast staff and the dinner staff (4 nights per week for dinner) is always helpful and accommodating. If I could give 1000 stars for friendliness and helpfulness, I would.  They really bend over backwards to make sure that each guest has a wonderful stay.  Upon arrival to the resort in late
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was my second visit since Apr of last year. This time was just average, the breakfast seemed to be of lesser quality then last time. Hot breakfast included is always a great feature, and that gets the farther from the park hotels bookings. I like individual yogurt cups, but this time was bulk scoop yourself yogurt, and the fruit was canned. Typcial breakfast was scrambled eggs or egg patties, bacon or sausage patties, oatmeal, 4 waffle machines, assorted breads, juices. Some mornings it was poorly stocked, and would be out of some things for a while. I booked 10 months in advance, asking for lowest floor possible, which I got the second floor but the farthest possible room away. Those hallways are very very long after an exhuasting day at disney land. They have laundry on
Manager Response: I appreciate your recent review of our property. I sincerely apologize for any inconveniences that were posed during your family trip to the area. I understand that you were disappointed with your meal selections and we will review our offerings, keeping your recommendations in mind. The next time you are in town please visit us again. Thank you for your comments.

Summary Heading: Fabulous hotel to explore Southern California from!
Summary: My family and I stayed at this hotel for 2 weeks in August 2012 on on holiday from the U.K. From the minute we arrived we had a warm greeting from the staff on reception and found all our room requests had been accommodated (high floor close rooms with Disney view). The room on inspection was immaculately clean and fresh and whilst the furniture is dark wood which gives a dark feel to the room; in time you didn't notice! The beds were very comfortable, some of the best we have slept on in a hotel, with vast amounts of pillows. The room temperature was easy to control and the room was serviced back to perfecton daily by the super ladies (or fairies)! The breakfast is fabulous; the staff worked tirelessly to keep all items well stocked and the menu of hot items were varied daily.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place to stay if only booking 4 people (or less) in a room
Summary: We stayed here May 2012 - there were 6 of us so we booked a 2-bedroom queen suite as it said it could accommodate 6 people as it also had a sofa sleeper.  The sofa sleeper was a joke - it was basically like lying directly on top of springs!  I asked the front desk to have it switched and they said all the sofa sleepers were in the same condition so they did offer to bring up a rollaway (that accommodated 1 person and wasn't much better than the sofa).  All staff were pleasant and accommodating.  The food was good, my family enjoyed the pool and the hot tub.  It also was very quiet in our room even though there were a lot of families staying there.  Also, the shuttle was very convenient and always on time.  We were able to get on it every time even though sometimes it looked like
Manager Response: none

Summary: breakfast was good. Room was nice and cozy. Sleeper sofa unfolded takes up most living room space. Still liked it though. Leave bathroom light on before bed. got trapped in bathroom in middle of night. Great hotel though. Would stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We visited from the UK and booked this accommodation for thirteen nights on the strength of the reviews on here and were glad we did. The hotel staff are friendly, welcoming and very helpful and the room is clean, well sized with comfortable beds. The location of the Suites is convenient being only a few minutes from Disneyland and Interstate 5 (to go to LA) and has numerous eating and shopping opportunities within walking distance. The complimentary breakfast is a bonus but be aware that choice is limited and it does get very busy, the complimentary dinner (which is served Monday-Thursday) was served too early for us to take advantage as we had some very full days. The pool area with jacuzzi was rarely busy (particularly during the day) but would be utilised by guests more of
Manager Response: Wow, thank you for the great review from a senior contributor on TripAdvisor!  We're thrilled to hear you agree with our strong reviews as well as our award from TripAdvisor as one of the top ten large hotels in the US for families.  We try to maintain a low level of noise for all guests while allowing them to enjoy themselves and have a great vacation at the same time.  We will continue to strive to improve in this area moving forward.  We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: friendly staff makes it a great stay
Summary: free beer, compimentary hot breakfast and dinner was always a great way to save money especially with a family of 4.  clean rooms but more importantly they were very large.  kitchenette/living room was separated by another bedroom/bathroom with 2 beds.  best of all, each room had it's own TV.  the best part was how friendly the entire staff was.  heck, they even serve you orange juice (thanks maru) and even serve you beer (budweiser ) in the evening reception.  that was a hit especially coming back a long day from the beach, shopping as the driving around LA was quite insane!
Manager Response: Who doesn't love a review that starts with the words "free beer"?  In all seriousness, thank you for the kind review of your recent stay.  Maru was delighted when we read your review to our staff today during our morning huddle.  We're glad you had a good stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Great value and location for family vacations/Disneyland
Summary: ‚Ä¢	I stayed at the Homewood Suites located on Harbor Blvd in Garden Grove (CA) for nine (9) nights August into September 2012 ‚Ä¢	For practical purposes, this is a hotel primarily designed and used for family vacations/Disneyland ‚Ä¢	Had a corner (slight larger than standard) suite which was quiet, and a good size with separate living room, kitchen area, and bedroom ‚Ä¢	Beds were comfortable ‚Äì no issues ‚Ä¢	Overall hotel, grounds, and room were clean and appeared well maintained ‚Ä¢	All furnishings (room and elsewhere) were very standard, midlevel hotel quality and some did show some noticeable wear ‚Äì but nothing particularly noteworthy poor condition ‚Ä¢	Housekeeping did its job as expected each day ‚Äì no issues ‚Ä¢	Pool area was fine: clean, towels & chairs available, never crowded.   It had
Manager Response: Another review from a senior contributor!  Thank you very much for this amazingly detailed review of our hotel.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and give our future guests a very clear explanation of all the great things that come with staying at the Homewood Suites Anaheim.  I apologize for the billing errors and if it is convenient for you, would like you to contact me via email at: joe.leinacker@hilton.com so that I may follow-up on these issues to ensure this does not happen in the future and as well as see what we can do to express our regret over this situation.

Summary: This is part of a letter I just wrote to the hotel manager: I am writing to applaud your staff.  They all are awesome, but I would like to name three that really stand out.  Louis, Jasmine and Connie.   My husband and I have made annual trips to Disneyland since 1997.  We would usually stay at a different place each time.  One of those times we stayed at your hotel.  Since that trip we have always stayed at your hotel. Your staff goes above and beyond to make sure we feel at home. On our second stay there my granddaughter who was turning four was treated to a gift basket full of sweets, a stuffed animal and other items.  Evidently Louis and Jasmine had overheard us saying it was her birthday.  They went out of their way to make it an extra special one!  It is always so nice to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this very heartwarming review.  While our staff works hard every day to deliver a perfect stay for every guest, when things happen unexpectedly we go out of our way to try to resolve the issue.  It means a great deal to us that the efforts of our staff made a difference in your stay and we are absolutely thrilled that you are coming back to stay with us in a few months.  If you have the opportunity, please email me at: joe.leinacker@hilton.com so that we prepare a special arrival for you in December.

Summary: We (2 adults and 2 children) stayed in the hotel for 2 nights visiting theme parks.  The hotel was very busy with children.  The room was clean, quiet and comfortable.  The breakfast was good.  We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for logging onto TripAdvisor and posting this review.  We are quite pleased that you had a very good stay and hope to see you on your next visit to Southern California.

Summary: We stayed at the Homewood Suites for 8 nights- first off I have to say that the staff is very nice but even their kindness could not overcome my experiences.  We checked in and got our room on a high floor with the perk of being able to watch the Disney fireworks the first night that we were there. Next morning we get up and my husband takes a shower and the water is stuck in the tub. I wait for about 30 mins to have my shower and by then the water has gone down a bit but as we were going to La Jolla for a lunch date, we needed to get cleaned up. Before we left we reported it to the desk and they assured us that it would be fixed. We come back at supper time and it was obvious by the smell of chemicals in the bathroom that maintenance had been there. During the night I am woken
Manager Response: To say that your experience is concerning would be an understatement.  I would welcome the opportunity to speak with you regarding your experience and find a way to make this up to you and your family as well as follow-up on the multiple issues that you incurred.  At your earliest convenience, please contact me at my direct line of: 714-620-2153 or via email at: joe.leinacker@hilton.com.

Summary Heading: What I expect at Homewood Suites
Summary: I stayed 2 nights here recently when my daughter started the Disney College Program.  It's very convenient to the parks, I felt like the parking lot was safe and with all the hotels in the block, this one had parking segregated, so there was always plenty of places to park.  At first I was concerned the room was loud because we could hear the pool right outside our window, but 4 floor up.  Then we discovered the window was open.  Almost all the rooms are along a VERY long hallway, and we were right in the middle, but it was okay, we just needed to get our bearings when we left the room to figure out which way we needed to walk.  There's one elevator at each end of the hall, and we never needed to wait very long.  There are LOTS of families here, and they take advantage of the
Manager Response: Thank you for submitting this review regarding your recent stay with us.  The Homewood Suites brand is an exceptional group of hotels and we are pleased that we lived up to your expectations.  We hope that your daughter enjoys the Disney College Program as we know it to be a great learning experience.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed here last year and was happy, so we returned this year, and was very happy. We like the fact the rooms are large with full kitchen and separate bedroom. The curtains truly blackout the room, which is nice because we make our 4 year old come back and take a nap in the afternoon (makes for more pleasant day at disneyland.) The bedrooms are quiet, another plus for afternoon nap or early to bed. The staff is always helpful, friendly and personable. They always smile and address you when they see you. They are always accomodating. We arrived very early due to our flight was early and they offered the use of the facilities/grounds/pool until our room was ready. Also gave directions to great lunch places. They made every effort to get our room ready early and checked us in at
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us that you continue to return and stay with us during your visits to Southern California.  We will continue to deliver the service and product that exceeds your expectations so that you may fully enjoy your Disney vacation.  We look forward to seeing you on your next stay.

Summary: Stayed here for 9nights in june 2012 with my husband and two daughters ages 12 and 9. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. Staff very helpful and friendly. The only thing i have to complain about was the breakfast... Not a great selection and they need more toasters and waffle machines - but what do you expect when its free!!!
