We are going back to LA next summer but don't think we will be staying here because the price has increased by an extra ¬£300 more ($460) for the same dates and duration, so i will need to look for cheaper accommodation!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nicest Hotel We've Ever Stayed In
Summary: We were supposed to stay at Paradise Pier ... long story, but we ended up at Homewood Suites. From the moment we checked in...everything was perfect.  Breakfast and Dinner were free on the days that they were offered. The staff, from top to bottom, were some of the kindest i've ever come across. We are from Philly, PA, and this was our first experience actually staying at any CA hotel.  We just couldn't get over how friendly and smiley the staff was.  We stayed 6 nights, and they were all exceptional.  The gym was clean. The eating area clean.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Do not expect high standard. Justgood enough
Summary: Pluses: Convenient to visit Disneyland and around Los Angeles  Large room with kitchen facilities  Windows can be opened (Although very slightly)  We watched the fireworks of Disney from our room on 3rd floor  Nice restaurants around in walking distance  Free wi fi  Fast reception service  The reception staff was very helpful and welcoming  Minuses First time in my life I did my breakfast with plastic plates, forks and knives in a hotel. Breakfast is a mess(I think because of so many children staying in the hotel) and needs imrovement  The parking should be free  The room was a bit durty
Manager Response: none

Summary: Short and sweet review as the title suggests there is not a lot wrong with this hotel.The rooms are big and modern,staff are very friendly,location is great for disney.My only gripe(small one) is breakfast which is like a circus between 8-830am and is hard to find a table also the actual breakfast area is close to the front doors so you can get a cold draft having your food.That aside i would definately recommend this hotel and we would stay there again in the future.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us!  We appreciate you taking the time to complete a TripAdvisor post.  On behalf of our entire staff here at Homewood Suites we would like to thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I was quite apprehensive about the reviews I had read here.  This hotel is right down the street from Disneyland therefore, it is going to be busy year-round.  I stayed here while in town for business.  This location turned out to be perfect with easy access to the beaches and to Disneyland. We went to Newport Beach and to Huntington Beach easily and enjoyed the beautiful sunsets.  Many people explained their disappointment in the meals.  If you go to breakfast before 6:30, it is quiet and the food it hot and fresh.  Don't wait until after 7:30.    I left some clothes in my room and reported it that night after I had checked out and left town.  No one in housekeeping was available after 7:30 local time, so they said they would check into it when the manager arrived in the
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate hearing from our corporate guests and thank you for submitting this review.  It is our goal to meet the needs of all of our guests and we continue to work to perfect the experience for our business clients.  We are very happy to hear you had a good stay. We apologize that your initial attempts to recover your forgotten items were not handled in an efficient manner and we will follow-up on your experience to improve moving forward.   We hope to see you again on your next business trip.

Summary: Stayed here last week with my mom and 6 year old son.  Have stayed in many hotels in the area before (Embassy Suites, Hampton Inn, Hyatt, etc.) and overall this was a good solid hotel/suite.  The pool area was great....good size pool to accommodate a lot of people without it feeling cramped.  They also had a decent jacuzzi and a wading pool (1-1 /1/4 ft deep) for little ones.  The hotel also includes a breakfast and a light dinner (M-Th).  Although this seems like a benefit we never really used this benefit due to the times offered (either we were too anxious to get to the parks early to get the Radiator Springs Racers fast passes or we just missed the dinner (only offered 5-7pm).  The staff was great and very helpful....I think this really sets this hotel apart from the others
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate that you took the time to post this review.  We know we play an important role in your family vacation and are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the beds and that our staff service exceeded your expectations.  We look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim/Southern California area.

Summary Heading: Great Disneyland hotel for large family
Summary: My husband is active duty military.  We hadn't taken a vacation in 4 years and wanted a great Disney vacation for 6 people on a budget.  We absolutely loved this hotel! I had called the hotel to ask some questions a couple of times before making the reservation through Hotels.com.  My husband and I were taking kids: 18, 17, 9, and 7 years old, so we needed a hotel that could accommodate all of us in one suite.  Byron and Connie were extremely knowledgeable and friendly.  I can't say enough great things about this hotel and their staff.  The hotel is conveniently located near Disneyland and is right across the street from Target.  Since all the hotel rooms have a kitchen, we were able to stock the full-size fridge with water, sodas, and stuff for lunches. This makes a huge
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this amazing review!!!!!!  Your experience is what drives us to deliver great service with a great product every single day.  We are honored to be a part of such an important vacation and are thrilled that you had a fantastic stay.  Also, thank you for recognizing the efforts of our staff.  We are fortunate to have some great people working here at the hotel.  Please come back and see us again whenever possible.

Summary: We arrived to find hair and cigarette holes on the sheets.  The maintenance person handed us new sheets - which also had holes in it.   They have no housekeeping at the time.   We had to cover the bed with 3 layers of sheets.  The carpets were filthy.  The phone in the bedroom didn't work.  And the phone in the living area smelled like puke.  We normally stay at the Westin but needed to stay closer to Disney land.  This property was horrible.
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  We apologize that you had such an experience and assure you that this is not the typical stay at this hotel.  I would like the privilege to follow-up with you in more detail to prevent this from happening again as well as resolve this with you.  At your earliest convenience, please contact me on my direct line at: 714-620-2153 or via email at: joe.leinacker@hilton.com.

Summary: Modern hotel with clean and very comfortable rooms. Service from staff is truly excellent. Complimentary breakfast and dinner buffet. This is a perfect hotel when visiting Disney. Can highly recommend it!
Manager Response: We genuinely appreciate you taking the time to share this experience.  We thank you for your recommendation and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: First time to Southern California - great accomodations, great experience!!!!
Summary: My wife and I recently celebrated out 11th wedding anniversary.  We moved west to Arizona about a year and a half ago and decided to vacation to southern california since neither of us had ever been and had heard about the great beaches, etc.    Homewood Suites was perfectly located for us, we took time to go experience Los Angeles, visit several beaches along the coast and even took a day trip to San Diego.  You can say we got the full Southern California experience!    The staff was extremely helpful with directions, etc. and every employee we passed in the hallway greeted us with a smile.  Breakfast was amazing - what a spread!  Thank you Homewood Suites for helping make our first experience to southern california a great one!    Michael and Kim Land
Manager Response: We hope your first time isn't your last!  Thank you for this review.  We really enjoy playing a role in our guest's celebrations and are happy that we made your 11th anniversary a memorable one.  We hope to see you on your 12th anniversary!!!!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 7 days, and it was probably the best hotel we have ever stayed at. The lobby is great since there is a tv area where kids and their families can watch tv while waiting for the shuttle or just relaxing. There is always free coffee and water available beside the reception as well. The shuttle was prompt and offered comfortable seating, and the waiting time was not long. The staff was extremely friendly too. Everytime we would come home from a long day, they would always be at the reception welcoming us. The housekeeping is good and our room was very clean throughout our stay. It is in a nice area with a restaurant, target, and walgreens in very short proximity. It was an amazing stay for us, and we would definitely recommend this hotel to our friends.
Manager Response: Your review received a standing ovation from our staff when I read it to them in our daily huddle!!!  We hope to be the best hotel ever for every guest and are encouraged that we were able to acheive that for you.  Please come back and visit us again.

Summary: From the moment we checked in to the moment we checked out we had nothing but SUPERB service.  The staff went above and beyond to ensure a pleasant stay for our group.  I have traveled extensively(outside of my home state of Ohio) for my daughter's softball games over the past 8 years and I have to say we definately saved the best for last.  My father, who traveled with us, wanted me to give a special shout out to Joe and Connie as well as the rest of the staff....He was more than impressed (I'm sure you know who I am referring to....I actually contemplated leaving him with you...thanks for making HIS trip so special). Travel ball is over, but I hope to visit you again in the future and have already recommended HWS for teams traveling to Nationals next year.  Thanks again!
Manager Response: We had a great time hosting your group at the hotel and thank you for sharing your experience with TripAdvisor.  We just shared your review with Connie and she said we would've loved you to leave your father with us......we had a great time with him the all week!  Thank you for referring us to other teams.  We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Family Friendly Hotel close to Disney
Summary: This was our first trip to CA with our two small children & was referred to Homewood Suites by a friend.  We can't say enough about the friendly staff at this hotel.  We were always welcomed back with a warm smile which was nice to hear after a long day.  This is a great hotel with clean rooms, conveniently located near Disney & other venues.  Not having to leave the hotel for breakfast was an added bonus.  Multiple family friendly, sit down restaurants in the hotel parking lot was also handy for take out by the pool or to catch a game on TV.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to post this review.  We pride ourselves on treating your family like our family and we're happy that was your experience.  We hope to see you again on your next family trip!

Summary: Good hotel for families.  We stayed  4 nights and used it as our base to travel to legoland, universal, and disneyland.  Breakfast buffet was good and had enough variety to please everyone.  The dinners were more appealing to kids, but after a long day of sightseeing, it was great not having to go out for a meal.  Complimentary wine or beer was a nice bonus.  Pool depth was no more than 5 feet so we never worried about kids in it and lots of  space for lounging.  Drawback was housekkeeping for the bathroom - not clean and lighting is very dim.  We had a refrigerator and microwave, but only used the refrigerator to chill water.  Not sure if we would stay here again since we did not use the kitchen, uncleanliness of the bathroom,  and not walking distance to disneyland  (there is
Manager Response: We absolutely agree with you that the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim is ideal for families.  We are happy that you were able to take advantage of complimentary Suites Start Breakfast and the Manager's Welcome Home Reception.  As you noted, these meals can make your visit to Southern California very convenient and allows you to focus on enjoying your vacation without the hassle of searching for restaurants for every meal.  Although you may not need the full kitchen in each suite, we hope that additional space of our suites (1.5 times larger than a standard hotel room) helped you relax and unwind after a long day at Disneyland.  Thanks again and we hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disneyland
Summary: We recently stayed 3 nights at Homewood Suites.  I am very picky about places to stay and do extensive research of hotels.        Rooms very clean and the bed is very comfortable.  Nice having a kitchen though we only  used refrig. and micro. Staff very friendly and eager to help shuttle to Disney is $3 pp p day and is worth it.  It is not in walking distance! Bfast has good selections.  Staff did a great job keeping everything replenished. No fresh fruit, it looked liked out of can. We encountered a huge crowd with some very rude people.  It amazes me how people act like they have never eaten before and afraid hotel will run out of food. Staff continued to smile!  I would recommend going very early to avoid crowd. There are trays so you can fix plate and take to room. Didn't
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing review and great suggestions to our future guests!  We are thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with the service and cleanliness of the hotel as these are two of our most important objectives at the hotel.  I know everyone appreciates your tips for restaurants in the area and the new Radiator Springs ride at California Adventure.  We can't wait to see you again on your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary: We recently stayed in the Homewood Anaheim for the second time in two years.  I can't say enough great things about this hotel!  The staff are MORE than helpful and courteous, particularly, Luis saved our daughters warm cookies upon our late return to the hotel from Disneyland.  The room was VERY clean every day, fresh toiletries were left and the beds were very clean and comfortable.  The breakfast every morning was fantastic, but most importantly, the staff serving breakfast were kind, smiling and very helpful.  The manager's reception during the weekday afternoons was handy and food was excellent as well.  This hotel deserves rave reviews, not for the tiny details but for the outstanding staff that make it a home-away-from-home.  The manager was present most days for the
Manager Response: We love to win!!!!!  Thank you for the kind words about our staff and in particular about Luis.  He is truly a special individual and we are lucky to have him working here with us.  We can't thank you enough for posting this review and are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay.  We hope your next vacation brings you back to the Homewood Suites.

Summary: The past few years Homewood Suites has served as our a launching pad to Dinseyland. Every single time we stay there the staff is amazing and the amenities are always so well prepared to accommodate us. Disneyland can stretch the patience and energy of many parents so you need a place to get away from real quick. Homewood Suites no doubt in my mind takes care of that for my wife and I every time. I would consider Homewood Suites an extension of Disneyland. Thank you for taking care of us every time we stay there as we hope to get down there soon.  Once again ...thank you  Kristen Colwell
Manager Response: We agree with you that the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim is a great launching pad for a visit to anywhere in Southern California.  We take our role in your vacation to Disneyland very seriously and are honored that you felt like we are an extension of their service.  It means a great deal to us that you took the time to post this review and we hope to see you back here very soon.

Summary: We are fortunate to live within hours of Disney, As a result we visit the area often. Our experience at the Homewood Suites was beyond expectation. The friendly staff greeted us promptly and had us checked in within minutes. The room was spacious, clean, and perfect for families. In the morning, we were surprised to have a full breakfast provided at no cost! Our kids were in heaven...even got to make their own waffles. The hotel manager, Joe Leinacker, even introduced himself and assisted his employees! The shuttle was right on time and easily accessible. Our family will most definitely return again! Thank you for our great visit!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind words and great review.  We appreciate that you plan on coming back to see us on your next visit and can't wait to see you again.

Summary Heading: Be very proud of your staff--Amazing Staff
Summary: Best place to stay when visiting Disney.  The staff is AMAZING and extremely helpful, friendly, and welcoming.  All the staff stood out to me and were always willing to help.  I appreciate the friendliness of all the staff from the front desk ot the housekeepers were extremely helpful and friendly.  Thank you for the BEST stay.  You all have made a loyal customer!! Thank you!!
Manager Response: We strive to be the best hotel for all of our guests and are thrilled that you had that experience!  We agree that we have many amazing associates here that work very hard to help our guests have a memorable stay.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Southern California.

Summary: When we arrived at the Hotel, we were greeted with warm welcomes and smiles.  This was very encouraging.  We were given information about Disneyland and shuttles to and fro.  However, when we got to our room, we were a little underwhelmed.  Mostly when when we entered the bathroom . . . it was filled with mold!! There was absolutely no ventilation.  This was a huge concern since I have asthma.  By the third night, I had a huge asthma attack, I had to call the emergency line to my doctor at 2am and send my Husband to the pharmacy for an inhaler just so that I could breath.   The mattress was sagging,  The sofa-sleeper was dirty.  It was noisy.  What more can I say. My kids liked the pool.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to give feedback and your experience while you were a guest here at the Homewood Suites. While we treat every guest request with its due importance, I assure you that a report of a bathroom filled with mold would definitely be met with a response to immediately address the issue.  We encourage all of our guests to report any issue they have with the suite when they experience it as it is our expectation to provide everyone with a clean, comfortable suite with everything in working order.  Unfortunately since we did not know about this until after departure, we were unaware and unable to respond during the stay.  We have since inspected your suite and did not find any evidence of mold.   If possible, please contact me directly at: joe.leinacker@hilton.com so that we may resolve this to your satisfaction.

Summary Heading: Our recent stay at Homewood Suites-JCZ
Summary: This is our third time staying at this hotel and once again it was excellent.  The rooms are VERY clean.  The desk personnel are extremely nice and rapid to respond to ANY needs we had.  The free breakfast and dinner was PERFECT, convenient, and all you can eat.  The free dinner‚Äôs also included unlimited FREE beer and wine.  The workers in the dining area were helpful and pleasant.  I was so pleased with one worker in the buffet area (I wish I knew her name) I tipped her generously on our last day!  Every morning she greeted us with a smile and got us everything we needed.  Joe the manager is WONDERFUL.  He goes out of his way to accommodate all guests in the best way he possibly can and during meals he personally walked around the buffet area to make sure everyone was being
Manager Response: We appreciate your continued loyalty to the hotel and love that you keep coming back.  We know we are lucky to have so many great associates that choose to work at the hotel and are elated that they had a positive impact on your stay.  We always tell potential new associates that you can't fake sincerity, so if you don't like helping people enjoy their vacation this isn't the hotel for you.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit.

Summary: We have stayed at the homewood suites several times over the past six years and we are always thrilled with the property.  The staff are very friendly and helpful, we had our parents out with us this year and my mom just couldn't get over how nice everyone was.  My dad of course was thrilled with the breakfast and the light dinners.  They work very hard to keep the breakfast area clean and full of great food.  I love the large rooms with kitchen, we have a youngster and it makes life so much easier.  Also, we love the location, close to  Disney and several beaches.  I always say I am going to write a review (because I always read reviews before I stay anywhere) and then I forget.  Glad to finally do my part.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this great review!  We are thrilled that you loved the location as we are a terrific place to stay when visiting all Southern California attractions.  We hope to see you back with us again very soon!

Summary: The poster hotellover68 below was actually my friend who gave me a ride to the hotel I was staying at(here) for me to get something out of my fridge.  We were at the hotel for 20 minutes and as she said her seat was taken along with my purse.  No security, no cameras, and this happened in broad daylight.  The manager was unsympathetic to my dilemma as I had my cash, my Disney tickets for myself and 4 kids, camera, etc. etc. in there.  The vehicle was locked.  They did offer to waive the parking fee for my 7 day stay and comp 1 night.  I wasn't looking for the whole stay, but 1 night was a slap in the face.  Their website states they have security, and also that they are a Disney friendly hotel.  I am in the process of speaking with Disney as I am sure they would like to know
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback upon your recent stay with us. We sincerely regret the theft that occurred as we strive to make every guest's stay with us an enjoyable one.  This clearly was not the case for you and your friend   Please know that when we offered to adjust your bill, personally contact Disneyland to have your tickets refunded, assistance with getting any documents needed board the airplane, transportation to the airport as well as any other destination, and gave you the personal cell phone number to our Guest Service Manager to be contacted anytime day or night for any other need that may arise, this was not done with the intent to insult you, but rather to compensate you for the situation which had occurred and the time you spent working on it.  While this is a rare event, we work closely with the Garden Grove Resort Police as do all of the hotels in this area to prevent such crimes.  In working with the police, they have told us that leaving valuables in plain view in your vehicle should be avoided both day and night.  While it is true we do not have security, we also do not advertise such and most hotels in our neighborhood do not as well. Again, we are truly sorry for what happened to you during your stay at our hotel.

Summary Heading: Big room, very noisy, erratic hot water
Summary: This hotel looks nice.  The rooms, which are actually suites, are big.  The rooms and common areas are clean.  The Internet Wi-Fi Internet is fast and connects easily.  We used the laundry facilities and they are good.  The hotel goes downhill from here.  The hotel must be poorly insulated because we clearly and loudly heard people in the neighboring rooms, in the room above us, in the hallway, and the traffic outside was loud and annoying.  After the first night, we resorted to running the air conditioner fan continuously in order to drown out the noise.  That worked pretty well.  The hot water in the shower was erratic.  On some mornings, it was fine and on other mornings it was luke warm at best.  Even though everything looked nice and was clean, I would not stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review.  We were happy to hear that you enjoyed the additional space in the suites as well as the modern furnishings, complimentary high speed wireless internet, and laundry facilities.  All are important amenities when traveling and we were pleased to hear that they lived up to your expectations. We regret that the water temperature was erratic.  As we all enjoy a great shower, we understand how frustrating that can be.  Fortunately, on the rare occasion that this issue arises, our knowledgeable maintenance staff can get this addressed within 15-20 minutes of when it is reported to them.   While we don't get many guests that note an issue with the noise level (especially from the street), I would welcome the opportunity to discuss this with you further to find out your room location and see if anything can be done to reduce the noise in your suite as well as determine what we can do to get you to consider staying with us again on your next stay.   We sincerely appreciate your feedback (both positive and negative) as we strive every day to make the hotel better and your review will help us address these issues.

Summary Heading: Family Friendly??  If you like Dirty Hotels!!!  not for Single People or Business Travelers
Summary: As I always start off my reviews, I state that I am a Hilton Diamond Guest.  As a result, I have very high expectations of my total experience with a property, regardless of where it is located or what badging in the Hilton Family of Hotels it carries.  For a Homewood Suites, (which I normally really like) as a business traveler, the spaces are usually nice, and I like the separate sitting area from the sleeping area.  This Homewood however -- One of the WORST I have ever stayed in.  When I headed for bed the first night, the bedding was so dirty I had to have housekeeping come and completely strip the bed.  So, as you might image, this was not a good start for a what was to be a 7 day stay.  The hotel is very poorly maintained, the seating areas in the common areas of the lobby
Manager Response: We appreciate your very direct feedback and will follow-up on your impressions to ensure we offer the best stay possible for all of our guests.  We understand that traveling to this area on business can be challenging especially during the summer as most of our guests are families here on vacation.  We are going to be doing some renovations in the near future beginning with the lobby and dining area which we hope will make the hotel a suitable fit for not only guests traveling for pleasure, but for our business traveler as well.  We apologize that you did not find our service to live up to the award we received by TripAdvisor as the 10th best large hotel for families in the United States and 20th best large hotel for families in the world for 2012.  We will continue to try to improve our service and facilities to meet every guest's expectations.

Summary: We stayed  at this hotel when we took, our grandchildren,daughter and son in law to Disneyland this pass june. We enjoyed our stay and the many perks this hotel provided Not only did they provide breakfast but dinner! With dinner they provided beer  or wine! IT was nice to take the shuttle,which pick you up right at door of this hotel. (don't  have  to fight Diseyland  traffic)  We were able to enjoy the parks but when it got  to hot or kids were getting tired, we would go back to the hotel and either rest or go to the pool. Then enjoy dinner and be ready for the night festivities at either Disneyland or Ca.Disney. We hope to visit the parks next year and we will definitely stay here.
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for posting this review of your recent stay with us!  We're glad you were able take advantage of the value that the Homewood Suites by Hilton offers as well have a convenient location to let the kids come back to rest or go to the pool after a long day at Disneyland.  We hope that you are able to take another vacation very soon and will choose to stay with us once again.

Summary Heading: A very good option when staying near Disney
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 6 days while vacationing in the area.  It is clean,staff are friendly, and having a full kitchen is great - as is the extra space afforded by the separate bedroom.  Location is also great - about 10 minutes from Disney and the convention center.  Lots of restaurants within minutes and a Starbucks right next door.  All in all, a great option.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing about your experience on your recent stay with us.  It sounds like the hotel perfectly suited your needs and we lived up to the commitment that we make to our guests every day which is to offer a clean and comfortable suite that allows you to enjoy your stay with us whether on business or pleasure.  It is our sincere wish that your travels bring you back to see us again in the very near future.

Summary Heading: This is what a 5 STAR Family Friendly Hotel is!
Summary: We stayed at Homewood Suites for 5 days and 4 nights.  Checked in on Sunday and out on Thursday.  We spent 4th of July, our baby's 1st birthday, & had 3 Day Park Hoppers to Disneyland... its been a long week! Thankfully we stayed here at Homewood Suites!! We were so impressed at the quality and value of this Hotel!  I had never even heard of a "Homewood Suites" before but I am sooo glad we stayed here!!  For us, the biggest perks were the daily FREE breakfast buffet (who doesn't love to make their own waffles?); the Mon-Thurs FREE managers reception (alcohol INCLUDED) & homemade cookies (warm chocolate chip).. the food was enjoyable; the super friendly staff and most importantly the afforadability!  Gus was so nice and welcoming... really made us feel comfortable!  The pool,
Manager Response: We are honored that you and your family chose to spend such a special occasion with us at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim!!!!!  Thank you for taking the time to post this amazing review.  Homewood Suites is a fast growing brand that Hilton guests are coming to know will provide a great suite at an unbelievable value.  We are going to hold you to your commitment to not stay at another hotel while in the area:).  We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: 5 star quality at a fraction of the cost!
Summary: Our GPS had us all turned around when we were trying to find the hotel, but when we did, it was like a gift at Christmas!  I don't believe hotel search websites give this place enough credit.  We were a family of 7 staying for 6 nights and were completely, 100% delighted with our stay!  What more can you ask for with comfy beds (even the pull-out), clean rooms, full kitchens, free breakfast AND free dinner WITH drinks!  The pool too was awesome when we needed a break from Disney!  It was never too crowded and very clean.  Having Target, Starbucks, Red Robin and the pizza joint in the parking lot were all additional bonuses too!  We would very much recommend this place again and again.
Manager Response: We love the title of your review and may need to use this in our marketing campaigns.  Your review is very much appreciated are we are happy that we exceeded your expectations.  Thank you for helping us get the word out about our hotel.  Please come back and see us very soon.

Summary: I'd say 90% of everyone staying here is going to Disneyland ... And it's a great spot for that as well! You have to take a shuttle everyday, but a 3 day pass is $9 per person and it runs every 30 minutes (15 and 45 after the hour).   The staff was great! Benjamin, Kaitlyn, etc. they all took great care in ensuring our stay was great! The room was spacious and clean ... My wife loved the dishwasher for our 9 month olds bottles every night and the full fridge was awesome as well. The breakfast was pretty good as well.   I really loved how Target is right across the street ... A few tips on that since you're probably going to Disney if you are reading this.   1. Target has a GREAT selection of Disney souvenirs at 1/3 of the price ... Kids don't care where they get them, so do
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review and some cost savings tips for our guests!  We are fortunate to be in such a great location with Target across the street and with 4 restaurants in our parking lot; a few more reasons the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim is in our biased opinion the best place to stay when visiting Disneyland or any destination in Southern California.  Thank you for noting some of the special associates that work here including Ben and Kaitlyn.  They are not only wonderful employees, but wonderful people and we are lucky to have them working here.  We can't wait to see you again on your next trip!

Summary Heading: Can't say enough good about our experience!
Summary: Our destination was Disneyland, so we choose Homewood Suites for it's EZ access to the park and for it's kitchen facilities.  We were more than thrilled to also discover FREE breakfast, dinner, WI-Fi and short walk to restaurants, Target, and other shopping. We were able to buy our entry tickets to Disneyland at the front desk, minimizing our wait to get in the park. The shuttle to Disney picked us up at the hotel and was a quick trip to the park.  The staff was the MOST accommodating I've ever experienced, and I travel frequently for my business.  Oh, to have this type of accommodation and these unbelievable price everywhere I go would be a real BLESSING.     After a long day at the park, my feet needed the spa and it was more relaxing than a full massage.  The kids loved the
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you not only enjoyed the location and amenities of the hotel, but that the staff delivered the type of service that will bring you back as a guest in the future.  We are very fortunate to have a great group of people that work here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim.  We are looking forward to having you stay with us on your next visit to Southern California.

Summary: We visited this hotel at the end of May 2012. We were having a family reunion so we had multiple rooms and more than 20 of us staying. We feel a hotel can make or break a vacation and Homewood came through in a big way. The staff went out of their way to make sure everything was perfect for us. Having breakfast and dinner waiting for us everyday was a huge plus. Two of our children had birthdays while we were there and the staff all signed cards and filled a gift bag for each of them. Every staff member we met during our week-long stay had a smile and a greeting for us. It could not have been better. We will tell everyone we know that Homewood Suites is the place to stay in Anaheim!
Manager Response: Wow, what an amazing title for a review!!!!  Thank you so much for sharing your experience during your stay here for your family reunion.  We felt priveleged that you would allow us to host the entire family for such a special occasion and are thrilled everyone had a great time.  We hope to see you again for next year's reunion!

Summary: We stayed at the Homewood Suites in October 2011 for a Disneyland visit. The rooms were nice and spacious and it was great to have a door separating the two rooms. Beds were comfortable, plenty of hot water and closet space. The front desk staff was always helpful and cheery. The shuttle to and from Disneyland was a huge selling point for us!  The pool was a bit chilly and we weren't as impressed with some of the breakfast items.  We would recommend this hotel to friends and would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post the review of your stay last year.  We apologize that the pool was a little chilly during your stay and I'm not sure if there was an issue with our pool heater at that time, however we do check the pool temperature multiple times each day and address this issue as quickly as possible if we find it not at the correct setting.  We will definitely follow-up on your experience and thank you for your feedback.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Although I read trip advisor on a regular basis this is the first time I am compelled to write a review.   We travel to Anaheim about once a year from Hawaii and have stayed at a few different hotels.   The service at this hotel  by far is the best of any hotel in Anaheim we have stayed in the last 15 plus years!  What stands out for us is that the service is great across the board.   In my opinion, it starts at the top with Joe.   He greeted everyone he came across in the lobby and would assist in any area.  He would even help out in the complimentary breakfast area.  He is a leader by example.   I read in reviews the elevators are slow but the hotel is only about 7 stories high.   Just request a room on a lower floor or request a room further away from the lobby side of the
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us to receive such a positive review from someone that has stayed at some of the other hotels in the area.  We have a remarkable staff that comes to the hotel each day with the sole focus to assist our guests in having a great day.  We're thrilled this was your experience and we hope to see you next year on your annual trip to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: 10 out of 10 ! Perfect in every way, exceptional staff
Summary: Our Oz Cruise Club group of 30 recently stayed at Homewood Suites, Garden Grove during May as part of our tour of North America, what a wonderful choice it was. If only all hotels were as wonderful as this one.  Each and every staff member at this hotel are the nicest I have ever encountered at any hotel, always smiling and ready to greet each guest. They are happy to help with tickets, birthdays, booking town cars or any other thing that a guest requires. The town cars that Homewood suites uses are very comfortable, drivers are excellent and the price economical.  Evening meals became a social event for our group and with three birthdays on subsequent nights it became quite a celebration. The wonderful staff ensured that each birthday was very special and everyone will always
Manager Response: Thank you for such an amazing review. I just read your review to our entire staff and this really made our day.....actually, it made our week!  Hearing about our guests having experiences like this are the reason we work in the hospitality business.  While we know it is a great distance from Australia to Southern California, it is our hope that we see you and your group again on your next trip.

Summary: We recently spent a total of 7 nights at this hotel (5 nights, then 7 nights after a trip to San Diego). I cannot praise the staff here highly enough.  They could not have been more friendly or helpful.  Every time we walked into the foyer we were gretting with a "Hello" or "Welcome back".  These guys really know how to provide a great service.    They very kindly arranged an early check in for us and as a bonus we had great view of the Disney fireworks (we were happy to have a room on a higher floor and just as happy to walk up the stairs, although I didn't find the wait for the elevator too long at all....not sure what some people complain about to be honest.. a little bit of patience doesn't hurt).  My kids loved running up and down the stairs in any case..they didn't even
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your very detailed review of your stay at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim!  The Homewood Suites brand prides itself in having many guests that stay with us for more than 1 or 2 nights which allows us to really get to know our guests.  You were gracious enough to point out many of the amenities that Homewood Suites is known for and why were ranked as the hotel brand with the "Highest Guest Satisfaction Among Extended Stay Hotels" two years in a row by J.D. Power.  We hope your travels bring you back to see us in the very near future.

Summary: This is an excellent place for families.  Staff was exceptionally friendly and accomodating.  Rooms clean and comfortable.   Nice outdoor pool and hot tub area.  Excellent complimentary breakfast.  Dinners midweek are also a nice touch.  Not fancy, but good and filling.  The shuttle took us right into Disneyland every morning and their pickup times were always right on time.  Bottom line:  Stay here!
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review of your experience at our hotel.  We're happy that we lived up to and exceeded your expectations on your visit to Disneyland.  We hope that you have to opportunity to stay with us again very soon.

Summary Heading: Traveler is in LOVE with this property!
Summary: Where do I begin? I travel a lot with my family and we have stayed at so many locations and different hotels that I feel I have seen it all. We stayed at this property years ago and rememberd that it was a great place to stay. So when we went to Disney this year, there was no thinking about where to stay.  They got better!!! A LOT better!!! The staff at the time Esther, Eduardo and Arasely were beyond amazing. They were like family. So welcoming, friendly, funny and seemed to really appreciate their job (not just there to get a paycheck). Even pulling up, the maintenance outside gave us a great smile. The property was VERY clean and well maintained. The breakfast in the morning was plentiful and always stocked. For having such a large surge of eaters, the eatery ans dining area
Manager Response: We love that you love our property!!!!!  Thank you for noting the efforts of Esther, Eduardo, and Aracely as they are all genuine people that love what they do and we are fortunate to have them working here with us at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim.  You are right that both our Kitchen staff and Housekeeping staff do an amazing job on a daily basis to provide a well cooked meal and a clean suite during your stay.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the Anaheim/Orange County area.

Summary: What an incredible deal!! Stay mid-week and you get Free Dinner & Drinks and Free Breakfast daily! THey have a great pool, disney movies playing in the lobby and all suites with bedrooms, kitchens, etc. This was a fantastic place to stay when visiting Disneyland! Also, a convenient shuttle to and from the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for the nice review!  The Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim really is a great value and we're thrilled that you agree.  We hope to see you back with us again very soon.

Summary: We first stayed at Homewood Suites in April 2011 for 12 nights and were so impressed with it that we were talking about returning again in 2012, even before we had left.   Once again we made the long trip from Australia in April 2012 for 17 nights. (2 adults and 2 children 14G & 10B)  This is a hotel that is filled with quality, professional staff that truly get what their customers want.  From the top quality comfortable beds and pillows to the very well appointed kitchen with a superb full size fridge, this place is exceptional value for money.  Fantastic complimentary breakfast 7 days a week and complimentary dinner Monday - Thursday.  Starbucks next door, Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and a Joes Crab Shack are just a very short stroll away. We also found a fantastic little
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write this review and for noting our recent award from TripAdvisor.  For those that aren't aware, TripAdvisor named us as the 10th best large hotel for families in the United States and the 20th best large hotels for families in the World!  We are honored to know that you are already talking about coming back and seeing us again later this year.  Thank you noticing the care and effort that our staff put in everyday to assist our guests with having a memorable vacation.  Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Our stay was nice overall.  The only things that we didn't like was the elevator was slow, the dishwasher was extremely loud, and the air conditioner in the room was cold in the bedroom and hot in the living room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us.  I apologize that the dishwasher was noisy and the air conditioning wasn't consistent in both rooms of your suite.  If you have the time, please send me an email so I may directly follow-up on this suite to ensure other guests don't have this same experience.  We encourage all of our guests to let us know if there is anything that we can improve upon while you are here so that we may have an opportunity to fix it.

Summary Heading: could you make our stay any more perfect?!?!
Summary: without a doubt this was the best hotel in the area and we are definitely coming back to stay again with family. first off at check in we felt comfortable and well taken care of. our room was BEYOND what we expected which was amazing.our concierge called us about ten minutes after we got into our room just to see how everything was and to see if we needed anything. our bed was super plush and comfy with many many extra pillows. we had extra towels without even having to request it! wifi works amazingly and it is so convenient that there is a separate seating area  from the bedroom.it made it easier to entertain friends and get ready for the day. we love that there is pots and pans, utensils,dishes and cups waiting for you in your spacious kitchenette. the full sized fridge was
Manager Response: Wow, what a great description of our suites and our property!  We are a little biased, but we agree that everything that is included in your room rate is an amazing value and makes your visit to the area whether for Disneyland or for business comfortable and convenient.  We are fortunate to have a great staff that goes out of their way to ensure everyone has a fantastic stay and we are happy that was your experience.  We are honored to get your business again on your next visit.

Summary: We had so much fun. And it is so nice to stay somewhere that no matter how little the request it was answered or taken care of quickly and always with a smile. It was not only the little things, We had forgotten to pay for the transit for to and from Disneyland and we called the Hotel. Before we knew it they had taken care of it. Like a wave a magic wand... We needed rides to two different dinners. ( there were 6 of us so a regular taxi wouldn't work) They had it all done like clock work. We had breakfast there a few mornings. Yummy waffles I must say! Beds were comfy, room was always clean. Was a pleasureful stay.  Next trip you have our business.  Thank you.
Manager Response: No, it really was our pleasure:)!  When planning a vacation, it is quite difficult to remember everything you need and plan the entire trip seamlessly; that's where we come in.  We look forward to our guest's requests as we know we play an important role in your having a fantastic getaway.  We're glad you had so much fun and can't wait to see you again.

Summary Heading: Staff that go that extra mile.
Summary: We were traveling in a group of 30 from Australia of various backgrounds and ages, youngest was 31, oldest at a guess, mid 60's.  We spent 4 nights and as happened we had 3 birthdays during our stay.  My friends was the first and I had tried to organise a cake as a surprise, well the staff in conjunction with our tour leader/organiser did a fantastic job, and it certainly was a surprise.  Maybe not so for the other two, but hey the thoughts and best wishes from the group was still there!  When ever we asked for something, no matter how small or complex, the staff went out of their way to make it happen. If there were any little concerns, the air conditioner was a little loud and very cold at one end of the hall way and the main elevator was very slow, at least the stairs were
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for your recommendation to other TripAdvisor readers!  We were happy to assist with your birthdays and I encourage any future guests to let us know if you are celebrating a special occasion while staying with us as we enjoy making your stay memorable.  As noted in other posts as well, our front elevator gets used nonstop and there can sometimes be a wait.  We appreciate your patience and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: My family of four spent 5 nights here for our Disney vacation the first week of May 2012. The staff was wonderful and the rooms were clean and spacious.  The breakfast every morning is  very convenient and it is good. The dinner reception Mon-Thurs is awesome. The food was good and always things the kids liked, and my husband enjoyed the free beer.  It is well worth the short shuttle ride back to the hotel to save the $50+ it would cost to eat in the park. We will absolutely stay here again.
Manager Response: We love the title of your review as we strive to be the perfect hotel for families on a daily basis.  You are absolutely right about the value and money that can be saved by enjoying our Suite Start Breakfast and our Welcome Home Reception; over 5 nights that really adds up!  Thank you for the review and we will see you on your next visit.

Summary: A group of four women stayed at this hotel on May 3 to 5 2012 for the dental convention.  We all enjoyed this hotel.  It was very comfortable and clean.  Very close to walk to the convention center and to Disneyland.  Hotel has a great breakfast every morning and Mon to Thurs a nice dinner with beer and wine.  What a great value.  Front desk and support staff was very friendly.  We will deffinately be staying there again next year.
Manager Response: We are delighted that everyone in your party has a great experience during your recent visit.  Thank you for noting some of the benefits of the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim including the comfort, location, and staff.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Felt like we were home again
Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights on our return trip this March.  We had previously stayed here (7 nights) in August 2011 and loved it so much we just had to return.  In fact we did not need to stay in this area for what we were doing this trip, but due to the amazing experience we had previously, we decided to stay here regardless.  We were not disappointed.  Once again it was just like a home away from home.... the staff are incredibly friendly and go out of their way to be helpful! There was a problem when we arrived in that the guest staying in our room from the night before was not willing to leave (we had the largest family suite so there was no replacement).  After about ten minutes though, they came back with a solution of giving us two smaller family rooms for the same price
Manager Response: Reviews from returning guests are so very important to us and we are honored that you chose to go out of your way to stay with us again.  We apologize for the issue with your suite not being available, but thank you for letting us find a resolution that suited you even better than your original reservation.  We hope to see you again very soon!

Summary: We stayed for 7 nights on our Disneyland vacation.  Without exception, everyone I met on the staff was friendly and helpful.  The breakfast and dinners were a pleasant surprise.  The location is great, with a 5 minute drive to the parks or Angel Stadium, and easy freeway access.  The rooms are clean and spacious, but I echo the other reviews that it could use an upgrade on the carpeting.  We stayed in a room right next to the elevator on the second floor, and I'm glad we did, even though we didn't have a view, because we never had to deal with waiting for the elevator to arrive.  Overall, I would strongly consider staying there again on my next Southern California trip.
Manager Response: We really appreciate you noting the friendliness and helpfullness of our staff.  Thank you for your feedback and we will follow-up on your comments in an effort to improve the guest experience.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Southern California.

Summary: Just returned from our trip and were extremely happy with our accommodations.  Booked three rooms -- two were adjacent to each other and the third was across the hall.  Getting three rooms in close proximity to each other is usually difficult with any hotel because of the unpredictable and transient nature of the business but they got it right.  Discovered Homewood Suites last year after reading comments on Trip Advisor and Joe Leinacker‚Äôs (General Manager) responses.  Rooms were clean and spacious.  Breakfast was very convenient and avoids having to feed hungry kids as soon as you get to the park.  Good start for the day without waiting in line.  Pool was clean and was not crowded.  Only ate at the manager‚Äôs reception the first night as the grandkids remembered ‚Äútaco night‚Äù
Manager Response: What an amazing review; thank you for taking the time to share this with the readers of TripAdvisor. Your experience is exactly what we strive for with each and every guest.  We are very fortunate to have some talented people that genuinely care about our guests working here at the Homewood Suites Anaheim Main Gate.  We hope to see you back for another visit later this year.

Summary: We just got back from 1 week stay for our family vacation to Disneyland.  Very happy with this hotel.  Stayed in a family suite with 2 queens.  Definitely enough room for our family of 6 (kids ages 3,3,9, 14).  Having the kitchenette was great for reheating food and late night snacks.  Can't say enough about how helpful it is to have a decent sized fridge.  Breakfast was very good... A great way to start the day... No stress about where to go... If anyone felt lazy (usually our 14 yo)  we could bring food up to the room for breakfast in bed.  Only made it to the dinner once.. But it was a nice simple meal that kids like ( hot dogs, salad, chips).  Bus to the park ran like clockwork, the drivers took special care in helping our little guys in and out.  Pools  were nice.. Kiddie
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with us at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim.  Your review touched on a lot of the advantages we have over other lodging options in the area.  The suites (1.5 times larger than a typical hotel room) definitely make life a little more comfortable after returning from a long day at Disneyland with the entire family.  We're happy you were able to take advantage of the meals, the shuttle, and the pool.   I am pleased to let you know that we do now have dumbbells in our 24 hour fitness center!  We had ordered a new set, however there was a manufacturer flaw and we had to wait for them to be replaced.  We're sorry you weren't able to use them on this visit, but hope we see you again very soon so that you can try them out!

Summary: Our last visit was 2 years ago.  We made the reservation again without looking at other places.  One reason being that we were able to book the stay using award points.  But we also enjoyed the hotel.  It could use some new carpet and furniture, but understand, this property is used. Much more so than another Homewood that might see more business traffic.  Some complain that the charge for parking or the shuttle to Disneyland is excessive.  I find it to be the price of doing business around a popular destination.  The taxes and fees have to be pretty hefty. It serves a good breakfast (timing is everything, the earlier the better).  Dinner was ok (the spaghetti was without seasoning).  We found a number of eating options nearby.  It has a nicely sized pool.  A kiddie pool that is
Manager Response: We genuinely appreciate you taking the time to write this review of your stay with us.  We're happy that overall you enjoyed your stay, but are also thankful that you gave us some of your thoughts on how we can improve.  We will take your recommendations and continue to work to get better.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We have stayed at this property more than once.  It is a great family hotel.  Close to Disney, shuttle bus available ($), free breakfast and dinner (Monday thru Thursday).  Would stay again, would refer family and friends.  Only downfall, the elevators are slow and during breakfast lower floor room where you could walk up would be best.
Manager Response: Reviews written by repeat guests are greatly appreciated and we thank you for your loyalty and continuing to stay with us.  We apologize for the wait time for the front elevator as it seems to stop on every floor during this busy time of year (spring break).  We highly recommend that any guests with a suite towards the back of the property utilize the back elevator.  It is rarely used and can be much quicker and more convenient.  We look forward to seeing you again on your family's next visit to Southern California.

Summary: We loved this hotel. We went to Disneyland with members of our extended family and booked five suites. We were all pleased with the rooms, as well as the breakfast each morning.   Only downside was the $12/day for parking and the charge for the shuttle.   We are planning on staying here for our yearly Disneyland trip!
Manager Response: We are really excited that you and the entire extended family enjoyed the stay and we can't wait to see you again next year!  Send us a message before you arrive and we'll do something extra special for everyone.

Summary: Probably not one of the best Homewood Suites, only reason I have given this a 4 star and not a 3 star is because of the friendliness of the staff. The premises requires some renovation as it looks very used and tired. The additional fee of $12 per night for parking is just a money making mechanism for the orgainisation  and would be better placed at a smaller rate. Similalry the shuttle buss to Disney should be complimentary or at the very minimum half the price.  It was not particularly clean and the lifts (elevators) were terrible, leaving queues and long waits.  Occupants of the 7th floor are further burdened with the use of only one lift as the other (at the end of the corridor/hall) does not go to the top level. It is however very well placed for Disney enthusiasts and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your thoughts on Tripadvisor.  We greatly value the feedback from our guests and will take your comments and suggestions as we continue to try to improve the experience for all of our guests.  Thank you for the kind notation regarding our staff.  We are very fortunate to have many great individuals working here as a team and we hope that we see you again on your next visit to Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Excellent location, value, and size for a family!
Summary: I LOVE this hotel and will definitely be back!  Took my twins there for their 7th birthday and was incredibly impressed by the location, complimentary breakfast and dinners, pool, and room size.  We did 3 days at Disney and it was great to return for a dinner break (and complimentary wine too), then head back to the parks. The room was decorated tastefully with modern furniture and had a full kitchen as well. Easy shuttle access to Disneyland. Everything about this hotel was awesome and we will be returning for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for this referral!  We feel that the Homewood Suites Anaheim is a great place to come back and relax after a full day at Disneyland and we're delighted that you agree.  We hope to see you again very soon!!!

Summary: We just got home from our 2nd stay at the Homewood...we enjoyed it just as much as the last time...we did miss the fresh baked cookies they set out the last time, but we enjoyed the lemon water they put out daily...awesome customer service...the managers are very nice and go above and beyond for you....the breakfast was good...and the dinner they provide Monday thru Thursday evening is a nice extra...I am going to miss their beds...with all the pillows...we will be visiting again soon and for sure staying here again!!!
Manager Response: We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website!  The comments regarding the great customer service is very kind and we're thankful you had a great stay.....again!  And you're right; the beds are perfect for relaxing after an exhausting day.  We will look for you on your next trip to Anaheim.  Thanks again.

Summary: My family of 6 (13,10,5 and 2) stayed at the Homewood Suites the 3rd week of Feb. for 5 nights while visiting Disneyland. The rooms were clean and just big enough to accomodated teens and toddlers. Breakfast in the morning and a light meal in the evening was perfect to keep us going throughout the day (the wine and beer was a real treat after a long day with 4 at Disney!) The hotel staff was very pleasant and the manager was in the dining area most mornings making sure things ran smoothly. The pool and hot tub were well kept. The front elevator did run slow but we were aware of that prior to our stay and just took the stairs or back elevator. There were a bunch of band students staying and we were worried we would hear them all night but the rooms were very quiet. I only have
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to write this wonderful review.  We couldn't be happier that you and your family of 6 had such a good stay.  Isn't it great to have the suite (50% larger than a normal hotel room) as opposed to being cramped in a small hotel room with just a couple of beds?  We know the elevator can be a bit of a wait especially during high usage times (during breakfast), but thank you for your patience.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to Southern California.

Summary Heading: Didn't get what we paid for after all
Summary: Was really excited about staying here because of the good reviews, booked on hotel website for a 5 night stay, family Disney vacation. Got put in room by elevator and heard it all night. A/C felt like it was blowing warm air and couldn't get thermostat to adjust. Asked front desk to fix A/C or move rooms, they were nice but stated the we're booked full and would send someone to fix it. Day 2 A/C still not working, asked front desk to fix or move, they sent maintenance and he replaced unit. This was done quickly but a little inconvenient because we were in room, kids and baby crawling around, trying to shower because we were all tired from Disney. Cold air blew out of vent for a couple of hours then couldn't get A/C to work again. Day 3 checked out early and moved to another
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to share your experience.  As I read your review to my staff this morning, we were all surprised and disappointed that we let the issue with your air conditioning unit get to the point that you felt that your best option was to leave the hotel.  We typically hold ourselves accountable for resolving any guests issue within 15 minutes (based on the degree of difficulty) and I will personally follow-up with each staff member involved to determine how we allowed this to happen.  If possible, please contact me so that I can discuss this with you in more detail and offer an apology.  My email is: joe.leinacker@hilton.com.

Summary: My wife and I stay for five days.  This hotel was great!  Free dinner and drinks monday through Thursday (helps offset some of the Disney costs)  Free breakfast everyday.  The pool are was well maintained and secure.  The rooms are big, clean and comfortable.  The location is a few minutes from Disney and about 20 minutes from John Wayne airport.  It's only about 45 minutes to LA or Hollywood.  The staff was very helpful.  I would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!  We're happy that you and you're wife had such a good time while you were a guest here at the Homewood Suites Anaheim Main Gate.  We hope to see you back very soon.

Summary Heading: Great Service, Great Location, Great Stay!
Summary: I finished a trip to Palm Springs this Christmas by laying over one night in Anaheim. It was closer to the airport for returning the rental car. I have stayed in Homewood Suites before and have only been disappointed once. This was a very pleasant experience. The place was very busy, but the staff were amazingly helpful and polite. they got me into my room as soon as was humanly possible and I enjoyed all of the other amenities. I was surprised to find that they charge for parking, but then in Anaheim, I guess that is to be expected. The shuttle to and from Disneyland saved me the hassle of the parking lot....remember that you can no longer park anywhere near the park, you have to park in satellite lots and take a shuttle.  I will definitely stay here again when it is less busy,
Manager Response: We really appreciate you taking time to share your recent experience at our hotel.  Homewood Suites is a fantastic brand and we're glad that you agree.  When you factor in all of the great amenities this brand offers on a complimentary basis including the Suite Start Breakfast, The Manager's Welcome Home Reception, and the complimentary Wireless Internet, we truly are the best value in the Anaheim/Orange County area.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to Palm Springs.

Summary: I stayed here while running the Tinkerbell Half-Marathon.   The staff was friendly and went out of their way to help in every way possible.   When I arrived back from the race shortly after check out time, I was told that I could go up to the room, ice my legs, and check out when I was done and packed.  It made a world of difference.  The rooms were quiet and spotless.  The breakfast far exceeded by expectations.  The location worked well, just a little over a mile from Disney with a shuttle running often, several restaurants in the immediate area, and a Target just across the street.
Manager Response: First of all, congratulations on running the Tinkerbell Half Marathon!!!  Some of the staff at the hotel regularly run half marathons and we know the time and effort it takes to train in preparation for the race.  We're pleased you enjoyed your stay and always happy to help our guests relax even if that includes icing down your legs!  We hope to see you for next year's Tinkerbell Half Marathon again.

Summary Heading: Great Service! Where have you been all these years?
Summary: Recently stayed for a few nights to celebrate my daughter's birthday at Disneyland. We arrived very late the first night, we called on our way in and was impressed to see the crib in our room ready to setup! Did not expect to see that actually happen. Breakfast is par, good but not bad at all for being complimentary. I was shocked to see the complimentary dinner provided Monday through Thursday, we had no complaints here and it definitely saves some money. We had some TV and Bathroom light issues, nothing serious, but mentioned this one day on our way out the park for the day. TV was fixed but nothing in regards to the bathroom light, not a big deal, however I mentioned this as we checked out and without hesitation our parking was reimbursed....... Great service is easy to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review.  We agree with you that it easy to deliver great service, but that starts with having great associates working at the hotel.  We are very fortunate to have such a caring staff who's main goal is to ensure each guest has an experience similar to yours.  I'm sorry we weren't able to match the rate you had when you extended an additional night.  We have many conventions in Anaheim this time of year that sell-out the entire area which would cause us to restrict our online rates.  We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We stayed at the Homewood Suites while in Anaheim for business. We had stayed at a few of the larger hotels in the past but we had several positive experiences with Homewood Suites in other cities so we decided to give this one a chance. The location of the hotel is wonderful! Many of our associates stayed in hotels closer to the convention center but it was nice to be a little farther away near less crowded restaurants and across the street from Target. There was a free shuttle that took us to and from the convention center and could also take us to Disney. There is free breakfast every morning and free dinner Monday-Thursday. The food was pretty good! They always had free coffee and water in the lobby which had a fireplace in the middle. The hotel was VERY clean and quiet.
Manager Response: While we get a majority of reviews on this site relating to visits to Disneyland, we strive to also be an ideal location for our guests that are in the area for business.  You made some very good points about the convenience and value in staying at the Homewood Suites and we thank you for posting this review.  We hope to see you next year for the same convention.....or even sooner if you find yourself in the Orange County/Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Great for Family of 5 Visiting Disneyland
Summary: Our family of five (3 teen daughters) stayed at the Homewood Suites Anaheim MGA just before Christmas using HHonors points.  This hotel was very nice and a good choice for staying near Disneyland with the family.  The staff were very friendly and courteous.  Our room and the hotel generally were clean and well maintained.  Minor issues with the room (slow bathtub drain, etc) were dealt with promptly.  The room was comfortable--a typical Homewood Suites room.  We did not use the hotel's Disneyland shuttle but drove each day and parked in the Toy Story lots just up Harbor Blvd--this worked well for us.  Breakfast was the one disappointment--somewhat below average for HS.  The staff did a good job of keeping the breakfast stocked and the area clean, and there was adequate seating,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review.  It's always nice to have a little extra room to unwind after a long day at Disneyland and we're glad that you and your family had the same experience.  We are always looking to improve our breakfast and we will take your suggestions to help us get better.  We are grateful that you indicated you will return again in the future hope you have an even better experience next time.

Summary: We stayed here in Anaheim for our honeymoon. If you knew my husband and my self you would know our vacations are always less than stellar. Little did we know that the NAMM con. was the same week we would be in Anaheim. When we arrived to the Homewoods we were tired from an 8 hour air flight, drama with our lay overs, and issues with the dollar car rental in lax and many other issues that plagued us on our way to the hotel. Luis was the manager on staff working that night and he checked us in and even listened to me complain about the day. He was so nice and sweet and they even sent us a card with a bottle of wine and candies because it was our honeymoon. The staff has been A+ the whole time we have been here very help and friendly. The other wonderful feature is starbucks is
Manager Response: We were honored that you chose to stay with us for your honeymoon and delighted that we could play a small role in such a special occasion.  Thank you for the comments regarding Luis as he goes to great lengths to ensure each of our guests has a great stay.  We love that comment about not wanting to leave......we didn't think you should leave either!  We wish nothing but the best for you and your husband and hope that you come back to see us for an anniversary. Congratulations!

Summary: I really liked this hotel. I was skepticle because of the pictures of teh wonderful gold colored blankets, but it was not bad! The only thing that would have been nice if there was a table and chairs. Small children cant really eat off thier laps, so that proved a challange at times. The kitchen was perfect and couldnt ask for much more. Breakfast was good the usual scrabmled eggs, sausage or bacon, waffles, toast, yogurt, oatmeal... It woudl be hard for someone not to find something they liked! They have fresh coffee in the lobby and it didnt matter what time of day you were always greeted with a smile. ART is route number 1 which is awesome because it is closed to the gate. When you legs are dead at the end of the night it is a pleasure to drag yourself to this stop and not
Manager Response: Thank you so much for writing such a nice review of the hotel.  I hope that on your next visit you are able to take advantage of the Welcome Home Manager's Evening reception that includes a complimentary light meal as well as complimentary beer, soda, and wine.  Please come back and see us again very soon.

Summary: I am a fan of the Homewood suites because of the mini suite and full kitchen They have great customer service and have everything  Pool Jacuzzi gym and a substantial hot breakfast The beds are great and it works for a short stay for our volleyball tournament Restaurants in walking distance   I wish they had free parking. The only draw back
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your recent visit to Southern California.  We are thrilled that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel and look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area.

Summary: It's hard to find hotels that have rooms to accomodate families of 5+ without craming everyone into one room for a huge price.  We always look for suites with one or two bedrooms because of of boys and handicap daughter.  We arrived one hour early on Wed and they checked us in and upgraded us to a two bedroom suite.  Very spacious on second floor next to conference room so it was quiet.  Beds, and baths were great. The elevator is slow (only was used to take luggage up and down), used stairs other times. The boys used the pool and had a great time.  It was taco bar night with free food and drinks - very convenient when tired and not wanting to drag whole family out to look for food.  The next morning they had breakfast (satisfactory), again nice.  Checkout was easy and the
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review.  Although we are a little biased, we feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Homewood Suites by Hilton.  Whether traveling with a family of 5 or even more, the additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day at Disneyland.  We hope to see you as a guest again very soon.

Summary Heading: A nice place for the price.
Summary: We went there during Christmas. It is a really nice, well run place and the staff is extremely accommodating. The main bedroom are nice and the kitchen has a counter top, stove, microwave, and fridge as well as few cupboards.  Some things were less than perfect. The pullout bed has a poor mattress and would be a poor place for an adult to sleep. We put extra blankets on it and it was fine for our kids.  The elevator is really slow. If you go there only take a room on the first three floors. We used the stairs the entire time.  The free meals are not awesome but they are a nice feature for the price. They had nice eggs and sausages every morning and fruit juice and milk, toast, etc. The waffles will take a long time if it is busy. Some people   The pool area is nice and gets a
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay.  Thank you for noting some of the amenities in the suites that separate us from the rest of the hotels in the area. We are sorry that the mattress on the pull-out was not as comfortable as it could have been.  We do replace the mattresses if we find them in poor condition as these are often used by the large families that stay with us.   We are always looking to improve our complimentary breakfast and your suggestions are also appreciated.  We expect to add 2 more waffle irons in the next month as they are quite popular and the wait during busy periods the wait can be long. We hope to see you again on your next visit to Disneyland.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Hotel was great! Shuttle, not so much.
Summary: The hotel was a great deal. We enjoyed our stay and breakfast was great. Our suite was clean, beds were comfortable, and the kitchen is well stocked. The front desk staff were extremely helpful and the place was clean. The elevator is slow.   Minus 1 star because our experience with the Disneyland shuttle was extremely unpleasant. This hotel shares its service with the nearby Sheraton hotel. The shuttles are small when compared to the demand, and the needs of families with small kids (strollers). The shuttles are always overly crowded and unsafe for children. Once during our visit, the shuttle did not pick up in Disneyland as scheduled. We waited over 30 minutes for the next pick-up but by then, other families arrived. When the shuttle finally came, chaos happened, people
Manager Response: We appreciate that you not only took the time to post this review, but also enjoyed the hotel.  We sincerely apologize for the shuttle service that you and our other guests received for multiple days during the end of December.  We typically have our own shuttle during high demand periods such as this, however the company that operates our shuttle had a bus go out of service and it took 3 days before they could purchase another vehicle.  Over those 3 days, we had no other option but to share a shuttle with another hotel. I assure you that this is not the typical experience and hope that you will contact me at your convenience so that I can apologize again and discuss this further.  Feel free to contact me at either (714)620-2153 or via email at: joe.leinacker@hilton.com.

Summary Heading: Comfortable Exactly what I expected Stay
Summary: We stayed for 8 days and 7 nights in the roomy two queen 1 bdrm suite w/kitchenette and a sofa sleeper. We stayed in other kitcnettes that didn't seem as big as this one. Overall we were very comfortable and relaxed and did not encounter any major issues. We actually had to leave early a night and the friendly hotel manager refunded us without any hesitation. We enjoyed breakfast every morning which consisted of mainly scrambled eggs sometimes bacon or sausage was served with either hashbrown patties or home style potatoes. Make sure to get there early because it ends at 9am. So there really is no sleeping in if you want to take advantage. We saw a few guests with trays to carry breakfast back to their rooms. We dedided to do the same our last few days there. Our kids liked
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this kind review.
