We get many guests that stay with us for an extended period of time as this is a great place to stay and explore all of Southern California.  We apologize that you experienced an issue with your television, but we're glad that our maintenance staff quickly and efficiently corrected the problem.  We can't wait to see you again on your future trips to Disneyland!

Summary: We recently stayed here for 4 nights with 2 adults and 4 children. The rooms are spacious and clean. The kitchenette and full size refrigerator were a welcome addition. Our room was right next to the rear elevator but noise was not an issue. It just gave us easy access to our room. The breakfast and the managers evening reception weren't anything spectacular, but it certainly was sufficient if you did not want to eat out. Free Wifi in rooms. The only thing we missed was no in room safe, but there were safety deposit boxes at the front desk.  The hotel has its own shuttle that it shares with the hotel next door, so even though it is not in walking distance to Disneyland, it is convenient to get there. The shuttle runs 45mins prior to the earliest opening of Disney ie it starts
Manager Response: We're thrilled that you enjoyed your stay here at the Homewood Suites Anaheim.  Thank you for pointing out how great the Garden Grove area is with many restaurants and shopping within walking distance.  We hope to see you on your next visit to the area.

Summary: We recently stayed at the Homewood Suites near Disneyland at Thanksgiving.  It was exactly what I expected from this Hilton brand.  We had good service, the rooms were spacious and clean and we had a good, hot breakfast in the morning.  There is nothing fancy at this hotel, but it is just right for our family - two rooms with a kitchenette, full size refrigerator, two televisions and a decent sized bathroom.  The hotel was quiet.  The one negative is that it is a walk to Disneyland.  There is a shuttle at $4/person.  So with four of us, it was actually cheaper to park at Disneyland for the day.  There are also plenty of restaurants around the hotel if you want to eat out.  All in all, we had a pleasant stay and a good night's sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review.  We're glad you and your family had a good stay over the busy Thanksgiving holiday.  We hope to see you again next year!

Summary: Free beer and wine and dinner mon thru thrus! Love it! Clean and a nice hotel
Manager Response: We're glad you love it!!!  Come back soon!

Summary: The rooms are comfortable, the staff is kind and gracious, the property is close enough to Disneyland with convenient shuttle service, and we'd stay here again. Free morning breakfast and evening dinner are a nice touch.
Manager Response: We're happy you had a good stay and enjoyed the hotel.  That is an excellent tip about using the back elevator.....it is a fast and convenient way to get around the hotel and rarely gets used.

Summary: This is our first time staying at this location but have stayed at others.  The staff here is amazing, all very friendly and helpful.  Rooms are clean, housekeeping great.  Breakfast is more than your typical continental breakfast which is great.  Evening Reception meal is simple, but it wonderful to come home from a day at disney and not have to take tired kids out or cook something!  Gym was perfect for me, I needed a treadmill and some weights.  Kiddie pool was very cold, kiddies couldn't use.  We only have a couple of minor complaints about the hotel and that is the duvet covers are very noisy, they sound like slippery sleeping bags and the elevator is slow, but not huge issues at all.  We will be staying here again next year!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review.  I absolutely agree with you; we do have a great staff and we are fortunate to have each and every one of them.  We are looking forward to seeing you again next year!

Summary: We stayed here for the third time last month.  I cashed in some of my Hilton Honors points for a room.  The desk staff knew us when we came in the door!  That is awesome.  Our room was ready and on the second floor.  We prefer higher floors but for one night it was ok. I have the highest regards for this hotel.  Love it, love it.  Will stay here again.  The only problem I have ever had was this time.  A couple days after leaving, I realized I forgot my husbands WDW jacket in the closet.  It was very expensive and his good jacket against rain and cold.  I called the hotel and they checked the room and there was nothing there and they also checked the lost and found and failed to find the jacket.  I am really disappointed.  If I had the room after someone and found the jacket I
Manager Response: We are glad you had such a good stay but sorry to hear about the loss of your husband's jacket.  I personally spoke with the room attendant that cleaned your suite as well as the housekeeping supervisor that inspected the suite and neither saw the jacket.  Most of our staff has been here for many years and we have a very high success rate of finding items that are left behind by our guests.  If I can be of any assistance at all, please contact me at: joe.leinacker@hilton.com. We hope to see you back again on your next visit to the Anaheim/Orange County area.

Summary: This is the second time we've stayed here.  The staff is THE BEST hands down!  I have never run into more helpful people anywhere.  The rooms are great, beds are super comfy, and they have bedding for the pull out bed already in the room ready for use.  I didn't use the kitchen this time (really who wants to cook on vacation) but I did a little last time and everything was in perfect working order.  The leave you to want for nothing, dish soap, sponge, everything you have at home is in the kitchen. Yep, even a dishwasher!  This trip our TV wasn't working really well and they literally had a new one in our room in less than 10 minutes!  Towels were delivered within minutes when needed.  The one thing that was a bit of a let down this time vs last was the dinners and breakfasts.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing this amazing review of your stay at the Homewood Suites Anaheim.  We truly feel that we have a special group of associates that work here and we are thrilled that you feel the same.  We appreciate your feedback on some areas where we can improve as we attempt to make the experience better each visit.  We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Great place for a large family!
Summary: I have to say that this may be one of the best hotels that we have stayed at. The room was very large, very clean and the staff was very helpful. The breakfast and dinner service was very good and there was always plenty of food available. The lines for the waffles were always too long for me the wait as there are six of us. Maybe some more waffle makers are needed.  Housekeeping was great but there were never enough towels for our family. There were six registered in our party and I had to go to the front desk for more towels and washrags three times.  We tried the pool one day but it was insanely cold! I'm sure that it was not even 70 degrees and the kiddie pool was even colder.  On our second day, out older twins celebrated their 6th birthday and the hotel staff was nice
Manager Response: We very much appreciate that you took the time to write this review.  Thank you for pointing out how perfect the Homewood Suites is for large families. We are looking to add a few more waffle makers to make the wait a little shorter as everyone loves a freshly made waffle for breakfast.   We did have the pool heater go out and it took a few days before the new one could be delivered and installed.  We hope that this didn't have too much of a negative impact on your stay.  Rest assured that the pool is a warm 82 degrees now and waiting for your next trip.   If there is anything that I can do to assist with your next visit, please contact me at: joe.leinacker@hilton.com.

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay for Disneyland
Summary: My family of four really enjoyed our stay here.  It was clean, spacious and very comfortable.  Getting to and from Disneyland was very easy.  We used the city owned shuttle which picked us up just next door.  The staff was EXTREMELY nice and accommodating.  Great place!
Manager Response: Thank you for the very nice review.  Clean, spacious, and very comfortable are 3 great ways to describe the Homewood Suites.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: I stayed here for a wedding on the water in nearby Costa Mesa and my my my what a great choice. This hotel has by far the most personable,friendly,and incredible staff. Each and every person they interacted with seemed important,and customer service in the hotel industry seems to be lacking in many other hotels. This is not a "bargain" hotel by any means however the money you save cooking up some food for the family, or going to a local dennys or IHOP completely makes up for the extra 30 or so. The beds,linens,towels,kitchen equipment and toiletries are top notch.  The carpet and the surfacing in the tub have seen better days however the full service kitchenette and ample closet,lighting surely make up for it. Wifi is great here to.     Whether you are here for leisure or
Manager Response: We love the title of your review!!!!  Thank you for taking the time to write this account of your stay.  We believe that we have a great staff and a great product and are thrilled that you experienced both. We are also pleased to announce that we are renovating the fitness center in December and will have a new room and new equipment as we enter 2012!  We hope to have you come back and let us know what you think.

Summary: OMG, this place was awesome!  The staff was super friendly and helpful no matter what time of day.  The hotel offers an evening buffet meal between 5-7 PM that includes beer and wine.  It also offers a breakfast buffet with eggs, meat, oatmeal, waffles, cold cereal, juice, tea, coffee, milk, bagels, pastry, etc. These meals are included in the room fee.  The rooms are all suites--very large and well-appointed.  The bedding is out-of-this-world comfortable!  There is a bus that picks up at the hotel and delivers directly  to the Disney parks for $4 round-trip per person.  This was very convenient and saved us the $15 parking fee at Disney. The only downsides to the hotel are the $12 daily parking fee (which I can overlook since the meals more than make up for that) and the fact
Manager Response: We agree that this place is awesome!!!  Thank you for the fantastic review and for noting the value in staying at the Homewood Suites Anaheim.  Please come back and stay with us again very soon.

Summary: We stayed in this hotel for 13 nights while we did some sightseeing throughout California. This was the perfect hotel for us the pool was great never too crowded.Hotel was very clean and staff was extremely friendly and helpful. Free breakfast and dinners were great especially with 3 kids(we saved a lot of money on food). I would stay again if we return to California it was our home away from home!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review.  It means a great deal to us that you had such a great stay over 13 days.  The Homewood Suites Anaheim is a great place to set up camp and explore all of Southern California including Los Angeles and San Diego.  Come back and see us very soon!

Summary: We recently stayed for 4 nights. Very friendly staff. Thanks to Jasmine and the rest of the staff for my daughter's birthday bag. What a great surprise! The breakfast and dinners were real good and very convenient. On the 2nd night we had a leaky toliet and called the front desk, we had a maintenance man sent within 1hr. Loved the door to door shuttle service! Many restaurants are across the parking lot. No need to drive. Target is across the street and Starbucks is in the hotel next door. Very nice location. The only complaint is, not very many channels to choose from on tv and no option to buy a movie. Overall great experience for my whole family.
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you and your family had such a wonderful stay with us.  Thank you for specifically mentioning Jasmine and her efforts to help your daughter celebrate her birthday.  For our future guests, we are always happy to assist in celebrating any special occasion so please let us know if we can help!  Thank you for posting this review; we hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Great staff who really go out of their way!
Summary: We recently stayed here for a week and during that time it was our anniversary and our daughters birthday. Sara and Fabiana had a bottle of wine and some chocolate and other fun things from their little store delivered up to our room because we had mentioned it was our anniversary, they did the same on our daughters b-day, minus the wine of course...
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and noting the efforts of Sarah and Fabiana.  They are both great people and we are lucky to have them as associates of the Homewood Suites Anaheim Main Gate.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: I'm not sure how this hotel ever gets 5 circles.  It is a good value but, at the end of the day, this is a very average hotel blessed with good proximity to Disneyland.  It is probably an above-average value if you play your cards right.  If you can get the deal reportedly available at Costco (free shuttle and parking) then this becomes a great deal.  Otherwise, when we were there Homewood was about the same price as Embassy Suites - making Embassy a much better value if you don't need the full kitchen(parking is nominally more expensive at Embassy, however).     Homewood is just like a Hampton Inn only in suite format.  In other words it is all about a comfortable place, with nice people working there without any frills.  Homewood adds weeknight (Mon-Thurs) dinner to the usual
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us from the viewpoint of a business traveler.  We expect to deliver a great experience for all of our guests and will take your suggestions and try to improve on this for our corporate travelers.  We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to this part of the world.  If there is anything we can do to assist you in the future, please email me at joe.leinacker@hilton.com.

Summary Heading: A good choice for families visiting Disneyland
Summary: Pros: 10 minute shuttle bus ride from Disneyland, excellent large pool with barbecue area by the pool, helpful and friendly staff, grocery buying service to stock your fridge for you, quiet and comfortable rooms. Cons: the free breakfast and four times per week free dinners, while appreciated, were so-so in quality.  If one thing could be done to improve this place I would work on the quality of the food. We stayed here with our 5 school aged kids for 5 nights to visit Disneyland. I appreciated the regularly scheduled shuttle which ran every 1/2 hour. There is a nearby Target store 5 minutes walk from the hotel where we stocked up on groceries and other things. We faxed the hotel a grocery list ahead of time so when we arrived late at night our fridge was already stocked. The
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and your referral to other families visiting Disneyland.  We believe we are ideal choice for anyone visiting Disneyland and are happy that you agree.  We will review our complimentary meals and continue to improve the experience for all of our guests.  We hope to see you and your family again very soon.

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay for my Disney Vacation
Summary: We were at this hotel for 5 nights in a 1 bedroom suite. I just loved the hotel. My 2.5 yr old kid enjoyed the stay as well. The rooms were very clean and although the bed was a bit too soft, we slept comfortably. House keeping was perfect. They would come and change the bed sheets every day and even wash every utensil we would accidentally leave on the table. I gave them 5 stars for cleanliness, service and ambience.  The hotel staff was very very friendly.  I have only two complaints - 1. The complimentary breakfast and welcome dinner was very light and can be improved (Am I asking too much???) 2. Please remove the parking charge of 12 dollars a day. Thats too much. I was suprised to get a good deal but the 12 dollars spoiled it a bit.  Still 5 stars Homewood. I will
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing your experience on your recent stay.  Our staff goes out of their way on a daily basis to make this a special vacation for all of our guests and we're thrilled that you and your family had such a wonderful stay.  We appreciate your feedback regarding the breakfast and parking and we will continue to work to make future stays just as wonderful.

Summary Heading: Average compared to Other Homewood Suites
Summary: The Good:  Nice Location Easy to Catch Shuttle all day to Disneyland or California Adventure Park Free Breakfast Staff is Very Friendly  The Bad:  Air Unit in Room is load and Rattles, Hard to Sleep Pillows are Small Toilet and Showers need an Upgrade, not as nice as other parts of the room Selection of Food is Average for Breakfast and Dinner Wireless Internet did not work very well, sometimes not at all
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your experience on TripAdvisor.  We welcome your feedback as we are constantly focused on improving the experience for all of our guests.  The air conditioning units should not make more noise than your units at your own home, so if you are a guest with us and have this experience, please let us know immediately so that we may resolve the issue.    We were not aware of any outages in our internet, but I will test the system and follow-up with our provider.  We hope that we can have you as a guest on your next visit to the Anaheim/Orange County area so that we may improve on your first impression of our property.  Thank you very much for the positive words regarding our location, Disneyland shuttle, complimentary breakfast, and staff.

Summary: Bottomline the hotel is nasty!!!! The towels and sheets are dingy and extremely worn, not worthy to use for washing a car. The first room I stayed in smelled musty. I asked the person at the front desk to ensure the room was thoroughly clean upon my return. She offered to move my items to a new room. I thanked her for the offer and agreed to have my items moved while I was out. When I returned, I was directed to my new (second) room. During my stay in the second room, I removed the bed comforter. When I removed the comforter it revealed holes in the sheets and severe large black DIRT stains in the sheets. I can understand if housecleaning did not see the small holes in the sheets; however, no one could overlook the large dirt stains. Which means, the person that put the sheets
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your experience.   I sincerely apologize for the cleanliness issue that you encountered.  As you can tell from the many other reviews on this website, this is a very rare occurence and you can rest assured that I will follow-up to prevent this from happening again.   We would welcome the opportunity to make this up to you.  If possible, please contact me on my direct line 714-620-2153 or via email at: joe.leinacker@hilton.com.

Summary: Myself and 2 kids (11 and 13) stayed here August 17-22.  Front desk staff was very helpful and pleasant to deal with.  Answered all my questions and called town car twice.  Rooms were spacious - perfect space for the 3 of us.  Kitchen was clean and utensils, glasses, plates supplied.  Dishwasher was noisy!  Fridge handy to store leftovers from meals out.  Nice desk/table for eating or computer use.  Free WiFi! Fold out bed in living room was handy and comfortable (according to kids).  TV in living room was flat screen and big.  Bedroom had 2 large closets and flat screen tv sat on big dresser.  Plenty of room for all our clothes.  2 queens were very comfortable with tons of pillows.  Bathroom was clean.  The dinners were good - basic fare but filled the gap. Always fresh salads
Manager Response: Thank you for fantastic review!  We're thrilled that you and your family had such a great time on your vacation with us.  Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland.  We hope that you and your family return soon.

Summary: We stayed here for four nights recently for the purpose of going to Disneyland. We booked our trip through Costco.com (highly recommended). Since we booked with Costco.com, we got free daily parking (saved us $12 a day), got free shuttle passes (saved us more $$$) with this hotel.  Positives: 1. Excellent, excellent, excellent customer service. This is pretty consistent with the Hilton brand. 2. Rooms are suites with kitchen and very spacious. 3. Rooms were clean. 4. Strangely but very quiet. No foot steps heard above at all! Did not even notice any noise from our neighbors. Only heard fire works at 9:30 from Disneyland and that is it.  5. Free breakfast. 6. Free dinner and beverages (Monday through Thursday) from 5-7. 7. Nice pool  Areas to Improve: 1. The furniture needs some
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing both the positives and areas to improve from your recent stay with us.  We were happy to hear that you were pleased with the staff, the cleanliness of the suites, the quietness of the suites, as well as the complimentary meals.  We are currently re-staining the dark wood furniture in the suites as it does get nicked during normal guest use.  I have forwarded your review to our provider of our Disneyland shuttle as we expect the same high level of guest service given at the hotel to also be given on the shuttle.  We hope to see you again very soon and expect your experience will be even better than this stay.

Summary: I like that the hotel provides a buffet breakfast with a good spread of food, and a supper. Although we did not take the supper on any of the nights we were there.  The rooms are not large, but comfortable. The service is excellent.  The front desk staff are very patient and helpful.  There is free wifi in the rooms, plus a business centre on the ground floor which we used to print out our tickets and boarding passes.  There is also a shuttle to Disneyland that runs every half hour. I would definitely stay here again if I was going to Anaheim again.
Manager Response: We love the title of your review!  No other hotel in the Disneyland area has as many conveniences to offer to ensure your vacation is comfortable and memorable.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: This is the second time we have stayed at this hotel.  ALL the staff are great, from the always cheerful front desk attendants to the friendly housekeeping crew.  As many people have said in their reviews, the breakfast and suppers are a bonus when travelling with a family (and the beer and wine are a double bonus).  The shuttle service directly to and from Disneyland was a great addition from when we stayed 4 years ago.  The Target store right across the street is very handy.  Hats off to Joe and his AWESOME staff, we will continue to recommend The Homewood to all of our friends that are headed to the Disneyland area.
Manager Response: Thank you very kindly for the words about our staff.  We are fortunate to have such a great group of people that work here and work hard a daily basis to help all of our guests have a wonderful stay.  We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: This is the 2nd time my family and I have stayed at this property and there's a reason that we came back.  The service is good the hotel is clean and the staff are friendly and helpful.  The breakfast and managers reception are wonderful even with a large crowd.  There are several restaurants and Downtown Disney within walking distance.  Huntington beach is about a 15-20 minute drive.  If I could change anything about the property I wish they had more than a couple of 2 bedroom suites.  There are only 2 elevators and they are slow, so be prepared to take the stairs - that's not a bad thing since it's only a 5 story building anyway.  The walk to Disney isn't bad unless you are really tired from walking anyway.  The shuttle bus picks up in front of the hotel, but the price wasn't
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  We're happy that you found the service met your expectations as well as the cleanliness of the hotel.  We know that only having one elevator in the front of the hotel can cause delays during heavy usage times.  If staying closer to the back of the property, most guests find the back elevator much less used and more convenient.  We hope to see you on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: Best Hotel in the Disney Area
Summary: My family and enjoyed our first family vacation at Disneyland in March of this year.  At the suggestion of friends we stayed at the Homewood Suites, WOW....it was the best hotel we've ever stayed in.  Mr Joe Leinacher and his excellent staff were so helpful and friendly and made our stay so enjoyable.  We plan on (and actually have reservations) for March of 2012 and it can't get here soon enough.  I was so impressed to see a General Manger in the dining room cleaning tables, and if that's not enough Mr Leinacher went out of his way to speaks to all guests, greeting and just me family friendly.  Mr Leinacher is a great Host, his staff are the best, so friendly and helpful and full of suggestions to better our vacation. Homewood Suites for the value is excellent, very clean and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  The staff at the hotel does such a wonderful job and it is nice of you to recognize them for all of their hard work.  We will look forward to seeing you again this coming spring.  Please let me know if there is anything I can for you to ensure you have another fantastic stay by writing me at: joe.leinacker@hilton.com.

Summary Heading: great value and location, very pleasant stay
Summary: We stayed 3 nights (husband, son and me), we loved that all the rooms are suites,with a separate bedroom and full kitchenette. They have a shuttle that takes you directly to Disneyland, it departs every 1/2 hr to and from the hotel, it's very convenient, it costs 4 dlls per adult, kids under 3 ride free, but you can get a discount if you are using it for more than 1 day. I think we payed 9 dlls total (3 days). The rate includes breakfast, and also dinner and drinks (beer and wine) on Wednesday and Thursday, (i'm not sure about the rest of the week), so it was a great value to have those meals included! They also have free wi fi through out the property. The pool area is nice, it has a smaller pool for infants and toddlers (only 1'-0" deep)  which is fun for them and more safe.
Manager Response: We are very pleased to read your review and thank you for noting the value of choosing the Homewood Suites Anaheim Main Gate as your hotel of choice during your visit to Disneyland.  We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Staff was very friendly and helpful.  Had a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your positive review.  Please come back and see us again very soon.

Summary Heading: Convenient, clean and very helpful staff!
Summary: We stayed at this Homewood Suites near Disneyland towards the end of August 2011. We had been at the park all day and checked in rather late. The front desk was very helpful and it was a quick check-in, which I expect as a HHonors member. The room was perfect for us. My husband and I had the king sized bed in the bedroom, and our daughter had the pull out sofa in the livingroom. It had a kitchenette with a fridge, stove, coffeemaker, microwave and toaster.  Pots, pans and dishes were also provided. Not that we needed them, since we enjoyed the wonderful breakfast that was included with our stay. Something for everyone, two different kinds of scrambled eggs, sausage, yogurt, fruit, potatoes, etc.... We were all very happy!  We didn't have time to use the pool, but it looked nice.
Manager Response: There is nothing better than coming back to a clean, comfortable hotel where the staff genuinely cares about your experience after a long day at Disneyland.  We were excited to know that you found this here at the Homewood Suites.  We will continue to provide excellent service and look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Our home-away-from-home! Our favourite place we stayed by far!!
Summary: My husband & I and our 4 children, ages 7, 12, 14 and 16 yrs spent one week of our three week vacation at this wonderful place!  We were thriled with everything!  The staff were incredibly warm and friendly, right from the minute we arrived!  We had an early flight from Australia and got there well before our check in time.  We asked if we could leave our luggage there until the 4pm check in time, but they went one step further and did their best to find us a room to check in as soon as possible. They did so within a very short time and we were so grateful!  The beds were so comfortable and the rooms were lovely!  The hotel has its own shuttle bus to and from Disney that leaves every half hour which is so convenient and you can purchase tickets on it for a very small price.  We
Manager Response: What a fantastic review!!!!  Thank you for pointing out the value of the complimentary Suite Start Breakfast and complimentary Welcome Home Reception.  In times like these, saving money on meals really adds up and can make a trip to Disneyland much more affordable.   We're fortunate to have such a great staff working here on a daily basis.  Thank you for taking the time to write this review and note their efforts.  We hope to see you again at your home away from home on your next visit to Southern California.

Summary: We vacation at Disneyland about every other year and have always stayed at a different hotel.  Due to the size of our group, we stayed at Homewood Suites.  We couldn't have asked for a better place!  The staff at Homewood is ALWAYS smiling.  Every time you walk in or out the door they are welcoming you back or wishing you a wonderful day.  They seemed genuinely happy to not only be at work, but to be a part of your day.  The rooms are fabulous!  They can accomodate groups or couples.  They are equipped with everything you could need but you and food.  The breakfast was awesome with plenty of choices and great warm food.  The evening meal (a lighter one) was just as awesome as breakfast.  Those who clean the rooms had their work cut out for them as we had a room with 4 young boys
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for 12 nights as a joint vacation/business trip. The night desk manager Luis is the best. He is worth his weight in gold for this hotel. I have traveled extensively and no hotel is perfect.  There is always going to be some issues that pop up  no matter where you stay. What makes a difference is how the staff handle those issues. The staff were always pleasant and quick to resolve any problems.  While the food is not gourmet, it is adequate and breakfast offers lots of choices.   The complimentary wine and beer at dinner were a pleasant surprise. Our room was nice and clean and the kitchen was excellent for an extended stay. There are no ovens but it was nice to be able to cook a few meals on the weekends instead of having to eat out.  The barbecues were great for
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you were able to stay with us for both business and vacation.  We strive to be the best hotel in the area whether you are coming to visit Disneyland or in the area on business.   You're right, Luis does an amazing job and you didn't just catch him on a good night; he is like that every day!  I will make sure he sees your comments and we will celebrate his exceptional service.   Thank you for recommending us to your friends as well as writing this review on Tripadvisor.  We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We as a family just wanted to say, what a wonderful staff.  The food was good and helped save alot of money.  Sara at the front desk was so sweet. It was my birthday and she had a gift bag taken up to our room when we went to dinner.  All of the staff were always cheerfull.  The hotel was always clean.  Having managed in the corporate world I know how hard that can be.  I can not state how good this staff is, and do them enough justice.  We would recommend a stay here to any family going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!  We were honored that you chose to stay with us while celebrating your birthday and visiting Disneyland.  Thank you for the great comment about Sara.  She as well as the rest of the staff loves to help celebrate special occasions.  For any future guests, please let us know if there is anything special you are celebrating so that we can help make it memorable.  We hope to see you back very soon.

Summary Heading: Worst Hotel I have ever stayed in
Summary: I travel extensively for work, and this is by far my worst experience at a hotel ever!  What is the point of E-Check In when the hotel requires you to do it all over again when you arrive.  Why should you have to wair for over 1 hour to get ashtrays in a smoking room?  Why would your room not even be cleaned?  These have been my experiences with this hotel.  Oh and almost forgot, always fun to have the fire alarm go off!
Manager Response: We are truly sorry that you did not enjoy your stay with us.  As you can probably tell from the rest of the reviews, your experience was not what most of our guests experience when they stay with us.  If possible, please contact me on my direct line at 714-620-2153 or by email at joe.leinacker@hilton.com so that I may get further details and apologize.

Summary: We enjoyed staying here over memorial day weekend while visiting Disneyland.  Would definitely recommend this for families.  We were glad we took the shuttle..although we had to wait for return at end of day.
Manager Response: We're thilled that you enjoyed your Memorial Weekend at the Homewood Suites!  We hope to see back very soon.

Summary: I swear by this hotel!  My family goes every year to California and stay here.  Its a great location, easy access to Disney, In N Out Burger, Freeway, and other points of interest.  Staff is always friendly and quick with any requests.  We did have an issue checking in this last trip.  There weren't any rooms available yet and se we waited in the lobby.  We were told it would be 10 minutes..then 20 minutes later went and asked and said it would be another 5 minutes.  You know where this is going.  Once it was figured out, they said they were sorry and that the front desk clerk who had gotten off had told the new shift she had taken care of us.  Parking is easy, always spots.  They do charge parking for every car in your party.  But always extremely satisfied with this hotel.
Manager Response: It was great to see you back staying with us once again.  I sincerely apologize for the miscommunication at check-in.  We are using your experience for training our front desk agents to avoid this in the future.  We hope to see you again next year.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay while visiting Disney etc.
Summary: The front desk were very helpful and friendly and the room extremely good. What a great idea the managers reception is. Free dinner 4 nights a week, with drinks. Grab a feed and a drink and sit out by the pool, alternately sit inside in the very adequate dining area.The hotel is ideally located to Disney and the shuttle will get you to where you want to be.All in all a very pleasant and convenient hotel. Would not hesitate to stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for pointing out how nice it is to enjoy the manager's evening reception by the pool.  Our dining area can get full quickly during the summer and what better place to enjoy a light dinner and some drinks than next to a palm tree overlooking the pool?  We hope to see you again very soon!

Summary Heading: Nothing Fancy but it suited our family of 5
Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights during a short trip to Los Angeles to do some sight seeing.  We had 2 queen beds, and a fold out sofa.  The beds were older and not up to Hilton's usual standards.  The bedding was older and had been put on both beds upside down.  I am not sure why, but when we put them on the correct way, each day when we returned they were put on by housekeeping the wrong way!  The shower flooded the floor over an inch during showering, they have not yet discovered the curved shower rod I guess!  It was obvious that the flooding was a daily occurance as there was mold along the tile where the flooring met the wall paper.  There were dirty hand marks all over the room, and the doors.  I wiped them off myself.  The living room seemed smaller than most Homewood suites,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us your feedback.  We look to reviews to provide insight into our hotel and how we can improve the guest experience. I welcome any additional comments or suggestions you would like to share.  Please contact me at joe.leinacker@hilton.com.

Summary: We were here for a family vacation and stayed a couple of nights.  It was very close to Disney (could see the nightly fireworks from our room), the ballpark, and the Beach cities. The pool and hot tub were great and not to crowded.  The breakfast area was large and not to overcrowded.  The room was nice and clean.  Price was not bad for room.  Only negitive was the 12.00/day charge for parking in an unsecure lot.
Manager Response: We're glad that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the Orange County/Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel breakfast and dinner is nice
Summary: Stayed here for over a week in July.  The rooms seem a bit smaller than Hampton, but the dinner was a nice touch. We were able to save a lot of money with our family of 6. The selection for breakfast or dinner is not great, but the food was pretty good, not outback good which is right next door. The room was good and fairly well equipped, but several big burn spots in the carpet definetly took away from it. The sofa bed is not the most comfortable I have ever seen, but they seldom are. staf was very attentive and helpful. The burns in the carpet, limited breakfast selection, and the dozen or so empty bottles and cans under the sink were the only real negatives.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review.  We sincerely apologize for your experience and would welcome the opportunity to speak with you further to get more details.  If it is not too much inconvenience, please contact me either by calling my direct line @at 714-620-2153 or by emailing me at joe.leinacker@hilton.com.

Summary: Stayed here for 5 nights. Barely adequate. I just stayed previously at the Homewood Suites Carlsbad for 4 nights- it was a much more pleasant stay than at this hotel.  The complimentary breakfast is adequate.  The complimentary light dinners are ok - they are served Monday to Thursday only from 5 to 7 pm. If you plan to eat the light dinner, you must go promptly at 5 to get a table to sit at. The area fills up very quickly with other hotel guests.  During our visit the light dinners included spaghetti and meatballs one night and teriyaki chicken the next. Salad is also provided. Soda pop and juice also provided. Wine also served.  Note that the self parking fee is $12 a night. Yikes!  Issues: The showerhead was broken. Had the most terrible shower b/c there was no water pressure
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts regarding your stay at the hotel.  We expect to provide a clean and comfortable suite with everything in working order and apologize that this was not your experience. While I'm glad we quickly resolved most of your issues, it is my job to ensure that we are preventing these issues so as to not impact your stay.  I would welcome the opportunity to speak to you to personally to apologize and see what I kind do to get you to consider staying with us in the future.  If possible, please contact me on my direct line: 714-620-2153 or via email at: joe.leinacker@hilton.com.

Summary Heading: Clean, friendly, all around great hotel!
Summary: Everything was great at this hotel. Food was par but it was free. Shuttle to and from Disney was on schedule and very convenient. Front desk was very helpful and easy to work with. Most definitely would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the nice words!  We're glad you had a great time and we look forward to your next visit to the area......see you soon!!!

Summary: My partner and I stayed here joining others in my family in late May. We had a total of 3 rooms on level 2. Rooms were comfortable, well fitted and large in size.  Well equiped bathrooms and a suitable living room plus the bonus of a kitchen. We had a room overlooking the pool which was pleasant. We also had super comfy beds.  The hotel isnt within walking distance to Disney but that's not a problem as the hotel operates a shuttle bus and there is also the Anaheim transport bus. The location is fine, not great but fine. The price is reflective for this and the hotel offeres far superior accommodation for similar prices to much less impressive accommodation closer to Disney. There a few fast food outlets and restaurants around the hotel. Coco's across the road is a good option.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We're glad that you and your partner had a good time while you were staying with us.  I think you've done really well at explaining the value of staying at the Homewood Suites Anaheim Main Gate.  We hope to see you back here very soon.

Summary Heading: EXCELLENT LOCATION, EXCELLENT HOTEL, Fantastic Staff
Summary: This hotel was everything and more then we expected, never staying at these hotels before we now wish we knew the standard of them when we were making all our bookings for this holiday as we would of booked them.   From the arrival to this hotel it was just so homely and the staff couldn't be more friendly and helpful they were fantastic.   The checkin was smooth. The room we had was very comfortable and had all the home creature comforts: lounge room, kitchen, wifi, large television.    The bedroom was very spacious and the bed was so comfortable there were 2 queen beds.  The bathroom was clean and fresh and the rooms were serviced daily with replenished toiletries.    Breakfast was provided in the hotel dining room and the big surprise was a light dinner was served everynight
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit such a detailed review!  We're happy that you enjoyed every aspect of the hotel from the service, to the accomodations, to the complimentary meals.  We can't wait to have you back so that we can exceed your expectations again!

Summary Heading: we loved this hotel and we will be back
Summary: we stayed at this hotel in june for 31 days and loved every moment of it this was our second time to stay here and canot fault it what a great hotel this is the staff are very pleasant and always greet you with a smile especially luis always cheerful and happy whenever you see him will be here again in december with family thank you all for a wonderful holiday
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you stayed with us for so long and had such a good stay.  Thank you for mentioning Luis' name as he is an amazing person and we are fortunate to have him here at the hotel.  We hope to see you on your next holiday.

Summary: We traveled to ca for our first big family vacation. The hotel is conveniently located near Disney. The shuttle made or extremely convenient. It was not always on schedule but or did not affect our plans too much. Breakfast and dinner were very crowded het there early. That being said they never ran out of food. Great place to stay!!
Manager Response: We were honored that you chose to stay with us for your first family vacation!  We think you should make this an annual trip:).  We hope to see you back very soon.  Have a great summer!

Summary: Stayed here 6/6-6/10 for a graduation celebration for my daughter.  Staff knew this and had a cake and card in the room when we checked in....nice!  The staff here is very friendly, hard-working and professional.  This hotel obviously caters to families for visiting Disneyland, and they do not disappoint.  The rooms are smaller than some Homewood Suites I have stayed in, but clean and well-appointed.  We had a great time here...the breakfast is nice and the crew really works hard to keep up with the guests.  I appreciate how hard the staff works here!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and for the very nice comments about our staff.  I'm thrilled that the hard work by our housekeeping department and kitchen didn't go unnoticed.  We hope to see you back here very soon!

Summary: I apologize for writing this review so late as I thought I had already done so. We stayed in a 2 bedroom suite and it was VERY spacious compared to anyplace else that my parents, my son and myself could have stayed! We were there for 56 nights.  FIRST, let's get a few things straight! This is a great priced, family friendly hotel near Disneyland. It is going to be full of people, the breakfast crowds will be nuts and there WILL be children running around like animals.... THEIR @ DISNEYLAND for goodness' sake! They do not have a full kitchen so I think their meal services deserve much credit and no matter how chaotic things get, the staff ALWAYS has a smile on their face and a hand out willing to help anyone who needs it. There are multiple cereal choices, make your own waffles,
Manager Response: Wow!  It means so much to us that you took the time to share your experience and we can't thank you enough.  While we try to ensure that every stay is perfect, if something does go wrong we are willing to do whatever we need to so that you still have a great vacation.  We are fortunate to have such a great group of people that works here and we really do care about your trip.  We are all looking forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area.  Thanks again!

Summary: We have stayed here a total of 3 times in the past 2 years.  Everytime we are so impressed with the cleanliness of the rooms and the hotel, and the friendly staff.  I always just feel so comfortable throughout the whole hotel.  The breakfast and dinner are real money savers also.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We feel like we're the best value in the area and are glad you keep coming back.  We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Very nice rooms - large, bright and with a kitchen, though you will not need it with the excellent breakfast that they serve.  Quiet and clean.  Yes the elevators are slow, but not enough to make you too crazy.  The front staff are excellent, willing to go the extra mile.  The only problem I have is that you have to take a shuttle to the park which runs 20 after and 40 after.  The shuttle back is on the hour and the half hour, and ends one hour after the park closes.  I really hate waiting for buses and it stopped us from returning to the hotel for a quick afternoon nap.  And if the park is on reduced hours, seeing the late WOC show may mean a VERY crowded last bus home.
Manager Response: We're glad you enjoyed the hotel and thank you for the nice words about the Front Desk staff; they really are a special group.  We are constantly trying to improve our shuttle experience and have a dedicated shuttle for the rest of the summer.  I expect that this will improve the service and hope that you give us another opportunity on your next visit to the Anaheim/Orange County area.

Summary: We stayed at this property over the Christmas-New Years holiday, and were duly impressed.  Not only was there a full breakfast every morning, but on many of the evenings, there was dinner as well!  This is a HUGE money saver when on vacation! Our room was spacious, and the kitchen was well stocked.   We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!  We're glad that you were able to save some money by taking advantage of both the breakfasts and dinners.  We hope that you return very soon.

Summary: My family of five just completed a stay at the Homewood Suites.  I read several reviews of many of the local accomodations prior to reserving a room in the area.  We wanted to be close to Disneyland with a nice pool and free breakfast.  This hotel met all the criteria.  We were given a 6th floor room with views of the nightly fireworks.  The room was great - perfect size for the five of us.    Breakfast was great each day.  Even though busy on most mornings, there was always a place to sit.  The hotel staff kept the breakfast area spotless.  The pool was a good size for the hotel.  Always had pool towels available.  The front desk staff was the nicest I have ever met in a hotel.  They sure know how to make people feel good after a long day at the parks with a quick greeting.
Manager Response: Thank you for submitting this very well written review.  I think you've done a good job giving the TripAdvisor readers an accurate description of the hotel.  Please come back and see us again soon.

Summary Heading: Outstanding Place to stay for Family Disneyland Visit
Summary: Our family (2 adults & 3 kids aged 16, 13 & 10) spent one month in the US (we are from New Zealand) and stayed in a number of Hotels while in the US. This Hotel was THE BEST we stayed in. Great suite room and the breakfasts and light dinners were fantastic. Only about 5 minutes on the shuttle to Disneyland ($9 each for 3 days). The pool was fantastic....the weather was so hot that we came home from Disneyland around 4pm, had a swim, had the free tea and then headed back to Disneyland for another few hours. We would definitely stay at this Hotel again if in LA. It was great value too...especially when you book and pay early (around $100 a night for the 5 of us).
Manager Response: Thank you for this review.  We feel like there is no better hotel to bring your family especially for a long stay such as this one and are thrilled you had such a good time.  Our location makes us the perfect place to explore all of Southern California from San Diego, the beaches of Orange County, and the Hollywood/Los Angeles area.  We hope to see you soon.

Summary: My family stayed at Homewood Suites in Peabody Ma two years ago and loved the hotel, food, service, etc.  We expected the same at the Anaheim hotel.  The hotel room was o.k., not as large as the one we had in Peabody, even though we stayed in the extra large suite.  The greatest disappointment was the food.  Breakfast consisted of artificial eggs either in a patty, or scrambled...they were horrible.  Plastic plates and spoons, cups, etc.  The juice dispenser was broken so no juice for the kids!  Evening meals were so bad we could not eat at the hotel as planned which added additional unplanned expense to the travel budget.  One day there was something that I think was supposed to be a breaded chicken patty, string beans, garlic bread sticks and chopped lettuce for a salad.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit this review regarding your recent stay.  On behalf of the entire staff, we were disappointed to hear that you were dissatisfied with almost every aspect of the hotel.  As other reviews indicate, this is not a typical stay.  We will follow-up on your feedback and continue to work to provide an exceptional experience for all of our guests.

Summary Heading: TERRIFIC STAY WILL RETURN FOR SURE
Summary: Can not think of anything negative about the 4 night stay!! CLEAN, QUIET, friendly staff. CLOSE to great restaurants and fast food and a Target right across the street. The low level kiddie poll was a delight for 3 yr odl grandson and we did not have to worry as much as if there were only the big, deep pool. The coffee pot was always on and a STarbucks next door. The free buffets ( breakfast every day, dinner Mon-Fri) were an added plus!! Shuttle to Disney back & forth was for myself and grandson and no long wait, Others in the party were more athletically fit for the 2 mile walk. Also, was not a terribly far drive to Huntington Beach & Laguna Beach. Oroginally booked for 3 nighst but enjoyed ourselves so much stayed an extra night and hotel staff was terrific in making the
Manager Response: We really love your review and the fact that you decided to stay for an additional night!  Please bring your family back to see us very soon.

Summary Heading: Only booked here for location but LOVED IT!!!
Summary: Never stayed in a Homewood before - welcomed by Luis - what a great guy!  We were not doing Disney but needed access to the general area.  Room was a one bed suite - had everything you could need, even a dishwasher!  Huge corner couch and really comfy bed.  Pool was great and hot tub divine.     Breakfast was well stocked, we got up early (mainly due to jet lag!) and missed the rush.  Really nice breakfasts from hot foods, to waffles or cereals. Nothing over the top.  Didnt do an evening meal due to our dates, but did eat at Oggi's and really enjoyed it.  We tried to rebook later in our trip as liked it so much but was fully booked!  The only one problem was another room near ours had kids that constantly rattled their door and screamed but thats not the hotels fault! Oh and you
Manager Response: Thank you for mentioning Luis; he really is a great guy!  We're thrilled you had such a good stay and regret that we were full when you tried to make another reservation.  You should be able to find the lowest rates on our Homewood Suites website.  Come back and stay with us again very soon.

Summary Heading: Very good value on a family hotel
Summary: I would rate this Homewood 3.5 stars.  My 5-year old daughter and I stayed here with our friends - another 5-year old girl and her mom - for a Girls' Getaway to Disneyland.  We picked this hotel because (1) I had the hotel points to cover our stay, (2) it's a suites hotel and (3) it had a shuttle to Disneyland.  The rooms were clean, although a little small compared to other Homewood Suites I've stayed in.  The furniture seemed worn and the beds were a tad soft for my comfort but overall the rooms were fine.  I think the only glaring issue I had was that I expected a DVD player in the main room, but there wasn't one.  So we ended up paying for "Tangled" on demand, LOL.    Whenever possible I try to stay at a suites hotel or other lodging with some kind of kitchenette because of
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit this review to the readers of TripAdvisor.  We agree with you that we are a great value especially when you consider the complimentary meals, free Internet, as well as the extra space that comes with a suite.  We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Beyond impressed with all aspects of this hotel!
Summary: I just returned from a trip to Homewood Suites in Garden Grove with my daughter (2 years old) and life-long best friend.  I almost don't want to write such a rave review in fear the demand will go up and thus the room rates!  :)  From the moment we checked in, I was blown away by the service - not only did we get an early check in but the gal that checked us in gave my daughter a Minnie Mouse stuffed animal... it was just a special touch that really made my day (and my daughters, too!).  The room was clean and spacious... and you know that feeling when you are on vacation and you can't wait to get home to sleep in your own bed... never once did I have that feeling!  The beds were incredibly comfortable!  The daily breakfast was always hot, well stocked, and there were always new
Manager Response: What an amazing review!!!  We try to deliver this kind of experience to all of our guests and are glad you had such a great stay.  Come back very soon!!!

Summary: At a glance Homewood Suites............. 1. Comfy rooms, full kitchen, sofa and super nice beds 2. Free buffet breakfast 3. Evening meal with beer and wine from Monday to Thursday 4. Free internet but not great connection 5. Excellent location 6. Fantastic Staff 7. Laundry available - washing machines $1.25 dryers $1.00 8. No harsh chemicals used for cleaning 9. business centre with two computers available for use, printing and fax services are free.  --------------- I had booked us for a five night stay, this was the very best decision I could have made. Huge thank you to Luis and Jennifer for making us feel so welcomed, nothing was ever too much trouble for them.  Everything was easy and for us flying in from Australia it makes for an easy way to settle into life in the USA,
Manager Response: Thank you for writing such a detailed review and thank you for individually recognizing Luis and Jennifer!  I am happy to announce that we just upgraded our Internet as of June 1, 2011 and we expect this to resolve the issues that were noted on this review and others.  Please stay in touch; we hope to see you soon!

Summary: Good value, decent breakfast, friendly staff, large pool, lots of families, busy hotel, shuttle overwhelmed ($4 adult, $1 children), $12 parking, soft bed (too soft for me).
Manager Response: While it sounds like you had a pretty good stay, we strive to have every stay a great stay.  I'm sorry we didn't deliver that on this trip, but I hope to have an opportunity to achieve our goal on your next visit to the Anaheim/Orange County area.  Also, I am pleased to announce that we will have a dedicated shuttle going directly back and forth from our hotel to Disneyland with no other stops during the summer.

Summary: I stayed here while traveling for business.  It was a great place to say.  Very clean, great staff and the rooms had everything you could want.  It is a must stay an Anaheim!
Manager Response: It is great to see a review posted from one of our business travelers.  Our suites are perfect for being productive yet comfortable on the road.

Summary Heading: A hotel you will NOT be disappointed in!!!
Summary: I have stayed at this hotel for business travel since 2006 and in the last couple of years I have stayed much more frequently (minimum of every other week for the past 2 years).  I travel very frequently for business and have stayed at too many hotels to remember.   Both domestically and internationally.  One of the things that makes this hotel so different for me is the fact that the staff makes my time away from my family much more tolerable.  The staff here is truly HAPPY to work here and seeing people that have a genuine smile on their face and enjoying what they do truly makes my many nights away from my family more tolerable and bearable.  The GM Joe has the best staff at any hotel I have ever stayed at.  I am a Hilton Diamond level member and have stayed at Waldorf
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: This hotel was fabulous for our "home" away from home!
Summary: Prior to our Disneyland Spring Break trip this April we took our time considering & comparing all local hotels & reviews.  Homewood Suites stood out as the perfect place for our family's needs.  We have four young children & are selective as to which hotel would fit our criteria for best value, cleanliness & location. Quite simply, Homewood Suites cannot be beat!  The General Manager reserved a lovely ground floor room for us & welcomed us with a handwritten note & goody basket for the family.  It was a very sweet touch & we began our stay with high hopes & excitement for our vacation.  Our room & bathroom was clean & most definitely passed the "baby in the bath" test.  We had a pool view & enjoyed watching the other families having as much fun as we did throughout our stay. The
Manager Response: We're happy that you and your family had a terrific vacation!  Thank you for mentioning how clean the hotel is as you will not find a harding working group of people than those that work in our Housekeeping Department.  Let the kids know we are looking forward to seeing them again very soon!

Summary Heading: Aussies, you cant go wrong with Homewood Suites. Fantastic.
Summary: Where do I start. This was a fantastic place to stay for 4 Aussie travellers. From the free breakfast everyday and free light dinner MON-THU, it made Homewood Suites very affordable. The room we had (227) was VERY clean and spotless. Very roomy and comfortable for 2 adults and 2 children (9 & 13). The rooms are very quiet. Good restaurants near by and Target across the road. It's about 3 km from Disneyland so you might want to grab the shuttle bus that picks you up at the front door. A 3 day shuttle pass for 4 of us cost US$22 and the shuttle runs every 30 minutes to and from Disneyland. If you have a laptop you get free wifi in your room or else they have 2 PC's in the business centre for your free use. You truly cant go wrong. Thankyou Homewood Suites for a wonderful holiday.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation to all of our Aussie friends!!!  The Homewood Suites Anaheim is perfect for a long holiday as we are centrally located in Southern California which allows you to not only explore Orange County, but also Los Angeles and San Diego.

Summary Heading: Awesome hotel...will be returning without a doubt!!!
Summary: We just got back from staying at the HS...it was great!...The service was excellent...the amenities are awesome..we will be returning again this is for sure!..I will recommend this hotel to everyone I know that will be in the area visiting...I miss it already!!!..We stayed 4 nights and the only one thing that I can think of that I didn't like was the pull out sofa bed..they aren't very comfortable...but, if you were to call down and ask for more blankets, I know for sure you can make it a whole lot more comfortable...other than that...there are no complaints...the breakfast is awesome...the free coffee is sooo good!!!...and the managers reception is a nice added feature!..All the staff are soooo nice and make u feel at home, the manager is a really nice guy who isn't above
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great  Convenience for Family Visit with Small Kids
Summary: We started out on the left foot--we'd been assigned the wrong room. We had ordered the larger suite for our son, daughter-in-law and their four sons. The staff was very sorry, and moved both of  us  (we were in our room suite) the next day while we were at Disneyland. Having breakfast and dinner included is a big plus, even for us on restricted kosher diets. There were lots of breakfast products certified kosher and in the evening lots of fresh, undressed salad. We made the rest of dinner in our suites with the spotless kitchens. The ride to Disney is easy and fast on the shuttle,and we bought discounted tickets from the desk clerk. We enjoyed the swimming pool, too. I'd spent a lot of time deciding on the ideal Disney vacation hotel for our family and found it!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here this past week for a trade show and was pleasantly surprised. The hotel is located a few blocks away from Disneyland and the Convention Center.  The rooms, all suites, are incredibly spacious...huge common area with a well-outfitted kitchen, couch and flat screen TV. The bedroom was equally large. Mine had two queens and two full size closets.  The hotel is a few years old, but well maintained. Service and housekeeping was ultra-fast and the free breakfasts were adequately stocked.  Only possible improvement was the bedding...sheets were a bit dry and scratchy. Otherwise, as mentioned above, a rather nice property.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great service and loved the free daily breakfast. Very spacious rooms that are great for family with kids.  I also liked the convenience of buying Disneyland tickets at the front desk. This hotel is a bit on the older side and could use a renovation. The hallways are also a bit dark. Overall, we enjoyed our stay with the convenience of being close to Disney. However, be prepared to pay $4 per adult and $1 per child for the shuttle.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not Up To Par For a Homewood Suites
Summary: I have stayed at many Homewood suites hotels in the past 5 years and have always been very happy with the consistant level of service and quality at each location.  Not the case at this hotel.  The staff was friendly, however the rooms (we moved from our first one) were worn and poorly maintained. The shower had rust in it and the pressure was about the worst of any hotel i have ever stayed in.  The elevators take forever and the breakfast is unbelievably crowded.  When i expressed my frustrations to the GM he said that he would have the problem fixed and that was about it.  Not a terrible hotel, but i will definately stay elsewhere again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  On behalf of my entire staff, I apologize that your experience was not exceptional. You are not the first guest to note an issue with the water pressure from our shower heads, and in response to that feedback, we are replacing all showerheads at the hotel over the next 2 weeks.  I'm happy we are addressing this issue, but I regret that this wasn't done while you were here. The crowds using the elevator and at breakfast can be overwhelming.  We give out Homewood Suites bookmarks at check-in with tips for a successful stay which suggest coming to breakfast early if you want to avoid the "rush hour traffic" that typically takes place the last 45 minutes of breakfast.  I greatly appreciate the kind words about my staff; they are terrific at what they do and they genuinely care about all of our guests. Please contact me at joe.leinacker@hilton.com if there is anything I can do in order for you to give us another opportunity at your business on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: I have to say that i was skeptical of this hotel because we were moved to it due to some reservation issues.  I was pleasantly surprised because it exceeded my expectations.  We have two small children and the daily breakfast and dinner (during week only) were good, the hotel was super nice and clean.  The staff in the eating area was also very nice and friendly.  The staff seemed to go out of their way to talk to us and our kids.  We had great interactions with the front desk staff when dealing with suggestions on where to go, how to get there and the best thing for our family.  (and we ask alot of questions!)  We loved the proximity to disney, knottsberry farm and the beaches.    My few complaints would be: - computers should be for 16 and up.  It was difficult to get time to
Manager Response: We're thrilled that you that you found our hotel and had a great stay!  Superior service and cleanliness and two things that we strive to perfect each day; we're glad that you found this to be true. We do our best to monitor the use in the business center and limit the amount of time one person occupies the computers; please don't hesitate to ask for our assistance if you are unable to use the computer in a reasonable amount of time. We know that the high demand on the elevators each morning can lead to a longer wait time.  We are doing our best to address this for future guests.

Summary: My husband and i just stayed at this hotel for 119 nights..(business travel)....we had a wonderful stay thanks to the staff at this hotel!  Jennifer and Louis at front desk were the kindess we have encountered at a Homewood Suite anywhere in the country!  We have stayed at ALOTof them to! AND Housekeeping Supervisor Maria was one of a kind forsure!!! (and her efficient staff )  our room was exactly like we wanted it to be everytime :)     we thank all of you for our stay in your lovely hotel....ALL of you made it what it was...
Manager Response: When you stay this long with us, you become part of the family.  We enjoyed having you here and I will pass on your compliments to Jennifer, Louis, and Maria.  Please stop in and say hello the next time you're in the area!

Summary: This hotel is great unless  you want to use their Internet.  If my jailbroken iPhone connection is faster, then there's something very wrong.  However, it's about the same speed as most Homewood Suites I've stayed at.  They'd be perfect hotels if they would just upgrade to the 21st Century!!  This particular location has a great common area.  breakfast was exceptional.  The pool & hot tub is very nice!  Very convenient to Disney.  My suite had 2 digital TVs, 1 in the living room and the other in the bedroom.  Very nice!  Channel selection was OK too.  I'd stay here again, but I won't be watching anything on Youtube.
Manager Response: I apologize that there were issues with the Internet during your recent stay.  I believe we have resolved the issue that you experienced and I regret that this negatively affected your visit.  The feedback from our guests is vital to our success and I appreciate that you took the time to share this with us.  If possible, please contact me at either joe.leinacker@hiltion.com or at my direct line at 714-620-2153 so that I may be of further assistance.

Summary Heading: Great family hotel close to Disneyland
Summary: stayed Jan 22 - Jan 27 2011.  Me, my wife, and two kids (3 and 6).  I am a Hilton Honors Diamond VIP and spend a lot of time on the road.  The staff at this hotel is as good as any I've ever encountered.  Property was very clean.  Pool was great.  Breakfast was perfect.  We ate the complimentary dinner twice.  Was good.  Kids loved it and ate plenty.  Breakfast isn't as good as an Embassy Suites, but it's still good and helps to cut down costs.  The rooms have plenty of size for a family of 4-5.      Having a full fridge in the room was helpful.  We made a quick trip to Vons and stocked up on food.  The front desk had warm cookies out each night as we returned from DL.  Kids really looked forward to that.  We used the ART shuttle to DL.  It picks up at the marriot.  Very
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great room if you like shoeboxes
Summary: We took our 4 children to Disneyland for 5 days. They have their own shuttle to the parks which was wonderful! Service was good but the rooms were so small! We have never been in such a small room before. I expected much more from a Hilton chain.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience and I apologize that our suites weren't quite the size that you would have preferred for your family.  While our suites are 1 1/2 times larger than a typical hotel room, larger families may want to check availability for one of our 2 bedroom suites.  These spacious suites have the same living room area as all of our suites; however there are two bedrooms rather than one.  I hope that you will give us another opportunity to be your hotel on your next visit to the Anaheim/Orange County area.  Please let me know if I can ever be of assistance by emailing me at: joe.leinacker@hilton.com.

Summary Heading: Love this hotel will return on next disneyland trip
Summary: My only complaint about this hotel is that it was  difficult to find from the street at first but other than that it was perfect.  Friendly staff, immaculate rooms and very comfortable beds.  The rooms had two tvs which was excellent. The breakfasts and weekday dinners in the large dining room were great especially when tired after Disneyland.  The disney bus picks up and drops off from just outside the door.  The business centre was also handy for banking and keeping in touch with family.  More washing machines and dryers would be great but we got by.  I will be back here again.
Manager Response: We're thrilled that you and your family loved the hotel!  You're right; we are tucked back behind the Outback Steakhouse, but definitely worth finding.  We hope you had a safe trip home to Australia and look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to the States.

Summary: We stayed here four nights before Christmas.  This hotel is located a few minutes from Disneyland/Downtown Disney.  It is centrally located but not within walking distance to Disneyland. You can take the area hotel's bus or drive.  We drove and parked for free at Disneyland with park tickets purchased through AAA.  We traveled with our children and their daughter (5).  They had stayed at the hotel before and were very happy.  When we arrived we were greeted by the front desk staff. I have never experienced a more friendly staff at any other hotel.  EVERY front desk person had exceptional customer service skills.  The lobby and breakfast/dinner area were clean and updated.  We were there during the downpour in LA.  The hotel had a few leaks in the ceiling but nothing big.  This
Manager Response: Thank you for your in-depth review during your recent stay.  We're sorry we got so much rain while you were here in "Sunny" Southern California, but glad you still had a good time.  It's always appreciated when someone takes the time to leave such a detailed review so that the readers can get a comprehensive understanding of the value of the Homewood Suites Anaheim.  We hope we get to see you back here very soon.  Thanks again!!!

Summary: This is a great place to stay when visiting Disneyland.  The shuttle takes you back and forth about every 20 minutes as it is about a mile from Disneyland.  The staff is very friendly and helpful.  They have a huge complimentary breakfast, free business center, laundry facilities.  We had a suite with kitchenette that included full size frig, stovetop, microwave, dishwasher, and disposal.
Manager Response: We're glad you enjoyed your visit to the Homewood Suites and to Anaheim.  We look forward to having you back very soon.

Summary Heading: Designed for families with smaller children
Summary: I stayed with my two teenage sons (17 & 19) and we all agree that while you cannot beat the value and facilities we would not choose to stay again.  This hotel is awesome value for families travelling with smaller children (which is mostly what I saw during my stay).  Our suite was large and roomy with comfortable beds and a full kitchen.  Free wireless was also a bonus with teenagers.  The free breakfast buffet and dinner/drinks from Mon to Thur made the rate excellent value, however the buffets are not 'attended' by staff and it's a bit of an "all-in".  We actually skipped the breakfast on the last few days of our stay (and the dinner ones completely).  The lifts are slow (as mentioned in other posts), though we made good use of the stairs during our stay (there are only 6
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts and positive comments.  We attempt to be a great hotel for adults/children of all ages.  Any additional feedback on what we could do to make the hotel more enjoyable for teenagers would be greatly appreciated.  If you have the time, please send me your teenager's suggestions to joe.leinacker@hilton.com.

Summary Heading: No admittance advised unless you're packing 3+ kids, strollers, and lots of baby wipes
Summary: I'm here on business, and clearly this hotel is designed for families visiting Disney. There, with that caveat out of the way, this hotel is just a beaten-up, worn-out shell of a place. There are dozens and dozens of screaming kids everywhere--watching "Cars" at super-high volume in the lobby, wreaking havoc in the breakfast area, running up and down the halls as though they are lanes on the Autobahn. If you like quiet, this is not the hotel for you.  The actual structure is fine by design, but just seems worn out from what is surely an endless parade of screaming children, harried parents, and mouse ear-wearing tourists. The lobby is ok, but guilty of one of my pet peeves: BLARING television. There are two very old, slow elevators, one of which is very far from the front desk.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your review and I'm sorry that your experience wasn't as positive as usual.  We try to meet the expectations of our corporate guests and typically do, however we do have a large percentage of families in the hotel during the holidays.  I'd welcome the opportunity to get you to give us another try during your next visit to the Anaheim/Orange County area.  If there is anything I can do to make this happen, please contact me at joe.leinacker@hilton.com.

Summary: If you'd like to read a detailed, pretty lengthy review by me of this Homewood, I posted one about our trip last May.  You can click to it through my profile.  This stay was 10/25-28.  We had tickets to the Halloween event at Disneyland and decided to make a mini-vacation out of it.  We've stayed here many times and have always had a great time.  It was completely renovated a few years ago, and now it's even better.  The beds are so comfy that even my love for Disneyland is almost not enough to get me up and out the door to go downstairs and get breakfast for me and my daughter each morning.  Every member of the staff is super-friendly and you'll be asked at least a dozen times a day if there's anything you need, by everyone from housekeeping to maintenance to management.  If
Manager Response: Wow!  We are thrilled that you continue to come back and see us on your trips to Disneyland.  Thank you for the kind comments about our staff.  We know that trips like these are special memories for families and we are happy that we can enhance your vacation.  It is always great to see you here; hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I am currently in the middle of an extended stay at the Homewood Suites with my family while our home is being repaired after some unexpected damage.  This hotel definitely lives up to all of the excellent reviews!  The rooms are fairly spacious - good-sized bedroom which, when you include the bathroom, is about the same size as your typical non-suite hotel room.  There is a huge amount of closet space for a hotel room.  The bedroom has two closets, one what I would call your typical bedroom closet with sliding mirror doors, the other almost a walk-in size.  Perhaps it's overkill for a hotel room, but the abundance of closet space is very welcome for us considering we're on an extended stay and have a lot more of our belongings with us than we would if we were on vacation.  The
Manager Response: I think it's great that you took the time to post your feedback in the middle of your trip.  We believe we are the perfect hotel for anyone visiting the area for more than a day or two as our amenities and space in the suite make an extended visit quite comfortable and affordable.  I followed up with our Housekeeping Department about not getting all of your items re-stocked everyday and don't think this oversight will be made in the future.  Thank you for staying with us!

Summary Heading: Amazing Family Friendly Home Away from Home!!
Summary: My family and I (a group of 11 of us ranging in age from 11 to 73) came to the Homewood Suites in Anaheim last week and it was an amazing experience. I'll break it down into the categories TripAdvisor has:  Cleanliness - very clean. Everyday there was room cleaning and even the pool area and public bathroom was extremely clean.
